[\[202b.4\]]bshad do/_/de bas na 'dir de gso ba'i cho ga 'di thog ma kho nar bshad de/_rims ni thog mar lha chen po drag po zhes bya ba la drang srong shes nyan can zhes bya bas brnyas te/_lha chen po drag po khros nas dbugs btang ba las byung ba/_rlung dang mkhris
[\[202b.5\]]pa dang bad kan so so'i rims dang /_rlung dang mkhris pa 'dus pa'i rims dang /_mkhris pa dang bad kan gnyis 'dus pa'i rims dang /_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum 'dus pa'i rims dang /_glo bur gyi rims dang /_rims rnam pa brgyad
[\[202b.6\]]du gyur to/_/de la rims thog mar byung ba'i thabs ni/_kha zas kyis nyes pa dang /_'dug nyal la sogs pas gnas pa'i nyes pa las nad gzhi rnams pho ba'i nang du zhugs te/_khong pa'i drod phyi rol tu bton pa de dang /_dngas ma dang 'dus shing
[\[202b.7\]]gnas par gyur pas ni rims skyed par byed do/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/_lus grang zhing 'dar ba dang /_mgo 'khor ba dang /_sla ba dang /_ba spu langs pa dang /_slal zhing bya rmyang byed pa dang /_mgo bo dang rked pa dang brla dang rtsib
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]logs na zhing byin snying skyur ba dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_mig dang pags pa'i mdog dang /_sen mo dang /_phyi sa dang /_gcin rnams mdog gnag cing khar ro bska ba bro ba dang /_'gram pa na ba dang /_dbugs mi bde zhing lud pa 'gog
[\[203a.2\]]tu mi btub pa rnams yin no/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/_lus shin tu tsha ba dang /_khong pa tsha ba dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_brgyal ba dang /_rngul 'byung ba dang /_kha'i ro tsha bar bro ba'am/_mgo 'khor ba dang /_sla ba dang /_sna'i
[\[203a.3\]]nad dang /_kha'i nad dang /_mchu dang lkog ma rnams su 'brum pa 'byung ba dang /_khro zhing shin tu khro ba dang /_bsil ba 'dod pa dang /_mig dang /_sen mo dang /_pags pa'i mdog dang /_phyi sa dang /_gcin rnams kyi mdog ser ba dang /_sgregs pa'i ro kha ba
[\[203a.4\]]dang/_'khru ba rnams yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pa lu ba dang /_cham pa dang /_mchil ma mang ba dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_skyug pa dang /_gnyid che ba dang /_lus lci ba dang /_dang ga mer mer por gyur
[\[203a.5\]]pa dang /_slod par gyur pa dang /_khar mngar ba bro ba dang /_grang 'bum 'byung ba dang /_mig dang sen mo dang /_pags pa'i mdog dang /_phyi sa dang /_gcin gyi mdog skya ba dang /_dro ba 'dod pa rnams yin no/_/rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa'i
[\[203a.6\]]rims kyi mtshan ma ni/_skom dad che ba dang /_lus tsha ba dang /_lkog ma skom pa dang /_kha skom pa dang /_spu langs pa dang /_gnyid mi 'ong ba dang /_skyug pa dang /_tshigs dang /_klad pa rab tu na ba rnams yin par bshad do/_/rlung dang bad kan gnyis 'dus pa las
[\[203a.7\]]gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/_snyom pa dang /_slod par gyur pa dang /_lus tsha ba dang /_tshigs dang klad pa na ba dang /_lus lci ba dang /_lus grang ba dang /_lud pa dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_lus rngul ba rnams las rtogs par bya'o/_/mkhris pa dang bad kan
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]tshul ni/_phyed grang phyed tsha ba dang /_yig 'chus pa dang /_rdul 'byung ba dang /_lu ba dang /_snyom pa dang /_khar ro kha ba bro ba dang /_rmongs pa dang /_sgyid lug pa dang /_skom dad che ba rnams yin no/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang /
[\[203b.2\]]bad kan gsum 'dus pa las rims nad du gyur pa'i tshul ni/_tshigs dang rus pa dang /_klad pa na ba dang /_phyed grang phyed tsha ba dang /_snyom pa dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_mgo 'khor ba dang /_lkog ma ngar ngar zer ba dang /_rna bar zug pa dang /_mig dmar zhing yon
[\[203b.3\]]por gyur pa dang /_kha nas mkhris pa dang khrag 'byung ba dang /_skyug pa dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_nub mo gnyid mi 'ong ba dang /_lce tshig pa bzhin nag por 'gyur zhing reg na rtsub pa dang /_lus kyi mdog sngo bsangs su gyur cing /_'brum bu dmar po 'thon pa dang /
[\[203b.4\]]rnams yin te/_rnam pa 'di dag thams cad tshang bar gyur na gsor mi rung ngo /_/tshad par gyur na gso dka' bar bshad de/_glo bur gyi rims ni/
[\[203b.5\]]sems 'khrug pa'i gdung ba las mkhris pa'i rims tsha bar 'gyur te/_de yang 'dod pa dang /_mya ngan dang /_'jigs pa dang /_khro ba rnams sems 'khrug
[\[203b.6\]]mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gsum gang byung ba las rims su gyur pa de dag so so'i mtshan mas bstan to/_/rims nad gso ba'i thabs ni/_rims thog ma byung ma thag tu nyams stobs la mi gnod par smyung ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/
[\[203b.7\]]de la rlung dang ngal ba dang /_khro ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_lud pa lu ba dang /_glo rdol ba rnams la rims su gyur pa la ni smyung ba'i cho ga mi bya'o/_/smyung bar bya ba'i tshad ni bkres shing skom par gyur pa dang /_phyi sa dang gcin tshul bzhin du 'byung bar gyur pa dang /_lus
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]yang bar gyur na smyung ba'i cho ga legs pa yin no/_/smyung ba'i cho ga ha cang drags na ni skem pa'i nad dang /_snyom pa dang /_mgo 'khor ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_ngal ba'i nad du 'gyur ro/_/de la bad kan dang rlung gi rims
[\[204a.2\]]la ni/_skom du chu skol ba dron po blud do/_/mkhris pa dang tsha ba dang dug las gyur pa'i rims la ni skom du ro kha ba skol ba'i khu ba grang mo blud do/_/bca' sga dang /_/ba le ka dang /_ldum bu skra lo dang /_pu shel tse dang /_gla sgang dang tsan dan rnams
[\[204a.3\]]skol ba'i khu ba grang mo blud na yang skom pa dang skyug pa dang /_rims dang /_lus tsha ba sel to/_/smyung ba'i cho ga byas pa'i rjes la/_kha zas smin pa ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan so so'i tshos par byed pa'i sman gang yin pa'i khu ba las gzhi blangs pa'i
[\[204a.4\]]thug pa phan zhing 'phrod par blud do/_/yang na 'bras yos btags pa'i thug pa sla ba bca' sgas btab pa blud do/_/yang na rlung gi rims la ni/_sA lu'i chan ri dgas dang ri bya'i sha khu bcad dang bcas pa sbyin no/_/des zhi bar ma gyur na/_zhag bdun
[\[204a.5\]]lon pa'i 'og tu tshos par byed pa'i sman dang zhi bar byed pa'i sman blud do/_/zhag bdun gyi snga rol rims gsar bu byung ba'i tshe/_sman btang ba ni sman de nyid kyis nad gzhi shin tu skyed par byed de/_de la rlung las gyur pa'i rims la ni tshos par byed pa'i
[\[204a.6\]]sman bi lba la sogs pa rtsa ba lnga skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_sle tres dang /_bca' sga rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na sle tres dang /_gla sgang dang /_byi tsher dang /_bca' sga rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud
[\[204a.7\]]do/_/yang na skyu ru ra dang /_gla sgang dang /_rtsa ba lnga pa dang /_sle tres dang /_'u su'i 'bras bu rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na rtsa mkhris dang /_gla sgang dang /_sle tres dang /_pa la ka dang /_br-i ha tI rnam gnyis dang /_gze ma rnams lhan cig skol
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na s+thi ra dang /_ka le shi dang /_bca' sga rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud na rlung nad la phan no/_/yang na thal tres dang /_pi pi ling dang /_rgun dang /_shu ti'i 'bras bu dang /_ha re nu ka rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang
[\[204b.2\]]na thang shing dang /_br-iMk+Sha da ni dang /_sman ra sna dang /_sgron shing dang /_e la ba lu ka rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na/_sle tres dang /_aM shu ma ti dang /_rgun dang pa t+ya la ka rnams lhan cig skol ba'i ba blud do/_/yang nar sna dang /_shing
[\[204b.3\]]mngar dang /_dong ka dang /_taM pa la dang /_shal ma li dang /_bal rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na khyi lce ba dang /_rgun dang shi ri sar ni dang /_thal tres dang /_sle tres rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/'di rnams ni rlung las gyur
[\[204b.4\]]pa'i rims sel bar byed do/_/gong nas thal tres zhes smos pa man chad kyi sbyor ba lnga po 'di dag kun gyi khu ba ni bu ram dang sbyar bar bya'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims la ni/_tshos par byed pa'i sman skyu ru ra dang /_rgun dang /_ba la ka dang /
[\[204b.5\]]rtsa mkhris rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na pu tse shel dang /_rgun dang /_nim+pa dang /_shing mngar rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na am bra dang /_rtsa mkhris pa dang /_byi tsher pa dang /_sro lo rnams lhan cig skol ba'i
[\[204b.6\]]khu ba blud do/_/yang na dug mo nyung dang /_pu tse shel dang /_gla sgang dang /_shing mngar rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na seng phrom dang /_me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad+ma dang /_thal tres dang /_sle tres rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba kha ra dang
[\[204b.7\]]sbyar ba'am/_/yang na sro lo skol ba'i khu ba grang ba blud na mkhris pa'i rims sel to/_/yang na khyi lce ba dang /_sro lo dang /_ba la ka dang /_pu tse shel dang /_rtsa mkhris dang /_byi tsher rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar zhing blud na
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]mkhris pa'i rims sel to/_/yang na pu tse shel dang /_rtsa mkhris dang /_byi tsher rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blud na mkhris pa'i rims sel to/_/yang na pu tse shel dang /_kat+pal dang /_dug mo nyung
[\[205a.2\]]dang/_gla sgang rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na gong du sman gyi sde tshan bshad pa'i skabs nas smos pa/_thal tres la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang /_ut+pal la sogs pa'i sde tshan gnyis so sor skol ba'i khu ba khar dang sbyar ba so sor blud do/_/
[\[205a.3\]]yang na gla sgang dang /_a ru ra dang /_rgun dang /_pu tse shal dang /_dong ka dang /_sro lo rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na pu tse shel btags te kha ra dang sbyar te btang na mkhris pa'i rims nad sel to/_/yang na pu tse shel dang /_byi tsher dang /
[\[205a.4\]]rtsa mkhris dang /_rtsa sh+ya ma dang /_sro lo dang /_ba sha ka rnams lhan cig bskol te bsgrangs pa'i khu ba kha ra dang sbyar te blud na khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims sel to/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i rims la ni/_tshos par byed pa'i kha lung gi rtsa ba dang /_bca'
[\[205a.5\]]sga dang /_sle tres dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang sbyar ba 'am/_yang na pi pi ling la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bstan pa rnams skol ba'i khu ba nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang sbyar ba blud do/_/yang na pu tse
[\[205a.6\]]shel dang /_a ru ra dang /_dbyi mong dang /_thang shing dang /_yung rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na am ba ta dang /_bu tse shel dang /_murba dang /_a rany+dza dang /_a ri ta dang /_ku la ka rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na bca' sga dang /
[\[205a.7\]]bong nga dkar po dang /_ru rta dang /_thang shing dang /_byi tsher dang /_gla sgang rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na tsha ba gsum zhes bya ba/_bca' sga dang/_pi pi ling dang /_na le sham rnams dang /_sman nag ta ma la dang /_shi ri par+Ni dang /_sgron shing dang /
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]sla tres rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na nA ga ge sar dang /_yung dang /_skyer pa dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_pu tso shel dang /_dug mo nyung lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na bca' sga dang /_byi tsher dang /_pa sha ka dang /_gla sgang rnams
[\[205b.2\]]lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na dong ga dang /_dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang /_murba dang /_bye'u rug pa dang /_ke'u ka rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/sman gyi sbyor ba bdun po 'di dag kyang bad kan gyi rims sel to/_/yang na nim pa
[\[205b.3\]]dang /_bca' sga dang /_sle tres dang /_thang shing dang /_li zung ba dang /_rtsa mkhris dang /_ma ru dang /_pi pi ling dang /_br-i ha tI rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud na bad kan gyi rims sel to/_/yang na sap+ta par+Ni dang /_sle tres dang /_nim pa dang /_stag ma
[\[205b.4\]]rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blud na bad kan gyi rims sel bar byed do/_/rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis 'dus pa'i rims la ni tshos par byed pa'i sman/_kaN+Da ka ri dang /_ba la dang /_ra sna dang /_khyi lce ba dang /_sle tres dang /
[\[205b.5\]]rtsa sh+ya ma rnams skol ba'i khu ba blud na sel bar byed do/_/yang na 'bras bu gsum dang /_sha ma li dang /_ra sna dang /_dong ka dang /_ba shi rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud na/_rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims myur du sel to/_/yang na shing mngar
[\[205b.6\]]dang/_thal tres dang /_rgun dang /_tsan dan dang /_me tog ma b+hu ka dang /_ut+pa la dang /_taM pa la dang /_shug pa dang /_seng phrom dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_pad+ma'i ze ba dang /_ba ru sha ka dang /_pu shel tse rnams chu bzang po'i nang du bskol te bsgrangs
[\[205b.7\]]la zhag lon par byas pa'i nang du/_'bras so brngos la phub ma bsal te btags pa dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_khar dang sbyar te blud na/_rlung dang mkhris pa'i rims dang /_lus tsha ba dang /_skom pa'i nad dang /_brgyal ba dang /_skyug bro ba dang /_mgo 'khor
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]ba dang /_khrag lud pa'i nad rnams sel te sprin la rlung bab pa bzhin no/_/rlung dang bad kan gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims la ni/_tshos par byed pa'i sman pi pi ling dang /_rgun lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs te
[\[206a.2\]]sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba blud do/_/yang na dong ka la sogs pa'i sman gyi sde tshan sngar bstan pa rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba go snyod btab pa dang bu ram dang sbyar te blud do/_/yang na thang shing dang /_sro lo dang /_brgi dang /_gla sgang dang /_shu dag dang /_'u su'i
[\[206a.3\]]'bras bu dang /_kat+pal/_a ru ra dang /_bca' sga dang /_rtsa bu ti ka rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/_shing kun dang /_sbrang rtsi shas bskyed de sbyar ba 'thungs na/_bad kan dang /_rlung gi rims dang /_skyigs bu dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /
[\[206a.4\]]lkog nad lha gor dang /_lud pa dang /_skem pa'i nad dang /_mchil ma mang du 'byung ba rnams sel to/_/shing la thog shog 'bab pa bzhin no/_/bad kan dang mkhris pa gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims la ni/_tshos par byed pa'i sman shing mngar dang /
[\[206a.5\]]ba la dang /_a rish+ta dang /_pa to la dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_'di rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na myur du sel bar byed do/_/yang na yung dang skyer ma dang /_gla sgang dang /_pu shel tse dang /_shing mngar dang dong ga rnams lhan cig skol ba'i
[\[206a.6\]]khu ba bsgrangs te/_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blud na/_/bad kan dang /_mkhris pa'i rims med par byed do/_/nang gzhi rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims gso ba'i thabs ni/_gnyis shas che la gcig shas
[\[206a.7\]]chung na gang shas chung ba de'i stobs bskyed par bya'o/_/gcig shas che la gnyis shas chung na gang shas che ba'i stobs dbri bar bya'o/_/yang na gang shas chung ba de'i stobs bskyed par bya ste/_de ltar shas che chung mi mnyam pa la ni/_mdor na gang shas che ba'i
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]stobs ni dbri/_gang shas chung ba'i stobs ni bskyed de/_ci nas kyang stobs mnyam zhing cha mthun par bya'o/_/gsum char shas mnyam du 'khrug pa la ni/_thog mar bad kan gzhil ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu mkhris pa gzhil ba'i cho
[\[206b.2\]]ga bya'o/_/de nas rlung gzhil ba'i cho ga bya ste/_de lta bu'i tshul gyis nad gzhi gsum las gyur pa'i rims gzhom par bya'o/_/de la gsum 'dus pa'i rims la ni tshos par byed pa'i sman d+ha ma ka dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_thang shing dang /_shug
[\[206b.3\]]pa dang /_tsan dan dang /_pu shel tse dang /_pu tse shel dang /_shing pa ru sha ka rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na rtsa ba gsum dang /_gla sgang dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_pu tse shel dang /_pa to la dang /_ha ri sta dang /_dug mo nyung dang /
[\[206b.4\]]rtsa mkhris dang /_sle tras dang /_pa ta rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba yang nad gzhi gsum las gyur pa'i rims sel to/_/gsum 'dus pa'i rims de'i mjug tu sna drung du skrangs bar gyur na de ni gso dka' ba yin te/_gtar te khrag dbyung ba dang /
[\[206b.5\]]sman gyis bsku ba dang /_mar btung bas gzhil bar bya'o/_/nad gzhi gsum 'dus pas lus dang ngag dang sems kyi spyod pa rnams ro bzhin du bya ba mi byed par bsdus nas/_srog la thug pa'i nad ror 'byin pa zhes bya ba skyed par byed do/_/
[\[206b.6\]]ror 'byin pa'i nad de mi la thebs par gyur na/_shi ba'i khongs su bcug ste/_so shi bsngo bar dam bcas nas/_snod chur bying ba snyeg pa bzhin du/_bang bya stod la myur du nyams su blang zhing gso bar bya'o/_/de la gso ba'i thabs ni/_shing tog kha lung gi
[\[206b.7\]]khu ba shing kun dang /_bca' sga dang /_sman ro tsha ba dang /_kha ba dang /_rno ba dag dang sbyar ba'i khu ba btsags pa slar dran par ma gyur gyi bar du khar blugs so/_/shing ma d+hu ka'i snying po dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_shu dag dang /_na le sham dang /_pi pi ling rnams
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]cha mnyam la chu'i nang du bdar te btsags nas snar blugs na yang slar dran par 'gyur ro/_/shi ri sha'i 'bras bu dang /_pi pi ling dang /_na le sham dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_skyer khaN+Da dang /_byi sku dang /_ldong ros dang /_shu dag rnams
[\[207a.2\]]cha mnyam la ba gcin gyi nang du bdar te btsags nas mig tu bskus na yang dran par 'gyur ro/_/gang cho ga de ltar byas te/_/yang na slar dran par gyur pa de ni 'phral ba'am/_rkang pa gnyis kyi rting par lcags kyi thur mas bsreg go/_/bya g+h+ri dang /_byi
[\[207a.3\]]tsher dang /_b+ha gi dang /_li zur ba dang /_bu bran shing dang /_ma nu rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na yang /_bad kan dang /_ror 'byin pa'i nad rims rmang du zhi bar byed do/_/kha lung dang /_shing skasma b+hi dang /_bilba dang /_bya g+h+ri dang /
[\[207a.4\]]pA thA dang /_e raN+Da'i rtsa ba rnams skol ba'i khu ba lan tshwa dang ba gcin dang sbyar te blud na yang ror 'byin pa'i nad dang /_lto sbo zhing rtul ba'i nad sel to/_/ka ra bi dang /_ma nu dang /_e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang /_khyi lce ba dang /_ba sha ka dang /_sle tres dang /_sngar bshad
[\[207a.5\]]pa'i rtsa ba lnga pa chen po zhes bya ba bilba la sogs pa dang /_rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu zhes bya ba pr-iSh+Na par+Ni la sogs pa dang /_lnga tshan che chung gnyis bsdus pa'i ming ni/_rtsa ba bcu pa zhes ste/_bcu po de dag dang /_li zur ba dang /_bu bran shing dang /_byi tsher dang /_b+hargi dang /
[\[207a.6\]]pu na sna ba dang /_'di rnams cha mnyam la ba gcin gyi nang du bskol te 'thungs na yang dran pa sor chud par 'gyur zhing /_ror 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i rims tshabs chen po dang /_ngal ba'i nad tshabs chen po yang myur du sel bar byed do/_/ka raN+Da dang /_kru trug
[\[207a.7\]]tres dang /_btsod dang /_khyi lce ba dang /_bilba dang /_ku la ka dza dang /_br-i ha tI rnam gnyis dang /_ka ra bI dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_'di rnams skol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na yang /_ror 'byin pa'i nad kyi rkyen gyis mid pa 'gags shing sgra ngar ngar por gyur pa
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]yang sel bar byed do//_//da ni rims ldang dub kyi dus mi 'dra bar bshad de/_dngas ma la sogs pa lus zungs bdun gyi gnas rnams rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi gsum po rnams zhugs pa las rims ldang dub can du gyur te/_de yang rgyun chags
[\[207b.2\]]kyi rims dang /_rtag pa'i rims dang /_nyin re ba'i rims nyi ma gnyis shing lan gcig gi ldang ba'i rims dang /_nyi ma gsum zhing lan gcig ldang ba'i rims dang /_rnam pa lngar gyur te de dag gso ba'i thabs ni/_tshos par byed pa'i sman shing nim ba dang
[\[207b.3\]]a ru ra dang /_sle tres dang /_gla sgang dang /_ba to la dang /_dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu rnams cha mnyam ste lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_khyi lce ba dang /_pu tse shel dang /_ba tha dang /_thal tres rnam gnyis dang /_'di rnams cha mnyam ste lhan cig sbyar ba dang /_pa to la
[\[207b.4\]]dang /_a rish+ta dang /_rgun dang /_dod gdang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_pa tha sha ka sha mas cha mnyam ste lhan cig sbyar ba dang/_tsan dan dkar po dang /_pu shel tse dang /_'u su'i 'bras bu dang /_gla sgang dang /_sle tres dang /_bca' sga rnams cha mnyam ste lhan
[\[207b.5\]]cig sbyar ba dang /_thang shing dang /_s+thi ra dang /_bca' sga dang /_ba sha ka dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_a ga ru rnams cha mnyam ste lhan cig sbyar ba dang /_sman gyi sbyor ba lnga po 'di dag so sor skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang sha kha ras bskyed de sbyar ba so sor
[\[207b.6\]]'thungs na/_sman gyi sbyor ba re res gong du smos pa'i rims nad rnam pa lnga po re re sel bar byed do/_/rims nad kyi grangs dang sman gyi sbyor ba'i grangs kyi go rim bzhin du so sor sbyar ro/_/yang na rims lnga po re re zhing yang sman gyi sde tshan lnga char gyis so so nas sel
[\[207b.7\]]bar yang bshad do/_/de ltar tshos par byed pa'i cho ga bshad nas/_rims nad can gyi khong na nad gzhi tshos par gyur pa na gnas pa slar ma phyin na yang gnod pa chen por gyur te/_de bas na khong na nad gzhi tshos par gyur pa dang /_tshos par ma gyur pa yod
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]pa/_nyams stobs dang dus dang nad las dpags te ci rigs par bkru sman gyis dbyung bar bya'o/_/de la bkru sman ni shing mngar dang /_dong ga dang /_rgun dang /_pu tse shel dang /_pa tha dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_pa to la
[\[208a.2\]]rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/_a ru ra'i phye ma btab pa ni bkru bar byed de rims sel to/_/pa to la dang /_dong ga dang /_pu tse shel dang /_bi shal dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_shing nye rang rnams skol ba'i khu ba nas tshig 'khus pa'i
[\[208a.3\]]thal ba dang sbyar ba ni 'khru bar byed do/_/rims thams cad sbyong ngo /_/pu tse shel dang /_a ru ra dang /_shing nye rong dang /_dan+ti'i rtsa ba dang /_khyi lce ba dang /_dong ga dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang/_mar dang /_rgyam tsha rnams lhan cig skol
[\[208a.4\]]ba'i khu ba yang 'khru bar byed de rims sel to/_/'bras bu gsum dang /_pi pi ling dang /_shing nye rong dang /_rtswa sh+ya ma rnams zhib tu btags la/_kha ra dang /_sbrang rtsi dang sbrus te ri lur byas pa yang 'khru bar byed pa yin te/_'dus pa'i rims dang /
[\[208a.5\]]'or nad skrangs pa dang /_khrag lud pa'i nad sel to/_/rims rnying dang /_bad kan zad par gyur pa la ni 'o ma bdud rtsi dang 'dra'o/_/rims gsar bu la ni de dug dang 'dra ste mi gsod par byed do/_/de la 'o ma gtang ba'i thabs ni/_'o ma rtsa ba lnga pa
[\[208a.6\]]dang bskol te bsgrangs pa'am/_yang na 'o ma chu bzhi 'gyur dang bskol te chu du bar byas pa'am/_yang na 'o ma shing sha pa'i snying po dang skol ba'am/_yang na 'o ma bzhos pa'i 'phro la dron po 'thungs na rims sel to/_/'o ma pi pi ling dang /_shing mngar
[\[208a.7\]]dang/_rgun dang /_ldum bu pa la dang /_tsan dan dkar po dang /_thal tres rnams dang lhan cig bskol te 'thungs na rims myur du sel to/_/'o ma shing bilba gzhon nu dang skol ba'am/_yang na e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang skol ba 'thungs na de ma thag tu gdug pa'i
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]rims sel bar byed do/_/'o ma bu ram dang /_bca' sga dang /_ba la dang /_bya g+hi dang /_gze ma dang lhan cig bskol te bsgrangs pa 'thungs na/_skrangs pa dang /_rims dang /_phyi sa dang /_gcin 'gags pa zhi bar byed do/_/'o ma'i tshogs kyang ma smon te/
[\[208b.2\]]rims kyi drod kyis mdongs med par byas pa la ni gso ba'i thabs gzhan bya ste/_mar khu nyi tshe'am/_yang mar sman dang skol ba'i me'i drod las dpags te btung bar bya'o/_/de la mar sman dang skol ba ni/_rgun dang skol ba'am/_yang na ba la dang skol ba 'am
[\[208b.3\]]yang na shing mngar dang skol ba'am/_yang na 'bras bu gsum dang skol ba'am/_yang na sle tres dang skol ba'i mar 'thungs na de ma thag tu rims sel bar byed do/_/ba sha ka chen po'i mar zhes bya ba ni/_shing ba sha ka dang /_shing a ri sh+ta dang /_sle tres dang /
[\[208b.4\]]b+hargi dang /_rtsa ba lnga pa dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_byi tsher dang /_shing mngar dang /_rgun dang /_btang pa la rnams btags pa'i phye ma zho gnyis gnyis mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang bskol te chu du bar byas pa'i mar 'di'i ming
[\[208b.5\]]ni ba sha ka chen po'i mar zhes bya ste/_de la tshod ran par 'thungs na rims thams cad sel to/_/ba sha ka chung ngu'i mar bya ba ni/_shing ba sha ka skol ba'i khu ba dang /_ba sha ka nyid phye mar btags pa rnam pa gnyis kyis mar skol la sman gyi khu ba du bar byas te
[\[208b.6\]]bsgrangs nas sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i ming ni ba sha ka chung ngu'i mar zhes bya ste/_de las tshod ran par 'thungs na/_rims dang glo gcong chen po zad byed kyi nad dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pa dang /_skya rbab dang /_mkhris pa dang /_khrag lud pa'i nad
[\[208b.7\]]sel to/_/dge ba'i mar zhes bya ba ni/_ru rta dang /_sug smel dang /_rgya spos dang /_bal bu dang /_dan+ta'i rtsa ba dang /_thang shing dang /_e la ba lu ka dang /_tsan dan dkar po dang /_ut+pa la dang /_btsod dang /_bi sha la dang /_br-i ha tI rnam gnyis dang /
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]yung dang /_skyer pa dang /_thal tres rnam gnyis dang /_bar+Ni rnam gnyis dang /_ha re nu ka dang /_pad+ma'i ze ba dang /_byi dong ka dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_rtsa sh+ya ma dang /_sri shing rna ma'i me tog dang /_bal po se'u
[\[209a.2\]]rnams cha mnyam ste/_zho gnyis gnyis zhib tu btags la mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang /_lhan cig tu bskol nas/_chu du bar byas pa ni dge ba'i mar zhes bya ste/_'di ni nyams stobs skyed cing bzhin mdog bzang ba dang /
[\[209a.3\]]bu mang bar byed la/_rims dang brjed byed dang /_smyo phyed dang /_gcin snyi ba'i nad dang /_skrangs ba dang dug sel te/_dreg dang /_skya rbab dang /_skren dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_skyigs bu 'ong ba dang /_gcin 'gags pa drag po rnams kyang 'joms
[\[209a.4\]]par byed do/_/dge ba chen bo zhes bya ba'i mar ni/_gong ma dge ba'i mar de dang /_sman de dag nyid kyi steng du/_'tsho byed ces bya ba'i sman sna bcu ste/_dzi ba ka dang /_ri sha ba ka dang /_me da dang /_ma hA me da dang /_bu tshad rto dang /_ra mnye ba dang /_mung+ga
[\[209a.5\]]par+Ni dang /_ka sha par+Ni dang /_dzi ban+ti dang /_shing mngar rnams dang /_rtsab bcu sngar smos pa rnams kyis kyang bsnan la/_'o ma mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/_'o ma du bar byas pa'i mar gyi ming ni dge ba chen po'i mar zhes bya ste nad do cog sel
[\[209a.6\]]to/_/dug mo nyung dang /_pu shel tse dang /_ti ra dang /_pu tse shel dang /_tsan dan dkar po dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_gla sgang dang /_khyi lce ba dang /_thal tres dang /_bilba dang /_rgun dang /_ta ma la ka dang /_pi pi ling dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_bya
[\[209a.7\]]g+h+ri dang /_'di rnams zhib tu btags te/_sngar phye ma'i sman sbyar ba'i thabs bstan pa bzhin du skol ba'i mar ni rims sel zhing /_glo gcong chen po zad par byed ba dang /_lus tsha ba dang /_lud pa 'jam por byed de/_glo 'or dang klad pa na ba yang med par
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]byed do/_/gla sgang dang /_a ri sta dang /_s+thi ra dang/_byi tsher dang /_ba la dang /_sro lo dang /_gze ma dang /_khyi lce ba dang /_da pa ni dang /_bya g+h+ri dang ka la shi rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba dang /_mar gyi nang du phye ma'i sman ma nu dang /_rgun dang /_med dang /_skyu
[\[209b.2\]]ru ra dang /_dzad dang /_dan+ta'i rtsa ba rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma skol la sman gyi khu ba du bar byas te btsags pa'i mar ni rims dang /_glo gtsong zad byed dang /_lud pa dang /_klad pa'i nad sel to/_/dpyad de dag gis kyang rims rnying thams cad la/_nad
[\[209b.3\]]gzhi long ga na gnas pa ma phyin na/_sman mar mas btang ba dang /_bkru sman drag po mas btang ba gnyi ga cho ga bzhin du bya'o/_/de la sman mar mas btang ba ni/_tsan dan dkar po dang /_me tog ut+pal dang /_ta ba la dang /_shing mngar dang /_a ka ru dang /
[\[209b.4\]]ku la ka rnams dang /_til mar dang /_lhan cig skol ba mas btang na rims thams cad sel to/_/yang na pa to la dang /_po son cha dang /_a rista dang /_sle tres dang /_shing mngar rnams dang til mar lhan cig pa'i sman mar mas btang na des kyang rims sel
[\[209b.5\]]to/_/yang na 'jam rtsi mas btang ba la phan pa zhes bya ba'i sman/_d+ha ba ni dang /_pa shi ka dang /_thang shing dang /_sug smel dang /_pa tha dang /_ra sna dang /_pa la dang /_shu dag dang /_dzi ba ka dang /_zangs rtsi ba dang /_med dang /_med chen po dang /_ru rta dang /
[\[209b.6\]]par+N-i rnam gnyis dang /_pi pi ling dang /_sle tres dang /_ga tha ma dang /_po son cha dang /_bu bran shing dang /_shing mngar dang /_a ri sta dang /_ba sha ka dang /_a shwa gan+d+ha rnams las zho gnyis gnyis zhib tu btags la/_til mar srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad
[\[209b.7\]]dang /_chu til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang /_'di rnams lhan cig tu skol la chu du bar byas nas btsags pa'i til mar 'di las tshod ran par mas btang na rims nad thams cad sel zhing /_rlung nad tshabs chen po thams cad med par byed do/_/bkru sman drag po mas
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]btang ba zhes bya ba ni/_pa to la'i rtsa ba dang /_po son cha dang /_pu tse shel dang /_gze ma dang /_dong ga dang /_stir dang /_ba la dang /_a ri sha dang /_gla sgang dang /_pu shel tse rnams lhan cig tu 'o ma dang /_chu 'o ma phyed kyi nang du skol la/
[\[210a.2\]]chu du bar byas te/_'o ma nyi tshe lus pa bsgrangs la/_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar dang sbyar ba'i nang du/_po son cha dang /_gla sgang dang /_pi pi ling dang /_dug mo nyung dang /_shing mngar rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma dang sbyar ba 'di rims so cog bsal ba'i phyir
[\[210a.3\]]mas btang na/_nad gzhi phyir 'byung zhing lus shin tu dag par 'gyur te de ma thag tu rims med par byed do/_/yang na bkru sman drag po mas btang ba ni/_po son cha dang /_dong ga dang /_pu tse shel dang /_shing mngar dang /_lo ma rnam bzhi zhes bya ba/_sa
[\[210a.4\]]la brti dang /_br-iSh+N-i bar+Ni dang /_mung+ga par+Ni dang /_ma sha par+Ni rnams skol ba'i khu ba dron mo'i nang du/_rtswa sh+ya ma'i rtsa ba dang /_nye'u shing gi rtsa ba dang /_gla sgang dang /_shing mngar dang /_po son cha rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar
[\[210a.5\]]dang bu ram sbyar ba ni bkru sman btang ba'i nang na mchog yin te/_btang ma thag tu rims rnying gi gnod pa thams cad sel to/_/yang na bkru sman drag po mas btang ba ni/_pr-iSh+Na bar+Ni dang /_s+thi ra dang /_po son cha dang /_ba la rnams skol ba'i khu ba dron mo'i
[\[210a.6\]]nang du/_pi pi ling dang /_po son cha dang /_shing mngar dang /_gla sgang rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma dang /_mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_sha ra'i khu ba dang /_rgyam tsha bro ba tsam dang /_'di rnams sbyar te mas btang na rims sel cing yi ga 'bye ba
[\[210a.7\]]dang /_rngul phyin pa dang /_nyams stobs skyed par byed do/_/sman mas btang ba'i cho ga 'di dag gi skabs su/_sman gyi tshad la sogs pa cho ga bzhin du ma smos pa ni/_'og nas las lnga'i le'u las rgyas par 'byung ngo /_/rims ldang dub can gyis
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]gnod par gyur pa la ni/_'o ma skol ba pi pi ling gi phye ma dang sbyar te gzhan mi bsam par btung ngo /_/yang na 'o ma skol ba'i nang du/_nyin re bzhin pi pi ling bcu bcur bskyed de btab pa 'thungs la/_pi pi ling gi grangs brgyar phyin nas slar yang nyin re bzhin bcu
[\[210b.2\]]bcu bri ste btung bar bya'o/_/'o ma dang mar bskol te bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang /_kha ra dang /_pi pi ling dang sbyar te dkrugs pa 'thungs na/_rims ldang dub can dang /_snying na ba dang /_glo rdol pa dang /_lud pa dang /_glo gcong zad byed kyi nad sel to/_/bi wa'i phye
[\[210b.3\]]zhun mar dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na dar ba dang sbyar ba'am yang na 'o ma dang /_ba lang gi lce ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba 'thungs na rims ldang dub can sel to/_/thog ma rims kyis 'debs par tsher ma thag tu ni mar khu mang du 'thungs la phyir skyug par bya'o/_/yang na rims
[\[210b.4\]]kyis thog mar 'debs pa tshor ma thag tu/_kha zas 'grangs par zos la/_chang zhim po mang du 'thungs te nyal na 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na shing kun dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_mar rnying pa gsum sbyar te blugs so/_/yang na rims la/_ldong ros dang /_pi pi ling
[\[210b.5\]]dang /_rgyam tsha rnams las 'bras kyi 'bru tsam re re zhib par til mar dang lhan cig btags te mig tu bsku'o/_/rims ldang dub can la ni/_nas dang /_yungs kar dang /_ru rta dang /_nim+ba'i lo ma dang /_rtsa ba pha la sha dang /_shu dag dang /_a ru ra
[\[210b.6\]]rnams cha mnyam ste/_zhun mar dang sbyar la bsregs te snar bdug par bya'o/_/yang na sa he de ba dang /_shu dag dang /_gla sgang chen po dang /_na khu li rnams btags te lhan cig tu sbyar ba bsregs te snar bdug go/_/yang rims zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sman de
[\[210b.7\]]dag gong ma gnyis kyis lus bsku ba'am lus dril bar bya'o/_/shi ri sha dang /_bilba dang /_a mra dang /_a d+hid tha dang /_a rdzun rnams kyi lo ma dang /_skye ba dang /_skyer pa dang /_'di rnams btags la lhan cig tu sbyar te bsregs pas bdugs na yang
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]rims so cog dang /_gdon thams cad sel to/_/gu gul dang /_d+h+ya ma ka dang /_shu dag dang /_sra rtsi pog dang /_nim+ba dang /_arka dang /_a ka ru dang /_thang shing dang /_'di rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba'i bdug pa 'di'i ming ni
[\[211a.2\]]gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ste/_des bdugs na yang rims nad thams cad sel to/_/rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang /_til mar gnyis las srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang /_zho kha chu til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du/_a sho gan+d+ha dang /_yung dang /_thang
[\[211a.3\]]shing dang/_ha re nu ka dang /_ru rta dang /_gla sgang dang /_tsan dan dkar po dang /_murba dang /_spod dang /_ra sna dang /_shu ti dang /_la phug rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu bskol te/_til mar 'ba' zhig lus pa'i ming ni rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i mar
[\[211a.4\]]zhes bya ste/_des lus bsku ba la sogs pa byas na rims so cog dang /_zad byed kyi nad dang /_smyo byed dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_brjed byed dang /_rlung sel cing /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po 'joms par byed la/
[\[211a.5\]]sgrum ma rnams la yang dge ba yin no/_/mi mkhris pa'i nad drag pos btab nas lus shin tu tsha bar gyur pa la ni/_khong pa bsil zhing bser bu 'ong ba'i gnas su bzhag la/_bsil ba'i cho ga 'og nas 'byung ba 'di dag bya'o/_/de la bsil bar bya
[\[211a.6\]]ba'i cho ga ni skyu ru ra mar gyi nang du brngos te btab pa'i phye ma rtsabs skyur pos 'dag gu byas pas lus la bskus na tsha ba zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na chu'i lbu ba'am/_rgya shug gi lo ma brdungs te/_rtsabs skyur bas btab pa'am/_nya lcibs shin tu
[\[211a.7\]]bsil ba 'am/_rtswa dUrba btags pa rtsabs skyur bas btab pa'am/_'dam shin tu bsil bas lus thams cad bsku bar bya'o/_/yang na sngar smos pa'i shing n+ya gro d+ha la sogs sman gyi sde tshan nam/_me tog ut+pal la sogs pa sman gyi sde tshan
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]phye mar byas la/_rtsabs skyur po dang sbyar bas lus la bsku bar bya'o/_/yang na sman gyi sde tshan de gnyis las gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs ba'i nang du/_tsha ba mi bzod pa'i mi nyid 'ju bar bya'o/_/yang na bu ram chang ngam/_rgun chang gi
[\[211b.2\]]tsha'am/_chang tham le pa'am/_rtsabs skyur ba'am/_'o ma'i rgun lus la byug na yang tsha ba sel te bzang ngo /_/shug pa dang /_me tog ut+pal dang /_ka lta ra dang /_pad+ma'i rtsa lag dang /_le brgan rtsi dang /_pu shel tse dang /_btsod dang /_pad+ma dang /
[\[211b.3\]]btsag dang /_ka tal dang /_thal tres rnam gnyis dang /_seng phrom dang /_gla sgang dang /_rgun dang /_'bra go dang /_tsan dan dkar po dang /_skyu ru ra dang nye'u shing rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/_sman de dag nyid kyi phye ma dang /_rgya skyegs kyi khu
[\[211b.4\]]ba dang /_'o ma dang /_tsha dang /_rtsabs kyi dngas ma dang /_zho kha chu dang til mar rnams blugs te bskol la til mar nyi tshe lus par byas la btsags pa 'di ni pags pa'i mdog bzang zhing /_lus tsha ba dang /_skom pa'i nad sel ba'i mchog yin te lus la bsku bar
[\[211b.5\]]bya'o/_/ka ling ya ka dang /_rgya shu ka dang /_a dan+ta dang /_shing mngar dang /_btsag rnams btags la zhun mar dang sbyar te mgor bskus na yang skom pa'i nad dang /_lus tsha ba'i gnod pa sel to/_/bal po se'u dang /_rgya shug dang /_seng phrom dang /_da d+hi tha
[\[211b.6\]]dang/_kha lung rnams btags la zhun mar dang sbyar/_'dis kyang skom pa'i nad dang lus tsha ba sel to/_/mgo bsku bar bya'o/_/pad+ma'i lo ma dang /_chu shing gi lo ma dang nyi sngo ba'i steng du nyal la/_shing tA la'i lo ma tsan dan brdar ba'i khu ba'i nang du dmyugs pa'i
[\[211b.7\]]bsil g.yob kyis g.yabs na yang lus tsha ba'i gnod pa sel to/_/rdzing bu'i me tog pad+ma kha bye ba dang ldan pa'i phyogs sam/_chu 'dren ba'i 'khrul 'khor yong ba'i phyogs su bsil khang bzang po byas pa'i nang du 'dug cing /_bud med kyi lus tsan dan gyi 'dag
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]gus byugs pas mthar sbyar na yang /_lus tsha ba'i gnod pa sel to//_//da ni bad kan dang /_rlung gi rims kyis thebs te/_grang bas nyen pa'i cho ga bshad de/_de ltar grang bas nyen pa la ni/_khyim dron po'i nang
[\[212a.2\]]du 'dug la rngul gdon pa'i dugs bya zhing gos lci ba la sogs pa bgo bar bya'o/_/sman ka ya sta dang /_na gu li dang /_pu tse shel dang /_sle tres dang /_a ka ru dang /_na ku ta ku dang /_sa ha de ba dang /_shu dag rnams lhan cig sbyar bas lus byug cing de
[\[212a.3\]]dag bsregs pas lus bdugs na yang grang ba sel to/_/yang na sman de dag nyid btags pa'i phye ma dang /_lan tshwa dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /_tshwa dang rtsabs skyur ba la sogs pa dang /_til mar rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i til mar nyi tshe
[\[212a.4\]]lus pas lus la bskus na yang grang ba sel to/_/zho kha chu 'am/_ba gcin nam/_tshwa dron pos lus la byug gam/_yang na byi'u rug pa dang /_zan tig li dang /_shi kru rnams brdungs pas lus la bskus na yang grang ba sel to/_/yang na sbrebs par
[\[212a.5\]]gyur pa la ni rlung sel ba'i rtsi shing rnams dang /_gso ma brdungs ba'i khu ba dron po'i nang du/_lums su 'jug par bya'o/_/yang na thang shing dang a ka ru bsregs pas bdug gam/_yang na pog dang /_k+Sha bu ka bsregs pas bdug par bya'o/_/
[\[212a.6\]]bud med lang tshol bab pa nu ma rgyas shing 'bur la yid tsam dbyibs dgu zhing /_rked pa la sogs pa'i lus/_a ka ru'i lde gus byugs pa dang /_mthar sbyar na yang grang ba shin tu sbrebs pa med par byed do//_//da ni rims nad can gyi kha zas kyi
[\[212a.7\]]bye brag bshad de/_rims nad can la ni/_kha zas 'bras sA lu shun lpags dmar po la sogs pa dang /_'bras zhag drug cus smin pa bzang ngo /_/tshod ma dang /_khu bcud du ni/_sran chung dang /_mon sran tsa na dang /_mon sran sde'u dang /_rgya
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]sran dang /_mon sran na gu bzang ngo /_/bya na dang /_khu bcud ni/_ri bong dang /_dgo ba dang /_'ur ba dang /_bya bar ti ra dang /_brta ka dang /_gong ma sreg rnams kyi sha bzang ngo /_/tshod ma ni shing pa ta la'i lo ma dang /_brta ka dang /_karko ta la
[\[212b.2\]]sogs pa bzang ngo /_/de la cho gar bsrung ba'i mdo ni/_rims na ba'am/_rims byang nas nyams ma brtas kyi bar du kha zas lci ba dang /_bsil ba dang /_chu grang mo dang /_nyin par nyal ba dang /_mgo mi 'thub ste ngal bar gyur pa rnams bsgrims te bsdad
[\[212b.3\]]par bya'o/_/rims la nad bla gnyan 'byung ba mgo 'khor ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_skyug pa la sogs par gyur na/_rims nyid la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i so so'i sman gang 'os pa rnams kyis de bsal bar bya'o/_/rims
[\[212b.4\]]drag po 'byung du mi btub cing cho ga gzhan gyis ma slon pa la ni sman chen po lus la gdags pa dang /_sman gyi khu ba'am sngags chus khrus bya ba dang /_zhi ba'i cho ga dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_gtor ma sbyin pa dang /_dka' thub spyad pa dang /_grub pa'i sngags kyi
[\[212b.5\]]cho ga rgyas par bya ba rnams kyis zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rims nad byung ba'i mtshan ma ni/_kha zas 'dod pa dang /_mgo g.ya' ba dang /_sbrid pa 'byung ba dang /_lus yang ba dang /_rdul 'byung ba dang /_khar 'byung ba rnams la rtogs par bya'o/_/rims
[\[212b.6\]]nad gso ba'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so//_//'chi ltas kyi le'u bshad pa/_nad pa zad par ma shes te/_gya tshom du sman gyi las byas na/_ngal gyi snon de las sto bar zad do/_/de bas na phrin pa dang /_'chi ltas dang /_mtshan ma 'di gsum las
[\[212b.7\]]tshe rtogs par bya'o/_/de 'chi ltas ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba de'i ngang tshul dang /_lus kyi mdog dang /_dbang po dang /_spyod pa'i tshul rnams 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni/_mdor na sman pa mchog gis 'chi ltas su rig par bya'o/_/de la dbang po rnams don
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]rnams la log par 'dzin la/_sman pa dang mdza' bo bla ma la sdang zhing dgra la dga' bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/nam thang ba la sprin dang /_'ja' dang /_glog mthong zhing /_gzhal med khang dang bzhon pa rnams
[\[213a.2\]]kyis nam mkha' khebs par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/_/skar ma lha mo sgrib med ces bya ba dang /_skar ma gong cug dang /_dgu tshigs mi mthong ba dang /_sa chen po gom pa brgyad khor khor yug tsam du chung ngur mthong ba de ni srog gi
[\[213a.3\]]dbang po 'das zin pa yin no/_/nyin par skar ma me 'bar ba 'dra ba mthong ba dang /_nyi ma'i mdog kha dog sna tshogs su mthong ba dang /_rlung la gzugs yod par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni nges par 'chi bar bstan to/_/nyi ma 'char ba'i ngos la bu gu
[\[213a.4\]]dod par mthong ba dang /_mar me shi ba'i dri snar mi tshor ba de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/me long la sogs pa la bdag gi gzugs brnyan yan lag ma tshang bar mthong ngam/_yang na ye med par mthong ba dang /_sems can sna tshogs kyi cha byad mthong na
[\[213a.5\]]de ni gshin rje'i khyim na gnas pa yin no/_/mig g.yon pa khung du bros pa 'am/_lce nag por gyur tam/_sna'i dbyibs 'gyur ram/_mchu nag por gyur cing dbyibs nyams sam/_kha mnam por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni spang bar bya'o/_/
[\[213a.6\]]mig dmar por gyur pa dang /_mig dmar bar gyur pa dang /_mig mi 'gyur ba dang /_mchi mas gang ba dang /_ya yor gyur pa dang /_smin ma zhum pa dang /_ya yor gyur pa de ni ror gyur par shes par bya'o/_/bzhin gyi mdog dmar ba dang /
[\[213a.7\]]gnag pa dang /_ser ba dang /_sdo sangs su gyur pa dang /_ngo tsha med pa dang /_mdog mi sdug par gyur pa dang /_dran pa nyams pa gang yin pa de'i tshe ni 'das zin par shes par bya'o/_/mgo bo la ba lang gi lci ba'i phye mas stug por khebs pa
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]lta bur snang ba dang /_skra bshig pa dang /_sen mo dang /_so mdog mi sdug par gyur cing zho byung bar gyur na/_de ni tshe zad par shes par bya'o/_/dpral rtsa ser skya dang /_dud ka dang /_dmar ba dang /_sngo sangs dang /_nag po dang /_dkar po lta bur
[\[213b.2\]]gyur pa gang la snang ba ni gshin rje'i khyim du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/dpral ba la shig 'gro ba dang /_gtor ma bya rog mi 'dod pa dang /_ha cang gnyid che ba dang /_ha cang gnyid med par gyur pa de'i tshe ni ring por mi thub po/_long bu dang /_pus mo'i lha
[\[213b.3\]]nga dang /_dpral ba dang /_phrag pa dang /_mkhur tshos dang /_'gram pa dang /_mur 'gram gyi sha lhod pa dang /_sha 'phyang bar gyur ba gang yin pa de ni srog ring por mi thogs par spong bar 'gyur ro/_/sha bros la skad kyi gdangs che bar gyur pa dang /
[\[213b.4\]]nyams stobs yod bzhin du skad zhom par gyur pa dang /_skra mtshams bye ba gang yin pa de 'chi ba'i dus kyi zhags pas zin par shes par bya'o/_/kha zas zos kyang sha bros pa dang /_kha zas ma zos kyang nyams stobs skye ba dang /_bzhin gyi mdog
[\[213b.5\]]snum par gyur tam/_kha dog gzhan du gyur pa de ni srog gi dbang po 'das zin pa yin no/_/glo bur du dri mi zhim pa dang /_dri mi zhim pa zhig tu gyur tam/_sbrang ma sngon po 'khor bar gyur na de 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/da ni mtshan ma'i bye brag bshad de/_rmi
[\[213b.6\]]lam du lus snum gyis byugs pa dang /_lho phyogs su 'gro ba dang /_phag dang /_ma he dang /_gcan gzan dang /_bong bu dang /_rnga mo la zhon pa rmi lam mi bzang ngo /_/bud med skra bshig cing gos nag po dang /_dmar bag gyon pas bcings te dgod
[\[213b.7\]]bzhin du lho phyogs su khrid pa rmis na mi 'dod pa yin no/_/gshin dog dang /_mu stegs can gyi rab tu byung ba la sogs pa dang phrad pa dang /_de dag dang 'grogs pa dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_'bru mar 'thung ba dang /_'ji bas lus byugs te gar byed pa
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]rmis na mi bzang ngo /_/ri dang /_brag la sogs pa las lhung ba dang /_bcing ba dang /_gzhan gyis thub pa dang /_bya rog la sogs pas mchus btsugs pa dang /_lhung ba rmis na mi dge'o/_/lha ste'i shug to dang /_rgya
[\[214a.2\]]skyegs kyi shing dang /_grog mkhar dang /_shing pa ri pat+t+ra rnams la 'dzegs pa dang /_'bru mar dang /_shing bal dang /_'bru mar btsir ba'i tshigs ma dang /_lcags rnyed pa rmis na mi rung bar 'gyur ro/_/rmi lam na bag ma len pa dang /_me tog
[\[214a.3\]]dmar po'i phreng ba thogs shing gos dmar bag gyon pa dang /_chus khyer ba dang /_sha btsos pa za zhing rmi ba ni mi 'dod pa yin no/_/rmi lam du rnam pa 'di lta bu dang /_gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs de 'dra ba dag mthong na/_mi na pa ni nad kyis 'debs
[\[214a.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/na ba ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro//_//da ni mtshan ma bzang po'i bye brag bshad de/_lha dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_gdugs dang /_khyu ba dang /_me tog pad+ma dang /_rgyal po dang /_me tog dkar po dang /_gos
[\[214a.5\]]dkar po dang /_chu dang ba dang /_me 'bar ba dang /_mdza' bo gson po dang /_mi dge zhing des pa dang /_bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong zhing rmis na bzang ngo /_/rmi lam du khyu ba dang /_rta zhon pa dang /_ri la 'dzeg pa dang /_shing 'o ma yod pa dang /
[\[214a.6\]]'bras bu yod pa la 'chag pa dang /_me long dang /_sha rjen pa dang /_me tog gi phreng ba rnyed pa dang /_chu chen po las brgal ba rmis na/_mi na bas ni nor rnyed par 'gyur/_nad pa zhig na ni nad myur du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//_//da ni phrin
[\[214a.7\]]pa'i bye brag bshad de/_phrin pa rigs ngan nam/_yan lag ma tshang ba'am/_mu stegs can gyi rab tu byung ba la sogs pa'am/_zhags pa dang /_dbyig pa lag na thogs shing /_rgod bag tu gyur pa dang /_gos dmar po dang /_nag po dang /
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]rnying pa gyon pa dang /_khyed reng can dang /_'di rnams mi 'dod pa yin par bshad do/_/phrin pa lag pa nyed pa dang /_mchi ma zag pa dang /_mgo lus mar gyis byugs pa dang /_rtswa shing gcod pa dang /_bud med dang /_ma ning phrin par 'ong ba dang /
[\[214b.2\]]bud med kyi rtsig gi ming dang /_ldan pa sna la sogs pa dang /_ma ning gi rtsig gi ming dang ldan pa /_mig la sogs pa la lag gis nom pa dang /_pho mtshan gyi phyogs su lag pas nom pa dang /_bong bu dang /_rnga mo dang /_ma he zhon te 'ongs pa dang /
[\[214b.3\]]bsdad cing duHkhar smra ba 'di dag ni mi rung ba yin no/_/de dag las ldog pa ni dge ba yin no/_/sman pa nad pa'i gan du 'gro bar chas pa na/_glang po che'i skad thos pa dang /_'brug sgra dang /_rnga sgra la sogs pa thos pa dang /_rin po che dang /_me tog gi phreng ba dang /
[\[214b.4\]]sha rjen pa dang /_gdugs dang /_bum pa gang ba la sogs pa mthong na bzang ngo /_/sman pa chas te 'gro ba na/_pho'i ming dang ldan pa/_bya ngang pa dang /_phug ron la sogs pa g.yon logs na gnas shing snang la/_mo'i ming dang ldan pa skyung ka dang /_ri
[\[214b.5\]]skegs la sogs pa g.yas logs na gnas shing snang ste/_nad pa'i khyim gyi nang du 'gro ba'i tshe legs par bsu na bya ba de don du 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/rta babs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_shing 'o ma can dang /_'bras bu dang me tog yod pa'i shing
[\[214b.6\]]mthong ba dang /_g.yas logs sam g.yon logs nas bya 'phur ram 'dug cing skad snyan pa sgrog pa thams cad kyang dge ba yin no/_/khyi dang wa g.yas phyogs su song na dge'o/_/srog chags go d+ha dang /_sbrul dang /_klu sbrul mthong ba ni dus
[\[214b.7\]]thams cad du mi 'dod pa yin no/_/de ltar sman pa gang gis bsgrims te legs par brtags shing bye brag phyed par byas nas las nges par rtsom pa de'i grags pa ni dge ba mang po tshogs pa'i nang du me tog gi phreng ba rnying pa bzhin du mdzes par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]'chi ltas kyi le'u ste drug pa rdzogs so//_//da ni 'khru ba gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/de la 'khru ba ni kha zas mi 'phrod pa dang /_ha cang lci ba dang /_ha cang snum pa dang /_ha cang rtsub pa dang /_ha cang tsha
[\[215a.2\]]ba za zhing 'thung ba dang /_ha cang mang du za ba dang /_ha cang nyung ngu za ba la sogs pas me drod med par byas nas/_nad gzhi shas rnyed pa las 'khru bar 'gyur te/_de yang nad gzhi gsum re res gyur pa dang /_kun 'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_mya ngan
[\[215a.3\]]las gyur pa dang /_'jigs pa las gyur pa dang rnam pa drug yod de/_de dag gi mtshan ma yang bshad par bya ste/_de la rlung las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma ni/_phyi sa 'i mdog rtsa dmar ba dang /_dbu ba can dang rtsub pa dang /_nyung
[\[215a.4\]]ngu nyung bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang dang yang du 'byung ba dang /_be'u snabs su 'byung ba dang /_'khrog pa dang /_sgra dang bcas su 'byung ba rnams so/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma ni/_phyi sa'i mdog ser ba dang /_dmar ba
[\[215a.5\]]dang/_nag pa dang /_sngo ba dang /_ljang gur 'dug pa dang /_shin tu mnam pa dang /_sla ba dang /_gzhang kha tsha 'ur 'ur por gyur cing 'brum pa 'byung ba dang /_skom dad che bar gyur pa rnams yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma ni/_phyi sa'i
[\[215a.6\]]mdog dkar ba dang/_dri bshul ba dang /_bska ba dang /_snum pa dang /_grang ba dang /_cher mi 'khrog pa dang /_yi ga 'chu ba dang /_brang tsha zhing kha nas chu 'byung ba rnams yin no/_/nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma ni/
[\[215a.7\]]phyi sa phag tshil 'dra ba dang /_mar dang /_'bru mar 'dra ba dang /_sha bkrus pa'i khu ba 'dra ba rnams yin te gso dka' bar shes par bya'o/_/phyi sa sbrang rtsi 'dra ba dang /_mar dang 'bru mar 'dra ba dang /_mchin pa'i dum bu 'dra ba 'byung ba dang /_'o ma 'dra ba
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]dang/_sha brdungs brdungs pa 'dra ba dang /_tshon sna tshogs su 'dug pa dang /_dri shin tu dku ba dang /_zhag tshig tshig po yod pa ni mi 'tsho/_gzhang khar 'brum pa 'byung ba dang /_gzhang phyir byung ba dang /_sha zad pa dang /_dbugs mi bde ba
[\[215b.2\]]la sogs pa'i nang bla gnyan gyis thebs pa dang /_me drod nyams pa dang /_ther zug tu lto gang ba dang /_mkhal rked na ba rnams kyang mi 'tsho ba'i mtshan ma yin no/_/'jigs pa dang /_mya ngan gnyis las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma ni/
[\[215b.3\]]rlung las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma dang 'dra bar shes par bya ste/_de gnyis la yang rlung bsal ba'i cho ga bya zhing dga' ba bskyed pa dang snying mal du dbab par bya'o/_/de ltar 'khru ba rnam pa drug po thams cad kyang /_smin pa dang /_ma smin
[\[215b.4\]]pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/_de la 'khru ba smin pa la ni/_smyung ba'i cho ga dang /_skyug pa'i cho ga go rim bzhin du bya'o/_/'di'i skom dang /_zas ni bca' sga dang /_ba le ka skol ba'i khu ba dang /_kha zas yang ba'i bag
[\[215b.5\]]dge'o/_/'khru ba ma smin pa bcad sngas na skran dang mdze la sogs pa'i nad du 'gyur te/_de la 'khru ba ma smin pa ni/_phyi sa chu'i nang du btang na zhabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/'khru ba smin pa ni chu'i nang du btang na steng du 'ong zhing byer bar 'gyur
[\[215b.6\]]ro/_/de la 'khru ba ma smin pa la ni smyung ba'i cho ga dang skyug pa'i cho ga go rim bzhin du bya'o/_/'di'i skom dang /_zas ni bca' sga dang /_ba le ka skol ba'i khu ba dang /_kha zas yang ba'i bag dge'o/_/'khru ba ma smin pa gcad pa sngas na/
[\[215b.7\]]skran dang /_mdze la sogs pa'i nad du 'gyur te/_de bas na thog mar a ru ras bkrus la phyi sa bcad pa'i cho ga byas na bzang ngo /_/de la bcad pa'i thabs ni/_pi pi ling la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad pa rnams skol ba'i sman gyi khu ba
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]las gzhi blangs te/_'bras thug dang /_khu bcud byas pa 'am/_dar ba'i thug pa blud do/_/de la dar ba'i thug pa ji ltar sbyar ba'i thabs ni 'og nas zhib tu ston to/_/yang na yung la sogs pa'i sde tshan nam/_shu
[\[216a.2\]]dag la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba las gzhi blangs la 'bras thug byas te blud na 'khru ba ma smin pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na bca' sga dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_shing kun dang /_gla sgang dang /_dug mo nyung dang /_kru trug tres rnams
[\[216a.3\]]lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_gla sgang dang /_te dze ba ti dang /_ba tha dang /_pi pi ling dang /_dug mo rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_/rgyam tsha dang /_dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu dang /_shu dag dang /_pu tse shel rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_rtsabs ru tsha
[\[216a.4\]]dang/_shu dag dang /_a ru ra dang /_ba thA dang /_byi dang ka dang bca' sga rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_sug smel dang /_dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu dang /_sha ba ra'i seng phrom dang /_yung dang /_skyer pa rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_dug mo
[\[216a.5\]]nyung gi shun lpags dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_bca' sga dang /_gla sgang rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_smin par byed pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba drug po 'di dag las gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/yang na sman gyi sbyor ba 'di dag las
[\[216a.6\]]gang yang rung ba zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma chu gtsang mar bskol ba'am/_chang ngam rtsabs skyur po'i nang du btab ste blud do/_/yang na/_tsha ba gsum dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_shing kun dang /_shu dag dang /_kha ru tsha dang /_a ru ra rnams zhib tu
[\[216a.7\]]btags pa'i phye ma chu skol ba'i nang du btab ste blud na 'khru ba ma smin pa tshabs chen po sel bar byed do/_/yang na/_shu dag dang /_bilba dang /_pi pi ling dang /_bca' sga dang /_ru rta dang /_go snyod dang /_ku la ka dang /_byi dang ka rnams zhib tu
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]btags pa'i phye ma chu skol ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na 'khru ba 'chad do/_/da ni 'khru ba smin pa'i cho ga bshad de/_de la pho ba'i drod chung ste/_'khru ba smin pa yang dang yang du 'byung bar gyur pa la ni/_gcod sman gyi cho ga smyur te bya'o/_/de la
[\[216b.2\]]gcod pa'i sman ni ldum bu sa mang ga dang /_shing shal+ma li'i lo ma dang /_seng phrom dang /_pa tha dang /_d+ha thA dang /_da ta ka'i me tog rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_shing lwang ko dang /_gan+d+ha pri yaM ku dang /_me tog pad+ma dang /_ti ri tra dang /_bilba'i
[\[216b.3\]]shing tog gi shegs ma rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_shing dir g+ha brin+ti'i shun lpags dang /_bca' sga dang /_shing mngar rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang /_bal pho se'u dang /_seng phrom dang /_d+ha ta ki
[\[216b.4\]]dang/_gan+d+ha ma lig lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_sman gyi sbyor ba 'di bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na 'khru ba smin pa gcod par 'gyur ro/_/yang na 'khru ba smin
[\[216b.5\]]pa la/_gla sgang bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blud do/_/de bzhin du seng phrom la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang /_am pa sh+ta la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad pa'i yon tan chen po 'di gnyis las gang yang rung ba cig bskol ba'i khu ba
[\[216b.6\]]bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blud do/_/yang na taM pa la dang /_me tog pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang /_shing ro tsha ba'i shun lpags rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa/_pad+ma'i ze ba dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te 'thungs na gcod par 'gyur ro/_/shing
[\[216b.7\]]n+ya grod+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad pa zhib tu btags pa'i phye mas phye sreg pa'i kho pa bkang la/_snod kha bcad pa'i nang du btsos pa'i khu ba bsgrangs pa/_sbrang rtsi dang kha ra dang sbyar te 'thungs na dmu rdzings sel bar byed cing /_'khru ba gcod do/_/
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]yang na rtsa ba lnga pa dang /_ba la dang /_bilba dang /_'u su'i 'bras bu dang /_ut+pal dang /_bca' sga rnams skol ba'i khu ba las gzhi blangs pa'i 'bras thug bal po se'us skyur por byas pa'am/_yang na kha ra dang /_sbrang
[\[217a.2\]]rtsi dang /_rgun la sogs pas mngar bar byas pa blud do/_/yang na kat+pal dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_gla sgang dang /_dug mo nyung dang /_bca' sga rnams skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blud na/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba
[\[217a.3\]]sel to/_/yang na ut+pal dang /_d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang /_bca' sga dang /_bal po se'u'i shun lpags rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_ldum bu sa mang ga dang /_ut+pa la dang /_pad+ma dang /_seng phrom dang /_chu shing gi 'bras bu'i khu ba dang /_til rnams
[\[217a.4\]]lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_dug mo nyung dang /_gla sgang dang /_rtsa mkhris dang /_skyer khaN+Da rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /_tsan dan dkar po dang /_seng phrom dang /_ut+pa la dang /_bca' sga rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_ba tha dang /
[\[217a.5\]]byi tsher dang /_bca' sga dang /_shing lwang kho dang /_dzam+bU'i shing tog gi rus pa dang /_kat+pal rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_bilba dang /_skyer pa'i shun lkogs dang /_byi tsher dang /_ba la rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_d+ha ta ki dang /_bong nga dkar po
[\[217a.6\]]dang/_bca' sga dang /_dug mo nyung gi shun lbags dang /_'bras bu dang /_skyer khaN+Da rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_kat+pal dang /_shing mngar dang /_seng phrom dang /_bal po se'u 'i shun lpags rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_shing lwang kho dang /
[\[217a.7\]]d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang /_ldum bu sa mang ga dang /_pad+ma rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_dug mo nyung gi shun lbags dang /_skyer pa dang /_pa tha dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_bca' sga rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_sman gyi sbyor ba bcu pa 'di dag las
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]gang yang rung ba zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i nang du btags te 'thungs ni mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel to/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba yod bzhin du/_mkhris pa dang mi 'phrod pa'i kha zas zos pas
[\[217b.2\]]khrag 'khrugs par byas nas/_khrag las gyur pa'i 'khru ba tshabs chen por gyur pa la na khrag lud pa'i nad sel ba'i cho ga smyur te bya'o/_/de la khrag lud pa'i nad bsal ba'i cho ga ni/_btung ba dang /_kha zas dang /_mas btang ba kun la yang ra'i 'o ma
[\[217b.3\]]dang sbyar bar bya'o/_/ba ya s+ya dang /_thal tres dang /_seng phrom dang /_kha ra dang /_shing mngar rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma 'o ma grang mo dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag nad las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel to/_/pog dang /
[\[217b.4\]]rgya shug dang /_shing dzam+bU dang /_bi yal dang /_a mra dang /_ardzu na rnams las gang yang rung ba'i shun lpags zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma/_'o ma dang /_sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang /_khrag nad las gyur pa'i 'khru ba
[\[217b.5\]]sel to/_/ut+pa la dang /_a mang+ga dang /_chu shing gi 'bras bu dang /_pad+ma'i ze ba rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_til dang /_sha ba ra'i seng phrom dang /_shing mngar dang /_sa mag dang /_thal tres dang /_ut+pa la rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /
[\[217b.6\]]ut+pa la dang /_shal+ma la'i shun lpags dang /_shing mngar dang /_sha ba ra'i seng phrom dang til rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_sman gyi sbyor ba 'di dag gsum las gang yang rung ba btags pa'i phye ma 'o ma dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs
[\[217b.7\]]na yang khrag nad las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel to/_/tsan dan dkar po 'am/_gan+d+ha pri yaM ku gnyis las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang /_kha ra sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag nad las gyur pa'i 'khru ba
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]sel to/_/yang na char pa'i chu dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_bu ram gyi dbu ba sbyar ba'i nang du dug mo nyung gi shun lpags zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag nad las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel to/_/yang
[\[218a.2\]]na shing mngar dang /_ut+pa la dang /_chu srin gyi sen mo dang /_kha ra rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba btang ngo /_/khrag tshad dang /_phyi sa thal ba snrel zhi byung ba la ni 'o ma'i nang du 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma btab pa'am/_yang na 'o
[\[218a.3\]]ma bzhos ma thag pa dron mo ci ran par 'thungs te lan mang du 'khrus na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i 'khru bas gnod par gyur pa la ni/_kha zas sman bu ti ka dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_bilba dang /_kru trug tres dang /_dar ba dang /
[\[218a.4\]]bal po se'u dang /_shing kun rnams dang legs par sbyar ba'i khu bcud dang ldan pa bza' bar bya'o/_/dbyi mong dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_ru rta dang /_ba tha dang /_pu tse shel rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_a ru ra dang /_gla sgang dang /_bca' sga
[\[218a.5\]]dang/_bilba dang /_karka ti ka rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_kru trug tres dang /_pi pi ling dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_pi pi ling chen po rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba rnams dang /_phyi dang ka dang /_shu dag dang /_shang shing dang /_'u su'i
[\[218a.6\]]'bras bu dang /_tsha ba gsum po rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba ste sman gyi sbyor ba 'di bzhi las gang yang rung ba lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba blud na yang bzang ste/_me drod dang nyams stobs bskyed do/_/yang na a ru ra dang /_kru trug tres dang /_pa tha dang /
[\[218a.7\]]shu dag dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_dug mo nyung dang /_bca' sga rnams skol ba'i khu ba dron mo'am/_yang na de dag gi phye ma'i sman byas na bad kan las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel to/_/shing aM ko ta'i rtsa ba dang /_skyer ba rnams las srang re re btags te
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]char pa'i chus brdzis la zho gnyis tsam reng bur byas te mas btang na 'khru ba thams cad kyang sel bar byed do/_/bilba dang /_gla sgang dang /_d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang /_pa thA dang /_bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma dang /_chu shing gi 'bras bu'i khu ba rnams cha mnyam
[\[218b.2\]]la bu ram dang /_dar ba sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang 'khru ba gcod do//_//da ni rlung las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i cho ga bshad de/_khrag dang /_phyi sa byung ba'i rjes la rlung gi mthus phyi sa 'gags te be'u snabs dbu ba 'dra bar 'byung zhing /
[\[218b.3\]]'khrog pa'i nad kyi ming ni be'u snabs su 'byung zhing 'khreg pa zhes bya ste/_de la ni me drod chen po zhig na/_kru trug tres dang /_bilba 'o mar skol ba'i khu ba/_bu ram dang /_til mar dang sbyar te nad par 'thungs na/_phyi sa 'gags pa bde bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[218b.4\]]'o ma bskol te phyung ba'i nang du/_pi pi ling gi phye ma'am/_yang na na le sham gyi phye ma btab ste zhag gsum gyi bar du 'thungs na be'u snabs su 'byung zhing 'khreg pa yun ring du lon pa yang sel to/_/til mar dang /_mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_kha ra dang /
[\[218b.5\]]bca' sga dang /_bu ram gyi khu ba rnams lhan cig tu sbyar la dkrugs te 'thungs na yang de ma thag tu be'u snabs su 'byung zhing 'khreg pa sel to/_/d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang /_rgya shug gi lo ma dang /_shing ka pit+tha dang /_drub mar cang dang /_seng phrom rnams kyi
[\[218b.6\]]phye ma zho dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang be'u snabs su 'byung zhing 'khreg pas nyam thag pa sel to/_/bilba'i 'bras bu'i shags ma dang /_bu ram dang /_seng phrom dang /_til mar dang /_na le sham rnams lhan cig tu sbyar te/_zos na yang be'u snabs su
[\[218b.7\]]'byung zhing /_'khregs pas dub par gyur pa myur du sel zhing bde bar 'gyur ro/_/des kyang zhi bar ma gyur na/_shing mngar dang /_til mar mas btang ba'i cho ga ni/_shing shal ma li'i lo ma btsos dkris la 'jim pas g.yogs te/_me mar mur
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]gyi nang du bcug la/_'jim pa ni skams/_lo ma ni tshos par gyur nas/_lo ma de gtun gyi nang du zhib tu brdungs pa'i phye ma/_mar dang /_shing mngar gyi phye ma dang ldan par 'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis bskol te phyung ba'i nang
[\[219a.2\]]du brdzis pa'i ming ni mas btang ba'i sman 'jam zhing 'khyil ba zhes bya 'di mas btang na/_rims dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel zhing /_skran dang/_tshad rnying 'joms par byed la/_pho ba'i nad dang /_skrangs pa med par byed do/_/da ni
[\[219a.3\]]pho ba'i me drod nyams pa gso ba'i cho ga bshad de/_me drod bri nas nad gzhi rnams kyis pho ba'i me drod dkrugs pa las/_pho ba'i me drod 'khrugs pa'i nad/_rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gsum so so las gyur pa dang /_kun 'dus
[\[219a.4\]]pa las gyur pa rnam pa bzhir gyur te/_de dag mtshan ma dang gso ba'i thabs ni 'khru ba dang 'dra'o/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i pho ba'i me drod 'khrugs par gyur pa'i mtshan ma dang /_gso ba'i thabs ni/_rlung las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma dang
[\[219a.5\]]gso ba'i thabs dang 'dra'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_kun 'dus pa las gyur pa yang de bzhin du so sor sbyar ro/_/de la me drod bskyed pa'i thabs ni/_sman a dza mo dang /_kru trug tres dang /_dbyi mong dang /
[\[219a.6\]]tsha ba gsum dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_sngar bshad pa'i thal ba rnam gnyis dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_shing kun rnams shing tog kha lung gi khu bas ri lur byas te zos na me drod skyed par byed do/_/'bras bu gsum dang /_ga bye'i 'bras bu dang /
[\[219a.7\]]tsha ba gsum dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_kha ru tsha dang /_rtsabs ru tsha rnams btags te rdze'u kha sbyar gyi nang du btab ste 'thungs na/_skya rbab kyi nad dang /_pho ba'i nad dang /_skran dang /_zug cing na ba rnams sel to/_/sman la la phud dang /_tsha ba gsum
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]dang/_rgyam tsha dang /_go snyod rnam gnyis dang /_shing kun rnams kyi phye ma mar khu dang brdzis pa kha zas kyi snga rol tu zos na/_rlung sel cing me drod skyed do/_/shu ti dang /_'u su'i 'bras bu dang /_pa thA dang /_bilba dang /_kru trug tres dang /
[\[219b.2\]]bca' sga dang /_la la phud dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_rgya shug gi 'bras bu rnams kyi phye ma/_mar dang /_zho mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang /_ldum bu cang ge ri'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang /_'di rnams skol la mar nyi tshe lus par byas te ji
[\[219b.3\]]ran par 'thungs na/_pho ba'i nad dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_gzhang byung ba dang /_gcin sri ba dang /_lto sbos pa dang /_be'u snabs su 'byung zhing 'khreg pa dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_skya rbab kyi nad dang /_skom pa'i nad dang /_lud pa
[\[219b.4\]]dang/_drag tu skyug cing 'chad du mi btub pa rnams sel cing yi ga 'bye bar byed de/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i pho ba'i me drod 'khrugs pa'i nad la ni/_skyer pa'i khaN+Da dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_bilba dang /_byi tsher gyi shun lpags dang /_byi
[\[219b.5\]]tsher gyi 'bras bu dang /_gla sgang dang /_pA thA dang /_d+ha ta ki dang /_pu tse shel dang /_bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma char pa'i chu sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na/_gzhang 'brum dang /_be'u snabs su 'byung zhing 'khreg pa dang /_khrag nad
[\[219b.6\]]dang/_mkhal rked na ba dang gzhang nad rnams sel to/_/dug mo nyung gi shing dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_gla sgang dang /_rtsa mkhris dang /_pu tse shel rnams cha mnyam pa dang /_kru trug tres cha'i nyis 'gyur dang /_dug mo nyung gi shun lpags cha'i
[\[219b.7\]]bcu drug 'gyur dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na/_pho ba'i nad dang /_mig ser dang /_skya rbab kyi nad dang /_gcin nad dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_'khru ba dang /_skran dang /_skem pa'i nad dang rims
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]sel to/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i pho ba'i me drod 'khrugs pa'i nad la ni/_sman sha thi dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_a ru ra dang /_thal ba rnam gnyis dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_kha lung gi 'bras bu dang /_rgyam tsha
[\[220a.2\]]rnams kyi phye ma chu bskol te phyung ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/ma d+hu ka'i me tog bskol te gdus pa'i khu ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi de'i bzhi cha blugs pa sbyar te/_bum pa'i nang pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /_/a ka ru dang /_til mar
[\[220a.3\]]rnams sbyar bas byugs pa'i nang du blugs te zla ba gcig gi bar du nas kyi nang du bzhag pa las ran par 'thungs na me drod skyed do/_/pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_kru trug tres dang /_a ru ra dang /_pi pi ling dang /_byi tang ga rnams lhan cig tu sbyar bas
[\[220a.4\]]rdza ma ri nang du bskus la/_de'i nang du ngar ba blugs te/_nas kyi nang du zla ba gcig gi bar du bzhag pa las ran par 'thungs na pho ba'i nad dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_lung pa dang /_skran dang srin bu rnams sel to/_/de ltar pho ba'i me drod 'khrugs
[\[220a.5\]]pa'i nad kyis thebs pa la ni mdor na tshabs che chung la sogs pa las dpags te shin tu bye brag phyed par byas nas/_me drod bskyed pa'i kha zas dang /_btung ba dang /_sman gyi phye ma dang /_sman gyi khu ba btung ba dang /_sman mar la sogs pa ci rigs par
[\[220a.6\]]btang ngo /_/'khru ba dang /_pho ba'i me drod 'khrugs pa'i nad las/_srin bu'i nad 'byung ba'i phyir/_de 'og tu skabs 'dir/_srin bu'i nad kyi bye brag dang /_de'i mtshan ma dang /_gso ba'i thabs bshad de/_de la srin bu'i nad kyi mtshan ma ni/_rims
[\[220a.7\]]na bar 'gyur ba dang /_sha mdog ngan pa dang /_ru shing na ba dang /_snying na ba dang /_lus sbrid pa dang /_mgo 'khor ba dang /_kha zas mthong na yid du mi 'ong ba dang /_'khru bar gyur na/_stor srin bu skyes pa'i mtshan ma yin no/_/de gso ba'i thabs ni/
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]sman byi tang ga dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /_kam+pi l+ya ga dang a ru ra rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma dar ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na/_srin bu thams cad sel to/_/shi kru dang /_skyer pa dang /_mu sha par+Ni dang /_gla sgang dang /_'bras
[\[220b.2\]]bu gsum dang /_'di rnams skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/_pi pi ling dang byi tang ga'i phye ma btab ste sbyar ba 'thungs na yang srin bu sel to/_/su sha par+Ni btags pa'i phye ma dang /_'bras bsregs pa'i khu ba zos la/_tshal nan du rtsabs skyur po 'thungs na yang
[\[220b.3\]]srin nad sbyang ngo /_/byi tang ga'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na yang srin bu sel to/_/shing pa ri b+had tra ka'i lo ma'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang srin bu sel to/_/yang na 'bras bu gsum dang /_shu dag dang /_dan+da'i rtsa ba dang /_kaM pa l+ya
[\[220b.4\]]ka rnams kyi phye ma mar dang /_ba gcin mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol la/_ba gcin du bar byas nas tshigs ma btsags pa'i mar ji ran par 'thungs na yang srin bu sel to/_/'khru ba gso ba'i le'u ste bdun pa rdzogs so//_//de la
[\[220b.5\]]khrag lud pa'i nad ni/_nyi ma dang me la sogs pa'i tsha ba bsten pa dang /_kha zas la sogs pa tsha ches pa dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_thal ba rnon po'i sman dang /_ro tsha ba'i bag zos pas/_mkhris pa 'khrug par gyur pa las mchin pa dang /
[\[220b.6\]]mcher pa'i nang na khrag gnas pa lud par gyur te/_yar yang 'byung la mar yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i khrag lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/_khrag gi mdog sngo skyar 'dug pa dang /_dmar ba dang /_sla ba dang /_dbu ba can rnams yin no/_/
[\[220b.7\]]mkhris pa las gyur pa'i khrag lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/_khrag gi mdog gos tshon nag por btsos pa'i kha dog 'dra ba dang /_dud khar 'dug pa dang /_ba gcin gyi mdog 'dra ba dang /_skyer khaN+Da'i mdog 'dra ba rnams yin no/_/bad kan las gyur
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]pa'i khrag lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/_khrag gi mdog snum pa dang /_yid tsam skya ba dang /_'byil ba dang /_bska ba rnams yin no/_/nad gzhi gnyis gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa'i khrag lud pa'i mtshan ma ni 'dres mar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[221a.2\]]nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa'i khrag lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/_kun gyi mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/_/de la nad gzhi re re las gyur pa'i khrag lud pa gyen du 'byung ba ni gso sla'o/_/nad gzhi re re las gyur pa dang /_gnyis gnyis
[\[221a.3\]]'dus pa las gyur pa'i khrag lud pa thur du 'byung ba ni/_kha zas dang /_sman gyi cho gas mi ldang bar gso tsam du rung ste/_nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa'i khrag lud pa ni/_gyen du 'byung ba yang rung thur du 'byung yang rung ste shin tu gso dka' ba yin no/_/
[\[221a.4\]]khrag lud pa'i rkyen gyis skyugs pa dang /_brgyal ba dang /_rims dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pa dang /_skad 'gags pa dang /_lus tsha bar gyur pa dang /_khrag gi mdog shing dzam+bU'i 'bras bu 'dra ba dang /_'ja' 'dra ba dang /_mi ro'i
[\[221a.5\]]dri mnam pa ni gso ba'i thabs med do/_/de la nyams stobs dang ldan zhing za phod pa ni/_nad khrag ngan pa thog ma nas bcad na/_de las lkog nad lha gor dang /_skran dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_rims dang /_mdze la sogs pa'i nad du 'gyur ro/_/de bas
[\[221a.6\]]na sngar gcad par mi bya'o/_/khrag lud pa la thog mar ni/_ci nus kyis smyung ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/de'i skom ni tsan dan dkar po dang /_pu shel tse dang /_sro lo dang /_gla sgang rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/_/khrag lud pa gyen du 'byung ba la ni thog
[\[221a.7\]]mar brta ba dang /_bkru sman bya'o/_/thur du 'byung ba ni nyams stobs dang sbyar zhing /_thog mar 'bras thug gi cho ga dang /_skyugs pa'i cho ga bya'o/_/de la lus brta ba ni/_mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_'bras brngos pa'i phye ma dang kha ra rnams sbyar ba'i nang du/
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]skyu ru ra dang /_bal po se'u btab ste ro skyur bar byas pa blud do/_/de la bkru sman ni dong ka'i tshig gu dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_shing nye rong dang /_a ru ra 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma chu bskol te bsgrangs pa'i nang du btab la/_kha ra dang sbrang rtsis sbyar
[\[221b.2\]]te gtang bar bya'o/_/skyug sman ni/_gla sgang dang /_dug mo nyung dang /_shing mngar skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa/_po son cha'i tshig gu dang /_'o ma dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba ni khrag lud pa'i nad sel ba'i mchog yin te btung bar bya'o/_/sha zad pa
[\[221b.3\]]dang nyams stobs zad pa dang /_byis pa dang /_rgad po dang /_skem pa'i nad yod pa la ni/_skyug sman dang bkru sman byar mi rung ste/_khrag 'byung ba gcad pa'i cho ga bya'o/_/de la khrag 'byung ba bcad pa'i cho ga ni/_pa to la dang /_sna ma'i me tog
[\[221b.4\]]dang/_nim+pa dang /_tsan dan rnam gnyis dang /_shug pa rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_mon sran sde'u dmar ru dang /_ba sha ka dang /_seng phrom dang /_sa nag po dang /_ma da yan ti ka rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_ka ko la dang /_ra mnye'i
[\[221b.5\]]rtsa ba dang /_thal tres rnam gnyis dang /_shing mngar dang /_nye'u shing gi rtsa ba rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_'bras sgang dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang /_dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang /_sro lo rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_sman
[\[221b.6\]]gyi sbyor ba 'di bzhi las gang yang rung ba cha mnyam ste skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa dang /_kha ra dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_sbyar ba ni khrag lud pa'i nad myur du sel ba'i mchog yin te shin tu grang mor btung ngo /_/pri yaM ku dang /_skyer khaN+Da dang /_sa tshig
[\[221b.7\]]pa dang /_seng phrom rnams lhan cig tu zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma/_ldum bu ba sha ka brdungs pa'i khu ba'am/_bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa gang yang rung ba kha ra dang /_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag lud pa'i nad sel
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]to/_/chu srin gyi sen mo dang /_shug pa dang /_gan+d+ha pri yaM ku dang /_seng phrom dang /_btsag rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma char ba'i chu kha ra dang sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag 'byung ba gcod do/_/seng ldeng
[\[222a.2\]]dang /_sap+ta parna dang /_par+tha dang /_shal+ma li dang /_ko bi da ra rnams kyi me tog gi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na yang khrag lud pa sel to/_/u dum ba ra dang /_taM pa la dang /_a ru ra dang /_'bra go dang /_rgun rnams kyi 'bras bu smin pa las gang
[\[222a.3\]]yang rung ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na yang khrag lud pa'i nad sel to/_/ku shan+ma da'i 'bras bu rlon pa shun lpags bshus la nang gi sa bon rnams kyang bor te/_bar gyi sha kham tshad du gtubs la/_brngos pa srang brgyad bcwo Da srang brgyad dang zhun mar bzang po srang
[\[222a.4\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis lhan cig tu skol ba'i nang du/_dri gsum zhes bya ba/_shing tsha dang /_gan+d+ha ba tra dang /_sug smel rnams dang /_'u su'i 'bras bu dang /_na le shaM dang /_'di rnams la srang phyed phyed dang /_pi pi ling dang /_bca' sga dang /_go snyod
[\[222a.5\]]rnams las srang gnyis gnyis dang /_'di rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma btab ste bsgrangs la/_sbrang rtsi zhun mar gyi phyed dang sbyar te zos na yang khrag lud pa'i nad sel to/_/glo rdol ba dang /_glo gcong zad byed kyi nad dang /_dbugs mi bde
[\[222a.6\]]ba'i nad dang /_snying stor ldang ba dang /_thibs byed ces bya ba dang /_rims dang /_skom pa'i nad dang /_lud pa dang /_skyug pa rnams kyang 'joms par byed la/_glo la phan zhing /_sha skye ba dang /_ro tsa ba dang /_nyams stobs bskyed pa dang /_sha
[\[222a.7\]]mdog bzang ba dang /_skad snyan par 'gyur ro/_/rgun dang /_'o ma bzhi pa zhes bya ba/_sa la par+Ni dang /_phri shaM par+Ni dang /_mung+ga par+Ni dang /_ma sha par+Ni rnams dang /_ba la dang /_bca' sga dang /_gze ma dang /_nye 'u shing gi rtsa ba dang /_'di rnams
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]las gang yang rung ba 'o ma dang bskol te 'thungs na yang khrag nad sel to/_/kha ra dang /_e ya ba lu ka dang /_rtsa dUrba dang /_tsan dan rnam gnyis dang /_gla sgang dang /_shug pa dang /_me tog ut+pa la'i gze ma dang /_btsod dang /_pu she la tse rnams
[\[222b.2\]]kyi phye ma cha mnyam ste/_ra'i mar dang /_'o ma mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang /_char ba'i chu'i nang du bskol te mar gyi nyi tshe lus pa las btung ba dang /_mas btang ba dang /_lus bsku ba dang /_snar blugs pa gang yang rung ba byas na yang khrag lud pa'i nad
[\[222b.3\]]sel to/_/bi da ri dang /_shing mngar dang /_me da rnam gnyis dang /_di na ta li'i shing tog dang /_bal po se'u dang /_nye'u shing dang /_ldum bu ka ko la dang /_kha lung gi shags ma dang /_'di rnams cha mnyam ste zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma/_mar dang /
[\[222b.4\]]'o ma mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang chu'i nang du bskol te mar nyi tshe lus pa las ci ran par zos na rims sel cing phyi sa 'gags pa dang /_lto sbos pa dang /_zug cing na ba 'joms par byed de/_lud pa dang /_khrag lud pa'i nad med par byed do/_/sna nas
[\[222b.5\]]khrag 'byung ba la ni/_dung dang /_btsag dang /_d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang /_shing mngar rnams gang yang rung ba'i phye ma btsags pa bud med kyi nu zho dang sbyar te snar blugs na gcod par 'gyur ro/_/bal po se 'u'i khu ba dang /_rtsa dUrba 'i khu ba dang /_shing log
[\[222b.6\]]kog gi tshig gu dang /_kun dong gi khu ba 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba snar blugs na yang sna khrag zag pa gcod do/_/khrag lud pa thur du byung ba la ni/_khrag tshad kyi cho ga sngar bshad pa bzhin du bya'o/_/khrag lud pa pho mtshan nas 'byung ba la ni/
[\[222b.7\]]mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin nad kyi cho ga rgyas par 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin du bya'o/_/khrag lud pa bud med kyi mo mtshan las 'byung ba la ni/_'o ma kha ra sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba blud na phan te zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na btsag yug snam/_shing dzam+bU'i
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]lo ma dang /_ut+pa la'i rtsa ba rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang mo mtshan nas 'byung ba'i khrag 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/yang na sman a nan+da dang /
[\[223a.2\]]gan+d+ha pri yaM ku dang /_tsan dan dang /_nA ga ge sar rnams gang yang rung ba'i phye ma chang dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang mo mtshan nas 'byung ba'i khrag 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/yang na mon sran sde'u dmar ru'i rtsa ba'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang /_skyer khaN+Da
[\[223a.3\]]rnams 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba sbyar te dkrugs la 'thungs na yang /_mo mtshan nas 'byung ba'i khrag gi rnam grangs thams cad sel bar byed do/_/yang na ldum bu bun sna ba dang /_sha lu ka dang /_sran chung dang /_a lam bu sa
[\[223a.4\]]rnams las gang yang rung ba btsos pas mo mtshan la dugs byas na yang na ba sel to/_/yang mung+ga par+Ni btags te til mar dang lhan cig btsos pa'i nang du/_srin bal lam/_shing bal smyugs la mo mtshan gyi nang du bzhag na yang khrag gcod
[\[223a.5\]]cing 'jam la bde bar 'gyur ro/_/spyir na khrag lud pa'i nad yod pa la ni/_chu grang mo'i nang du 'jug pa dang /_lud la chu grang mo thugs par sogs pa dge ba yin te/_kha zas kyang sA lu dang /_mon sran sde'u la sogs pa dang /_ri dgas dang bya'i
[\[223a.6\]]sha bsil ba'i bag rnams bzang ngo /_/khrag rgyas pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste bdun pa rdzogs so//_//de nas gcong chen po gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/de la gcong chen po'i nad ni/_nad gzhi bzhi las 'byung ste/_de yang
[\[223a.7\]]brtsal drags pa dang /_zad byed kyi nad dang /_phyi sa dang /_gcin 'gags pa dang /_dus su mi za ba dang rgyu 'di bzhi las 'byung ngo /_/de'i mtshan ma ni/_skad 'gags pa dang /_lud pa dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]rims dang /_klad pa na ba dang /_thal gong na ba dang /_rtsib logs na ba dang /_snying na ba dang /_mkhal rked na ba dang /_khrag dang /_bad kan skyugs pa dang /_rnam pa bcu gcig po 'di rnams yin no/_/mtshan ma de dag gis nyam thag par gyur
[\[223b.2\]]la/_sha brad cing nyams stobs med par gyur pa ni dor bar bya'o/_/de ma yin pa gzhan ni sman dang ldan pa zhig na cho ga smyur te bya'o/_/kha nas rnag 'dra ba dang /_bad kan dmar ba dang /_sngo skya dang /_ljang gu dang /_sngon po dang /_ser po 'byung la dbugs mi bde
[\[223b.3\]]ba dang /_lud pas dgar te nyam thag pa dang skad 'gags pa ni mi 'tsho'o/_/kha zas phal cher phyi sa dang gcin 'ba' zhig tu gyur la/_sha skam zhing lus zungs zad de/_phyi sa khong na yod pa tsam gyis srog zungs byas pa gang yin pa de la ni khong na yod pa de mi
[\[223b.4\]]bkru bar rtag tu bsrung bar bya'o/_/nyams stobs yod la gcong chen po na ba la ni/_gso ba'i las skyug sman dang /_bkru sman dang /_sman snar blugs pa dang /_bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang /_'jam rtsi mas btang ba'i las 'di lnga bya'o/_/
[\[223b.5\]]lus kyi sha zad pa la ni las lnga po 'di dag byas na de dag nyid dug dang 'dra bar 'gyur te byar mi rung ngo /_/gcong chen po na ba'i kha zas ni/_'bras sA lu dang /_'bras zhag drug cu pa smin pa dang /_gro dang /_nas dang mon sran sde'u la sogs pa dge'o/_/
[\[223b.6\]]skom du ni chang bzang ngo /_/bya nad ni bya dang ri dgas kyi sha nad de dang 'phrad pa'i sha rnams rung ngo /_/de'i sman ni pi pi ling dang /_rgun dang /_kha ra rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang /_mar sbrang rtsis sbyar ba'am/_yang na a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_pi pi ling dang /_kha ra
[\[223b.7\]]rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang zhun mar dang sbyar ba zos na gcong chen po sel bar byed do/_/yang na bu bran shing dang /_rgun dang /_pi pi ling dang /_a ru ra dang /_'bra go dang /_byi tsher rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_bu ram dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_'bras yos dang /_kru trug tres dang /
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]pi pi ling dang /_bca' sga rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_ma nu dang /_li zur ba dang /_ra mnye ba dang /_kha ra dang /_byi'u rug pa rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_sman gyi sbyor ba 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma mar dang sbrang
