[\[224a.2\]]rtsi shas bskyed de sbyar ba zos na/_lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba sel cing /_skad 'gags pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/bal bu'i lo ma dang /_na le sham dang /_bca' sga dang /_pi pi ling rnams yas kyi rim bzhin du dang po cha las re res bskyed pa
[\[224a.3\]]dang/_shing tsha dang /_sug smel dang /_bal bu'i tshad kyi phyed phyed dang /_kha ra pi pi ling gi brgyad 'gyur dang /_'di rnams btab ste lhan cig tu sbyar ba'i phye ma'i sman gyis ni/_lud pa dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /
[\[224a.4\]]mcher pa na ba dang /_rims dang /_skem pa'i nad dang /_pho ba'i me drod chung ba rnams sel zhing snying la phan te/_'khru ba dang /_skran dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_skyug pa rnams sel to/_/bca' sga dang /_pi pi ling dang /_na le sham
[\[224a.5\]]dang/_nA ga ge sar gyi me tog dang /_shing tsha dang /_sug smel dang /_'di rnams mas kyi rim bzhin du tha ma'i cha re res bskyed pa dang de rnams bsdams pa'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i kha ra dang /_'di rnams btags te sbyar ba'i phye ma ni lkog ma
[\[224a.6\]]'gags pa la phan zhing /_snying na ba dang /_skran dang /_gzhang 'brum gyis nyam thag pa rnams sel to/_/shing tsha dang /_sug smel dang /_pi pi ling dang /_smyig rkang dang /_kha ra rnams yas kyi rim bzhin du dang po'i cha nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis
[\[224a.7\]]bskyed de btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar ba'i phye ma ni rtsib logs na ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pa sel zhing yi ga 'bye bar byed do/_/nye'u shing dang /_pi da ri dang /_a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_a ru ra dang /_pu rna Na ba
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]dang/_ba la dang /_/a ti ba la dang /_na ga ba la dang /_gze ma rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na zad byed kyi gcong chen po zad par byed do/_/brag zhun dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_drub mar cang dang lcags kyi phye ma rnams
[\[224b.2\]]sbyar te zos la/_kha zas su 'bras chan dang /_'o ma ldan par za ba gang yin pa de'i gcong chen po ni myur du 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/sbrang rtsi dang /_drub mar cang dang /_byi dong ga dang /_brag zhun dang /_lcags kyi phye ma dang /_mar dang a ru ra
[\[224b.3\]]rnams sbyar ba za zhing kha zas mthun zhing 'phrod pa za ba ni gcong chen po mi bzad pa sel bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na gcong chen po'i nad yod pas/_kha ra dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gsar sbyar ba'am/_yang na mar dang /_sbrang rtsi cha mi mnyam par
[\[224b.4\]]sbyar ba zos la/_kha zas su 'bras chan dang /_'o ma dang ldan par zos na sha brta bar 'gyur ro/_/sman nir gun+ti'i rtsa ba dang /_lo ma dang bcas par brdungs pa'i khu ba mar de'i bzhi cha dang lhan cig tu skol la/_mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na/
[\[224b.5\]]gcong chen po'i nad kyis lus zungs zad par gyur pa las slar nyams stobs bskyed cing brta bar byed de nad do cog kyang sel to/_/ma nu dang /_li zur ba dang /_rgu na dang /_ba la dang /_me tog ut+pa la dang /_pi pi ling dang /_dz+ha ta dang /_dzi bin+ta
[\[224b.6\]]dang /_shing mngar dang /_bya g+h+ri dang /_khyi lce ba dang /_byi tsher dang /_dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang /_gze ma rnams cha mnyam ste btags pa'i phye ma mar de'i bzhi 'gyur dang /_chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang lhan cig tu bskol la mar nyi tshe lus par
[\[224b.7\]]byas te btsags pa las tshod ran par khu bcud dang sbyar ba'am/_sha khu 'am/_'o ma skol ba'am/_shing kun la sogs pa skol ba gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na/_gcong chen po'i mtshan ma rnam pa bcu gcig dang ldan pa sel bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]ra'i mar dang ra'i 'o ma dang ra'i zho dang ra'i gcin dang /_ra'i ril ma'i khu ba 'di rnams lan tshwa rnam pa lnga dang bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs la de'i rjes la/_ra'i 'o ma 'thungs na gcong chen po sel to/_/nas las
[\[225a.2\]]byas pa'i kha zas zos la ra'i ra bar nyal te ra'i 'o ma 'thung zhing ra'i ril ma dang gcin gyis lus dril ba dang /_khrus byas na yang zad byed kyi gcong chen po sel to/_/til mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis/_'o ma de'i bzhi 'gyur dang /_shing
[\[225a.3\]]mngar gyi phye ma srang gcig dang bskol te 'o ma du nas til mar btsags te dang zhing dri ma med par byas la/_yang 'o ma bzhi 'gyur dang /_shing mngar gyi phye ma srang gcig dang bskol te 'o ma du nas til mar btsags la/_'o ma dang shing mngar gyis snga
[\[225a.4\]]ma bzhin du bsnan zhing /_skol ba de lta bu'i tshul du shin tu bsgrims te lan brgyar skol ba'i til mar gyi btung ba dang /_snar blugs pa dang /_lus la bsku ba dang mas btang ba rnams byas na/_gcong chen po dang /_snying na ba dang /_rlung nad
[\[225a.5\]]dang skya rbab rnams sel cing /_nam tshong yan chad kyi nad dang /_smyo byed dang /_khrag lud pa'i nad dang /_me dbal rnams med par byed do/_/bilba la sogs pa rtsa ba lnga pa dang /_gla sgang dang /_ba la dang /_lo ma rnam pa bzhi ste/_sa la par+Ni
[\[225a.6\]]dang/_sri shan par+Ni dang /_mung+ga par+Ni dang /_ma sha par+Ni rnams dang /_ldum bu rit+thi dang /_pi pi ling dang /_li zur pa dang /_a ru ra dang /_dzi ba ka dang /_zangs rtsi ba dang /_sle tres dang /_rgun dang /_bun sna ba dang /_me da dang /_dzi bin+ta dang /_ka
[\[225a.7\]]ka na si ka dang /_me tog ut+pa la dang /_sug smel dang /_dza da dang /_bu bran shing dang /_bu tsha rto dang /_byi tsher dang /_tsan dan dang /_gyi da ri dang /_gze ma dang /_bya g+h+ri dang /_ma nu rnams las srang re re dang /_skyu ru ra 'bru lnga brgya dang /_'di
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]rnams chu phul gang la srang brgyad du brtsis pa de lta bu phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du bskol te/_chu bzhi cha gcig lus pa btsags la/_khu ba'i nang du/_til mar dang /_zhun mar phyed ma srang bcu gnyis dang /_kha ra srang lnga bcu blugs te yang bskol la
[\[225b.2\]]byog tu rung ba tsam du gyur te/_tshos nas phyung la bsgrangs pa'i nang du/_pi pi ling gi phye ma srang gnyis dang /_smyig rkang srang bzhi dang /_sbrang rtsi srang drug dang /_dri sna bzhi zhes bya ba/_shing tsha dang /_g+han+d+ha pa tra dang /_sug smel dang /_nA ga ge sar
[\[225b.3\]]rnams cha mnyam pa sbyar ba srang gcig dang /_'di rnams sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde gu'i ming ni/_drang srong ts+ya pa na'i sman zhes bya ste/_'di las ran par zos na/_snying na ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_skom pa'i nad dang /_lud pa dang /_dreg dang /
[\[225b.4\]]zad byed kyi gcong chen po rnams kyis nyam thag pa sel cing /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_skad snyan pa dang /_ro tsa bar byed de sman bcud kyis len du 'gyur ro/_/shing ka pit+ta'i 'bras bu dang /_byi shal gnyis las srang bco lnga bco lnga dang /_skyu ru ra
[\[225b.5\]]rlon pa srang sum cu rtsa gnyis/_skom na srang bcu drug dang /_a ru ra de'i phyed dang /_pi pi ling dang /_e la ba lu ka dang /_seng phrom dang /_byi dang ga dang /_na le sham rnams las srang gnyis gnyis chu phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du bskol la/
[\[225b.6\]]bzhi cha gcig lus pa'i khu ba btsags te bsgrangs pa'i nang du bu ram srang nyis brgya blugs te sbyar ba de 'thungs na/_gzhang 'brum dang /_gcong chen po dang /_mdze nad sel zhing /_skrangs pa dang /_skya rbab dang /_rims dang /_mcher pa na ba dang /
[\[225b.7\]]snying na ba dang /_mkhal rked na ba dang /_skran med par byed la/_pho ba'i nad dang /_mig ser dang /_sha bkra dang /_srin bu dang /_yi ga 'chus pa rnams sel to/_/gcong chen po'i nad la rims la sogs pa'i nad bla gnyan gzhan zhig byung na/
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]gsor rung ba gang yin pa de dag so so'i gso ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/mdor na skem pa'i nad gcong chen po yod pa la ni lus bkru ba dang /_dri ba la sogs pas lus brta zhing /_nyams stobs bskyed par bya'o/_/gcong chen po gso
[\[226a.2\]]ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//skran kha zas kyis nyes pa dang /_'dug nyal la sogs pa gnas pa'i nyes pa las rlung la sogs pa shin tu 'khrugs nas/_khong pa'i nang du skran phur ma lta bur 'dug pa rnam pa lngar 'gyur te/_lnga po de dag
[\[226a.3\]]gi gnas ni/_glo g.yas g.yon dang /_snying ga dang chu so rnams yin no/_/gzhan gang de'i mtshan ma dang /_gso ba'i thabs dang bcas pa yang bstan par bya ste/_de la skran no cog ni yi ga 'chus pa dang /_phyi sa dang /_gcin sri ba dang /_rlung gi shas che
[\[226a.4\]]ba dang /_rgyu ma 'khrug pa dang /_lto sbo ba dang /_sgregs pa mang du 'ong ba'i mtshan ma rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i skran gyi mtshan ma ni/_zug cing gzer ba dang /_lto sbo ba dang /_phyi sa dang gcin 'gags pa dang /_skran
[\[226a.5\]]nyid 'phar ba dang /_gnas 'pho ba dang /_che chung du 'gyur ba dang /_ltag pa dang /_mgo bo dang /_za 'gram du zug pa dang /_ru shing na ba rnams yin par bstan to/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skran gyi mtshan ma ni/_lus tsha ba dang /_skom dad che
[\[226a.6\]]ba dang /_mgo 'khor ba dang /_rngul 'byung ba dang /_sgregs pa skyur ba dang /_khar kha ba bro ba dang /_skran nyid reg tu mi bzod pa rnams yin par bstan to/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i skran gyi mtshan ma ni/_mchil ma mang ba dang /_yi ga
[\[226a.7\]]'chus pa dang /_brang tsha zhing kha nas chu 'byung ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pa dang /_kha zas 'jur mi btub pa dang /_skran nyid sra zhing phyir rlo ba dang skyugs pa rnams yin no/_/'dus pa las gyur pa'i skran gyi mtshan ma ni/_skran nyid mi bzad
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]par na zhing tsha 'ur 'ur por 'dug pa dang /_rdo bzhin du sra zhing phyir rlo ba dang /_sems dang /_lus dang /_me'i drod nyams par byed pa rnams yin te/_gsor mi rung ngo /_/bud med kyi khrag skran ni/_mngal rlug pa dang /_bu byung ba dang /_zla mtshan
[\[226b.2\]]'dzags pa las 'gyur te/_skran nyid na zhing tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug pa sbrum ma dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de la skran gyis nyam thag ste/_rul sbal bzhin du phyi rol tu rlo zhing rtsa mngon la nad mang po bla gnyan gzhan gyis kyang thegs shing /_snying ga dang /_lte
[\[226b.3\]]ba'i phyogs dang /_rkang lag skrangs te mi bzod par gyur pa ni spang bar bya'o/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i skran la ni/_thog mar sman mar blud do/_/de'i 'og tu phye ma'i sman dang /_lus snum gyis bsku ba dang /_dug dang /_bkru sman drag po mas
[\[226b.4\]]btang ba dang /_'jam rtsi mas btang ba rnams kyis gso bar bya'o/_/de la sman mar ni byi dang ga dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_dbyi mo'i lo ma dang /_'u su'i 'bras bu dang /_kru trug tres rnams kyi mar dang /_'o ma dang /_chu'i
[\[226b.5\]]nang du bskol la mar nyi tshe la lus pa las ran par 'thungs na rlung las gyur pa'i skran sel to/_/kha ru tsha dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /_shu dag dang /_pu tse shel dang /_a ru ra dang /_kru trug tres dang /_byi dang ga dang /_tsha ba gsum po
[\[226b.6\]]rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis/_mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_'o ma de dang mnyam pa dang /_chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na yang /_rlung las gyur pa'i skran na ba dang /_bcan du sel cing
[\[226b.7\]]skyigs bu dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_srin bu dang /_mcher pa'i nad dang lud pa rnams sel to/_/bca' sga dang /_dbyi mong dang /_kru trug tres dang /_pi pi ling dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /_rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma srang re re/
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]sman tsi ri dang /_bilba skol ba'i khu ba dang /_mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang du bskol te mar nyi tshe lus par byas pa ni skran dang /_rtug skam dang /_skya rbab dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_pho ba'i nad dang lud pa rnams
[\[227a.2\]]sil cing /_rims dang /_cham pa drag po dang /_mcher pa'i nad dang /_gzhang 'brum rnams zhi bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/shing kun dang /_star bu dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_bye'u rug pa dang /_sug smel dang /_shu dag dang /_rtsabs ru
[\[227a.3\]]tsha dang /_kha ru tsha dang /_'u su'i 'bras bu dang /_go snyod dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /_bal po'i se'u dang /_ma nu dang /_a dza g+han+d+ha dang /_li zur pa dang /_kru trug tres dang /_la la phud rnams kyi phye ma mar dang /_zho mar dang bzhi
[\[227a.4\]]'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus par byas pa ni rlung las gyur pa'i skran dang /_zug cing na ba dang /_lto sbo ba'i nad rnams sel to/_/spa ma'i 'bras bu dang /_sug smel dang /_kru trug tres dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_dbyi mong dang /
[\[227a.5\]]la la phud dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_go snyod dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba rnams kyi phye ma/_rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang /_la phug lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba skyur por gyur pa/_zho dang mar 'o mar ldan pa'i nang du bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pas skran dang zug cing
[\[227a.6\]]na ba dang /_phyis 'gags pa sel cing /_mngal gyi nyes pa dang /_zas 'jur mi btub pa dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_snying na ba dang /_rtsib logs na ba rnams med par byed do/_/mar dang sbyor ba'i sman bstan pa 'di dag nyid
[\[227a.7\]]zhib tu btags te chu skol ba dang /_zho kha chu dang /_chang dang /_rtsabs skyur po dang /_tsha rnams las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang /_skran dang /_zug cing na ba la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/shing kun dang /_shu dag dang /_rtsabs ru
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]tsha dang /_bca' sga dang /_la la phud dang /_a ru ra dang /_kru trug tres dang /_ru rta rnams yas kyi rim bzhin du/_dang po'i cha res bskyed de btags pa'i phye ma chang la sogs pa gong du smos pa gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na/_skran dang /
[\[227b.2\]]lto sbo ba dang /_dmu rdzings sel te/_zug cing na ba dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pa 'joms par byed la/_pho ba'i drod bskyed par bshad do/_/shing kun dang /_kha lud dang /_star bu dang /_bal po'i se 'u dang /_rgyam
[\[227b.3\]]tsha dang /_rtsabs ru tsha rnams kyi phye ma chang bzang po dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang rlung las gyur pa'i skran sel to/_/rtsabs ru tsha dang /_kha ru tsha dang /_star bu dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /_shing kun rnams kyi phye ma zho kha chu la sogs pa gang yang
[\[227b.4\]]rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na/_skran dang /_zug cing na ba dang /_phyi sa 'gags pas nyam thag pa bde bar byed do/_/byi dang ga dang /_bri ha tI dang /_dan+ta 'i rtsa ba dang /_snu ha k+Shi ra dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis
[\[227b.5\]]mar srang brgyad dang /_chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol la/_mar nyi tshe lus pa las nyin re srang phyed phyed sha khu dang sbyar te 'thungs nas thur du bkrus pas/_kha zas sha dang ldan par zos na/_skran dang /_rtug skam dang /_mdze dang /_gzhang 'brum
[\[227b.6\]]dang/_me'i drod nyams pa dang /_dmu rdzings rnams med par 'gyur ro/_/shing nye rong dang /_snum ha k+Shi ra dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_ba la ka dang /_kam bi l+ya ka rnams las srang re re dang /_rgyam tsha srang phyed dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma mar srang brgyad
[\[227b.7\]]dang/_chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pa'i ming ni d+hi bin+du'i mar zhes bya ste/_'di las nyin re zhing zho gnyis gnyis 'thungs la/_chu skol ba dron pos phul te thur du bkrus na skran no cog dang dmu rdzings thams cad 'joms par
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]byed do/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skran yod pa la ni/_thog mar bu tshang rto la sogs pa'i sman mar dang /_ma hA tik+ta zhes bya ba'i sman mar dang /_ba sha ka la sogs pa'i sman mar rnams las gang yang rung ba btang ste/
[\[228a.2\]]lto 'jam por byas pa'i rjes la bkru sman btang nas de'i 'og tu bcud mas gtang bar bya'o/_/n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang /_ut+pal la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad pa rnams las gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba dang /_mar gyi nang du sman 'tsho
[\[228a.3\]]byed ces bya ba sna bcu sngar bstan pa rnams kyi phye ma btab ste bskol la mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i khrag lud pa'i skran sel to/_/a ru ra'i phye ma mar a ru ra'i bzhi 'gyur dang /_skyu ru ra skol ba'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur
[\[228a.4\]]gyi nang du btab ste bskol la mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skran myur du sel to/_/yang na mkhris pa'i skran yod pa la ni 'bras bu gsum skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du shing nye rong gi phye ma btab pa blud dam/
[\[228a.5\]]yang na kha ra dang /_kam byi la'i sbrang rtsis sbyar ba btab ste thur du bkru bar bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i sman ni dugs dang /_bcing ba'i dugs dang /_sman mar btung ba dang /_bkru sman rnon po dang /_'jam rtsi mas btang ba rnon po dang /_bkru sman drag po mas btang
[\[228a.6\]]ba rnon po dang /_sngar rlung skran gyi cho gar bstan pa rnams kyis kyang gso bar bya'o/_/drod bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i sman bca' sga dang /_pi pi ling dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_kru trug tres dang /_dbyi mong dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba rnams kyi
[\[228a.7\]]phye ma srang re re mar dang 'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang /_chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pa'i ming ni srang drug pa'i mar zhes bya ste/_'di las ran par 'thungs na yang bad kan las gyur pa'i skran sel to/_/pho ba'i nad
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]dang/_skya rbab kyi nad dang /_mcher pa'i dang /_lud pa dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_rims 'joms shing skrangs pa dang /_rtug skam med par byed do/_/dong ka la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba dang /_mar gyi nang du drod bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i sman
[\[228b.2\]]rnam pa drug po gong du smos pa rnams btags pa'i phye ma mar nyi tshe lus pa'am/_yang na pi pi ling la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i mar sngar bshad pa las ran par 'thungs na yang bad kan las gyur pa'i skran sel to/_/kha ru tsha dang /_kru trug tres dang /_shing
[\[228b.3\]]kun rnams kyi phye ma/_dar ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang me'i drod bskyed do/_/rtsabs ru tsha dang la la phud kyi phye ma dar ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang bad kan dang rlung dang 'phrod/_bud med kyi mngal gyi khrag las skran du gyur pa zla ba bcu 'das na bu ma yin
[\[228b.4\]]te skran yin par gyur na/_sman mar blud pa dang dugs byas pas lto 'jam por byas pa'i 'og tu snum pa'i cho ga bya ste bkru sman btang ngo /_/shu ti dang /_tsi ri bil ba'i shun lpags dang /_thang shing dang /_brgi dang /_pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma til
[\[228b.5\]]mar skol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang mngal gyi khrag las gyur pa'i skran sel to/_/til skol ba'i nang du/_bu ram dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_zhun mar dang /_brgi rnams kyi phye ma btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag gi skran sel to/_/bud
[\[228b.6\]]med zla mtshan mi 'byung ba la ni/_skyu ru ra skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du shing king+shu ka'i thal ba blugs la bskol te yang blud do/_/yang na nas tshig 'khus pa'i khu ba dang /_tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma chang dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang khrag gi skran sel to/_/
[\[228b.7\]]khrag gi skran khong du gram ste mngal gyi khrag drag tu 'byung zhing mi chod pa la ni/_khrag lud pa'i cho ga sngar bstan pa dang /_rlung nad sel ba'i cho ga sngar bstan pa rnams kyis bcad cing na ba yang zhi bar bya'o/_/rlung la sogs pa las gyur pa'i nad 'byang du mi btub pa
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]la ni/_sman pa sngon byed pa mthong zhing goms pas lag pa'i rtsa gtar zhing /_bad kan dang rlung las gyur pa'i skran la me btsa' gdab par bya'o/_/skran can la ni mdor na/_kha zas lci ba dang /_bad kan skye bar 'gyur ba'i bag spang
[\[229a.2\]]zhing/_me'i drod dang /_nyams stobs rtag tu bsrung bar bya ste/_kha zas dang btung ba rnams tshabs che chung las dpag cing bza' bar bya'o/_/skran gso ba'i le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so//_//de nas dmu rdzings gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/dmu
[\[229a.3\]]rdzings ni me'i drod chung ba dang /_kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pas nad gzhi 'khrugs nas/_lus rngul ba dang /_chu grang mo 'thungs te rtsa dang 'dzag sgo rnams 'gags pa las/_dmu rdzings kyi nad ma rungs pa rnam pa brgyad skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de la rlung las
[\[229a.4\]]gyur pa'i dmu rdzings kyi mtshan ma ni/_ltor zug cing na ba dang /_rdol la thug pa ltar na ba dang /_sgra 'byung ba dang /_rkang lag dang rlig pa skrangs pa dang /_gnyer ma nag po 'byung zhing rtsa mngon par 'byung ba rnams yin par bshad do/_/mkhris pa las gyur
[\[229a.5\]]pa'i dmu rdzings kyi mtshan ma ni/_lto sha reg na 'jam pa dang /_rims kyis 'debs pa dang /_rngul 'byung ba dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_lus tsha ba dang /_mgo 'khor ba dang /_rtsa sngon po dang /_ser pos g.yogs par 'dug pa rnams yin par bshad
[\[229a.6\]]do/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings kyi mtshan ma ni/_mchil ma mang ba dang /_lus lci ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_gnyid che ba dang /_skrangs pa dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_rims kyis 'debs pa dang /_'byang dka' ba dang /_lto 'khrang
[\[229a.7\]]ba dang /_pags pa stug pa dang /_rtsa mdog dkar pos g.yogs pa rnams yin par shes par bya'o/_/'dus pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings ni/_bud med kyi dbang du bya ba'i phyir skra dang sen mo la sogs pa byi ste zos pa dang /_'bebs par byed pa dang /
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]lus ma rung bar byed pa'i dug las kyang 'byung ste/_mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/dmu rdzings glo g.yas phyogs su 'byung ba la ni/_mchin pa'i dmu rdzings zhes bya'o/_/g.yon phyogs su 'byung ba ni mcher pa'i dmu rdzings
[\[229b.2\]]zhes bya ste/_'di gnyis ka yang bad kan dang khrag 'khrugs pa las 'byung ste/_mkhris pa dang bad kan gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa yin no/_/kha zas bya sgro dang spu 'dres pa zos te/_rgyu ma 'gags te phyi sa mi 'byung ba las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings/
[\[229b.3\]]snying ga dang lte ba'i bar gyi nang du dmu rdzings skye ba ni 'byung dka' ba yin te gzhang 'gags pa'i dmu rdzings zhes bya'o/_/kha zas zag rngu dang bcas pa zos na rgyu ma nang nas brtol te/_kha zas kyi khu ba phyir zags pa las nang du gyur te/_lte ba'i 'og tu zug
[\[229b.4\]]cing na ba byung ba'i ming ni rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzings zhes bya ste/_de'i mtshan ma ni chu sor zug pa'i mtshan ma la sogs pa sngar bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_/chu'i dmu rdzings zhes bya ba ni/_snum bag 'thungs sam/_skyug sman nam bkru sman btang ba'i rjes
[\[229b.5\]]la/_chu grang mo 'thungs pa las nad du gyur na/_lto ba'i phyogs su zlum zhing cher gyur te/_mdog snum la lto rkyal ba gang ba bzhin du gyur pa yin no/_/dmu rdzings rnam pa brgyad po 'di rnams kyi nang du rgyu ma brdol ba'i dmu rdzings dang /_gzhang 'gags
[\[229b.6\]]pa'i dmu rdzings gnyis ni gsor mi rung ngo /_/lhag ma gzhan ni gso dka' bar bshad de/_de dag las kyang chu'i dmu rdzings su gyur pa ni spang bar bya'o/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings la ni sman s+thi ra la sogs pa'i sde tshan btags pa'i phye ma
[\[229b.7\]]dang/_skol ba'i sman mar blud pa dang /_dugs bya ba dang /_snum bag gi bkru sman btang la lto zhi bar gyur nas/_lto phyir mi skye bar ras kyis bcing ba dang /_nad de dang 'phrod pa'i sman sbyar bas lto bskus pa'i steng nas/_pags pa drod che zhing spu
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]'jam la ma rul ba la lig to byas pa 'am/_de med na dar srin bal can gyi lig to 'am/_lug lpags kyis bcings pa'i dugs byas la/_kru trug tres kyi phye ma dang /_til mar lhan cig skol ba'i 'jam rtsi
[\[230a.2\]]mas btang ba dang /_sman s+thi ra la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba dang /_sbyar ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang /_kha zas 'o ma dang /_khu bcud dang sha khu gang yang rung ba dang ldan par bza' ba rnams rim bzhin du bya'o/_/mkhris
[\[230a.3\]]pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings la ni/_thog mar 'jam rtsi sman ro mngar ba'i phye ma dang mar skol ba 'thungs la/_de'i 'og tu shing nye rong dang /_'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma mar gyi nang du skol ba'i bkru sman btang ngo /_/yang na shing n+ya gro d+ha la sogs
[\[230a.4\]]pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba mar dang skol la mar nyi tshe lus pa sbrang rtsi dang kha ra dang sbyar bas bkru sman drag po mas gtang bar bya ste/_de yang sngar 'jam rtsi mas btang ba dang ldan par bya'o/_/'jam rtsi mas btang ba ni/_n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan
[\[230a.5\]]skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du sman gyi sde tshan de nyid kyi phye ma dang /_til mar dang lhan cig tu bskol te/_til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa btang ngo /_/de nas 'bras kyi 'o thug bska bas bcing ba'i dugs bya ste/_kha zas kyang sman s+thi ra la sogs pa'i
[\[230a.6\]]sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba 'o ma dang bskol la 'o ma nyi tshe lus pa dang ldan par bza'o/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings la ni thog mar 'jam rtsi pi pi ling la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i sman mar sngar bshad pa btang nas dugs byas pa'i 'og tu/_shing
[\[230a.7\]]snu ha ga shi ri dang /_skol ba'i mar gyi bkru sman btang ngo /_/de nas sman mu ska ka la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba til mar dang /_ba gcin dang /_tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma rnams dang sbyar ba'i bkru sman drag po mas gtang bar bya zhing /_'jam rtsi mas btang ba'i cho ga yang bya ste/_'jam rtsi
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]mas btang ba'i cho ga yang bya ste/_'jam rtsims gtang ba ni sman gyi sde tshan gong ma nyid skol ba'i khu ba dang /_til mar dang /_tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma lhan cig tu bskol te til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa btang ngo /_/de nas phabs dang /_la phug gi sa
[\[230b.2\]]bon dang /_yungs kar rnams sbyar re bas bcing ba'i dugs bya'o/_/kha zas ni rgya sran gyi khu bcud dam 'o ma tsha ba gsum dang ldan pas dpag cing bza'o/_/'dus pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings la ni/_rlung las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings la sogs gong du smos pa rnams
[\[230b.3\]]kyi cho ga sngar bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyar bar bya'o/_/yang na 'di la ni/_bog dang /_shaM ki ni'i phye ma dang mar lhan cig tu skol ba'i bkru sman yang btang ngo /_/mcher ba'i dmu rdzings can la yang /_'jam rtsi dang /_dugs dang /_/bkru sman la sogs
[\[230b.4\]]pa'i cho ga byas la/_lag pa g.yon pa'i gru mo'i nang gi rtsa yang gtar bar bya'o/_/byi dang ga dang /_kru trug tres dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_phye dang /_shu dag rnams cha ma chom du brdungs la mar gyis bskus te/_snod kha sbyar gyi nang du bsnos nas/_zhib tu btags
[\[230b.5\]]la 'o ma dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang skran dang mcher pa'i dmu rdzings sel to/_/yang na le sham dkar po skol ba'i khu ba/_rgyam tsha dang /_kru trug tres dang /_pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na na le sham dkar po skol ba'i khu ba shing
[\[230b.6\]]ba la sha'i thal ba dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang sbyar te blud do/_/ro hi ta ka dang /_a ru ra'i phye ma ba gcin nam/_chu'i nang du spangs te/_'thungs na yang dmu rdzings thams cad dang /_mcher pa'i nad dang /_gcin snyi ba'i nad dang /_gzhang
[\[230b.7\]]'brum dang /_srin bu dang /_skran sel to/_/yang na rgyam tsha 'am nya lcibs bsregs pa'i thal ba 'o ma dang sbyar te tshod ran par btung bar bya'o/_/yang na 'cher pa'i dmu rdzings la/_pi pi ling gi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar te blud do/_/mtsher pa'i dmu rdzings
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]gso ba'i cho gar bstan pa de thams cad ni mchin pa'i dmu rdzings la yang gtang bar bya'o/_/yang na mchin pa'i dmu rdzings la ni/_lag pa g.yas pa'i gru mo'i nang gi rtsa gtar bar bya'o/_/dmu rdzings rnams la ni phyi sa la sogs
[\[231a.2\]]pa lto'i dri ma shas che bas ni/_bkru sman lan mang du bya bar bstan to/_/de nas de'i 'og tu dmu rdzings kyi spyi'i cho ga zhes pa yang bstan par bya ste/_dmu rdzings la ni e raN+Ta'i mar 'o ma dang ba gcin gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te lan mang du btung bar bya'o/_/
[\[231a.3\]]yang na til mar shing kun dang /_swa rtsi ka'i thal ba dang sbyar ba 'am/_sman dz+yo ti ka'i phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba blud do/_/mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_'o ma mar gyi brgyad 'gyur gyi nang du/_snu ha k+Shi ri srang gcig dang /_shing nye rong gi phye ma srang drug
[\[231a.4\]]bskol la/_mar nyi tshe lus par byas te/_btsags pa las ran par 'thungs na yang dmu rdzings dang skran sel to/_/'bras bu gsum dang /_bya rnu dang /_pog dang /_shi drod dang /_shu dag dang /_khyi lce ba dang /_spa ma'i 'bras bu dang /_pu tse
[\[231a.5\]]shel dang /_shing nye rod dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_pi pi ling gi phye ma ba gcin dang /_chu skol ba dron mo dang /_sha khu rnams las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang skran dang /_dmu rdzings dang /_mtsher pa'i nad dang /_mdze dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /
[\[231a.6\]]khrag tshad dang /_skrangs pa 'or thabs rnams kyis nyam thag pa thams cad sel to/_/sman big sha la dang /_shing khi ni dang /_dan+da'i rtsa ba dang /_shing nye rong dang /_shing dong dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_yung dang /_byi dang ga dang /_kaM bi l+ye ka
[\[231a.7\]]rnams kyi phye ma/_ba gcin dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang dmu rdzings sel to/_/zhag bdun gyi bar du kha zas dang skom gzhan mi bza' mi btung bar/_ma he'i gcin dang 'o ma sbyar ba 'ba' zhig btung ngam/_yang na zla ba gcig gi bar du kha zas dang skom
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]gzhan mi bza' mi btung bar/_rnga mo'i 'o ma 'ba' zhig 'thungs na yang skrangs pa 'or thabs su skrangs pa dang dmu rdzings sel to/_/yang na dmu rdzings can la pi pi ling gi phye ma shing snu ha'i 'o ma zags pa'i nang du spangs pa las ci ran par btung
[\[231b.2\]]ngo /_/yang na dmu rdzings zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/_dbyi mong dang /_dan+da'i rtsa ba dang /_kru trug tres dang /_byi dang ga dang /_tsha ba gsum rnams kyi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na thang shing dang /_kru trug tres kyi phye ma 'o ma dang /_sga skol ba'i khu ba
[\[231b.3\]]gnyis las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar ba 'am/_yang na dbyi mong dang /_bca' sga'i phye ma 'o ma dang sga skol ba'i khu ba gnyis las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/_/nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /_swa rtsi ka'i thal ba dang /_kru trug tres
[\[231b.4\]]dang/_tsha ba gsum dang /_shi dong dang /_lan tshwa rnam lnga rnams kyi phye ma mar khu dang sbyar te 'thungs na/_skran dang dmu rdzings thams cad sel to/_/dmu rdzings so cog bsal ba'i phyir/_sman byi sha la dang /_shing ki ni dang /_dan+da'i rtsa ba dang /_shi dong dang /
[\[231b.5\]]byi tsher rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/_/mdor na dmu rdzings so cog ni/_phal cher nad gzhi mang po 'dus pa las byung bas na/_de'i phyir dmu rdzings so cog la rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi rnams zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/rgyu ma rdol
[\[231b.6\]]ba'i dmu rdzings dang /_chu'i dmu rdzings dang /_gzhang 'gags pa'i dmu rdzings 'di gsum la ni/_sman pa cho ga shes pas so shi rdo bar dam bcas la lta dbug pa dang dral ba'i cho ga yang bya'o/_/dmu rdzings rnams kyis nyam thag pa'i kha zas su ni/_/
[\[231b.7\]]'bras sA lu rnams dang /_nas dang /_mon sran sde'u dang /_'o ma dang /_srog chags rnams skam sa na gnas pa'i sha khu rnams nyams stobs las dpags te dal zhing btung bar bya'o/_/dmu rdzings can la ni chu btung ba dang nyin par gnyid log pa dang /
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]kha zas lci ba dang /_bad kan bskyed pa'i bag dang drag shul gyi bag mi bya'o/_/bzhon pa la zhon pa rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/dmu rdzings gso ba'i le'u ste bcu pa rdzogs so//_//de nas gcin snyi
[\[232a.2\]]ba'i nad gso ba bshad par bya ste/_kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pa dang /_'dug nyal la sogs pa gnas pa'i nyes pa las/_gcin snyi ba'i nad rnam pa nyi shu 'byung bar bshad de/_de yang gcin snyi ba'i nad du gyur
[\[232a.3\]]gcin snyi pa'i nad yin no zhes drang srong thub pa rnams kyis gsungs so/_/gcin snyi ba'i nad des thog mar 'debs pa'i mtshan ma ni/_so la sogs pa shin tu dri ma che bar 'gyur ba dang /_rkang lag tsha ba dang /_lus kyi
[\[232a.4\]]mdog dmar por gyur pa dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_khar mngar ba bro ba rnams yin no/_/de la bad kan las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad kyi ming ni/_chu 'dra ba zhes bya ba dang bu ram shing gi khu ba dang 'dra ba dang /_chang 'dra ba dang /_'bras
[\[232a.5\]]phye 'dra ba dang /_phye ma 'dra ba dang bska ba dang /_'bred ba dang /_lan tshwa 'dra ba dang /_dbu ba 'dra ba dang /_khu chu 'dra ba zhes bya ba dang rnam pa bcu'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad kyi ming ni ljang ser zhes bya ba dang /_sngon po dang /_btsod
[\[232a.6\]]kha dang /_thal kha dang /_khrag 'dra ba dang /_skyur ba tshos pa zhes bya ba dang rnam pa drug go/_/rlung las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad kyi ming ni/_mar khu dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba dang /_sbrang rtsi 'dra ba dang /_glang po che'i gcin 'dra ba dang /_zhag 'dra ba zhes
[\[232a.7\]]bya ba dang rnam pa bzhi'o/_/gcin snyi ba'i nad 'di dag thams cad kyi mtshan ma ni/_so so'i ming du smos pa'i don bzhin du lta'o/_/de la bad kan las gyur pa rnams ni gso sla bar bshad do/_/rlung las gyur pa rnams ni/_gsor mi rung bar mthong ngo /_/
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams ni/_kha zas dang /_sman gyis gso tsam du 'jog nus so/_/de las bad kan las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad yod pa la ni/_sman la la phud dang /_pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /_sle tres dang /_a ru ra rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_ba tha dang /
[\[232b.2\]]skyer pa dang /_byi dang ga dang /_yung dang /_ardzu na dang /_byi tsher rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_byi dang ga dang /_yung dang /_skyer pa dang /_a ru ra dang /_rgya spos lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_shing sA la dang /_ardzu na dang /_ka da ma pa dang /_skyer ba
[\[232b.3\]]dang/_la la phud rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_tsan dan dkar po dang /_a ka ru dang /_ru rta dang /_thang shing rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_kat+pa la dang /_gla sgang dang /_pa tha dang /_ti ri ta dang /_a ru ra rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_aM pa sh+tha
[\[232b.4\]]dang/_seng ldeng dang /_skyer pa dang /_ag+mi man+tha dang /_'bras bu gsum po rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_sman gyi sbyor ba bdun po 'di rnams las/_gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs la/_sbrang rtsi dang shas cher sbyar te blud do/_/mkhris pa las
[\[232b.5\]]gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad yod pa la ni/_pa To la dang /_nim+ba'i lo ma dang /_sle tres dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_gla sgang rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_a ru ra dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_pu shel tse dang /_ni la ba ri dang /_gla sgang rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba
[\[232b.6\]]dang/_pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /_shug pa dang /_gla sgang dang /_a ru ra dang /_dug mo nyung rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_u di ts+ye dang /_d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang /_seng phrom dang /_ka li ya ka rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_ut+pa la dang /_pu shel tse dang /
[\[232b.7\]]seng phrom dang /_ardzu na dang /_tsan dan dkar po rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_sman gyi sbyor ba lnga po 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blud do/_/gcin snyi ba'i nad la/_rlung gtso bor gyur la/_bad kan
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]dang/_mkhris pa gnyis las/_gcig grogs su gyur na/_gang grogs su gyur pa rtogs par bya ste/_bad kan grogs su gyur pa la ni de dang 'phrad pa'i sman ro tsha zhing drod che ba'i mthu dang ldan pa rnams kyi phye ma til mar
[\[233a.2\]]dang /_sman gyi khu ba til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/_til mar nyi tshe lus pa las ci ran par blud do/_/mkhris pa grogs su gyur pa la ni/_de dang 'phrod pa'i sman ro mngar zhing bsil ba'i mthu dang ldan pa rnams kyi phye ma/_mar dang /_sman gyi khu ba mar
[\[233a.3\]]gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te mar nyi tshe lus pa ci ran par blud do/_/sle tres rlon pa'i khu ba btsir ba 'am/_skam po skol ba'i bsgrangs pa la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang gcin snyi ba'i nad thams cad sel to/_/skyu ru ra rlon pa btsir pa'i khu
[\[233a.4\]]ba 'am/_skam po btsos pa'i khu ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du yung gi phye ma dang sbyar ba 'am/_yang na 'bras bu gsum dang /_thang shing dang /_skyer pa dang /_gla sgang rnams skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs la/_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na dug mo nyung gi shing sab+ta r+Na dang /
[\[233a.5\]]skyer pa dang /_kru trug tres dang /_'bras bu gsum po rnams bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'thungs na gcin snyi ba'i nad sel to/_/shing sA la dang /_spu skar dang /_kaM bi ka rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis skyu ru ra'i khu ba dang sbrang rtsir sbyar
[\[233a.6\]]te 'thungs na yang gcin snyi ba'i nad thams cad sel ba'i mchog yin no/_/yang na 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_brag zhun sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_lcags kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_a ru ra'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_/sman
[\[233a.7\]]gyi lde gu gcin snyi ba'i nad bzlog pa'i phyir bza' bar bya'o/_/seng phrom dang /_sug smel dang /_kru trug tres dang /_dan+da'i rtsa ba dang /_pa tha dang /_gan+d+ha pa tra dang /_shing tsha dang /_nA ga ge sar dang /_gla ba dang /_ma nu dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_rtsa mkhris dang /
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]thang shing /_dug mo nyung dang /_bi shal dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_brgi dang /_ru rta dang /_mu rwa dang /_gan+d+ha pri yaM ku dang /_byi dang ga dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_pu tse shel dang /_dbyi mong dang /_pi pi ling dang /_rtsa ba dang/_la la phud rnams kyi phye ma
[\[233b.2\]]zho gnyis gnyis chu phul gang la srang brgyad du brtsis pa phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du bskol te/_chu bzhi cha gcig lus nas bsgrangs te btsags la/_sbrang rtsi sman gyi khu ba gdus pa de'i phye dang sbyar nas/_bum pa mar snod du byas pa'i nang du blugs te kha bcad la
[\[233b.3\]]zla ba phyed kyi bar du nas kyi nang du bzhag pa'i sbrang chang 'di las nyin re bzhin srang gnyis gnyis 'thungs na yang gcin snyi ba'i nad sel zhing /_pho ba'i nad dang /_skya rbab kyi nad dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_mdze dang /_yi ga 'chus pa rnams 'joms
[\[233b.4\]]par byed do/_/gcin snyi ba'i nad yod pa'i kha zas ni/_tshod ma kha ba'i bag dang /_skam sa na gnas pa'i ri dwags sha bkra'i sha dang /_bya sha dang /_nas las byas pa'i kha zas dang /_mon sran sde'u dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_zhag drug cu smin pa rnams dge'o/_/
[\[233b.5\]]skom du ni bu ram dang /_rgun chang dang /_seng ldeng gi snying po la sogs pa skol ba'i khu ba dang /_sbrang chang dang /_rtswa ku sha skol ba'i khu ba dang /_'bras bu gsum skol ba'i khu ba rnams gcin snyi ba'i nad la bsngags pa yin no/_/gcin snyi ba'i nad kyi rkyen gyis
[\[233b.6\]]phol mig rnams mang po 'byung ste/_thog ma 'byung ba'i tshe ni rtsa nas khrag dbyung bar bya'o/_/phol mig smin pa ni brtol la rma gso ba'i cho ga bzhin du bya'o/_/gcin snyi ba'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs so//_//sman dpyad gces pa
[\[233b.7\]]grub pa zhes bya ba bam po bzhi pa'o/_/de nas mdze nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/mdze nad ni sdig can dang /_kha zas ngan pa zos te nad gzhi gsum 'khrugs nas/_pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag dang /_chu ser rnams ma rung bar gyur pa la mdze nad
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]rnam pa bco brgyad du 'gyur te/_mdze nad u dum+bA ra zhes bya ba/_u dum+bA ra'i 'bras bu 'dra ba dang /_sha gzi gu zhes bya ba dung gi kha dog 'dra ba dang /_ka ka na zhes bya ba 'ol ma se'i 'bras bu smin pa dang 'dra ba dang /_pags
[\[234a.2\]]pa shul grub ces bya ba glang po che'i pags pa 'dra ba dang /_pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba rang gi ming gi mdog 'dra ba dang /_ri dwags ri sha'i lce 'dra ba zhes bya ba rtsub po dang /_rma kha brgya pa zhes bya ba rma mang po dang /_khyab pa rdul med ces bya ba dang /_pags pa
[\[234a.3\]]myags pa zhes bya ba pags pa zad pa dang /_rkang pa zhigs pa zhes bya ba rkang pa ser ga mang po 'gas pa dang /_mdze nad rnam pa bcu po 'di dag ni gsor mi rung ngo /_/lhag ma brgyad ni gsor rung ba yin te/_mdze nad gya mo 'dra ba zhes bya ba mdog
[\[234a.4\]]gnag cing rtsub pa dang /_me dbal zhes bya ba rma kha chen po dang /_'brum bu phra mo zhes bya ba sha rmen 'dra zhing /_mdog sngo skyar 'dug pa dang /_shu ba zhes bya ba 'brum bu mang po phyogs gcig nas 'bud pa dang /_sha bkra zhes bya ba ku ba'i me tog
[\[234a.5\]]'dra ba dang /_thig le zhes bya ba mdog snum zhing 'byang dka' ba dang /_g.yan pa zhes bya ba 'brum bu mdog dkar zhing dmar ba dang /_rkang shu zhes bya ba 'brum bu 'dzag pa rnams so/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i mdze ni/_mkhrang zhing mdog sngo skyar
[\[234a.6\]]'dug pa dang dmar zhing rtsub la mi bzad par na ba yin no/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mdze ni lus tsha zhing shin tu myags la khrag 'dzag pa yin par bshad do/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i mdze nad ni lus rul zhing pags pa stug la g.ya' zhing mdog snum pa dang
[\[234a.7\]]dkar zhing lci ba yin no/_/de la nad gzhi gsum las gyur pa'i mdze nad kyi mtshan ma ni tshul thams cad dang ldan pa'am/_nad bla gnyan mang pos thebs pa gang yin pa de ni spang bar bya'o/_/mdze bo cog ni phal cher nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa dang /_khrag
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]rgyas pa las 'byung bar bshad pas na/_mdze nad tshabs chen po nyams stobs yod la sngar yang snum bcud btang ba la ni rtsa gtar zhing khrag dbyung bar bya'o/_/mdze nad tshabs chung ngu la ni zhal zhal gdab pa dang /_rngab rus gzhibs pa dang /_ku
[\[234b.2\]]bas khrag drang ba dang /_srin bu pad pa la 'jib tu gzhug go/_/nad gzhi ci 'dra ba las skyug sman dang bkru sman yang btang ngo /_/mdze nad gtar ga byar mi rung ba dang /_tshor ba med pa bem bem po la ni sman mu ka'i thal ba dang /_til gyi sog
[\[234b.3\]]ma'i thal ba la sogs pas gdab bo/_/mdze tshor ba med pa bem bem bor gyur pa dang /_pags pa mkhrang por 'dug pa dang 'byang du mi btub pa rnams la ni/_mda' dug la sogs pas sngags dang ldan par bya ste lus la bsku bar bya'o/_/
[\[234b.4\]]pa to la dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_a riSh+Da dang /_sle tres dang /_d+ha ba ni dang /_ba sha ka dang /_ka rany+dza rnams btags pa'i phye ma dang chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni rdo rje can zhes bya ste/_de las
[\[234b.5\]]ran par 'thungs na mdze nad sel to/_/kha ba chen po ci skrigs zhes bya ba'i mar ni/_rtsa mkhris dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_pu shel tse dang /_pa Tha dang /_a riSh+Ta dang /_gla sgang dang /_byi tsher dang /_shing mngar dang /_thal tres rnam
[\[234b.6\]]gnyis dang /_pu tse shel dang /_khyi lce ba dang /_tsan dan dkar po dang /_sle tres dang /_pi pi ling dang /_shug pa dang /_shu dag dang /_pi sha la dang /_dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu dang /_ba sha ka dang /_murba dang /_pa to la dang /_dong ka dang /
[\[234b.7\]]sro lo dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_yung dang /_ba mkhal dang /_nye'u shing gi rtsa ba dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma spyir mar gyi bzhi cha gcig dang /_skyu ru ra'i khu ba mar gyi nyis 'gyur dang /_chu mar gyi brgyad 'gyur dang /_'di rnams mar dang bskol te mar nyi tshe lus
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]par byas nas btsags te/_de las ran par zos na yang rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad drag po dang /_mdze dang /_'bras dang /_skya rbab rnams sel cing /_rims dang smyo ba dang /_'bras kyi phreng ba rnams med par byed do/_/
[\[235a.2\]]mkhris pa dang /_khrag shas che ba'i mdze nad la ni/_mar pa To la'i phye ma dang skol ba'am/_skyer pa'i phye ma dang skol ba'am/_seng ldeng gi phye ma dang skol ba'am/_nim pa'i phye ma dang skol ba'i mar blud do/_/yang na sman a brta ka'i phye ma srang brgyad
[\[235a.3\]]mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_chu srang brgya'i nang du bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pa las ci ran par rtsabs dron po dang sbyar te 'thungs la sman khong du zhu ba'i 'og tu zas su ko dra ba'i chan bza' bar bya ste/_zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin re bzhin cho ga de
[\[235a.4\]]ltar byas pa'i 'og tu zhag gsum gyi bar du sman mi btang bar mthun zhing 'phrod pa'i kha zas zos la/_yang zhag bdun gyi bar du sman gyi cho ga snga ma ltar bya ba de lta bur ma sos kyi bar du byas na/_mdze dang /_skran dang /_dmu rdzings dang /_mtshan par
[\[235a.5\]]rdol ba'i nad rnams las thal bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na dzA ti ka'i 'bras bu dang /_sna ma'i me tog dang /_tsha ba gsum pa rnams btags la/_'bru mar dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na ldong ros dang /_na le sham btags pa'i til mar dang /
[\[235a.6\]]shing arga'i lo ma rnams lus la bskus na yang mdze'i nad ngo cog sel to/_/a ru ra dang /_ka rany+dza dang /_yungs kar dang /_yung dang /_bal guny+dza dang /_rgyam tshwa dang /_byi dang ka rnams lhan cig tu btags la ba gcin dang sbyar te lus bskus
[\[235a.7\]]na yang mdze nad sel to/_/ru rta dang /_a raN+Da dang /_e da ga dza rnams lhan cig tu til mar ram/_ba gcin dang sbyar te lus la bskus na yang mdze nad thub po/_seng phrom dang /_skyer khaN+Da dang /_rgyam tshwa dang /_phra puN+Da rnams kyang bsku ba'i
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]rnam grangs su bshad do/_/ru rta dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_yungs kar dang /_byi dang ga dang /_e da ga dza rnams lhan cig tu btags la rtsabs dang sbyar te bskus na yang shu ba dang mdze thig le zhes bya ba sel to/_/mu zi dang /_ba bla dang /_ldong ros dang /_ru rta dang /
[\[235b.2\]]sman ka li dang /_phu shel tse dang /_gan+d+ha pa tra rnams btags la chu dang sbyar te bskus na yang sha bkra la sogs pa mdze'i nad do cog sel to/_/gan+d+ha pa tra dang /_na le sham dang /_nag tshur dang /_ru rta dang /_ldong ros rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang sbyar la/_khar ba'i
[\[235b.3\]]snod kyi nang du zhag bdun gyi bar du bzhag ste lus la bskus na yang sha bkra dang /_sha gzi gu med par byed do/_/mu zi dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba'am/_chu shing gi thal ba'am/_shing kha ra'i me tog gi thal ba gang yang rung ba til mar dang sbyar te lus
[\[235b.4\]]bskus na yang sha bkra sel bar byed do/_/sman da ku na nyi rma bya'i mkhris pa dang sbyar ba 'am/_sman pa la ka'i thal ba rma bya'i mkhris pa dang sbyar ba'am/_sna ma'i me tog glang po che'i rdul las sbyar ba rnams las gang yang rung bas lus la bskus na yang sha gzi gu
[\[235b.5\]]med par byed do/_/ru rta dang /_sman a shu mar dang /_shing arga'i shun lpags dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_pu shel tse dang /_kru trug tres rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang til mar gyi nang du bskol te til mar nyi tshe lus pa lus la bskus na yang mdze nad sel to/_/
[\[235b.6\]]ru rta dang /_a shwa mar dang /_b+hing ga ra dza dang /_arga dang /_rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang /_shing snu ha'i lo ma dang /_til mar gyi nang du bskol la til mar nyi tshe lus pa'i nang du mda' dug cung zad tsam btab ste lus la bskus na yang shu ba
[\[235b.7\]]dang/_rkang shu la sogs pa sel to/_/btsod dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_rgya skyegs dang /_yung dang /_ldong ros dang /_ba bla dang /_mu zi rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma til mar dang sbyar te nyi tshan gyi drod kyis bsros pa lus la bskus na
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]yang g.yan pa sel bar byed do/_/sman ka ka na si ka dang /_u dum+bA ra dang /_nim+pa dang /_gla sgang dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_byi dang ga rnams kyi phye ma nim+pa skol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang pags pa'i nyes pa'o cog sel
[\[236a.2\]]to/_/sle tres skol ba'i khu ba dang /_'bras bu gsum skol ba'i khu ba dang /_ba gcin skol ba dron mo rnams las gang yang rung ba gu gul dang sbyar te zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thungs na yang pags pa'i nyes pa dang /_rma dang lus skem pa rnams sel to/_/
[\[236a.3\]]brag zhun dang /_yung dang /_skyer khaN+Da rnams las gang yang rung ba sbrang rtsi dang ba gcin gyis sbyar te zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thungs na yang /_mdze dang skya rbab kyi nad sel to/_/zhag bdun gsum gyi bar du khang pa dron po 'am/_nyi ma tsha ba la 'dug
[\[236a.4\]]cing /_sman tsha ba skol ba'i khu ba dron mo dang /_sman pa ku tsi'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs la kha zas 'o ma dang ldan par zos na yang mdze las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/ba ku tsi'i phye ma mar sar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar te zos la/_de'i rjes la dar ba 'thungs shing /
[\[236a.5\]]kha zas kyang dar ba dang spags te zos na mdze nad kyi 'jigs pa med do/_/til dang /_mar dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_go bye dang /_kha ra dang /_rnam pa 'di bdun cha mnyam ste sbyar ba'i ming ni bdun cha mnyam pa zhes bya
[\[236a.6\]]ste/_de las ci ran par zos na ro tsa zhing yid gzhungs par byed la/_mdze nad sel te 'di la cho ga bsrung ba med do/_/byi dang ga dang /_kru trug tres dang /_kha ra dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_lcags kyi so dog dang /_pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang
[\[236a.7\]]sbyar te zos na mdze'i nad do cog shin tu tshabs che ba yang sel bar 'gyur te/_a ru ra dang /_til dang /_go bye rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang sbyar te brdzis pa zos na yang mdze nad sel to/_/go bye dang /_byi dang ga dang /_so ma ra tsi ka rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang brdzis
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]pa 'am/_byi dang ga dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang brdzis pa zos na yang /_mdze dang /_srin bu dang /_gcin snyi ba'i nad dang /_rma 'khyims pa dang mtshan par rdol gyi nad rnams sel bar byed do/_/pags
[\[236b.2\]]pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba la dug mo nyung gi phye ma mar khu dang sbyar ba yang btung bar bya'o/_/yang na til dang /_so ma ra dza ka'i phye ma cha mnyam ste sbyar ba cho ga bsrungs bzhin du lo gcig gi bar du bza' 'o/_/seng ldeng dang /_brag zhun dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /
[\[236b.3\]]zhun mar dang /_byi dang ga rnams sbyar te zos nas cho ga bzhin du bsrungs na/_skrangs mdze dang /_skrangs pa'i nad ring po mi thogs par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/seng ldeng gi rtsa ba bsregs pa'i khu ba bum pa'i nang du bzags pa/_skyu ru ra'i khu ba dang mar dang
[\[236b.4\]]sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na yang mdze nad sel zhing sman bcud kyis len du 'gyur ro/_/seng ldeng skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang skyer khaN+Da dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na 'bras bu gsum dang /_byi dang ga'i phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar te zos na yang mdze nad
[\[236b.5\]]sel to/_/seng ldeng skol ba'i khu bas lus la bsku ba dang /_lus la dril ba dang /_khrus bya ba dang /_btung ba dang /_kha zas g.yo ba'i chu la sogs pa spyad cing rtag tu 'thungs na mdze nad pags pa'i nyes pa thams cad sel to/_/ji ltar seng ldeng mdze nad bzlog
[\[236b.6\]]pa'i cho gar sbyar ba bzhin du/_shi sha ba dang /_dong ka dang /_a riSh+Ta dang /_skyer pa dang /_shing ro hi ta ka dang a sa na rnams kyang de bzhin du bya'o/_/mdze nad can la ni kha zas su 'bras sA lu dang /_ko dra ba dang /_gro dang /_nas dang /_mon sran sde'u la sogs
[\[236b.7\]]gang bu can rnying pa rnams dang /_tshod ma ro kha ba'i bag dang /_ri dwags skam sa na gnas pa'i sha dang sbyar ba rnams phan zhing 'phrod pa yin no/_/mdze nad gso ba'i le'u bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhang 'brum dang /_mtshan par
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]rdol gyi le'u bshad par bya'o/_/de nas gzhang 'brum ni nad gzhi gsum re re las gyur pa dang /_kun 'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_khrag nad las gyur pa dang /_thog ma nas lhan cig skyes pa dang rnam pa drug yod de/_gzhang
[\[237a.2\]]ka'i gnyer ma gsum yod pa'i gnas su 'byung bar rig par bya'o/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi mtshan ma ni/_'brum bu chung zhing ma rgyas pa dang /_skam pa dang /_rtsa dmar zhing sngo skyar 'dug pa dang /_snum bag med cing rtsub pa dang /
[\[237a.3\]]'brum bu rnams mtho dman yod cing mi mnyam pa dang /_na zhing 'gag par byed pa la sogs pa rlung gi tshul thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi mtshan ma ni/_mdog dmar zhing ser la gnag ste reg tu mi bzod cing /
[\[237a.4\]]'jam la khrag 'dzag cing chu ser can la mgo 'khor zhing lus tsha ba la sogs pa mkhris pa'i tshul rnams dang ldan pa yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi mtshan ma ni/_mdog dkar ba dang ser skyar 'dug pa dang /_'byang dka' ba dang /_snum
[\[237a.5\]]zhing 'byil ba dang /_'brum bu che zhing tshor ba med pa dang /_bad kan gyi tshul rnams dang ldan pa yin no/_/kun 'dus pa las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum dang /_thog ma nas lhan cig skyes pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi tshul ni thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang ldan pa yin
[\[237a.6\]]no/_/khrag las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi mtshan ma ni mdog dmar zhing khrag 'dzag pa yin par bstan to/_/de la nang gi gnyer ma'i gnas su 'byung ba dang /_nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_thog ma nas lhan cig skyes pa 'di gsum ni spang bar
[\[237a.7\]]bya'o/_/lhag ma gzhan rnams ni gso dka' bar bshad/_gzhang 'brum can la nad bla thabs su skyug pa dang /_mod mod pa'i nad dang /_ngu shing na ba dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_rims dang /_snying na ba dang /_chu so na ba dang /_khar 'brum pa 'byung ba dang /_gzhang
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]kar 'brum pa phre'u 'byung ba dang /_sha zad pa rnams spang bar bya'o/_/yang na gzhang 'brum ni rnam pa gnyis su 'dus te/_gzhang 'brum skam pa ni bad kan dang rlung gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa yin no/_/mkhris pa dang /_khrag nad 'dus pa las gyur pa ni/
[\[237b.2\]]gsher zhing 'dzag pa yin par shes par bya ste/_de la thog mar gzhang 'brum skem pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/_gzhang 'brum zhi bar bya ba la/_ba lang gi lci ba'i dugs dang /_zan dron gyi dugs dang /_la phug gi dugs dang /_shu ta'i dugs rnams gang
[\[237b.3\]]yang rung bya ba zhing /_gso ma skol ba'i khu ba blugs pa dang /_sbrul nag po dang /_byi la dang /_rnga mo dang /_phag dang /_srog chags dza du ka rnams gang yang rung ba'i tshil bsregs pa'i dud pas bdug pa dang /_yang na yung gi phye ma shing snu ha'i 'o ma dang
[\[237b.4\]]sbyar te bsku ba dang /_yang na pi pi ling dang /_lung gi phye ma ba lang gi mkhris pa dang sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/_/yang na srardzi ka'i thal ba dang /_dan+da'i rtsa ba dang /_lung ga la'i rtsa ba dang /_kru trug tres rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang /_pi pi ling dang /_shing shir
[\[237b.5\]]sha'i sa bon dang /_shing arga'i 'o ma dang /_ru rta dang /_rgyam tsha rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_yung dang /_bya gag gi rtug pa dang /_'ol ma se'i 'bras bu dang /_pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar ba dang /_bsku ba'i sman rnam pa 'di gsum
[\[237b.6\]]ni/_gdon mi za ba yin te gang yang rung bas bskus na gzhang 'brum med par byed do/_/dan+da'i rtsa ba dang /_a shwa mar dang /_nag tshur dang /_byi dang ga dang /_ba bla dang /_kru trug tres dang /_rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma shing arga'i 'o ma dang /_til mar
[\[237b.7\]]gyi nang du bskol te/_til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pas bskus na yang gzhang 'brum sel te/_yang na/_a ru ra bu ram dang sbyar ba 'am/_yang na a ru ra zhag gcig gi bar du ba gcin gyi nang du sbangs pa'am/_yang na a ru ra dang pi pi ling mar
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]gyi nang du brngos pa'am/_yang na a ru ra dang /_shing nye rong dang /_dan+da'i rtsa ba rnams sbyar ba bza' bar bya'o/_/yang na go bye btags pa'i phye dang dar ba sbyar ba'am/_yang na dar ba dang /_phye kru trug tres dang /_la la phud btags
[\[238a.2\]]pa'i phye ma dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na dar ba dang /_phye bca' sga dang /_bilba dang sbyar ba nan tan du byas te btung ngo /_/yang na rdza ma kru trug tres kyis bskus pa'i nang du zho mnan de langs nas zho 'am dar ba gang yang rung ba btung ngo /_/yang de nyid kyi cho ga bzhin
[\[238a.3\]]du/_pi rga dang /_po ta dang /_sle tres rnams kyis rdza ma bskrus pa'i nang du zho mnan la zho 'am dar ba gang yang rung ba btung ngo /_/yang na dbyi mong dang /_kru trug tres phye ma chang dang sbyar te rtag tu 'thungs na gzhang 'brum sel to/_/yang na bca' sga dang /
[\[238a.4\]]kru trug tres rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang chang dang sbyar te btung ngo /_/yang na gzhang 'brum can la/_dan+da'i rtsa ba dang /_go bye dang /_kru trug tres dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_'di rnams cha mnyam pa dang /_rgyam tsha cha nyis 'gyur rnams snod kha sbyar gyi nang
[\[238a.5\]]du brngos la/_tshig mar gyur pa'i phye ma kha zas gzhan dang sbyar zhing bza' bar bya'o/_/til nag po zho gnyis gnyis nang par bzhin zos la chu grang mos phul na yang gzhang 'brum zhi bar 'gyur zhing so brtan la sha skyi bar 'gyur ro/_/mar dang /_shing pa la sha'i
[\[238a.6\]]thal ba'i khu ba mar gyi chu sum 'gyur gyi nang du tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na yang the tshom med par gzhang 'brum 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/'bras bu gsum dang /_rtsa ba bcu dang /_kru trug tres dang /_dan+da'i rtsa ba rnams
[\[238a.7\]]kyi phye ma srang re re chu phul gang la srang brgyad du brtsis pa phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du bskol te/_chu bzhi cha gcig lus pa btsags la bu ram srang brgyad dang sbyar te mar snod kyi nang du blugs la/_zla ba gcig gi bar du mnan pa'i ming ni/_dan+da'i rtsa ba'i
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]chang zhes bya ste/_'di las ran par 'thungs na/_gzhang 'brum dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_rtug skam dang /_pho ba'i nad dang /_skya rbab kyi nad rnams sel to/_/bi sha la dang /_ka pit+tha dang /_kru trug tres dang /_pa tha rnams las srang
[\[238b.2\]]gnyis gnyis dang a ru ra dang /_skyu ru ra srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma chu phul brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi nang du bskol te/_chu bzhi cha gcig lus pa btsags la bu ram srang brgya dang sbyar te mar snod kyi rdza mar blugs la/_zla ba
[\[238b.3\]]phyed kyi bar du mnan pa'i ming ni 'bras bu'i chang zhes bya ste/_'di las ran par 'thungs na pho ba'i nad dang /_gzhang 'brum dang skran sel to/_/gzhang 'brum na zhing 'khru ba la ni/_rlung las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du bya'o/_/gzhang
[\[238b.4\]]'brum na zhing phyi sa skam ste 'byung du mi btub pa la ni/_rtug skam gyi cho ga 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin du lan mang du bya'o/_/shu ti dang /_bilba dang /_pi pi ling dang /_kru trug tres dang /_shu dag dang /_shing mngar dang /_thang shing dang /_ma nu dang /
[\[238b.5\]]li zur ba dang /_ru rta dang /_po son cha rnams btags pa'i phye ma til mar dang /_'o ma til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol la/_til mar nyi tshe lus par byas te/_btsags pa las ran par 'jam rtsi mas btang na/_rlung dang 'phrod cing /
[\[238b.6\]]phyi sa be snabs su 'byung ba dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_gzhang na ba dang gcin 'gag pa rnams sel to/_/pu tse shel la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang /_rtsa ba bcu sngar bshad pa 'di gnyis las gang yang rung ba dang /_po son cha dang /_shing mngar dang /
[\[238b.7\]]sh+ya ti dang/_ru rta dang /_gan+d+ha bri yang ku dang /_gla sgang dang /_rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma/_mkhris pa dang /_rlung gang las gyur pa'i nad kyi skabs dang sbyar te/_mar dang /_til mar gnyis las gang 'os pa zhig dang /_'o ma chu'i nang du bskol te/_mar
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]ram/_til mar nyi tshe lus pas/_bkru sman drag po mas gtang bar bya'o/_/gzhang 'brum na ba la khrag 'dzag par rtogs na khrag lud pa'i nad kyi cho ga bzhin du bya zhing thog mar sman dang /_kha zas la sogs pa kha ba'i bag
[\[239a.2\]]las sbyar zhing zos na me'i drod bskyed cing nad gzhi tshos par byed do/_/khrag nad kyi gzhang 'brum can la tshos par byed pa'i sman pu shel tse dang /_ya ri ta dang /_skyer pa'i shun pags rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa 'am/_yang na bca'
[\[239a.3\]]sga dang /_tsan dan dang /_rtsa mkhris dang /_byi tsher rnams skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa blud de/_yang na skom pa'i nad dang khrag nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/_nim+pa'i shun lpags dang /_dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu dang /_skyer khaN+Da dang /_bong nga dkar po
[\[239a.4\]]rnams kyi phye ma/_sbrang rtsi dang 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar ba blud do/_/sa maM ga dang /_ut+pa la dang /_chu shing gi 'bras bu dang /_ti ri ta dang /_til dang /_tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang gzhang 'brum khrag 'dzag pa
[\[239a.5\]]sel to/_/yang na khrag nad kyi gzhang 'brum can la/_kha zas ra'i 'o ma dang ldan par bza' zhing /_sman dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_bu ram gyi lbu ba rnams sbyar ba 'am/_yang na sman ma yu ra ka'i phye ma/_sbrang rtsi dang /_'bras bkrus
[\[239a.6\]]pa'i khu ba dang sbyar ba 'am/_yang na pad+ma'i ze ba sbrang rtsi dang /_mar sar dang sbyar ba 'am/_yang na pad+ma'i ze ba kha ra dang sbyar ba zos na/_gzhang 'brum khrag 'dzag pa bde bar 'gyur ro/_/dbyi mo'i lo ma dang /_bal bu'i lo ma dang /_na le sham
[\[239a.7\]]rnams las srang re re dang /_pi pi ling dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba srang gnyis gnyis dang /_dri sna bzhi zhes bya ba/_shing tsha dang /_sug smel dang /_gan+d+ha pa tra dang /_nA ga ge sar rnams dang /_pu shel tse dang /_'di rnams las zho gnyis gnyis
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]dang/_bca' sga srang gsum dang /_bu ram sman spyir bsdoms pa'i sum 'gyur dang /_'di rnams sbyar te ri lur byas pa'i ming ni/_bal bu'i ri lu zhes bya ste/_'di las ran par zos la/_chang dang /_khu bcud dang /_sha khu dang /_'o ma dang /_zho kha chu dang /
[\[239b.2\]]rtsabs rnams las gang yang rung bas nad gzhi gang shas che ba dang sbyar te phul na/_me'i drod bskyed cing gzhang 'brum thams cad dang /_skyug pa dang /_snying na ba dang /_lud pa dang /_skran dang /_rims rnams sel to/_/cho ga de rnams kyis kyang zhi bar ma
[\[239b.3\]]gyur na/_sman pa mkhas shing sngon byed pa mthong bas/_nad pa rkang pa dgug cing bcing ba la sogs pa ci nas kyang gzhang ltar snang ba'i thabs byas te/_'brum bu ga la 'dug pa brtag na/_rwa 'am/_lcags kyi sbubs 'jam po/_ba'i nu sor gyi dbyibs 'dra
[\[239b.4\]]ba/_kha'i sbubs sor bzhi/_srid du sor lnga yod par byas la/_glo logs su phu chen po gsum tsam byas te/_rkub tu brdzangs la/_glo'i bu gud 'brum bu ga la yod pa'i thad kar gtad de/_'brum bu sbubs kyi nang du byung ba la/_rlung dang /_bad kan las
[\[239b.5\]]gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum zhig yin na/_'brum bu mtshon gyis bcad la 'phro lcags kyis bsreg go/_/yang na mi bcad par bsreg go/_/yang na gzhang 'brum rnam pa drug po gang yang rung ste/_'brum bu gang gi nang du byung ba la/_sman mu ka ka'i thal ba phrad dar sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/_/gzhang
[\[239b.6\]]'brum na ba la ni mdor na gang ci yang rung ste/_mi'i stobs bskyed pa dang /_rlung dang 'phrod pa'i sman dang /_kha zas dang /_btung ba gang yin pa de 'ba' zhig las tshabs che chung dang sbyar zhing gtang bar bya'o/_/gzhang 'brum can gyis ni nad gzhi so so'i 'khrug par
[\[239b.7\]]'gyur ba'i kha zas dang /_stan mkhrang po la 'dug pa dang /_tsog tsog pur 'dug pa dang /_phyi sa dang /_gcin phro bzhin du mnag pa dang /_rta la sogs pa zhon pa rnams spang bar bya'o//_//da ni mtshan par rdol ba'i bye brag bshad par bya ste/_rkub
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]kha nas sor gnyis kyi tshu rol gyi glo logs su nyam thag par byed pa'i phol mig 'byung ste/_de rdol ba'i ming ni mtshan par rdol zhes bya ste/_de yang rnam pa lnga yod par bshad do/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i phol mig
[\[240a.2\]]gi ming ni/_rma kha brgya pa zhes bya ste/_mdog dmar la mi bzad par zug cing na ba yin no/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i ming ni/_rda me mgrin zhes bya ste mdog dmar la me 'bar ba bzhin du tsha ba yin par bshad do/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i
[\[240a.3\]]ming ni/_kun tu 'dzag pa zhes bya ste/_mdog dkar la g.ya' ba yin par bshad do/_/nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i ming ni/_dung 'khyil ba zhes bya ste/_thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang ldan pa yin no/_/kha zas zug rngu dang bcas
[\[240a.4\]]pa zos te/_gcin 'ong ba'i sbubs su zug pa las gyur pa'i ming ni/_log par song ba zhes bya ste/_'di rnams las nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_zug rngu zug pa las gyur pa gnyis ni spang bar bya'o/_/lhag ma rnams ni
[\[240a.5\]]gso dka' ba yin no/_/de la phol mig dang po byung ste ma smin pa la ni/_de'i nyen 'khor ram rtsa nas khrag dbyung ba dang /_nan rtsis bsku ba dang /_nad gzhi gang las gyur pa dang /_'phrod pa'i sman skol ba'i khu ba grang dro gang 'os pas steng du
[\[240a.6\]]blugs pa dang /_til mar dang /_nad dang 'phrod pa'i sman sbyar nas bsku zhing mnye ba dang /_bsku sman btang ba'i bar du cho ga rim bzhin du bya'o/_/rdol bar gyur pa'i cho ga yang bshad par bya ste/_dang por rdol ba'i rma zabs ci tsam yod pa dang /
[\[240a.7\]]srol gang logs su byung ba/_lcags kyi thur ma 'jam pos brtag pa dang /_rma'i srol gar gyur par dral ba dang /_sman muska ka la sogs pa'i thal bas gdab pa dang /_bsreg pa la sogs pa go rim bzhin du mthar gyis byas nas rma gso
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]ba'i cho ga bzhin du/_nad gzhi gang las gyur pa dang yang sbyar zhing mthun mthun sman bya'o/_/de la rma gso ba'i cho ga ni/_dong ga dang /_yung dang /_rgya shug gi 'bras bu rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/_gcin 'dzag pa'i rma mtshan par
[\[240b.2\]]rdol ba la bskus na/_rma sbyor zhing mi mched par 'gyur ro/_/shing nye rong dang /_te dzo ba ti dang /_dan+da'i rtsa ba dang /_btsod dang /_yung dang /_skyer pa dang /_skyer khaN+Da dang /_nim+ba'i lo ma rnams sbyar bas bskus na yang rma 'khyims pa sel to/_/
[\[240b.3\]]mtshan par rdol gyi nad la/_ka ra bi ra dang /_yung dang /_dan+da'i rtsa ba dang /_lang ka'i li dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_kru trug tres dang /_kha lung dang /_arka dang /_dug mo nyung rnams skol ba'i khu ba dang /_til mar gyi nang du/_sman de dag nyid kyi phye ma
[\[240b.4\]]bskol la/_til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa rma la bsdu bar bya'o/_/mtshan par rdol gyi nad yod pa'i mis ni/_rma sos pa'i 'og tu yang lo gcig gi bar du phyugs zhon pa dang /_nyal ba dang /_stobs 'gyed pa dang /_brtsal ba dang /_kha zas
[\[240b.5\]]lci ba rnams shin tu bsgrims te spang bar bya'o/_/gzhang 'brum dang /_mtshan par rdol ba gso ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs so//_//de nas skya rbab kyi nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/_skya rbab kyi nad ni/_kha zas la sogs pa rno
[\[240b.6\]]ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_sngon ma goms pa'i kha zas dang /_sa zhag rnams las ha cang mang du zos pa las skya rbab kyi nad du 'gyur te/_de yang nad gzhi gsum so sor nas gyur pa dang /_kun 'dus pa las gyur pa'i bye brag gis rnam
[\[240b.7\]]pa bzhir 'gyur ro/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi mtshan ma mi lus kyi mdog gnag la/_rlung gi mtshan ma dang /_rlung nad kyi bla gnyan rnams dang yang ldan pa yin no/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi mtshan ma ni/_mkhris pa las
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]ba rnams 'byung zhing /_mig dang /_pags pa dang /_phyi sa dang /_gcin rnams ser ba yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi mtshan ma ni/_mdog dkar la bad kan las gyur pa'i nad rnams dang ldan pa yin no/_/
[\[241a.2\]]nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi mtshan ma ni/_thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang ldan par shes par bya'o/_/de la skya rbab kyi nad yod la/_khrag zad pa dang /_glo 'grams pa dang /_sha zad pa dang /_skyugs pa dang /_skom pa la sogs
[\[241a.3\]]pa'i bla gnyan yod pa dang /_mdog ser zhing snang ngo cog dkar por mthong ba ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/skya rbab kyi nad thams cad la/_dang por ni sman mar btung bas khong 'jam por byas la/_de'i 'og tu nad gzhi dang sbyar zhing /_gyen du skyugs pa dang thur
[\[241a.4\]]du bkru ba'i sman rnon pos sbyar bar bya'o/_/de'i sman mar ni mur ba dang /_pu tse shel dang /_yung dang /_byi tsher dang /_pi pi ling dang /_tsan dan dang /_sro lo dang /_khyi lce ba dang /_dug mo nyung dang /_rtsa mkhris dang /_pa to la dang /_gla sgang dang
[\[241a.5\]]thang shing rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis/_mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_'o ma mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa las/_ran par 'thungs na/_skya rbab dang /_rims dang /_'brum bu dang /_skrangs pa dang /
[\[241a.6\]]gzhang 'brum dang /_khrag lud pa'i nad rnams sel to/_/'bras bu gsum dang /_sle tres dang /_ba sha ka dang /_pu tse shel dang /_rtsa mkhris dang /_nim+pa rnams skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang /_skya rbab kyi nad
[\[241a.7\]]dang mig ser can yang sel to/_/yang na skya rbab kyi nad yod pa la/_a ru ra ba gcin dang sbyar ba btung zhing /_kha zas 'o ma dang ldan pa bza' bar bya'o/_/yang na lcags kyi phye ma ba gcin gyi nang du yun ring du sbangs pa bza' zhing 'o mas dbul lo/_/
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]'bras bu gsum dang /_kru trug tres dang /_gla sgang dang /_byi dang ga dang /_tsha ba gsum rnams kyi phye ma dang /_lcags kyi phye ma dang /_sman de rnams spyir bsdoms pa'i tshad dang mnyam pa dang /_'di rnams sbrang rtsi dang mar dang sbyar te zos na yang /
[\[241b.2\]]skya rbab dang /_mig ser dang /_skrangs pa dang /_gcin nad sel to/_/til dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang /_drub mar cang rnams kyi phye ma dang /_lcags kyi phye ma/_sman de rnams spyir bsdoms pa'i tshad dang mnyam pa dang
[\[241b.3\]]'di rnams sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te ma brdzis pa las ran par zos na yang /_skya rbab kyi nad drag po dang skrangs pa sel to/_/mig ser gyi nad ni/_skya rbab kyi nad yal bar bor ba las/_mkhris pa 'khrugs nas/_mig ser gyi nad du 'gyur bas na/
[\[241b.4\]]de yang skabs 'dir bshad de/_de'i mtshan ma ni/_mig dang lus kyi mdog ser ba yin no/_/mig ser chen po zhes bya ba yang /_mig ser gyi nad la dang por nad tshabs chen por gyur pa las 'byung ste/_de gnyis la ni snum pa'i bkru sman
[\[241b.5\]]btang ngo /_/ba la dang /_yung dang /_nim+pa dang /_'bras bu gsum dang shing mngar rnams cha mnyam ste btags la 'o ma dang /_ma he'i mar dang skol nas mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa las ran par 'thungs na yang mig ser gyi nad sel to/_/
[\[241b.6\]]sle tres dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_skyer pa dang /_nim+pa rnams gang yang rung ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te nang par bzhin rtag tu 'thungs na yang /_mig ser gyi nad sel to/_/lcags kyi phye ma dang /_yung dang /_skyer pa dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /
[\[241b.7\]]pu tse shel rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang mar dang sbyar te zos na yang mig ser gyi nad sel to/_/skyu ru ra dang /_lcags kyi phye ma dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_yung rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang mar dang /_kha ra dang sbyar te zos na/_mig ser tshabs chen
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]po yang myur du sel to/_/pi pi ling dang /_pi pi ling chen po dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_kru trug tres dang /_la la phud dang /_na le sham dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_byi dang ga dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_'u su'i 'bras
[\[242a.2\]]bu dang /_rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang /_go snyod dang /_nu shing gi 'bras bu rnams kyi phye ma srang re re dang /_shing nye rong gi phye ma dang /_til mar srang brgyad brgya dang /_skyu ru ra'i khu ba srang dgu bcu rtsa drug dang /_bu ram srang lnga bcu dang 'di rnams lhan
[\[242a.3\]]cig tu skol ba'i ming ni/_sman gyi lde gu dge ba zhes bya ste/_'di las ran par zos na yang /_skya rbab dang /_mig ser dang /_gzhang 'brum dang sbyar ba'i dug rnams sel cing /_gcin nad dang /_mdze dang /_rims dang /_dbugs mi
[\[242a.4\]]bde ba dang /_pho ba'i nad rnams med par byed la sman bcud kyi len du yang 'gyur ro/_/mig ser gyis nyam thag pa ni/_sman dron pu shi ba'i khu ba'i mig bzang ngo /_/yang na yung dang /_btsag dang /_skyu ru ra'i phye ma zhib mo sbyar bas kyang bsku bar bya'o/_/
[\[242a.5\]]yang skran ka rko ta ka'i rtsa ba'i phye ma'am/_dza li na'i 'bras bu'i phye ma snar blugs so/_/yang na mig ser gyis nyam thag pa la/_e raN dang /_pi pi ling gi phye sbyar ba snar blugs so/_/nad ljang gu kha zhes bya ba ni/_rlung dang mkhris pa las 'byung ste/
[\[242a.6\]]de'i mtshan ma ni/_lus kyi mdog ljang gu khar 'dug pa dang /_sngo sangs dang /_ser ba dang /_rims kyis 'debs pa dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_me'i drod chung bar byed cing sgyid lug pa dang snyom pa rnams yin te skya rbab kyi nad yod pa la 'byung ngo /_/
[\[242a.7\]]de ni kha zas dang /_skom mngar bag dang /_rlung dang mkhris pa sel ba'i sman rnams kyis thub par 'gyur te/_mig ser dang /_skya rbab kyi nad kyi cho gar bstan pa bzhin du/_nad ldang khu kha 'di la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/skya rbab kyi nad gso ba'i le'u ste
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//de nas skyigs bu'i nad dang /_dbugs mi bde ba'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/_skyigs bu dang /_dbugs mi bde ba la ni/_rlung dang mkhris pa'i nad las 'das te/_bad kan gyi rjes su 'brang
[\[242b.2\]]bar 'gyur ba las/_skyigs bu dang /_dbugs mi bde ba drag po skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de gnyis re re la yang rnam pa lnga lnga yod do/_/de la skyigs bu'i nad rnam pa lnga ni/_skyigs bu chen po zhes bya ba/_sgra che zhing shugs drag la gnad la gnod pa dang /
[\[242b.3\]]skyigs bu'i nad zab mo zhes bya ba/_lte ba'i phyogs nas ldang zhing sgra zab tu 'byung ba dang /_skyigs bu'i nad btud ma zhes bya ba/_skyigs bu gnyis gnyis btud cing shugs drag tu 'byung la mi bzad par na zhing mgo 'dam par byed pa dang /_skyigs
[\[242b.4\]]bu chung ngu zhes bya ba shugs dal la/_brang dang /_nam tshong nas ldang zhing 'byung ba dang /_skyigs bu zas las 'byung ba zhes bya ba/_ha cang mang du zos zhing 'thungs pas rlung gi gnas dog par gyur pa las 'byung ba rnams yin te/_'di rnams kyi nad ni
[\[242b.5\]]skyigs bu chung ngu dang /_zas las 'byung ba zhes bya ba gnyis ni gso sla ba yin no/_/lhag ma rnams ni srog gcod par bshad do/_/dbugs mi bde ba rnam pa lnga la/_sgra chen po zhes bya ba/_dbugs che zhing ran pa dang /_snying dang /_lta ba
[\[242b.6\]]rnams log par bsgyur zhing /_snga ma pa zhes bya ba gyen du lta zhing /_dbugs drag tu 'byung la/_myos par byed cing snying dang rtsib logs su zug pa dang /_skabs su 'chad pa zhes bya ba/_dbugs skabs skabs su 'chad cing /_drag tu 'byung
[\[242b.7\]]ba gang yin pa dang /_rmugs byed ces bya ba/_cham pa drag pos 'debs shing snying myos la/_nam langs pa'i tshe lhag par tshabs che bar 'gyur ba dang /_dbugs chung ngu zhes bya ba mi dga' ba las 'byung la dal zhing gnod pa mi byed pa rnams yin te/_de
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]dag gi nad ni dbugs chung ngu zhes bya ba gso sla ba yin no/_/rmugs byed ces bya ba ni/_kha zas dang /_sman gyis sos tsam du 'jog nus so/_/lhag ma rnams ni 'chi bar byed pa yin te spang bar bya'o/_/de la skyigs bu'i nad
[\[243a.2\]]dang/_dbugs mi bde ba'i nad kyis thebs pa la ni/_dang por til mar gyis lus bsku ba dang dugs byas na bzang ngo /_/nyams stobs yod pa la ni gyen du skyugs pa dang thur du bkru bas sbyang bar bya'o/_/rid cing nyam chung ba la ni zhi bar bya ba'i sman/
[\[243a.3\]]rgya shug gi tshig gu dang /_skyer khaN+Da dang /_'bras yos rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_pu tse shel dang btsag lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_pi pi ling dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_kha ra dang /_bca' sga
[\[243a.4\]]rnams lhan cig sbyar ba dang /_nag mtshur dang /_pog dkar po lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang shing pa Ta la'i 'bras bu dang me tog lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_pi pi ling dang /_'bra go'i yal ga'i thor to dang lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_sman gyi sbyor ba rnam pa drug
[\[243a.5\]]po 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar la sman gyi lde gur byas te zos na/_skyigs bu'i nad sel to/_/shing mngar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba dang /_pi pi ling kha ra dang sbyar ba dang /_bca' sga bu ram dang sbyar ba 'di gsum las gang yang
[\[243a.6\]]rung ba snar blugs na yang skyigs bu'i nad sel to/_/sbrang ma'i rtug pa bud med kyi nu zho 'am/_le brgan rtsi'i khu ba gang yang rung ba dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na tsan dan dkar po bud med kyi nu zho las brdar te/_snar blugs na yang skyigs bu'i nad
[\[243a.7\]]sel to/_/yang na skyigs bu'i nad zhi bar bya ba la/_ldong ros dang /_ba lang gi rwa dang /_ru rta dang /_sra rtsi pog dang /_rtswa ku sha rnams las gang yang rung ba mar dang sbyar te/_snod kha sbyar gyi nang du bsregs la/_'u'i nang nas dud pa drang zhing /_kha snar
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]brngubs na yang skyigs bu'i nad sel to/_/mar bzang po srang gnyis bzhu ste tshos par byas la/_rgyam tsha srang gcig dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba mar bzang po bzhus te tshos par byas pa'i nang du btab pa 'thungs na yang skyigs bu'i nad
[\[243b.2\]]kyis nyam thag pa sel to/_/dbugs mi bde ba'i nad gso ba'i cho ga ni/_byi tsher dang /_pi pi ling dang /_rgun dang /_bu bran shing dang /_a ru ra rnams zhib tu btags la/_sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar te zos na/_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pa dang rlung nad rmugs
[\[243b.3\]]byed rnams sel to/_/bu ram dang /_na le sham dang /_yung dang rla rna dang /_rgun dang pi pi ling rnams btags la til mar dang sbyar te zos na yang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad drag po sel to/_/yang na sbrang rtsi dang /_mar dang ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_shing mngar
[\[243b.4\]]gyi phye ma sbyar te bza' bar bya'o/_/a ru ra dang /_rtsa mkhris dang /_pi pi ling dang /_byi tsher rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi mar dang sbyar te zos na yang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad sel to/_/shing ram b+ha dang /_kun+da dang /_shi ri rnams kyi me tog dang /_pi pi ling rnams
[\[243b.5\]]btags la/_'bras bkrus pa'i chu dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad sel to/_/yang na skyigs bu'i nad dang /_dbugs mi bde ba'i nad la ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_bca' sga'i phye ma chu skol ba dron mo dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/_/yang na bca' sga dang /
[\[243b.6\]]kha ra dang ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_kha ru tsha rnams kyi phye ma chu skol ba dron mo dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/_/yang na shing tsha dang /_sug smel dang /_za la ka dang li zur ba dang /_bca' sga dang /_dzi ban+di dang /_ma nu dang /_dz+ha ta dang /_bca' ba dang /_a ga ru dang /_pi pi
[\[243b.7\]]ling dang /_gla sgang dang /_byi 'u rug pa dang /_spang spos rnams cha mnyam ste btags pa'i phye ma dang kha ra sman de rnams spyir bsdoms pa'i brgyad 'gyur dang sbyar ba'i phye ma'i sman 'di zos na/_skyigs bu'i nad dang /_dbugs mi bde ba'i nad sel zhing /_lud
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]pa dang /_rims dang /_snying na ba dang /_rtsib logs su zug pa rnams med par byed do/_/rma bya'i rkang pa 'am sgro'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ba bsregs pa'i thal ba/_mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/_yang na byi thur gyi sha bsregs
[\[244a.2\]]la/_mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na yang skyigs bu'i nad dang /_dbugs mi bde ba'i nad sel to/_/skyigs bu'i nad dang /_dbugs mi bde ba'i nad kyis shin tu nyam thag pa'i skom du ni rtsa ba bcu pa skol ba'i khu ba 'am/_thang shing skol ba'i khu ba
[\[244a.3\]]'am/_chad rnams las ran par 'thung bar bya'o/_/skyigs bu'i nad dang /_dbugs mi bde ba'i nad yod pa la/_sman pas tshabs che chung la sogs pa'i bye brag shin tu phyed par bya ste/_bad kan dang rlung sel ba'i kha zas dang btung ba'i cho ga sbyin par
[\[244a.4\]]bya'o/_/skyigs bu'i nad dang /_dbugs mi bde ba'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa rdzogs so//_//de nas lud pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/_lud pa ni nad gzhi gsum re re las gyur pa dang /_glo 'grams pa las gyur
[\[244a.5\]]pa dang /_nad khong skems las gyur pa dang rnam pa lnga yod de/_de dag kyang rlung rnam pa lnga po/_dbugs rgyu bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang /_ngag 'byung bar byed pa dang /_legs par 'jog pa dang /_skyod pa dang /_dri ma 'byin pa zhes bya ba rnams
[\[244a.6\]]'khrugs pa las 'byung ste/_snying ga dang /_brang dang /_phrag pa dang /_lkog ma la sogs pa nad 'dru zhing /_rko ba ni lud pa zhes bya'o/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/_snying na ba dang /_klad pa na ba dang /_rtsib logs su zug pa dang /
[\[244a.7\]]lud pa skam zhing 'gogs su mi btub pa dang /_skad 'gags pa rnams yin par bshad do/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/_skom dad che ba dang /_lus tsha ba dang /_khar tshwa bro ba dang /_skyugs pa'i ro tsha zhing mdog ser la tsha ba rnams yin no/_/
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/_lus lci zhing mchil ma mang du 'ong ba dang /_cham pas 'debs shing yi ga 'chus pa rnams yin no/_/glo 'grams pa las gyur pa'i lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/_lud pa khrag tu 'ong ba dang /_ru shing na ba dang /_dbugs
[\[244b.2\]]mi bde ba dang /_glo las rnag 'byung ba rnams yin no/_/nad khong skems las gyur pa'i lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/_lud pa khrag dang rnag tu 'byung zhing /_nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las byung ba yin no/_/de rnams kyi nang na glo 'grams pa las gyur pa'i lud pa ni kha zas dang
[\[244b.3\]]sman la sogs pas sos tsam du 'jog nus so/_/nad khong skems las gyur pa'i lud pa ni mi 'tsho'o/_/lhag ma gsum po rnams ni gsor rung ngo /_/de la gso ba'i cho ga ni/_bca' sga dang /_byi tsher dang /_bu bran shing dang /_rgun dang li zur ba dang /
[\[244b.4\]]kha ra rnams btags pa'i phye ma/_til mar dang sbyar te zos na/_rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa mi bzad pa sel to/_/li zur ba dang /_bu bran shing dang /_pi pi ling dang /_ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_gla sgang dang /_byi tsher rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang til mar dang
[\[244b.5\]]sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde gu 'di'i ming ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ste/_rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/_/kon ti dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_byi dang ga dang /_ru rta dang /_shing kun rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde gu
[\[244b.6\]]'di ni lud pa'i nad dang /_skyigs bu'i nad la bsngags pa yin no/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa'i nad yod pa la ni/_pi pi ling dang /_kha ra dang /_smyig rkang dang /_'bras yos dang /_skyu ru ra dang rgun rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /
[\[244b.7\]]shing mngar dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_murba dang /_rgun dang /_bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_pi pi ling dang /_'bra go dang /_smyig rkang dang /_gze ma rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_sman gyi sbyor ba 'di gsum las gang yang
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]rung ba/_mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar la sman gyi lde gur bya ste bza' bar bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa'i nad yod pa la ni/_gla sgang chen po dang /_a ru ra dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_pi pi ling dang /_ta malka
[\[245a.2\]]rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_a ru ra dang /_pi pi ling dang /_gla sgang dang /_thang shing dang bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_kru trug tres dang /_pi pi ling dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_pi pi ling chen po rnams kyi
[\[245a.3\]]phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_sman gyi sbyor ba rnam pa 'di gsum las gang yang rung ba/_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar la sman gyi lde gur byas te zos na bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa'i nad sel bar rig par bya'o/_/btsod dang /_skyer khaN+Da dang murba dang /
[\[245a.4\]]kru trug tres dang /_pA thA dang /_pi pi ling dang /_yung rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi shas bskyed de sbyar ba zos na glo 'grams pa las gyur pa dang /_nad khong skems pa las gyur pa'i lud pa'i nad sel to/_/thang shing dang ba la dang /_ra sna dang 'bras bu gsum
[\[245a.5\]]dang/_rtsa ba gsum dang /_shug pa dang /_byi dang ga rnams kyi phye ma kha ra sman de rnams spyir bsdoms pa'i tshad dang mnyam par sbyar ba'i phye ma'i sman 'dis ni/_lud pa'i nad rnam pa lnga char sel to/_/a gas sti zhes bya ba'i sman gyi lde gu sbyar ba'i
[\[245a.6\]]thabs ni/_sman shang ka pu shi ba dang /_srad ma at+ma gup+ta dang /_kru trug tres dang /_rtsa ba bcu dang /_li zur ba dang /_ba la dang /_rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang /_ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_shing a pa marga dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_ma nu rnams las srang gnyis
