[\[245a.7\]]dang/_a ru ra 'bru brgya dang /_nas phul bu bcu drug dang /_'di rnams lhan cig tu chu nas kyi lnga 'gyur gyi nang du bskol la/_nas legs par tshos nas phyung ste btsags pa'i khu ba'i nang du/_a ru ra de rnams bu ram srang brgya dang mar srang brgyad dang /_til mar
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]srang brgyad dang /_pi pi ling gi phye ma srang brgyad dang /_lhan cig tu me mi che bar yang bskol te/_nur nur po skya bas drang du rung ba tsam du gyur pa phyung ste bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi srang brgyad blugs te sbyar ba'i sman bcud kyi len 'di las nang re bzhin a ru ra
[\[245b.2\]]'bru gnyis gnyis/_sman gyi lde gu dang bcas te zos na lud pa'i nad thams cad dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad dang nad khong skems rnams sel cing pho ba'i nad dang yi ga 'chus pa dang /_skyigs bu'i nad dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_rims dang /_snying
[\[245b.3\]]na ba dang /_skrangs pa rnams sel te/_kaN+Da ka ri skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/_ra sna dang /_ba la dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_gze ma rnams kyi phye ma mar dang lhan cig tu bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa las ran par 'thungs na yang
[\[245b.4\]]lud pa'i nad rnam pa lnga char sel to/_/ldong ros dang /_ba la dang /_a ku ta dang /_shing mngar dang /_gla sgang dang /_spang spos rnams bsregs pa'i dud pa kha snar bdug cing /_de'i rjes la bu ram dang 'o ma sbyar ba 'thungs te/_thabs de ltar zhag gsum gyi bar
[\[245b.5\]]du byas na yang lud pa'i nad thams cad sel to/_/lud pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so//_//de nas skyug pa'i nad dang skom pa'i nad gso ba bshad par bya ste/_de la skyug pa'i nad ni nad gzhi gsum 'khrugs
[\[245b.6\]]pa re re las gyur pa dang /_gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_mi sdug cing yid du mi 'ong ba dang /_rul zhing myags pa la sogs pa mthong ba dang reg pa dang /_snom pa dang gtam thos pa dang /_bsams pa rnams las gyur pa dang /_rnam pa
[\[245b.7\]]lnga yod de/_de dag gi mtshan ma bstan par bya'o/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i skyug pa'i mtshan ma ni/_skyugs pa'i ro bska zhing dang la mdog gnag pa dang /_dbu ba can dang /_shugs drag cing na ba rnams yin no/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mtshan
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]ma ni/_skyug pa tsha zhing ser ba dang /_dmar ba dang ljang gur 'dug la lus tsha ba rnams yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/_skyug pa 'byil zhing ro mngar la grang zhing bska ba rnams yin no/_/kun 'dus pa las gyur
[\[246a.2\]]pa'i mtshan ma ni/_mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan par shes par bya'o/_/mi sdug cing yid du mi 'ong ba las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/_dul ba dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_sems gdungs pa la sogs pa thog ma bskyed pa'i rgyur smos pa de dag nyid
[\[246a.3\]]las rtogs par bya'o/_/de la skyug pa khrag dang bcas par 'byung zhing /_zhag tshig tshig po yod la sha zad de nyam chung ba dang /_nad bla gnyan gzhan gyis kyang thebs pa ni mi 'tsho ste spang bar bya'o/_/skyug nad thams cad ni ma zhu
[\[246a.4\]]ba'i gnas pho ba las 'byung bas na/_rlung las gyur pa'i skyug pa ma gtogs par dang por smyung ba'i cho ga byas la des ma zhi na phyis bkru sman btang ngo /_/rlung las gyur pa la ni dang por de dang 'phrod pa'i sman gyis zhi bar bya'o/_/de la bkru
[\[246a.5\]]sman ni a ru ra'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te lde gur byas pa'am/_yang na bkru sman zhim zhing yi gar 'ong ba gzhan yang gtang bar bya'o/_nyams stobs yod pa la ni/_skyug sman dang bkru sman bya'o/_/rid cing nyam chung ba la ni zhi bar bya ba'i sman
[\[246a.6\]]gtang bar bya'o/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i skyug pa'i nad zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga ni/_/rgyam tshwa dang mar sbyar ba btung ba 'am/_yang na rgyam tsha dang /_kha ru tsha dang /_rtsabs ru tsha ba dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar
[\[246a.7\]]te btung bar bya'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skyug pa'i nad zhi bar bya ba la ni/_ba la dang /_btsag gi phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'am/_pu shel tse'i phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i phye ma dang sbyar ba 'am/_yang na pu shel tse'i phye skyu
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]ru ra'i khu ba grang mo dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i skyug pa'i nad yod pa la ni/_byi dang ga dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_nim+ba rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na byi dang ga dang gla ba dang bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma
[\[246b.2\]]sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te bza' bar bya'o/_/shi ra phi la dang /_sle tres dang /_murba rnams las gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na murba'i phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na/_rlung las gyur
[\[246b.3\]]pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams kyi skyug pa'i nad sel to/_/pi pi ling dang /_na le sham dang /_ldong ros rnams kyi phye ma dang /_de rnams spyir bsdoms pa'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i 'bras yos kyi phye ma
[\[246b.4\]]dang/_sbrang rtsi rnams ka pit+tha'i 'bras bu dang /_kha lung gi 'bras bu skol ba'i khu ba grang mo'i nang du blugs te 'thungs na yang skyug pa'i nad sel to/_/rgya shug gi tshig gu dang /_pi pi ling dang /_skyu ru ra rnams kyi phye ma dang lhan cig tu
[\[246b.5\]]sbyar ba dang /_'bras yos dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_rtsa sh+ya ma ka dang /_skyer khaN+Da dang /_gla sgang dang /_rgya shug gi rus pa rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_sbrang ma'i rtug pa
[\[246b.6\]]dang/_kha ra dang /_pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_pi pi ling dang /_na le sham dang /_ka pit+tha dang /_ba la rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_shing tsha dang /_sug smel dang /_gan+d+ha pa tra rnams kyi phye ma
[\[246b.7\]]lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_sman gyi sbyor ba rnam pa drug po 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/_sman gyi lde gur byas pa zos na yang skyug pa'i nad sel to/_/skyug pa'i nad ring du lon pa la ni dge ba zhes bya ba'i sman mar dang /_'o ma'i
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]sman dang ro tsa bar byed pa'i sman dang /_sha'i khu bcud la sogs pa rlung sel ba'i cho ga rnams bya'o/_/skom pa'i nad kyang /_nad gzhi gsum so so las gyur pa dang /_zas ma zhu ba las gyur pa dang /
[\[247a.2\]]glo 'grams nas nad khong skems su gyur pa las 'byung ba dang rnam pa lnga yod de skom pa'i nad do cog gi gzhi ni/_shas cher rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis yin pas na/_skom pa'i nad la thog mar de gnyis bsal ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/de la
[\[247a.3\]]skem pa'i nad yod pa'i skom du ni sbrang rtsi char pa'i chu dang sbyar ba 'am/_de ma rnyed na chu tha mal pa dang sbyar ba btung bar bya'o/_/yang na bong pa bsregs pa chur bcug pa'i khu ba 'bras brngos pa'i phye dang sbrang rtsi kha ra dang sbyar
[\[247a.4\]]ba btung bar bya'o/_/yang na kha ra dang /_nA ga ge sar dang /_pi pi ling dang /_ba be dang /_bal po se'u rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde gu'am pi pi ling dang /_shing 'o ma can gyi myu gu sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde gu
[\[247a.5\]]gang yang rung ba la zos na yang skom pa'i nad sel bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na shing ba ta'i yal ga'i thor to dang /_ru rta dang /_'bras brngos pa'i phye dang /_ut+pal sngon po dang /_'bras bu gsum rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar
[\[247a.6\]]pa'i ri lu khar bzhag na yang skom pa'i nad myur du sel to/_/rgun dang bu ram shing gi khu ba dang /_'o ma dang /_sbrang rtsi rnams kyi nang du shing mngar dang /_ut+pa la'i phye ma blugs te 'thungs na yang skom pa'i nad gdon mi za bar byed do/_/
[\[247a.7\]]'o ma dang /_bu ram shing gi khu ba dang /_rgun chang dang /_bu ram chang dang /_bu ram chab dang /_sbrang chab dang /_star bu'i khu ba dang /_rtsabs skyur po rnams gang yang rung ba/_khar yun ring du bzhag cing /_phyir pho na yang rkan
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]skams pa sel par byed do/_/skyug pa'i nad dang /_skom pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa rdzogs so//_//bam po lnga pa'o/_/de nas gcin sri pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/gcin sri ba la sogs
[\[247b.2\]]pa'i nad na/_kha zas la sogs pa shin tu rno ba za zhing 'thung ba dang /_shin tu mang bar za zhing 'thungs pa'i gnod pa las gcin sri ba'i nad rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur te/_de la rlung las gyur pa'i gcin sri ba'i nad ni shin tu mi bzad par na ba yin no/_/
[\[247b.3\]]mkhris pa las gyur pa ni gcin nyid tsha rab tu 'ong ba yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa ni chu so'i phyogs lci ba bem por 'dug cing skrangs pa yin no/_/nad gzhi 'dus pa las gyur pa ni ma rungs pa yin no/_/khrag nad las gyur pa ni gcin khrag
[\[247b.4\]]rtsa 'ong ba yin no/_/khu chu las gyur pa ni khu chu 'gags pa las 'byung ba yin no/_/gcin rde'us 'gags pa ni rlung gis khu chu dang bad kan bsgangs nas rdo 'dra bar gyur pa yin no/_/gcin bstus pa ni chu so lgang pa'i kha mi bzad par na zhing rde'u
[\[247b.5\]]zhig pas gcin 'gags par gyur pa yin par bshad do/_/de dag gso ba'i thabs ni sman mar dang /_til mar gyis lus bsku ba dang /_sman mar btung ba dang /_dugs bya ba dang /_bkru sman drag po mas btang zhing /_de'i rjes
[\[247b.6\]]la 'jam rtsi mas gtang ba rnams bya'o/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i gcin sri ba la ni/_rtswa ku sha la sogs pa'i sde tshan nam/_sman ti ri la sogs pa'i sde tshan gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu bas btsos pa'i sha khu dang ldan par kha zas
[\[247b.7\]]bza' 'o/_/mkhris pa dang /_khrag nad las gyur pa la ni/_skyu ru ra skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du skyer pa'i rtsa ba'i phye ma dang sbrang rtsi blugs pa'am/_yang na e la ba lu ka'i sa bon dang /_shing mngar dang /_skyer pa rnams kyi phye ma
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba'i nang du btab pa btung bar bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i gcin sri ba zhi bar bya ba la ni/_sug smel zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma/_ba gcin dang /_chang dang /_chu shing gi khu ba btsir ba
[\[248a.2\]]rnams las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/_/khu chu 'gags pa las gcin sri bar gyur pa la ni/_brag zhun sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde gu bza' bar bya'o/_/yang na ro tsa bar bya ba'i sman gyis lus zungs bdun brtas la/_na
[\[248a.3\]]chung bzang mo dang nyal po bya'o/_/gcin sri ba'i nad rnams la/_le brgan rtsi'i sa bon btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang /_'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na brag zhun dang /_sru sru dang /_pi pi ling dang /_sug smel
[\[248a.4\]]rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang /_'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/_/rgun dang /_kha ra'i phye ma zho kha chu dang sbyar ba 'am/_yang na 'o ma skol ba dron mo bu ram dang sbyar ba las ji tsam nus pa 'thungs na yang gcin sri ba'i
[\[248a.5\]]nad sel to/_kha ra dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang sbyar te zos na yang gcin sri ba'i sna grangs thams cad sel to/_/shi kru'i rtsa ba skol ba'i khu ba'am/_yang na sman ro tsha zhing drod che ba'i bag gang ci yang rung ba zos shing 'thungs
[\[248a.6\]]na rde 'us 'gags pa sel bar byed do/_/gze ma dang /_e raN+Da dang /_ha re nu ka dang /_sug smel dang /_shing mngar dang /_pi pi ling dang /_sru sru'i rtsa ba rnams skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du brag zhun gyi phye ma btab ste 'thungs
[\[248a.7\]]na yang /_gcin bstus pa dang rde 'us 'gags pa myur du sel to/_/sman ka ta bang ka'i rtsa ba btags pa'i phye ma chang la sogs pa dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang rde 'us 'gags pa sel to/_/sman pa ru na'i rtsa ba'i shun lpags skol ba'i khu ba
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]btsags pa'i nang du de nyid kyi phye ma btab ste sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na bca' sga dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /_a ru ra dang /_ka li ya ga rnams kyi phye ma zho kha chu dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang rde 'us 'gags
[\[248b.2\]]pa'i nad shin tu drag po yang myur du sel to/_/yang na sman bi ra ta ra la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyi sbyor ba'i thabs kyi rnam pa thams cad kyang sbyar bar bya'o/_/cho ga de dag gis kyang zhi bar ma gyur na/_so shi brdo bar dam bcas la
[\[248b.3\]]rde'u 'byin pa shes pas dral te 'byung bar bya'o/_/da ni pho mtshan gyi nad bshad par bya ste/_pho mtshan gyi nad ni/_sen mos snad pa dang /_sos zin pa dang /_drag shul las rma byung ba dang /_bud med mi gtsang ba dang nyal ba la sogs
[\[248b.4\]]pa'i nad gzhi rnams las 'byung ngo /_/de yang rnam pa lnga yod par bshad de/_rlung las gyur pa'i pho mtshan gyi nad ni/_pags pa 'gags shing na la/_yang grang ba dang /_mdog sngo skyar 'dug cing rtsub pa yin no/_/mkhris
[\[248b.5\]]pa las gyur pa ni tsha zhing mdog dmar ba yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa la ni g.ya' zhing mkhrang ba yin no/_/khrag nad las gyur pa la ni khrag 'dzag cing 'brum bu nag po 'byung la/_shin tu tsha ba yin no/_/nad gzhi gsum
[\[248b.6\]]char 'dus pa las gyur pa ni/_mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/_/de rnams kyi nang na srin bu zhugs pa ni pho mtshan zhig par 'gyur ro/_/'di rnams la thog mar ni pho mtshan mar gyis bsku zhing dugs byas la/_pho mtshan
[\[248b.7\]]gyi rked du gtar ka bya'o/_/yang na srin bu pad+ma 'jib tu gzhug pa dang /_yang skyugs pa dang /_thur du bkru ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/rlung las gyur pa'i pho mtshan gyi nad la ni/_dza puN+Da li ka dang shing mngar dang /_sgron shing dang /
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]a ga ru dang /_thang shing dang /_ra sna dang /_ru rta dang /_sman bri sh+tsi ba rnams lhan cig tu brdar te bsku ba dang /_skol ba'i khu ba dron mos blug par bya'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i pho mtshan gyi nad
[\[249a.2\]]la ni/_skyer khaN+Da dang /_ut+pa la dang /_btsod dang /_pu shel tse dang /_btsag dang /_shing mngar dang /_shug pa rnams kyi phye ma chu dang sbyar bas bsku'o/_/yang na 'o ma dang /_chu grang mo rnams gang yang rung bas steng du
[\[249a.3\]]blugs so/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i pho mtshan gyi nad la ni/_shing d+ha ba dang /_tha rams dang /_shing sA la rnams kyi phye ma chu dang sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/_/yang na dong ga la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba blug na bzang ngo /_/
[\[249a.4\]]pho mtshan la rnag zhugs nas pho mtshan zad par byed pas na/_ci nas kyang rnag tu mi 'gyur bar sman gyis bsku ba dang /_sman gyi khu ba la sogs pa steng du blugs pa rnams kyis bsgrims te bsrung bar bya'o/_/rnag 'jug pa lta na
[\[249a.5\]]gtar ka myur te byas la/_rma gso ba'i cho ga bzhin du byas te/_me tog ku mu da dang /_ut+pa la dang /_ka la lha ra dang /_pad+ma rnams kyi phye mas gdab po/_/yang na 'bras bu gsum mar dang lhan cig tu snod kha sbyar gyi nang du brngos
[\[249a.6\]]pa'i tshig mas bsku bar bya'o/_/yang na skyer khaN+Da dang /_shi ri sha'i phye ma dang sbyar ba'am/_a ru ra'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba gang yang rung bas bskus na pho mtshan gyi nad thams cad sel to/_/pho mtshan gyi nad 'dus pa
[\[249a.7\]]las gyur pa dang /_khrag nad las gyur pa gnyis ni so shi brdo bar dam bcas la/_nad gzhi rnams kyi shas che chung bye brag phyed par byas nas/_gang shas che ba dag gzhil ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/da ni rlig rlugs kyi nad bshad par bya ste/
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]rlig rlugs kyi nad ni gzhi gsum gyis rlig pa'i 'bras bu dang /_pags pa ma rung bar byas pa las/_rlig rlugs kyi nad rnam pa bdun 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs kyi nad ni rlig pa lgang ba rlung gis gang ba 'dra ba yin no/_/
[\[249b.2\]]mkhris pa las gyur pa ni/_u dum bA ra'i shing thog 'dra bar dmar ba yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa ni mkhrang zhing zlum pa yin no/_/khrag nad las gyur pa ni mkhris pa'i mtshan ma dang 'dra'o/_/tshil rgyas pa'i nad du gyur pa ni che la 'jam mo/_/
[\[249b.3\]]gcin las gyur pa ni rkyal pa gang ba bzhin du 'dug pa yin no/_/rgyu ma rlugs pa las gyur pa ni/_rlung gis rlig pa'i 'dab tu rgyu ma'i ltab ma mthar gyis phul nas rlig pa rkyal pa bus pa bzhin du ring por 'gyur ba yin te/_rlig rlugs kyi nad de ni mi
[\[249b.4\]]'tsho'i/_de la rlung las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs kyi nad la ni/_sman mar btung zhing bsku ba dang /_dugs kyis bdugs pa dang /_sman gyi khu ba blugs pa dang /_snum pa'i bkru sman btang ba dang /_bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang /_'jam rtsi
[\[249b.5\]]mas btang ba rnams bya bar bshad do/_/de la snum gyi bkru sman ni/_'o ma dang /_e raN+Da'i mar bskol te sbyar ba nyams stobs las dpags te btung bar bya'o/_/mkhris pa dang /_khrag nad las gyur pa la ni/_srin bu pad pa rlig pa las khrag 'jib
[\[249b.6\]]tu gzhug pa dang /_sman bsil bas bsku zhing /_sman gyi khu ba grang mos steng du blugs na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan las gyur pa la ni/_sman drod che ba btags pa'i phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar ba srin pos bsku zhing skyer pa'i rtsa ba skol pa'i khu ba gcin dang
[\[249b.7\]]sbyar ba btung bar bya'o/_/tshil rgyas pa las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs kyi nad la ni/_dugs bya ba dang /_byi'u rug pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan zhib tu btags te chu dang sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/_/gcin las gyur pa la ni/_dang por rlig pa dugs byas pa'i
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]rjes la rlig pa'i 'og gi srubs nas brtol te re zhig rna rtsi mi sbyar bar gce 'us bsu zhing ring du 'dzag tu bzhug go/_/rgyu ma rlugs pa las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs da dung tshabs chen por gyur pa la ni/_bsreg pa dang /_rlung sel ba'i
[\[250a.2\]]sman rnams bya'o/_/bsreg gcig la ni bsregs pa'i 'og tu rna la cho ga ji ltar bya ba bzhin du bya'o/_/gcin sri ba'i nad sel ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//da nas rtug skam gyi nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/rtug skam gyi nad
[\[250a.3\]]ni/_dri ma 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i rlung long ka na gnas pa 'khrugs te shas che bar gyur pas phyi sa bskams nas thur du 'ong ba'i lam 'gags te gyen du 'khyil bar gyur pa ni rtug skam gyi nad bskyed par bshad do/_/de'i mtshan ma ni snying dang mkhal rked dang /
[\[250a.4\]]rtsib logs na ba dang /_lgang pa chu so skrangs pa dang /_lto sbo ba dang /_skad 'gag cing lkog nad lha gor du 'gyur ba dang /_rims kyis 'debs shing skyugs pa dang /_mig ldongs shing 'on par 'gyur ba dang /_skom pa'i nad la sogs pa nad kyi sna grangs
[\[250a.5\]]'di rnams skye bar 'gyur te/_rtug skam gyi nad yod pa la ni dang por lus skam gyis bsku zhing dril ba dang /_dugs byas la sman gyi reng bus gzhug pa dang /_bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang /_sman mar btung ba dang /_'jam rtsi mas btang ba dang /_bkru
[\[250a.6\]]sman btang ba'i las rnams bya'o/_/de la sman reng bu mas btang ba'i cho ga ni po son cha dang /_khyim gyi du ba dang /_rtsabs ru tsha dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_bu ram rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin gyi nang du/_khaN+Da tshos pa tsam du bskol te reng bu mthe bong tsam
[\[250a.7\]]du byas nas mar gyis bskus te mas btang na phyi sa 'byung bar 'gyur la lto sbo zhing na ba yang sel to/_/yang na khyam gyi du ba dang /_pi pi ling dang /_po son cha dang /_yungs kar dang /_bu ram rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin gyi nang du khaN+Da tshos pa tsam bskol te snga ma
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]bzhin du reng bur byas pa yang bzang ngo /_/yang na shing kun dang /_shu dag dang /_ru rta dang /_swa rtsi ka'i thal ba dang /_rtsabs ru tsha rnams yas kyis rim bzhin du dang po'i cha gnyis kyis bskyed de btags la chu bskol ba dron po dang sbyar te 'thungs
[\[250b.2\]]na yang lto sbo ba dang /_zug cing na ba dang /_snying na ba dang /_skran rnams sel to/_/shing nye rong cha gnyis dang /_pi pi ling cha bzhi dang /_a ru ra cha lnga rnams btags te de rnams sbyar ba bsdoms pa'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i bu ram gyi nang du khaN+Da
[\[250b.3\]]tshos pa tsam du bskol la ril lu byas pa des ni phyi sa 'gags pa'i nad sel bar byed do/_/kha zas su ni nas rjen pa khram khrom du btags pa'i chan 'o ma 'am sha khu dang ldan pa'am/_gzhan yang gang de dang 'phrod pa'i kha zas rnams bza' bar bya'o/_/
[\[250b.4\]]ltar rlung gis g.yos nas phyi sa 'gags par 'gyur ba las mkhris pa dang bad kan bla gnyan du gyur pa la ni de gnyis la phan pa'i sman mas btang ba rnam gnyis bya'o/_/rlung las gyur pa'i phyi sa 'gags pa'i nad ni chu sor zug par byed do/_/
[\[250b.5\]]mkhris pa las gyur pa ni lte ba'i phyogs tsha ba yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa ni snying na ba dang /_dang ka mer mer po dang /_kha nas chu 'byung bar byed do/_/nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin te
[\[250b.6\]]spang bar bya'o/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i phyi sa 'gags pa'i nad la ni/_la la phud dang /_shing kun dang /_rgyam tshwa dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /_kha ru tshwa dang /_a ru ra rnams kyi phye ma chang zhim po dang sbyar te 'thungs na sel bar
[\[250b.7\]]byed do/_/yang na kha ru tsha dang shu dag dang /_go snyod dang /_na le sham rnams yas kyis rim bzhin du snga ma snga ma las nyis 'gyur du bskyed de btags pa'i phye ma kha lung gi khu ba dang sbyar te brdzis pa'i ril bu zos na yang rlung las gyur pa'i phyi sa 'gags pa'i
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]nad sel to/_/yang na rlung las gyur pa'i phyi sa 'gags pa'i nad la/_tshwa dang /_star bu dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_la la phud dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_kha ru tsha dang /_rtsabs ru tsha rnams kyi phye ma/_kha lung gi khu ba dang sbyar te ril lur
[\[251a.2\]]byas pa bza' bar bya'o/_/ldum bu se yab dang /_a ru ra dang /_shing kun dang /_ma nu dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_kha ru tsha dang /_rtsabs ru tsha rnams kyi phye ma nas btsos pa'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang rlung las gyur pa'i phyi sa 'gags pa dang /_skran dang /
[\[251a.3\]]rlung nad/_rmugs byed rnams sel to/_/mkhris pa yas gyur pa'i phyi sa 'gags pa'i nad la ni/_skyu ru ra'i khu ba dang /_bi da ri'i khu ba dang /_khyi lce ba'i khu ba dang /_rgun gyi khu ba rnams las gang yang rung ba kha ra dang sbyar te 'thungs na de ma thag tu sel to/_/yang
[\[251a.4\]]na skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang /_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i 'bras brngos pa'i phye ma dang /_kha ra sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba btung ngo /_/bad kan las gyur pa'i phyi sa 'gags pa'i nad la ni/_shu dag dang /_gla sgang dang /_kru trug tres dang /_a ru ra dang /_pu tse shel rnams kyi
[\[251a.5\]]phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar ba 'am/_yang na bilba la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba dron mo nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal pa dang sbyar ba btung bar bya'o//_//da ni snying na ba'i bye brag bshad par bya ste/_snying na ba la ni/_rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi gsum so so las
[\[251a.6\]]gyur pa dang /_kun 'dus pa las nad du gyur pa dang srin bu'i nyes pa las gyur pa dang rnam pa lnga yod de/_thams cad kyang zug cing na ba yin no/_/bye brag tu na srin bu las gyur pa ni/_snying g.ya' zhing na/_de la rlung las gyur pa'i snying na ba la ni/_tsang shu bsres
[\[251a.7\]]pa'i nang du/_til mar dang rgyam tsha blugs te btung bar bya'o/_/yang na til mar skol ba ba gcin dang sbyar te 'thungs na/_skran dang /_zug cing na ba dang /_lto sbo ba yang sel to/_/yang na a ru ra'i 'brum bu lnga bcu'i phye ma dang /_kha ru tsha srang gnyis/_mar
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na snying na ba dang dbugs mi bde ba dang skran rnams sel to/_/bca' sga dang /_kha ru tsha dang /_shing kun dang /_bal bo se'u dang /_star bu rnams kyi phye
[\[251b.2\]]ma chu skol ba dron po dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang dbugs mi bde ba dang snying na ba sel to/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i snying na ba la ni/_sman bsil ba'i khu ba la sogs pas lus la blugs pa dang /_sman bsil ba'i lde gus bsku ba dang /_sman mngar nag gi
[\[251b.3\]]bkru sman btang ngo /_/yang na pu tse shel gyi phye ma 'am/_shing mngar gyi phye ma gang yang rung ba kha ra chu dang sbyar ba'i nang du blugs te btung ngo /_/sman sti ra la sogs pa'i sde tshan btags pa'i phye ma/_mar dang /_chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang /_'o ma dang /
[\[251b.4\]]bu ram shing gi khu ba dang /_rgun gyi khu ba gsum las gang yang rung ba mar gyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i nang du bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa las ran par 'thungs na yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i snying na ba sel to/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i
[\[251b.5\]]snying na ba la ni/_pi pi ling dang /_li zur ba dang /_shu dag dang /_ra sna dang /_bca' sga dang /_a ru ra dang /_ma nu rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin bsres pa dang sbyar ba btung ngam/_yang na sman de dag nyid ba gcin dang bskol te bzhi cha lus pa btung bar
[\[251b.6\]]bya'o/_/nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i snying na ba la ni/_thog mar smyung ba'i cho ga byas la de'i 'og tu nyams stobs dang sbyar zhing /_rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gang shas che ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/srin bu las gyur pa'i snying na ba la ni/
[\[251b.7\]]byi dang ga dang /_ru rta'i phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/_/rtug skam gso ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa rdzogs so//_//de nas smyo byed dang /_brjed byed kyi nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/de la smyo byed kyi nad ni gzhan gyis ngan
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]du byas pa dang /_zas dang skom mi gtsang ba zos shing 'thungs pa dang /_'jigs shing sngangs pa dang /_mya ngan gyis gdungs nas/_yid dang blo dang /_dran pa log cing 'khrug pa yin no/_/de yang rnam pa lnga yod par bshad de/
[\[252a.2\]]de la rlung las gyur pa'i smyo byed kyi mtshan ma ni/_rang nyid la tsham rngam bya zhing rdeg pa dang /_ngu ba dang /_dgod pa dang /_glu len pa rnams yin par shes par bya'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/_khro ba dang /_bsal ba 'dod pa dang /
[\[252a.3\]]bsdigs pa dang /_snyegs pa la sogs pa rnams yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/_gnyid che ba dang /_smra ba nyung ba dang /_'ud med la dga' zhing snyeg pa dang /_kha zas mi 'dod pa rnams yin no/_/kun 'dus pa las gyur pa ni mtshan ma thams cad
[\[252a.4\]]dang ldan te/_ma rungs pa yin gyi spang bar bya'o/_/glo bur las gyur pa'i smyo byed ni/_lha la sogs pa'i gdon 'khrugs pas ngan du byas pa las gyur pa yin te/_mi ma yin pa'i shes pa dang /_shes nyen dang /_stobs dang /_tshig dang /_dpa'
[\[252a.5\]]ba la sogs pa dang ldan par shes par bya'o/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i smyo byed kyi nad la ni/_thog mar sman mar btung bar bya'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa la ni/_thog mar bkru sman btang ngo /_/bad kan las gyur pa la ni thog mar skyug sman
[\[252a.6\]]btang ngo /_/de ltar so so'i cho ga sngar bya ba rnams byas pa'i 'og tu 'jam rtsi mas btang ba dang /_bkru sman drag po mas btang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rim bzhin bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu yung dang /_skyer pa dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_shing nye rong
[\[252a.7\]]dang/_shu dag dang /_yungs kar dang /_shing kun dang /_shi ri sha dang /_kaT b+hi dang /_shwe ta dang /_btsod dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_thang shing dang /_ka rany+dza rnams kyi phye ma mar dang ba gcin gyi nang du bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]pa las ran par 'thungs na smyo byed kyi nad sel to/_/yang na sman de dag nyid kyi phye ma mar dang ra gcin gyi nang du bskol te mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni sman gnod sel zhes bya ste/_'di btung na brjed byed kyi nad dang dug sel bar byed do/_/sman pa
[\[252b.2\]]tha dang /_a ru ra dang /_shig gru dang /_shu dag dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma srang re re dang /_mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis ra'i 'o ma'i nang du bskol te mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni lce bde bar byed pa zhes bya ste 'di las ran par
[\[252b.3\]]zos na/_dran pa gsal ba dang yid gzhungs par 'gyur zhing /_'on pa dang /_dig pa dang /_lkugs pa rnams kyang de'i mthus sel bar byed do/_/yang na shing mngar dang /_shing kun dang /_shu dag dang /_rgya spos dang /_shi ri sha dang /_sgog skya dang /_ru rta
[\[252b.4\]]rnams ra gcin gyi nang du brdar te btsags pa'i khu ba snar blugs shing /_mig tu bsku bar bya'o//_//smyo byed kyis thebs pa la/_thog ma nas bcing ba dang /_brdeg pa dang /_gar yang mi btang bar bsrung zhing /_thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsdigs
[\[252b.5\]]la de'i 'og tu tshig 'jam pos gzhom par bya'o/_/glo bur las gyur pa'i smyo byed kyi nad kyis thebs pa la ni/_sman pa gtsang zhing re ba med pas mchod pa dang /_gtor ma dang /_bshos dang /_mchod sbyin dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_sngags dang /_mig tu
[\[252b.6\]]bsku ba dang /_snar blugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bsal bar bya'o//_//da ni brjed byed kyi bye brag bshad par bya ste/_brjed byed ni/_mun pa 'dra bas sems non nas nad gzhi shas cher 'khrugs pa las dran pa nyams shing khro bar gyur pa la
[\[252b.7\]]brjed byed kyi nad ces bya'o/_/de yang rnam pa bzhi ste ma rungs pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/de la rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa rnams kyi mtshan ma ni/_mdog gnag pa dang /_ser ba dang /_dkar ba rnams yin
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]te go rim bzhin du sbyar ba dang /_ci mthong ngo cog kyang de dag so so'i rnam pa mthong ba yin no/_/nad gzhi gsum car 'dus pa las gyur pa'i brjed byed kyi nad ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa ste/_gso dka' ba yin pas de dag
[\[253a.2\]]la thog mar ni bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang /_'jam rtsi mas gtang ba dang /_skyug sman btang ba dang /_bkru sman btang ba dang /_sman snar blugs pa dang /_cho ga rnam pa lnga po 'di rnams nad gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du gtang bar bya'o/_/de la rlung las
[\[253a.3\]]gyur pa la ni bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang /_'jam rtsi mas btang bar bya'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa la ni bkru sman btang ngo /_/bad kan las gyur pa la ni skyug sman btang ngo /_/sman snar blugs pa ni so so'i sman las sbyar na kun la yang
[\[253a.4\]]phan no/_/kun 'dus pa las gyur pa la ni/_gang shas che ba dang yang sbyar zhing cho ga de rnams las gang 'os pa gtang bar bya'o/_/cho ga de dag gis lus rab tu dag par gyur nas/_de'i 'og tu ni smyo byed kyi nad bsal ba'i cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du
[\[253a.5\]]bya'o/_/yang na sman shad ka pu shi pa dang /_shu dag dang /_ru rta rnams kyi phye ma sman bram m+hi khu ba dang /_mar rnying pa lo du ma lon pa'i nang du skol la mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te ci ran par 'thungs na brjed byed dang /_smyo byed can sel zhing yid gzhungs par
[\[253a.6\]]byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/mar dang til mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang /_'o ma mar gyi bcu drug gi nang du 'tsho byed ces bya ba'i sman sna bco lngar bshad pa rnams kyi phye ma srang re re skol la mar dang til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te ran par 'thungs na
[\[253a.7\]]yang brjed byed kyi nad sel to/_/shing kru dang /_ru rta dang /_ldong ros dang /_go snyod dang /_sgog skya dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_shing kun rnams kyi phye mar gcin dang /_til mar gyi nang du skol ba'i mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te snar blugs na yang
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]brjed byed kyi nad sel to/_/smyo byed kyi nad dang /_brjed byed kyi nad la/_chu dang /_me dang /_shing dang /_brag la sogs pa gnas ngan pa rnams ni spang bar bya'o/_/sems gsal zhing yid gzhungs par 'gyur ba'i sman bcud kyis len ni
[\[253b.2\]]bsgrims te rtag tu bza' bar bya'o/_/smyo byed dang /_brjed byed kyi nad gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa rdzogs so//_//de nas rlung nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/rlung nad rnam pa brgyad cu ni/_rlung 'khrugs pa las 'byung ste/_de rnams spyi'i mtshan ma ni
[\[253b.3\]]na ba dang /_yan lag chag pa snyam byed pa dang /_zug pa dang /_yan lag 'khums pa dang /_sha skam pa dang /_drag tu btsir ba 'dra bar na ba rnams yin no/_/de la rlung nad dam po zhes bya ba ni rang dbang med par lus 'gul ba yin no/_/rlung nad sgur po gzhu 'khums
[\[253b.4\]]bzhin du 'dug pa'o/_/rlung nad gzhogs phyed na ba zhes bya ba ni/_lus kyi gzhogs phyed ril gyis na bar byed pa'o/_/rlung nad lag pa ya gcig 'jes pa zhes bya ba ni/_rlung gis phrag pa'i rtsa 'khums par byas pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/rlung nad dpyi mig man
[\[253b.5\]]chad zug pa'i nad ni/_brla man chad du na ste/_brkyang bskum mi nus shing /_rting pa nas sor mo'i bar du na zhing 'gro mi shes par byas pa yin no/_/rlung nad kha yon zhes bya ba ni/_rlung gis kha phyogs gcig tu yo bar byas pa yin par bshad do/_/rlung nad pus mo skrangs
[\[253b.6\]]ba zhes bya ba ni/_rlung dang khrag rgyas pas pus mo'i lha nga skrangs par byed pa yin no/_/de la sman mar gyis lus bsku ba dang /_dugs bya ba dang /_sman mas btang ba dang snar blugs pa dang /_snum gyis bkru sman btang ba dang /_kha zas snum pa dang /_skyur ba dang /
[\[253b.7\]]lan tshwa dang /_mngar ba dang /_ro tsa bar byed pa'i bag rnams ni rlung nad sel to/_/sman ba la dang /_se ri ya gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du de nyid kyi phye ma/_til mar dang 'o ma lhan cig tu bskol la/_til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te 'thungs na/_rlung
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]nad kyi sna grangs thams cad sel to/_/yang na/_til mar dang /_'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang /_sman a shwa gan+d+ha srang lnga bcu skol ba'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du/_spang spos dang /_shing tsa dang /_gan+d+ha
[\[254a.2\]]pa tra dang /_btsod dang /_tra ban+ti dang /_byi'u rug pa dang /_dzA ti dang /_ba la dang /_thang shing dang /_sti ra dang /_shing mngar dang /_ra sna dang /_sug smel dang /_ma nu dang /_shu dag dang /_gze ma dang /_ru rta dang /_pu ti ka dang /_shu ti dang /_puD+Na Na ba dang /
[\[254a.3\]]praM ha tI dang /_pu shel tse dang /_bi ra ri rnams btags pa'i phye ma zho gnyis gnyis lhan cig tu bskol te til mar 'ba' zhig lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni a shwa gan+da la sogs pa'i til mar zhes bya ste/_btung ba dang /_lus bsku ba dang /_snar blugs pa dang /_mas
[\[254a.4\]]btang ba rnam pa bzhi po dag tu sbyar na rlung nad thams cad sel to/_/til mar dang /_la phug gi khu ba srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang /_zho dang /_rtsabs skyur po dang /_'o ma rnams las re re yang til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur bzhi 'gyur dang /_'di rnams kyi nang du/
[\[254a.5\]]shu dag dang /_ba la dang /_ra sna dang /_ma nu dang /_bca' sga dang /_kru trug tres dang /_shi kru dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_gze ma dang /_pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma skol la til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i til mar gyi sman yang rlung nad kyis nyam thag pa thams cad sel
[\[254a.6\]]ba yin no/_/til mar dang /_'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang /_sman pra sa ra ni srang brgya skol ba'i khu ba til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang /_'di rnams kyi nang du sman dzi ba ka dang /_ri sha b+ha ka dang /_me da rnam gnyis dang /_bu tshad rtong dang /_ra mnye dang /_ru rta dang /
[\[254a.7\]]tsan dan rnam gnyis dang /_shu ti dang /_thang shing dang /_btsod dang /_ra sna rnams kyi phye ma skol la til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa 'di las mas btang ba la sogs par sbyar na yang rlung sel to/_/til mar dang /_'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang /
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]gze ma'i khu ba til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bu ram dang /_bca' sga'i phye ma srang brgyad brgyad lhan cig tu skol la til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te ran par 'thungs pa'i 'og tu 'o ma 'thungs la thur du 'khrus pa chod pa'i rjes la/_bca' sga dang bu ram sbyar ba zos nas sman
[\[254b.2\]]snga ma btang ba dang /_zhu bar gyur pa'i 'og tu kha zas 'o ma dang lhan cig tu zos na rlung nad mi bzad pa thams cad sel to/_/mar srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_sgog skya srang brgya skol ba'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur rnams kyi nang du dbyi mo dang /_kru trug tres dang /_pi pi
[\[254b.3\]]ling rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis dang /_bca' sga dang /_shing kun dang /_lan tshwa rnam lnga dang /_'di rnams las srang re re dang /_star bu srang phyed dang /_'di rnams lhan cig tu skol la mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni sgog skyal sogs pa'i sman mar zhes bya ste/
[\[254b.4\]]'di las ran par 'thungs na rlung nad dang /_rlung nad rkang zug ya gcig 'jas pa dang /_rlung nad gzhogs phyed na ba dang /_skran la sogs pa sel to/_/dbyi mong dang /_kha ru tshwa dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_shig gru dang /_rgyam tshwa dang /_'u su'i 'bras bu rnams
[\[254b.5\]]kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis dang /_mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_la phug gi khu ba dang /_sge'u gsher gyi khu ba dang /_sha khu dang /_tshwa dang /_rtsabs skyur po dang /_zhog chu dang /_dar ba rnams las srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang /_'di rnams kyi nang du skol
[\[254b.6\]]la mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa las ran par 'thungs na yang rlung nad sel to/_/rlung nyi tshe'i nad la ni/_snum rnam pa bzhi po/_zhag dang rkang dang /_mar dang /_til mar rnams kyi sman gtang bar bya'o/_/rlung yod pa'i steng du/_bad kan dang /_mkhris pa'i bla gnyan gyis
[\[254b.7\]]thebs pa la ni re zhig bla gnyen btsan par byas te de zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga je bya'o/_/de la bad kan la ni sman drod che zhing rno ba rnams btang ngo /_/mkhris pa la ni sman mngar zhing bsil ba'i bag gtang bar bya'o/_/rlung nad rkang zug ya gcig 'jas pa dang /_rlung nad pus
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]mor skrangs ba la ni/_thog mar gtar te khrag phyung la/_de nas rlung nad sel ba'i cho ga thams cad bya'o/_/brla'i nad ni bad kan dang /_tshil 'dug pa gnyis ldan pas rlung non te/_brla rings pa'i nad drag po bskyed pa'i nad kyi
[\[255a.2\]]mtshan ma ni shin tu lci bar gyur cing sgyid lug pa yin te/_de la ni thog mar bad kan sel ba'i sman rtsub po cog gi cho ga byas la/_de'i 'og tu rlung bsal ba'i cho ga thams cad bya'o/_/dreg ni/_mi skyed de bar 'dug cing sdug ma myong ba las ngal ba la sogs pa drag
[\[255a.3\]]shul gyi bag byas pas rlung dang khrag 'khrugs pa las 'byung ste/_thog ma ni rkang lag gi nang na gnas la phyi sa lus la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de la rlung shas che ba'i dreg gi mtshan ma ni/_na ba dang /_rus pa grum zhing 'gas pa dang /_lus skem pa dang /_rtsub pa
[\[255a.4\]]dang/_mdog gnag pa rnams yin par bshad do/_/khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i dreg gi mtshan ma ni/_mdog dmar zhing skrangs pa dang /_lhang lhang por na ba dang /_chu ser 'dzag cing 'jig pa dang /_na ba dang /_lus tsha ba dang /_mdog 'jam pa rnams
[\[255a.5\]]yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i dreg gi mtshan ma ni/_cher mi na la/_lus g.ya' zhing rengs pa dang /_cher skrangs pa rnams yin no/_/nad gzhi gnyis gnyis 'dus pa dang /_gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa'i dreg gi mtshan ma ni/_mtshan ma gong du bstan
[\[255a.6\]]pa rnams cha 'dres pa las rtogs par bya'o/_/dreg nad gzhi gcig las byung la/_gsar pa ni gso sla ba yin no/_/nad gzhi gnyis 'dus pa las byung ba/_lo gcig tshun chad lon pa ni/_kha zas dang sman gyis gso tsam du 'jog nus so/_/nad gzhi
[\[255a.7\]]gsum char 'dus pa las byung la/_rma rdol zhing 'dzag ste rus pa 'gas pa gang yin pa ni gsor mi rung ste spang bar bya'o/_/de la dreg gso ba'i thabs ni/_thog mar sman mar blud de/_nyams stobs bskyed pa'i 'og tu/_rlung nyi tshe las gyur pa ma
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]gtogs pa gzhan rnams la gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu nad gzhi gang yin pa dang sbyar zhing bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang /_'jam rtsi mas btang ba dang /_skyug sman dang /_bkru sman dang /_sman snar blugs pa dang /_cho ga
[\[255b.2\]]rnam pa lnga po sngar bstan pa 'di rnams las gang 'os gtang bar bya ste/_rlung las gyur pa la ni/_sman mas gtang ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa la ni bkru sman btang ngo /_/bad kan las gyur pa la ni skyug sman btang ngo /_yang na rlung shas che ba las
[\[255b.3\]]gyur pa'i dreg la ni/_bag phye mar dang /_ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar bas bskus na sel bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na til brngos pa'i phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'am/_zar ma'i phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'am/_shu ta'i phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'am/_e raN+Ta'i sa bon gyi phye
[\[255b.4\]]ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba gang yang rung bas bsku bar bya'o/_/yang na chu na gnas pa'i srog chags nya la sogs pa'i sha gang yang rung ba zhib tu brdungs pa ste/_spod sna tshogs kyis btab la legs par btsos pas bsku bar bya'o/_/mkhris pa shas che ba las gyur pa'i
[\[255b.5\]]dreg la ni/_shing mngar gyi phye ma mar dang /_'o ma dang /_phye rnams sbyar ba'i lde gus bsku'o/_/yang na 'tsho byed ces bya ba'i sman sna bcu po rnams btags pa'i phye ma mar dang sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/_/bad kan shas che ba las gyur pa'i dreg la ni/_a shwa gan+d+ha dang /
[\[255b.6\]]til gyi phye ma 'am/_yang na yungs kar gyi phye ma'am/_yang na pur+Na rna ba dang /_shi kru'i phye ma dang /_'di rnams gang yang rung ba ba gcin dang sbyar te bsku bar bya'o/_/dreg go cog la ni a ru ra'i phye ma bu ram dang sbyar ba bza' bar bya'o/_/yang na sle tres
[\[255b.7\]]skol ba'i khu ba btung bar bya'o/_/yang na pi pi ling 'o mar skol ba'i sman bcud kyis len btung bar bya ste/_nyin gcig bzhin du pi pi ling lnga lngas bskyed de/_pi pi ling gi grangs brgyar phyin nas/_nyin gcig bzhin pi pi ling lnga lngas phri ste/_pi pi ling lnga
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]la thug nas yang snga ma bzhin du bskyed de/_bskol ba de lta bu'i cho gas legs par bsrung zhing rtag tu btung bar bya'o/_/rlung nad gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so//_//de nas chang nad
[\[256a.2\]]gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/dug la phan gnod rnam pa bcu yod par bstan pa gang yin pa de rnams ni chang la yang yod de/_de btung nyes pa las nad gzhi rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan rnams 'khrugs nas/_chang nad drag po skye
[\[256a.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de la rlung gis tshul gyur ba'i mtshan ma ni/_smra ba thogs pa dang /_mang du smra ba dang /_smra ba la bskam pa dang /_tshig mi brtan zhing khral khrul ba dang /_lus rtsub cing mdog sngon por 'gyur ba dang /_dmar por 'gyur ba dang /_myos
[\[256a.4\]]pa rnams yin no/_/mkhris pa'i tshul gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/_mdog dmar zhing ser ba dang /_khro zhing 'thab par dga' ba yin no/_/bad kan gyis tshul 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ni/_smra ba nyung ba dang /_tshig 'brel pa dang /_sems pa
[\[256a.5\]]dang/_bzhin mdog dpal skya ba dang /_rgyud zhen pa rnams yin no/_/nad gzhi kun 'dus pa las tshul gyur pa ni de dag thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i chang nad kyi mtshan ma ni/_snying dang/_klad pa dang /_rtsib logs
[\[256a.6\]]na ba dang /_lus rengs pa dang /_skyigs bus 'debs pa dang /_lud pa lu ba rnams yin no/_/mkhris pa las byung ba'i chang nad kyi mtshan ma ni/_skom dad che ba dang /_lus tsha ba dang /_rngul 'byung ba dang /_mdog ser por 'gyur
[\[256a.7\]]ba dang/_mi dran zhing myos pa rnams yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i chang nad kyi mtshan ma ni/_mer mer po dang /_kha nas chu 'byung ba dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_skyugs pa dang /_lus rengs pa rnams yin no/_/nad gzhi gsum 'dus
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]pa las gyur pa'i chang nad ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan par rig par bya'o/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i chang nad la ni/_chang snga ma 'thungs pa zhu bar gyur pa'i 'og tu/_chang gi nang du kha ru tsha dang /_tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma dang /_chu nyung zad
[\[256b.2\]]cig blugs te 'thungs na sel bar byed do/_/yang na chang gi nang du tsha dang kha ru tsha dang /_na le sham dang /_zim thig le dang /_la la phud rnams kyi phye ma blugs te 'thungs na yang /_rlung las gyur pa'i chang nad drag po sel to/_/yang na rlung las
[\[256b.3\]]gyur pa'i chang nad bsal ba'i phyir/_chang 'ol kon gyi skyo mar byas pa'i nang du/_rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang /_bal po se'u dang /_tin+ti la'i 'bras bu dang /_la la phud dang /_rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma blugs te btung bar bya'o/_/skom du ni kha lung dang /
[\[256b.4\]]bal po se'u skyur chu'i nang du mnyes te btung bar bya'o/_/ri dgas skam sa na gnas pa'i sha khu snum dang ldan pa'am/_rgyam tsha dang /_bal po se'u dang sbyar ba yang btung ba dang /_kha zas sbag par bzang ngo /_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i chang nad la ni/_chang dang chu
[\[256b.5\]]phyed mar byas la/_sbrang rtsi dang /_khar dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/_/yang na sman mngar bag bskol ba'i khu ba kha ra dang sbyar ba'am/_mon sran sde 'u'i khu bcud kha ra dang sbyar ba 'am sman mngar bag bskol ba'i khu ba las sha btsos te bsdus pa'i khu ba
[\[256b.6\]]rnams las gang yang rung ba btung bar bya ste/_thams cad kyang grang mos byas pa yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i chang nad la ni skyug sman chang dang sbyar te skyug tu gzhug pa dang /_nyams stobs dang sbyar te smyung ba'i cho ga yang bya'o/_/yang na drod bskyed pa'i
[\[256b.7\]]sman gyi phye ma chang dang sbyar ba'am/_'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba/_tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma dang sbyar ba btung zhing cho ga bsrung bar bya'o/_/kha zas ni nas las byas pa'i kha zas la phug skam po'i khu bcud dang /_rgya sran gyi khu bcud gang yang rung bas
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]spod tsha bas sha skyed de sbyar ba dang /_ri dgas skam sa nas gnas pa'i sha snum bag chung ba dang lhan cig tu bza'o/_/chang nad kyi rkyen gyis bskam pa'i nad dang /_rims dang /_lud pa dang /_rtsib logs na ba
[\[257a.2\]]dang/_'khru ba la sogs pa'i nad bla gnyan gang yang rung ste/_de dag la ni so so'i sman btang bas zhi bar bya'o/_/chang gis lus kyi sha zad par gyur pa la ni/_bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang /_'jam rtsi mas btang ba dang /_snum gyis
[\[257a.3\]]lus bsku zhing dril ba dang /_khrus bya ba dang /_sman mar dang /_'o ma blud pa rnams kyis brta bar bya'o/_/de la sman mar ni nye'u shing dang /_pur+Na r+Na ba dang /_shing mngar gyi phye ma mar chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pa
[\[257a.4\]]las ran par btung ngo /_/yang na ba la dang /_a ti la ba bskol ba'i khu ba 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'thungs na zad byed kyi nad sel to/_/pu rna rna ba bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/_mar dang /_'o ma dang /_shing mngar gyi phye ma blugs te/_bskol
[\[257a.5\]]la mar nyi tshe lus pa btsir ba las ran par 'thungs na yang /_chang 'thungs pas mdangs med par byas pa phyir brta zhing sor chud par byed do/_chang nad gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//de nas me dpal gso ba'i
[\[257a.6\]]le'u bshad par bya'o/_/me dbal ni/_lan tshwa dang /_skyur ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_drod che zhing rno ba la sogs pa'i kha zas rtag tu zos pas nad gzhi 'khrugs par byas pa las me dbal rnam pa bdun du shes par bya ste/_me dbal zhes bya ba ni
[\[257a.7\]]lus thams cad du mched cing 'jug pa yin no/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i me dbal gyi mtshan ma ni/_'brum bu 'jam zhing mdog gnag pa dang /_skrangs pa dang /_rims kyis 'debs pa dang /_gzer ba rnams yin no/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]me dbal gyi mtshan ma ni/_'brum bu'i mdog ser zhing dmar ba dang /_lus tsha ba dang /_rims kyis 'debs pa rnams yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i me dbal gyi mtshan ma ni/_'brum bu'i mdog dkar zhing dbal skya ba dang /_g.ya'
[\[257b.2\]]zhing bad kan gyi rims 'debs pa yin no/_/kun 'dus pa las gyur pa'i me dbal ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/_/glo rdol ba las gyur pa'i me dbal ni/_khrag dang /_mkhris pa gnyis las 'byung ste/_'brum pa'i mdog
[\[257b.3\]]gnag pa dang /_sngo skyar 'dug pa dang /_dmar ba dang /_skrangs pa dang brnags nas rdol ba dang /_lus tsha ba dang /_rims bdo bar byed pa rnams yin par bshad do/_/me'i me dbal zhes bya ba ni/_rlung dang mkhris pa dag las 'byung
[\[257b.4\]]ste/_'brum bu'i mdog mes bsregs pa 'dra la/_nye skor me mdag bzhin du dmar zhing /_lus tsha ba dang /_skom dad che ba dang /_'khru ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma las rtogs par bya'o/_/me dbal rdzab 'dra zhes bya ba ni/_bad kan dang mkhris
[\[257b.5\]]pa las 'byung ste/_'brum pa'i mdog dbal skya zhing dmar ba dang /_gnag cing 'tsher te dri mas g.yogs pa dang /_tsha zhing nye skor du chu ser gyis 'dam zhing 'dug pa rnams yin no/_/de la nad gzhi gsum so so las gyur pa'i me dbal ni gso
[\[257b.6\]]sla ba yin no/_/lhag ma gzhan rnams ni gsor mi rung bar bshad do/_/lus kyi phyi nang gnyis kar byung ba dang /_tshigs kyi steng du byung ba ni/_bdun char yang lhag par gsor mi rung ngo /_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i me dbal la ni/_rtsa ba lnga'i sman
[\[257b.7\]]lnga phrugs lnga sngar bshad pa'i nang nas/_rtsa'i rtsa ba lnga pa ma gtogs par rtsa ba lnga pa rnam pa bzhi po rnams las gang yang rung bas lus bsku ba dang /_nad kyi steng du blugs pa dang /_sman mar sbyar ba la sogs pa bya'o/_/yang na 'bras dang /_nas dang /
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma mar dang 'o ma'i nang du bskol te/_thug pa tshos par byas pas na ba'i steng du bsku bar bya'o/_/yang na 'o ma na ba'i steng du blugs par bya'o/_/yang na mar gyi snying po steng du blugs par
[\[258a.2\]]bya'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i me dbal la ni/_sman phra puN+Ta rI ka dang /_btsod dang /_shug pa dang /_pu shel tse dang /_tsan dan dang /_shing mngar dang /_ut+pal rnams kyi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar te bsku bar bya'o/_/yang na shing n+ya gro d+ha la sogs
[\[258a.3\]]pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad pas nad kyi steng du khu ba blugs pa dang /_bsdu ba dang /_sman mar sbyar ba rnams byas na bzang ngo /_/yang na mar gzhu zhing 'khyag tu bcug pa de lta bur lan brgya'i bar du byas te/_rul bar gyur pa'i nang du/_shing mngar gyi phye ma shas cher
[\[258a.4\]]blug ste sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/_/yang na liklu mig dang /_pu shel tse dang /_tsan dan dang /_gla sgang dang /_mu tig dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_btsag rnams kyi phye ma/_mar dang 'o mar sbyar te/_bskus na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i me dbal sel to/_/
[\[258a.5\]]bad kan las gyur pa'i me dbal la ni/_seng ldeng dang /_sap+ta paR+Sha dang /_gla sgang dang /_shing d+ha ba dang /_dong ga dang /_thang shing dang /_ku raN+Ta rnams brdar ba'i lde gus bskus na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na shing mngar dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_bu tshad rto dang /
[\[258a.6\]]shi ri sha rnams brdar ba'i lde gus bsku'o/_/yang na bad kan las gyur pa'i me dbal la/_sman pa ru na la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyis bsku ba dang /_khu bas blugs pa dang /_sman mar sbyar ba la sogs pa byas na bzang ngo /_/pa to la dang /_nim+ba dang /_skyer pa'i rtsa ba'i
[\[258a.7\]]shun lpags dang /_pu tse shel dang /_khyi lce ba dang /_shing mngar rnams bskol ba'i khu ba 'thung na yang me dbal thams cad sel to/_/gla sgang dang /_nim+ba dang /_pa to la rnams bskol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na yang /_me dbal lo cog sel to/_/yang na skyu ru ra dang /_ba to la dang /
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]mon sran sde'u rnams bskol ba'i khu ba mar dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/_/mdor na me dbal la ni/_dang por skyug sman dang /_bkru sman gyis sbyang ba dang /_gtar zhing khrag dbyung ba rnams kyang bya'o/_/cho ga de ltar byas pa las kyang 'brum bu rnag ste
[\[258b.2\]]rdol ba las gyur pa la ni/_rma gso ba'i cho gar bstan pa thams cad bya'o/_/me dbal bsal ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so//_//sman dpyad gces pa grub pa zhes bya ba/_bam po drug pa'o/_/de nas skrangs pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u
[\[258b.3\]]bshad par bya'o/_/skrangs pa'i nad ni/_mi bzad pas/_kha zas lci ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_bad kan skye bar 'gyur ba'i zas zos nas/_nad gzhi rnams 'khrugs pa las skrangs pa'i nad mi bzad pa rnam pa drug 'byung bar 'gyur te/_skrangs so cog gi mtshan
[\[258b.4\]]ma ni gso sla ba yin no/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i skrangs pa'i nad kyi mtshan ma ni/_skrangs pa nyid phan tshun du 'pho zhing /_gar mnan pa'i mal shong der 'dug pa dang /_mdog gnag cing dmar ba dang mi bzod par na ba rnams yin no/_/mkhris pa las
[\[258b.5\]]gyur pa'i skrangs pa'i mtshan ma ni/_myur du smin cing rdol ba dang /_mdog 'jam pa dang /_ser zhing dmar ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_lus tsha bar byed pa rnams yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i skrangs pa'i mtshan ma ni mdog snum zhing dkar ba dang /_dbal
[\[258b.6\]]skya ba dang /_mkhrang ba dang /_g.ya' ba rnams yin no/_/khrag las gyur pa dang /_glo bur gyis skrangs pa'i mtshan ma ni/_mkhris pa'i mtshan ma dang 'dra'o/_/kun 'dus pa las gyur pa'i skrangs pa'i mtshan ma ni thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/_/de la nad gzhi pho
[\[258b.7\]]ba'i nang na gnas na ni/_ro stod skrangs par 'gyur ro/_/nad gzhi long ga'i nang na gnas na ni/_ro smad du skrangs par 'gyur ro/_/nad gzhi bar na gnas na ni bar du skrangs par 'gyur ro/_/nad gzhi thams cad du khyab na ni/_lus ril gyis skrangs
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de la skrangs pa'i nad gzhi gcig las gyur pa yin la/_nad bla gnyan gzhan gyis kyang ma thebs te/_mi nyal stobs chen po zhig la byung na ni gso sla ba yin no/_/lus ril gyis skrangs pa dang /
[\[259a.2\]]mas yar mched de skrangs pa ni ma rungs pa yin no/_/skrangs pa'i nad la sman pas nad gzhi dang sbyar zhing nad gzhi so so'i sman gyi sde tshan rnams kyis sman mar sbyar ba dang til mar gyi sman sbyar ba dang /_bsku ba dang /_nad kyi steng du blugs pa dang /
[\[259a.3\]]btung ba rnams su sbyar bar bya'o/_/las rnam pa lnga po bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang /_'jam rtsi mas btang ba dang /_skyug sman dang /_bkru sman dang /_sman snar blugs pa rnams kyang tsha bas che chung dang sbyar shing cho ga bzhin du gtang
[\[259a.4\]]bar bya'o/_/de ma yin pa skrangs pa'i nad zhi bar bya ba'i spyi'i cho ga gzhan yang bshad par bya ste/_thang shing dang /_a ru ra dang /_bca' sga dang pu na rna ba rnams kyi phye ma chu skol ba dron po dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na byi dang ga dang /
[\[259a.5\]]bong nga dkar po dang /_dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang /_bca' sga dang /_thang shing dang /_na le sham rnams kyi phye ma chu bskol ba dron po dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na tsha ba gsum dang /_lcags kyi phye ma dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i
[\[259a.6\]]thal ba rnams kyi phye/_'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang skrangs pa'i nad sel to/_/yang na pu tse shel dang /_lcags kyi phye ma dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_shing nye rong rnams kyi phye ma/_'bras bu gsum
[\[259a.7\]]bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na gu gul dkar po ba gcin dang sbyar ba dang /_yang na pi pi ling gi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba btung bar bya'o/_/yang na bu ram a ru ra'i phye ma dang cha bsnyams te sbyar ba'am/_yang na bu ram bca' sga dang cha bsnyams te
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]sbyar ba bza' bar bya'o/_/yang na bu ram dang /_sge'u gsher tshod ran par bza'o/_/rlung las gyur pa la ni kha zas sha khu dang lhan cig bza'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa ni kha zas 'o ma dang lhan cig bza'o/_/bad kan las gyur pa la ni kha zas khu bcud
[\[259b.2\]]rtsub pa'i bag dang lhan cig bza' bar bya'o/_/cho ga de ltar byas na skrangs pa'i nad dang /_skems pa'i nad dang /_dmu rdzings dang /_smyo byed dang /_skran dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_dbugs mi bde ba rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/thang shing dang /
[\[259b.3\]]bu na rna ba dang /_bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'am/_yang na kru trug tres dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_shing nye rong dang /_thang shing rnams bskol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na yang skrangs pa'i nad sel to/_/rkang 'bam zhes bya ba ni tshil dang /_sha'i nad
[\[259b.4\]]las gyur te/_rkang pa gnyis bum pa 'dra bar skrangs pa yin no/_/de yang nad gzhi gsum la bad kan shas che ba las gyur pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum yod de nad gzhi so so'i mtshan mas bstan to/_/de ni dus thams cad du grang zhing ser che la/_skam du mi btub pa'i
[\[259b.5\]]sar skye bar 'gyur te/_lo gcig lhag pa dang /_rkang 'bam grog mkhar lta bu ni mi 'tsho'o/_/de la gso ba'i cho ga ni nad gzhi dang 'phrod pa'i sman gyis bsku ba dang /_dugs bya ba dang /_gtar te khrag dbyung ba la sogs pa'i cho ga dang /_skrangs pa'i nad gso ba'i cho
[\[259b.6\]]gar bstan pa thams cad kyang ci rigs par bya bar bshad do/_/lba ba ni rlung las gyur pa dang /_tshil las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum yod de/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i lba ba'i mtshan ma ni/_mdog nag cing dmar ba dang /_kha dri mi zhim pa dang /
[\[259b.7\]]rkan skam par byed pa yin no/_/tshil las gyur pa'i lba ba'i mtshan ma ni/_'jam zhing snum pa yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i lba ba'i mtshan ma ni shin tu che zhing sra ba yin no/_/de la rid de ba la byung ba dang /_lo gcig phan chad lon pa ni gsor mi rung ngo /_/'bras kyi phreng ba
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]zhes bya ba ni/_lkog mar bad kan dang /_tshil gnyis las skyu ru ra'i rus pa 'dra bar rmen bur gyur pa mang pos bskor ba'i ming ni 'bras kyi phreng ba zhes bya ste yun ring du mi 'byang bar 'dug pa yin no/_/de la lba ba gso ba'i cho ga
[\[260a.2\]]ni/_sman pas nad gzhi dang sbyar zhing /_nad gzhi so so'i sman gyi sde tshan gyis dugs bya ba dang /_bsku ba dang /_lums bya ba dang /_gtar zhing khrag dbyung ba dang /_skyug sman dang bkru sman btang ba dang /_til mar gyi sman btung ba rnams kyis lba
[\[260a.3\]]ba med par bya'o/_/'bras kyi phreng ba la ni/_sman sha ko ta ka'i shun lpags kyi phye ma til mar dang chu'i nang du bskol te til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'am/_yang na ni m+pa dang /_a shwa ma ra dang /_ni rgun+ti rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang chu'i nang du
[\[260a.4\]]bskol la/_til mar nyi tshe lus pa bcags te snar blugs so/_/yang na 'bras kyi phreng ba ma smin pa la ni dral te rmen bu phyung la rma kha bsreg go_/smin cing rdol ba la ni sman mu ga ka'i thal ba'i sman sbyar bas bsku zhing sbyangs la 'di gnyi ga yang rma'i
[\[260a.5\]]cho ga bzhin du gso bar bya'o/_/yang na rting pa nas sor bcu gnyis kyi gong du phyin pa dral te byin pa'i nang na tshil gyi rmen bu nya'i sgo nga 'dra ba 'dug pa rnams phyung la/_rma kha bsregs te rma gso ba'i cho ga bzhin du bya'o/_/sha rmen ni nad gzhi gsum so
[\[260a.6\]]so las gyur te khrag dang sha dang tshil rnams kyi rmen bu yin no/_/de ni nad gzhi so so'i mtshan ma las shes par bya ste/_de la khrag dang sha las gyur ba'i sha rmen ni/_gsor mi rung ngo /_/sha rmen gso ba'i thabs ni/_lba ba gso ba'i cho gar
[\[260a.7\]]bshad pa bzhin du bya'o/_/yang na dral ba dang /_bsreg pa dang /_sman gyi thal bas gdab pa rnams kyang bya zhing /_ras ma'am lo mas g.yogs par bya'o/_/skrangs pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]de nas rma gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/rma ni lus nyid las 'byung ba dang /_glo bur du 'byung ba'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis yod par rig par bya'o/_/de la snga ma ni nad gzhi rnams las gyur pa yin no/_/phyi ma ni mtshon la sogs pas rmas
[\[260b.2\]]pa yin no/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i rma'i mtshan ma ni/_rma'i nye skor rtsub cing mdog dmar la sngo skyar 'dug pa dang /_'dzag pa nyung zhing 'dar ba dang /_cher mi na ba rnams yin no/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rma'i mtshan ma ni/_rma dang nye
[\[260b.3\]]skor gyi mdog ser zhing dmar la sngo ba dang /_'dzag pa che ba dang /_lus tsha ba rnams yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i rma'i mtshan ma ni/_mkhrang zhing dbal skya ba dang /_chu ser skya bo 'dzag cing grang la bska ba rnams yin no/_/khrag nad las
[\[260b.4\]]gyur pa'i rma'i mtshan ma ni/_mdog dmar zhing khrag 'dzag pa yin no/_/nad gzhi gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rma'i mtshan ma ni gang dang gang 'dus pa de dang de'i mtshan ma 'dres pas bstan to/_/de la thog ma ma
[\[260b.5\]]smin pa'i tshe ni/_zhi bar 'gyur ba'i nan rtsis bsku'o/_/rnag tu cha ba la ni smin par bya ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/rnag zin pa la ni brtol te 'jib pa'i sman gyis rnag dang chu ser dag par bsal nas rma'i sha'u skye ba'i sman bya'o/_/de la rnag par bya ba'i sman
[\[260b.6\]]ni/_til dang /_phabs dang /_zar ma dang /_ru rta rnams kyi phye ma dang /_phye dang rgyam tsha rnams zho skyur po dang sbyar te/_brdzis pa'i gong bu ni smin par byed pa'i mchog yin par 'dod do/_/de la rnag tu tsha ba'i mtshan ma ni/_tsha ba 'ur 'ur
[\[260b.7\]]por 'dug pa dang /_na zhing zug pa dang /_mdog dmar ba dang skrangs pa rnams yin par bshad do/_/rnag pa'i mtshan ma ni gong ma smin du che ba'i mtshan ma rnams rtse gzhil bar 'gyur la/_gnyer ma 'dus shing phyogs gcig tu mthon po cog cog
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]por 'byung ba yin no/_/rdol bar bya ba'i sman ni/_shing nye rong dang /_snu ha k+Shi ra dang /_asmari dang /_tsi ri bil ba la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang /_kru trug tres dang /_thi ba dang /_bya gag dang /_mchil pa'i rtug pa rnams
[\[261a.2\]]kyi phye ma sbyar ba'am/_yang na mu ska'i thal ba'i sman sbyar bas bsku ba ni rdol bar bya ba'i sman gyi nang na mchog yin no/_/'jib pa'i sman gyis rnag dang chu ser bsal ba'i thabs ni/_til dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_shing mngar dang /_nim+pa'i lo ma dang /
[\[261a.3\]]yung dang /_skyer pa dang /_shing nye rong rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar te bsku bar bya'o/_/yang na nim+pa ba tra dang /_til gyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te bskus na yang rma sbyong bar byed do/_/rma'i sha'u skye ba'i sman ni/_nas rjen par btags pa'i phye ma/
[\[261a.4\]]mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te bskus na rma 'drub par 'gyur ro/_/rma rub pa'i mtshan ma ni/_skrangs pa med la 'jam zhing snum pa dang /_lce'i mdog 'dra bar dmar ba dang /_na ba med cing 'dzag pa chad pa dang /_rlob med pa rnams yin te
[\[261a.5\]]rma dag par 'gyur ba'i rtags su bshad do/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i rma la ni sman rtsa ba lnga pa'i sde tshan che chung gnyis cho ga thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rma la ni shing n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan cho ga thams cad du sbyar
[\[261a.6\]]bar bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i rma la ni dong ga la sogs pa'i sde tshan cho ga thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/_/yang ut+pal sngon po dang /_ba la dang /_skyer pa dang /_me da dang /_shing mngar dang /_tsan dan dang /_sa mang+ga dang /
[\[261a.7\]]d+ha ta ki rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar te bskus na yang rma'i sha'u skye bar byed do/_/yang na shing 'o ma can gyi myu gu'i phye ma mar dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na 'bras bu gsum dang /_shing ba ta'i yal ga'i thor to dang /_seng ldeng dang /_seng phrom rnams
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar bas bskus na rma kha 'drub par 'gyur ro/_/yang na shing ardzu na dang /_u dum bA ra dang /_a shwad+tha dang /_seng phrom dang /_dzam bU'i shun lpags dang /_shing mngar dang /_kat+pa la dang /_rgya skyegs rnams kyi phye mas
[\[261b.2\]]btab pa na yang /_rma'i sha'u skye bar 'gyur ro/_/pu tse shel dang /_spra tshil dang /_yung dang /_shing mngar dang /_nak+ta ma la'i 'bras bu dang /_lo ma dang /_ma la ti dang /_nim+pa'i lo ma rnams kyi phye ma mar dang chu'i nang du bskol te/_mar
[\[261b.3\]]nyi tshe lus pa yang rma la phan pa yin no/_/yang na pra puN+Da rI ka dang /_shing mngar dang /_bu tshang rto dang /_ra mnye dang /_tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma dang /_shing 'o ma can bskol ba'i khu ba rnams til mar gyi nang du bskol te/_til mar nyi tshe
[\[261b.4\]]lus pa btsags pa yang rma 'tsho bar byed do/_/rma kha sman gyis bskus pa'i steng du/_shing ka rany+dza dang /_p+lak+Sha dang /_dzam bU la sogs pa'i lo mas glan la de'i steng du ras la sogs pas dkri ba ni bzang ste rma sbyong zhing 'tsho bar byed do/_/rma la
[\[261b.5\]]'bu zhugs pa la ni byi'u dug pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan sbyar bas rma kha dang rma'i nang du bskus na phan no/_/rma sos pa'i mal shong du gyur pa la ni/_sran ma dang /_mon sran sde'u la sogs pa sran ma'i rigs rnams kyi lo ma'i phye ma chu dang sbyar
[\[261b.6\]]ba'am/_yang na shing tog ko sha'am/_shing lbang ko btags pa'i phye ma chu dang sbyar bas bskus na slar gang bar 'gyur ro/_/rma 'khyims pa la ni cho ga shes pas rma'i bag gar byung ba brtags te/_mtshon gyis dral la dag par bsal zhing /_rnag
[\[261b.7\]]dang /_chu ser 'jib pa'i sman gyis bskus te myang ba ste/_rma khar sha'u skye zhing 'drub pa'i sman la sogs pa rma'i cho ga thams cad rim bzhin du bya'o/_/rngu ba khong na yod pa'i rma la ni/_rngu ba skam pas drangs te phyung la/_rma gso ba'i sman gyi cho ga
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]bstan pa rim bzhin du bya'o/_/rma rnying ring du lon pa'i rkyen gyis sha zad cing skam par gyur pa la ni/_sha rtas pa'i sman gyi cho ga yang bya zhing /_rma yang gso bar bya'o/_/rma rang pa la ni rma'i nye skor gtar zhing khrag dbyung
[\[262a.2\]]ba dang /_skyug sman dang bkru sman btang /_glo bur gyi rma la rma byung ba'i mod la/_mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bas bskus te bcings la/_mkhris pa dang khrag gi drod tsha ba dbri zhing bsil ba'i cho ga rnams bya'o/_/rus pa chag gam tshigs byung
[\[262a.3\]]ba la ni/_cho ga shes pas srang zhing /_tshigs bcug la/_mar dang shing mngar gyis bskus te bcings la ras kyis dam du dkris la/_shing 'o ma can gyi shun lpags kyis mi 'gul bar dbang du byas te ci nas kyang ma rnag par nan tan du
[\[262a.4\]]bsrung bar bya'o/_/rma dang /_chag grugs dang bur ba'i kha zas ni 'bras sA lu dang /_mon sran sde'u dang nas las byas pa dang /_ri dwags skam sa na gnas pa'i sha rnams bza'o/_/zho dang /_'o ma dang /_skyur bag dang /_kha zas lci
[\[262a.5\]]ba'i bag dang nyal po rnams spang bar bya'o/_/rma gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so//_//de nas mig sman gyi rgyud kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/_/mig sman gyi rgyud ces bya ba/_lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos bshad pa gang yin pa ni
[\[262a.6\]]rgya ches pas na/_'dir de dag thams cad mi bshad par cha tsam zhig bshad par bya'o/_/de la mig gi rang bzhin ni gong bur 'dug pa dang /_dmar ba dang /_dkar ba dang /_gnag pa yin no/_/de yang 'byung ba chen po sa dang /_chu dang me
[\[262a.7\]]dang rlung rnams dang ldan par bshad do/_/gnas khung bu yin pas na nam mkha' dang yang ldan no/_/de la rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_khrag gi nyes pa rnams kyi bye brag las mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa zhes bya ba drag po rnam pa bzhir
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]'gyur te/_de ni phal cher mig nad do cog 'byung ba'i gzhi yin no/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mtshan ma ni/_mchi ma grang ba dang /_rngu ma skam po yod pa dang /_na zhing ha re 'dug pa rnams yin par bshad do/_/mkhris
[\[262b.2\]]pa las gyur pa'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mtshan ma ni/_mchi ma tsha ba dang /_rngu ma ser ba dang /_tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug cing rtsa dmar ba rnams yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mtshan ma ni/_rngu ma dkar pos
[\[262b.3\]]yogs pa dang /_mchi ma 'byar 'byar po dang /_g.ya' zhing skrangs pa rnams yin no/_/khrag gi nyes pa las byung ba'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mtshan ma ni/_mig dmar zhing tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug la/_dmar po shar shar por 'byung zhing /
[\[262b.4\]]mchi ma rtsa dmar ba rnams yin no/_/kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pa dang /_dus bzhin du mi za ba'i rkyen gyis mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa zhes bya ba tsha bas chen por gyur pa la ni/_mig nad rdung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_mig dang klad pa'i phyed mi bzad
[\[262b.5\]]par na bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i mtshan ma yang gong du smos pa bzhin du nad gzhi so so'i mtshan ma dang sbyar zhing rtogs par bya'o/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad gso ba'i cho ga ni/_kha ra dang /_seng phrom dang /_rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma chu
[\[262b.6\]]'jam tsam dang sbyar te btsags pa'i khu ba'am/_yang na kha ra dang /_bca' sga dang /_sha ba ri'i seng phrom rnams cho ga gong ma bzhin du byas te mig tu blugs par bya'o/_/yang na ku sta ra'i me tog dang /_shing mngar dang /_kha ra dang /
[\[262b.7\]]bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma zho kha chu 'jam tsam dang sbyar te btsags pa'am/_yang na bca' sga dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_shing mngar dang /_seng phrom rnams kyi phye ma mar gyi nang du brngos pa'i khu bas mig tu blugs so/_/yang na shing mngar dang /_tsan
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]dan dang /_btsod dang /_seng phrom dang /_btsag yug snam rnams kyi phye ma chu 'jam tsam dang sbyar te btsags pa'am/_yang na bilba la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol bas mig gi nang du blugs na yang mig nad mi bzad par na ba sel
[\[263a.2\]]to/_/yang na e raN+Da 'i rtsa ba ra'i 'o ma'i nang du bskol te/_'jam tsam du bsgrangs la mig gdangs te/_ras dkar po gtsang mas g.yogs pa'i steng du/_mig 'gram logs nas rgyun ma chad par blugs pa ni/_mig sman tshags las btang ba
[\[263a.3\]]zhes bya ba'i mchog yin no/_/yang na pi pi ling dang /_bal ka dang /_shing mngar dang /_rgyam tsha rnams ra'i 'o mar bskol te 'jam tsam du bsgrangs pa snga ma bzhin du tshags las btang ba'i sman byas na yang mig nad mi bzad pa na ba sel to/_/yang
[\[263a.4\]]na lcags sam zangs kyi snod du rgyam tsha dang zho sbyar ba'am/_yang na zangs sam lcags kyi gtun gyi nang du 'khar ba'i gtun bus yung dang pi pi ling zhib tu brdungs la zho dang sbyar te snod de nyid kyi nang du zhag lon par bzhag pa zangs dang lcags kyi mig sman
[\[263a.5\]]gyi thur mas blang zhing mig tu bskus na mig mi bzad par na ba sel to/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni pra puN+Da rI ka dang /_shing mngar dang /_yung dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_shug pa rnams bskol ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang khar sbyar te sngar
[\[263a.6\]]bsten pa bzhin du/_tshags las btang zhing rgyun du blugs na mig nad sel to/_/yang na tsan dan dang /_ari sh+ta'i lo ma dang /_shing mngar dang /_skyer pa dang /_lce myang tsha rnams kyi phye ma chu grang mo dang sbyar te/_sbrang rtsi dang /_kha ra dang ldan
[\[263a.7\]]par byas la tshags las btang zhing rgyun du blugs so/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni/_dud pa dang /_yungs kar cha re dang /_yung dang /_skyer pa cha gnyis gnyis dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma chu 'jam tsam dang sbyar te tshags las btang
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]zhing rgyun du blugs na mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa sel to/_/yang na snod kha sbyar nim+pa'i khu ba bskus pa'i nang du/_seng phrom cha bzhi dang /_dud pa dang /_yungs kar cha re rnams kyi phye ma tshig mar brngos te btags nas/_chu 'jam tsam dang sbyar ba
[\[263b.2\]]yang tshags las btang zhing rgyun du blugs par bya'o/_/khrag las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni/_sman ti ri ta dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_shing mngar dang /_kha ra dang /_gla sgang chen po rnams kyi phye ma chu grang mo dang sbyar te tshags las btang zhing
[\[263b.3\]]rgyun du blugs na mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa sel to/_/seng phrom dang /_shing mngar dang /_ldong ros dang /_skyer pa dang /_skyer khaN+Da rnams kyi phye ma ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na skyer pa'i khu ba bsgrangs te sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba thur mas
[\[263b.4\]]blangs la mig la bskus na mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa thams cad sel to/_/thog ma mig nad kyis btab ste na ba bdo ba la ni/_seng phrom dang /_skyu ru ra khrel bur sbyar ba mar gyi nang du bsnos te zhib tu btags la ldong ros dang sbyar te/_chu dang brdzis
[\[263b.5\]]pas mig gi phyi rol pags pa'i steng du bsku'o/_/yang na mig sman tsak+Shu ras gtsang ma'i nang du phur la/_ba lang gi gci ba'i nang du btsos te/_chan tshos rab tu gyur pa'i shun lpags med par byas te bskams la zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma nyal gar lan
[\[263b.6\]]cig rgya mig tu blugs pa tsam gyis/_de ma thag tu mig nad mi bzad par bdo ba yang med par byed do/_/yang na mig na ste bdo ba la/_shi kru'i sa bon cha gcig dang seng phrom cha brgyad dang /_ldong ros cha gsum dang /_'di rnams zhib tu btags
[\[263b.7\]]pa'i phye ma sbyar bas ras gtsang ma la gzhan par btab ste mig g.yogs par bya'o/_/yang na skyer khaN+Da dang /_a ru ra dang /_skyer pa dang /_btsag dang /_rgyam tsha rnams lhan cig tu chu dgas mar byas la/_mig gi phyi rol pags pa'i steng du bskus
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]na yang mig nad do cog sel to/_/mig nad rdung ba thams cad la ni/_dpral rtsa gtar te khrag phyung la/_mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i skabs su so so'i rkyen tu/_sman gyi cho ga ji ltar bstan pa rnams kyang mthun mthun du bya'o/_/
[\[264a.2\]]mig gi 'bras bu na gu'i steng du dkar po'i thig le byung ba ni/_ling tog ces bya ste/_bad kan las gyur par shes par bya'o/_/mig gi sprin gyi steng du dmar po byung ba ni/_ling tog dmar po zhes bya ste/_khrag gi nyes pa las 'byung ba yin no/_/de
[\[264a.3\]]la ling tog dkar po zhi bar bya ba'i thabs ni/_drub mar chang dang /_me tog ma d+hu ka'i shing gi snying po dang /_ba ru ra'i tshi gu dang /_rgyam tsha rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te mig la bskus na ling tog med par 'gyur ro/_/yang na
[\[264a.4\]]ga bur dang /_na le sham dang /_shing mngar dang /_dung dang /_ba lang gi so dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_ldong ros dang /_tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma shig gru'i khu ba dang sbyar te ri lur byas pas bskus na yang ling tog dkar po sel bar byed do/_/
[\[264a.5\]]rgya mtsho'i lpu ba dang /_khyim bya'i sgo nga'i shun lpags dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_dung dang /_shi gru'i 'bras bu'i tshi gu rnams kyi phye ma chu dang sbyar te ri lur byas pas bskus na yang ling tog la sogs pa gris bzhogs pa bzhin du med par byed do/_/khyim
[\[264a.6\]]bya'i sgo nga'i shun lpags dang /_ldong ros dang /_dung dang /_mching bu dang /_tsan dan dang /_rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma cha bsnyams pa'i steng du/_mig sman gyi thur ma bsgres pas mig byug na yang /_ling tog dang /_mig 'dzer la
[\[264a.7\]]sogs pa med par byed do/_/tsan dan dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_a ru ra dang /_rgya skyegs rnams kyi phye ma yas kyi rim bzhin du dang po'i cha res bskyed de sbyar ba'i nang du mig sman gyi thur mas bsgres pas mig byug na yang ling tog dang /_mig
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]'dzer la sogs pa med par byed do/_/sna ma'i me tog kha ma 'bus ba dang /_rgya skyegs dang /_btsag yug snam dang /_tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma cha mnyam la chu dang sbyar ba'i ri lus mig bskus na yang mig snad cing rma byung ba dang /_ling tog
[\[264b.2\]]rnams sel zhing khrag gis rgyas pa dang bar byed do/_/ling tog dmar po la ni dung gi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/_ka ta ka'i 'bras bu rgyam tsha dang sbyar ba'am/_rgya mtsho'i lbu ba kha ra dang sbyar ba rnams las gang yang rung bas mig byug par
[\[264b.3\]]bya'o/_/sna ma'i lo ma'i khu ba dang sbrang rtsi dang /_yung dang /_skyer pa'i phye ma dang /_skyer khaN+Da rnams kyi mig sman nam/_yang na pi pi ling ras gtsang ma'i nang du phur te ba lang gi gci ba'i khu ba'i nang du btsos la skams pa'i phye mas mig
[\[264b.4\]]byugs na/_mtshan mo mi mthong ba'i mig nad sel to/_/ldong ros dang /_cu gang dang /_stang zil dang /_tsha ba gsum ba lang gi mkhris pas sbrus la/_sran tsam gyis reng reng po dril la/_chu las brdar ba'am/_yang na thang shing gi phye mar
[\[264b.5\]]gcin gyis sbang zhing skams pa de lta bur lan grangs mang du byas pas mig bskus na mig mchi mas gang ba sel to/_/yang na/_ba bla dang /_thang shing dang /_shu dag rnams kyi phye ma bye'u rug pa'i lo ma'i khu ba dang sbyar te/_ri lur byas la grib
[\[264b.6\]]mar bskams bas mig bskus na yang mig tshag rnying sel to/_/ba bla dang /_stang zil dang /_de gnyis bsdoms pa'i nyis 'gyur gyis zangs rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma'i nang du/_mig sman gyi thur ma bsgres pas mig byug gam/
[\[264b.7\]]yang na tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma dang /_skyer khaN+Da chu dang sbyar te bskus na yang mig tshag po sel to/_/mig nad rab rib tu gyur pa thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan ma ni shin tu zi zi por gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/so so'i bye brag gzhan yang bshad de/
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]de la rlung las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mtshan ma ni ci mthong ngo cog rtsa dmar zhing g.yo ba dang /_lang long bor snang ba yin no/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mtshan ma ni/_kha dog sngon po dang /_ser por snang zhing /_me 'bar
[\[265a.2\]]ba dang /_srin bu me khyer dang glog lta bu mthong ba rnams yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mtshan ma ni mthong ngo cog mdog 'jam zhing skya ba dang /_bstan par snang ba rnams yin no/_/'dus pa las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mtshan ma ni/
[\[265a.3\]]mtshan ma de dag thams cad lta bur mthong ba yin no/_/khrag las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mtshan ma ni mthong ngo cog shin tu dmar bar mthong ba yin no/_/mig nad rab rib ces bya ba yal bar bor te/_tshabs chen po las gyur pa la ni mig nad bris
[\[265a.4\]]g.yogs pa zhes bya bar gyur te/_de'i mtshan ma yang thog mar ni nad gzhi gang las gyur pa'i mtshan ma rab rib kyi skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra ba las/_phyir zhing 'khrul tshabs che ba dang mi mthong bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/de rnams
[\[265a.5\]]kyi nang na bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nad bris g.yogs pa ni gso sla ba yin te rtsa gtar zhing khrag dbyung na bzang ngo /_/de la rab rib gso ba'i cho ga ni/_a ru ra'i tshi gu dang /_shing mngar dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_na le sham dang /_spangs
[\[265a.6\]]ma rnams chu btags su byas pa'i ri lus bskus na mig nad rab rib rnams sel to/_/tsha ba gsum dang /_lcags kyi phye ma dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_stang zil rnams chu btags su byas te legs par sbyar ba'i ri
[\[265a.7\]]lu'i ming ni ri lu nag po zhes bya ste 'di bskus na yang mig nad rab rib sel to/_/yung dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_pi pi ling dang /_ka ta ka'i 'bras bu dang /_yungs kar rnams kyi phye ma char pa'i chu dang sbyar te/_ri lur byas pas bskus
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]na yang mig nad do cog sel to/_/bya g+h+r-i dang /_gla sgang dang /_shing thog a mra dang /_shing mngar dang /_pi pi ling dang /_rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma zangs kyi snod kyi nang du ra'i 'o ma dang spangs pa'i ri lus bskus na yang /_mig nad
[\[265b.2\]]thams cad sel to/_/rkang bzhi ba phyugs la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i so dang /_rgya skyegs dang /_ka rany+dza'i 'bras bu dang /_bri ha tI'i 'bras bu dang /_gla ba dang /_rnga mo'i rus pa dang /_nya rus dang /_byi dang ka ra dang /_tsha ba
[\[265b.3\]]gsum dang /_ru rta rnams cha bsnyams te/_chu btags su byas pa'i ri lu'i ming ni so'i ri lu zhes bya ste/_'dis bskus na mig nad rab rib dang /_pris g.yogs pa dang /_mig 'dzer dang /_'brum pa byung ba dang /_rma byung ba dang /_ling
[\[265b.4\]]tog la sogs pa sel to/_/ldong ros dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_nag tshur dang /_dung dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_skyer khaN+Da rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i khu ba'i mig sman gyis bskus na yang mig nad bris g.yogs pa dang /_ling tog dang /
[\[265b.5\]]mig 'dzer dang /_rab rib rnams sel to/_/shing ka bit+ta'i khu ba mu zi'i khu ba nyis gyur dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na skyer khaN+Da dang /_stong zil dang /_gla sgang gi bzhi 'gyur gyi phye ma dang sbyar ba'i nang du mig sman gyi thur ma bsgres te mig byugs na
[\[265b.6\]]yang rab rib sel to/_/yang na li shi cha gcig dang /_zangs cha gnyis dang /_stong zil cha gsum dang /_mu zi cha lnga dang /_nA ga ge sar cha gsum dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma snod kha sbyar gyi nang du tshig par brngos la zhib tu btags pas mig
[\[265b.7\]]sman gyi thur ma la bsgo zhing rtag tu mig byug par bya'o/_/stong zila'am/_skyu ru ra gang yang rung ba'i phye ma mar dang /_sbrang rtsir sbyar te/_a ru ra'i snying po phyung ba'i skyin par khong du bcug la slar kha sbyar te bag zan gyis g.yogs nas/_rgya shug
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]gi me'i nang du bsregs la/_bag zan tshig ste dud pa chad nas slar phyung ste bsgrangs la/_a ru ra'i khong na sman 'dug pa btags pa'i phye mas mig sman gyi thur ma la bsgo zhing mig la byugs pa ni rab rib sel ba'i mchog yin no/_/
[\[266a.2\]]yung dang /_skyer pa dang /_a ru ra dang /_spang spos dang /_ru rta dang /_pi pi ling rnams zhib tu btags ba'i phye ma 'di'i ming ni/_sangs rgyas pa'i mig sman zhes bya ste/_snga ma bzhin du mig sman gyi thur ma la bsgo zhing mig la byugs na mig nad
[\[266a.3\]]thams cad sel to/_/yang na stang zil dang /_spang spos dang /_gan+d+ha pa tra rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar la/_sbrul nag po shi ba'i mgo bcad pa'i khar bcug la 'jim pas g.yogs te bsregs la/_'jim pa tshig ste dmar por gyur nas
[\[266a.4\]]phyung ste bsgrangs la/_de'i nang gi sman zhib tu btags pa'i phye mas mig sman gyi thur ma la bsgo zhing mig byugs na yang rab rib sel to/_/dug mo nyung gi sa bon mar dang sbyar la/_shing pa to'i lo mo'i nang du phur mar byas te chu'i nang du bskol la
[\[266a.5\]]tshos par gyur nas/_nang gi khu ba bsgrangs pa mig tu blugs pa'am/_yang na dug mo nyung gi sa bon gyi skyin par bya skams na gnas pa'i sgo nga snga ma bzhin du btsos pa'i khu ba mig tu blugs na mig blta bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na 'bras bu gsum
[\[266a.6\]]dang /_lcags kyi phye ma dang /_shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba nyal khar rtag tu zos na mig nad do cog sel cing /_ro tsa bar yang 'gyur ro/_/'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_'o ma dang /_mar gyi nang du
[\[266a.7\]]'bras bu gsum gyi bye ma bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pa las nub mo zhing ran par 'thungs na yang ring mo mi thogs par rab rib sel to/_/sman ra sna dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_rtsa ba bcu pa rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_mar gyi nang
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]du sman 'tsho byed ces bya ba sna bcu pa'i phye ma bskol to/_/mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na yang rab rib sel to//_//da ni rna ba'i nad kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/_de la rlung las gyur pa'i rna ba'i nad kyi mtshan ma ni/_rna ba gnyis su
[\[266b.2\]]zug cing na la 'on zhing sgra 'byung ba dang 'dzag pa rnams yin no/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa ni tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug pa yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa ni rna ba'i nang skam la dri mnam pa yin no/_/de dag gso ba'i sman ni/_sman mu raM ga dang /_chu
[\[266b.3\]]shing dang /_shi kru dang /_la phug dang /_sge'u gsher rnams las gang yang rung ba'i khu ba rgyam tsha dang sbyar ba dron pos rna ba gang bar blugs la/_nang du chub par bsgul zhing phyir phos na rna ba'i nad sel to/_/rgyam tsha btags pa shing arga'i lo ma ser
[\[266b.4\]]po'i nang du phur la/_de'i phyi rol tu yang /_arga'i lo ma rim pa bdun gyis g.yogs te me mar mur gyi nang du bcug la/_lo ma nang rim ma tshig tsam du bsregs nas lo ma phyi rim rnams kyang bor/_nang gi rgyam tsha yang bor la/_nang rim gyi lo ma
[\[266b.5\]]ser po la gsher bag yod pa btsir ba'i khu ba rna bar blugs na yang rna ba'i nad sel to/_/bilpa la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang /_thang shing dang /_sgron shing rnams las gang yang rung ba'i shing bu'i thor to ras kyis dkris te/_til mar gyi nang du
[\[266b.6\]]smyugs la bsregs te/_'bad du bcug pa'i khu ba zags pa dron po rna bar blugs na yang rna ba'i nad sel to/_/ru rta dang /_bu bran shing dang /_shu dag dang /_thang shing dang /_shu ti dang /_shing kun dang /_rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye mar
[\[266b.7\]]gcin dang /_til mar gyi nang du bskol te/_til mar nyi tshe lus pa dron po rna bar blugs na yang rna ba'i nad kyis nyam thag pa sel to/_/ru rta dang /_a ru ra la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du shing mngar dang /_bu tshangs sto dang /_mon
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]sran sde'u dang /_'u su dang /_phag tshil rnams bskol te/_phag tshil gyi zhag nyi tshe lus pa las rna bar blugs na yang rna ba na zhing sgra byung ba sel to/_/rna ba mi bzad par na zhing /_sgra 'byung la/_chu ser 'dzag pa la
[\[267a.2\]]bsros pa dron po dang /_lce myong tsha sbyar ba rna bar blugs so/_/yang na shing ba ru na dang /_ka pit+ta dang /_a mra dang /_dzam+bU rnams kyi lo ma'i phye ma til mar dang chu'i nang du bskol te til mar nyi tshe lus pa'am/_yang na sna ma'i lo ma'i khu ba rna bar blugs
[\[267a.3\]]na/_rna ba nas rnag 'dzag pa'i na ba sel te/_thabs de ltar byas pa las kyang /_rnag skam po nang du lus pa la ni/_sngar til mar ram/_sman mar gyis sbyar zhing 'byung du btub par bya ba'i sman snum bag blugs pa dang dugs kyis bdugs pa rnams
