[\[267a.4\]]byas nas/_de'i 'og tu skra gzhar 'jam pos rul ba bru bar bya'o//_//da ni sna'i nad kyi bye brag bshad de/_de la sna'i nad cham pa zhes bya ba ni/_nad gzhi rnam pa gsum las 'gyur te/_rlung las gyur pa ni sna nas 'dzag pa sla ba yin no/_/
[\[267a.5\]]mkhris pa las gyur pa ni 'dzag pa'i mdog ser ba yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa ni 'dzag pa dka' ba yin no/_/nad gzhi kun 'dus pa las gyur pa ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/_/de la cham pa'i sman ni/_mgo snum gyis
[\[267a.6\]]bsku ba dang /_dugs bya ba dang /_snar sman blug pa dang /_skyug sman btang ba dang /_sman mar btung ba dang /_kha zas ni tsha zhing skyur ba bza' ba la sogs pa sman pas cho ga bzhin du bya'o/_/yang na cham pa la ni sman dri zhim mo cog snod kha sbyar
[\[267a.7\]]gyi nang du bsregs pa'i dud pa spyi'us drangs te/_kha snar brngub par bya'o/_/yang na dri sna bzhi zhes bya ba/_shing tsha dang /_sug smel dang /_gan+d+ha pa tra dang /_nA ga ge sar rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba'am/_yang na tha phe nag po phur mar 'phur te snar
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]bsnam par bya'o/_/li zir ba dang /_ta ma la dang /_tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma mar dang bu ram gyi nang du bskol te/_sbyar ba zos na yang cham pa dang /_glo rdol ba dang /_rtsib logs na ba dang /_snying na ba dang /_mkhal rked na ba rnams sel to/_/
[\[267b.2\]]bya g+h+r-i dang /_dan+da'i rtsa ba dang /_shu dag dang /_shi kru dang /_byi'u rug pa dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang chu'i nang du bskol te/_til mar nyi tshe lus pa snar blugs na/_cham pa yal bar bor ba las sna las rnag 'dzag
[\[267b.3\]]pa'i lud sel to//_//da ni lce nad kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/_de la lce nad ni rnam pa gsum ste/_rlung las gyur pa'i lce nad ni/_kha zas kyi ro mi tshor zhing slo slo bor gyur pa dang /_'gags pa dang /_shwing a sha ka'i lo ma bzhin du dmar ba rnams
[\[267b.4\]]yin no/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/_lce rtsub cing tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug la tsag tsag tsha ba yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/_lce ril gyis stug po bem bem por 'dug pa yin no/_/de ltar lce bem bem por gyur pa la
[\[267b.5\]]ni/_lce bzhar zhing nad khrag ngan pa phyung la nad gzhi gang las gyur pa dang sbyar te/_nad gzhi so so'i sman gyi sde tshan las snar blugs pa dang /_mkhur ba bkang zhing phyir dbo ba dang /_lce la bsku ba rnams kyi cho ga bya'o//_//da ni swo na ba'i cho ga
[\[267b.6\]]bshad de/_so nad zug cing na ba dang /_brtse ba rnam pa gnyis ni/_rlung las gyur pa yin te/_de gnyis la yang /_mar ram til mar rlung sman dang sbyar ba dron po'am/_rlung sman bskol ba'i khu ba dron pos kha bshal zhing phyir dbo ba'am yang na pu tse
[\[267b.7\]]shel dang /_gla sgang dang /_te dzo ba ti dang /_pa tha dang /_yung dang /_skyer pa dang /_seng phrom dang /_ru rta dang /_sa mang+ga rnams kyi phye mas so drud na/_so'i drud g.ya' ba dang /_so khrag 'dzag pa dang zug cing na ba rnams sel to/_/bca' ldan
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]zhing kha nas 'brum pa 'byung ba ni/_khrag dang mkhris pa 'khrugs pa las 'gyur te/_de la ni khrag dbyung ba dang /_bkru sman btang ba dang /_mar dang /_til mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_'o ma dang /_ba gcin rnams las gang
[\[268a.2\]]yang rung bas kha bkang la ring du bzhag la phyir dbo'o/_/yang na sna ma'i lo ma dang /_sle tres dang/_rgun dang /_byi tsher dang /_skyer pa dang /_'bras bu gsum po rnams bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bas mkhur ba bkang zhing byir
[\[268a.3\]]pho na tsha ldan zhing khar 'brum pa byung pa sel to/_/rkan gyi phug nas lce'u chung 'dug pa'am skrangs pa'i nad ni/_bad kan dang /_khrag 'khrugs pa las gyur pa yin te/_de ni brtol la/_tsha ba gsum dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_shu dag dang /_sbrang
[\[268a.4\]]rtsi rnams sbyar ba khar bzhag cing khu ba phyir dbo bas bad kan drang bar bya'o//_//lkog ma'i nad sha lu ka zhes bya ba/_lkog ma'i nang du 'brum pa rgya shug gi 'bras bu 'dra ba ril ril por 'byung ba ni/_bad kan las gyur pa yin te/_de'i cho ga ni gtar
[\[268a.5\]]ba'i dpyad mdzub mo gtsags bu phre'u bcings pas brtol te/_snga ma bzhin du de dang 'phrod pa'i sman mur zhing /_khu ba phyir dbo bar bya'o/_/lkog ma'i nad ro hi ni zhes bya ba/_lkog ma'i nang du sha lhag myu gu ltar skye ba ring po zhig 'byung ba ni nad
[\[268a.6\]]gzhi gsum po re re dang /_kun 'dus pa dang /_khrag gi nyes pa rnams las gyur pa yin te/_so so'i mtshan ma'i sgo nas rtogs par bya'o/_/de'i cho ga mchis te cher skyes na/_srog la yang 'bab par byed pas na cho ga myur te bya'o/_/de la
[\[268a.7\]]cho ga ni de dag thams cad la yang gtar ga bya zhing khrag phyung la/_nad gzhi so so gang las gyur pa'i sman sbyar bas kha na bzhag bzhag cing bad kan drang bar bya'o/_/de las rlung las gyur pa la ni/_rgyam tsha dang /_kha ru tsha dang /_rtsabs
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]ru tsha rnams sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba khar bzhag cing khu ba phyir dbo bar bya'o/_/mkhris pa dang/_khrag las gyur pa la ni/_kha ra dang /_rma shing gi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba kha na bzhag cing /_bad kan las gyur pa la ni/_khyim gyi du ba dang /
[\[268b.2\]]tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba khar bzhag cing khu ba phyir dbo bar bya'o/_/sman ra sna dang /_kha ru tsha dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_khyim gyi du ba dang /_gla sgang dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/_khar
[\[268b.3\]]bzhag cing khu ba phyir pho na yang /_lkog ma'i nad do cog 'byong bar byed do/_/yang na rgyam tsha dang /_ba bla dang /_ldong ros dang /_rgya skyegs dang /_skyer pa rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te khar bzhag cing bad kan drang ba ni/_lkog ma'i nad rnams dang /
[\[268b.4\]]kha nad rnams sel ba'i mchog yin no/_/shing tsha dang /_sug smel dang /_gan d+ha pa tra dang /_na le sham dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /_shing pa ta'i thal ba dang /_shing ku sha'i thal ba dang /_tsha ba rnam lnga la pi pi ling dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa
[\[268b.5\]]ba dang /_dbyi mo dang /_kru trug tres dang /_bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang chu bskol te tshos par byas nas phyir phyung ba dang sbyar te/_ri lur byas pa khar bzhag cing khu ba phyir pho na yang lkog ma'i nad sel to/_/skyer pa'i rtsa ba'i shun lpags dang /_te
[\[268b.6\]]dzo ba ti dang /_pi pi ling dang /_skyer khaN+Da rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du bu ram bskol ba dang sbyar te ri lur byas pa khar bzhag cing khu ba phyir pho na yang lkog ma'i nad rnams dang khar 'brum pa 'byung ba'i nad rnams sel to/_/dug mo nyung dang /_bong dkar
[\[268b.7\]]bo dang /_thang shing dang /_pa tha dang /_pu tse shel dang /_gla sgang rnams ba gcin gyi nang du bskol la bzhi cha lus pa bsgrangs te btsags nas sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'thungs na yang lkog ma'i nad sel to//_//da ni klad pa'i nad kyi bye brag bshad de/_rlung
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad ni/_klad pa stong par 'dug pa snyam byed pa dang zug cing na ba yin no/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa ni shin tu tsha ba yin no/_/bad kan las gyur pa ni lci ba bem bem por 'dug pa yin no/_/gsum
[\[269a.2\]]char 'dus pa las gyur pa ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/_/klad pa'i nang na srin bu yod pa'i nad ni g.ya' zhing zug ste na ba yin no/_/klad pa'i nad nyi ma bzhin du 'khor ba zhes bya ba nyi ma shar nas ldang ba nyi ma nub nas zhi bar 'gyur ba
[\[269a.3\]]dang /_klad pa'i phyed na ba dang 'di gnyis ni rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur par shes par bya'o/_/klad pa'i nad za 'gram du zug cing mi bzad par na ba ni/_rlung dang /_khrag dang /_bad kan las gyur pa yin te gsor mi rung gi spang bar bya'o/_/de la
[\[269a.4\]]rlung las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad la ni/_rlung nad gso ba'i sman gyi cho ga rnams bya'o/_/yang na rlung sel ba'i sman gyi khu ba las gzhi blangs te sbyar thug ces bya ba/_'bras dang til dang mon sran sde'u gsum bsres pa'i thug pa'am/_'bras kyi 'o
[\[269a.5\]]thug la sogs pas mgo bsku zhing dugs par bya'o/_/yang na pi pi ling dang /_ru rta dang /_shu ti dang /_ut+pal dang /_tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma/_shing karko ta'i khu ba dang /_til mar gyi nang du bskol te/_til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags
[\[269a.6\]]pa snar blugs so/_/yang na sman gyi phye ma dang /_sman gyi khu ba rnams mar dang sbyar te mgor bsku bar bya'o/_/yang na shing mngar dang /_ba bla dang /_ra sna dang rtsa ba bcu pa rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_mar gyi nang du sman 'tsho byed ces bya ba sman
[\[269a.7\]]bcu la sogs pa sman ro mngar ba rnams kyi phye ma bskol la mar nyi tsha lus pa btsags pa las ran par 'thungs na/_nam tshong yan chad kyi nad thams cad sel to/_/dzi ba ka dang /_zangs rtsi ba dang /_rgun dang /_kha ra dang /_shing mngar dang /
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]ba la dang /_ut+pal rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang /_'o ma phyed ma'i nang du bskol la til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te ran par snar blugs na rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad sel to/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad la ni/_ba la dang/
[\[269b.2\]]stag gi sen mo dang /_pu shel tse dang /_shing mngar dang /_ut+pal dang /_tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma'o ma dang lhan cig tu btags te mgor bsku'o/_/yang na 'o ma'am/_sman bsil ba'i khu ba la sogs pa mgo bor blugs so/_/yang na shing
[\[269b.3\]]tsha dang /_gan+d+ha pa tra dang /_kha ra rnams kyi phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar te btsags nas snar blugs so/_/yang na rgun dang /_kha ra dang /_shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma mar dang 'o ma'i nang du bskol la/_mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te
[\[269b.4\]]snar blugs so/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i mgo bo'i nad kyis nyam thag pa la ni/_sngar shing ma d+ha ka'i snying po cham chom du brdungs te bskol ba'i phur mas phur bas klad pa dugs kyis bdug gam/_yang na thang shing dang /_ro hi sha dang /_sha
[\[269b.5\]]raM ga ta dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_sgron shing rnams kyi phye ma chu dang lhan cig tu btags pas mgo bskus la/_de'i 'og tu sman snar blugs pas sna nas chu ser dbyung bar bya'o/_/de la sna las chu ser 'byung ba'i sman ni/_shu ti dang /_e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang /
[\[269b.6\]]shu dag dang /_rgya spos dang /_bya g+h+ri'i 'bras bu rnams kyi phye ma/_til mar dang chu'i nang du bskol la til mar nyi tshe lus pa snar blugs na/_rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nad rab rib dang /_nam tshong yan chad kyi nad thams cad sel to/_/
[\[269b.7\]]nad gzhi gsum ga las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad yod pa la ni mar rnying pa btung bar bya'o/_/yang na nad gzhi gsum la phan pa'i sman gyi cho ga gang yin pa rnams kyang bya'o/_/srin bu las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad yod pa la/_tsha ba gsum dang /_rgya spos
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]dang /_shig gru'i sa bon rnams bskol ba'i khu ba snar blugs na srin bu sel to/_/yang na shing a ba marga'i 'bras bu dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_yung dang /_bsha' ba dang /_shing kun dang /_byi dong ka rnams kyi phye ma ba
[\[270a.2\]]gcin dang til mar gyi nang du bskol la/_til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te snar blugs na srin bu sel to/_/grang ba'i nad nyi ma shar nas nub kyi bar du na ba dang klad pa'i phyed na ba gnyis la ni/_thal tres dang /_shing mngar dang /_ru rta rnams kyi
[\[270a.3\]]phye ma rtsabs skyur po dang sbyar te mgor byug go/_/yang na rlung dang mkhris pa la phan pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu bas mgor blug par bya'o/_/kha zas ni zhi ti'u la sogs pa rlung dang mkhris pa la phan pa'i kha zas bza' bar bya'o/_/sna ma'i thal ba dang /
[\[270a.4\]]gla sgang dang /_shing tsha dang /_ras bal gyi 'bras bu rnams bskol ba'i khu ba'am/_yang na shing mngar gyi phye ma mar dang bskol la btsags te snar blugs na klad pa'i nad thams cad sel to/_/yang na bca' sga dang /_byi dong ka dang /_shing mngar
[\[270a.5\]]rnams kyi phye ma/_b+h+ring ga rA dza bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_mar gyi nang du bskol ba las thigs pa drug snar blugs na nam tshong yan chad kyi nad thams cad sel to//_//da ni skra dkar po'i rtsi bshad de/_pra puN+Da ri ka dang /_shing mngar dang /
[\[270a.6\]]pi pi ling dang /_u t+pal dang /_tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma skyu ru ra bskol ba'i khu ba dang til mar gyi nang du bskol la til nyi tshe lus pa snar blugs na/_skra dkar ba dang /_skra ser ba med par byed do/_/yang na sman ram dang /_she lu dang /_til dang /
[\[270a.7\]]ba ru ra rnams kyi mar b+h+ri ng+ga rA dza dang /_ni li dang /_ku ran d+ha dang /_shri sha rnams kyi khu ba dang bskol te mar nyi tshe lus pa las rtag tu snar blugs na skra dkar med par gyur/_rma bya'i mkhris pa dang /_pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /_shing la ko dang /_ma ta
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]yan ti dang /_stong zil dang /_ut+pal dang /_ni li dang /_b+h+ring+ga rA dza dang /_nag tshur rnams kyi phye ma ba ru ra'i mar dang chu'i nang du bskol te/_ba ru ra'i mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags la zla ba gcig gi bar du lcags kyi snod du bzhag ste/_mgo la bsku
[\[270b.2\]]zhing snar blugs na/_de ma thag tu dus la ma bab par skra dkar ba dang /_dus la ba ba ste skra dkar ba med par byed do/_/lcags kyi phye ma dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_'bras rnams rtsabs skyur po dang /_tshwa dang /_zho kha chu rnams gang yang rung ba'i nang
[\[270b.3\]]du bskol bas nub mo mgo la byugs la/_nang par 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu bas bkrus na skra nag por 'gyur ro/_/skra 'khor ling du byi ba la ni/_sman sra ha ta'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te bskus na skye bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na 'ol ma se'i rtsa ba
[\[270b.4\]]dang /_'bras bu gang yang rung ba ba gcin dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na go bye'i khu bas byug par bya'o/_/shing pa ta'i myu gu dang /_b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i phye ma sle tres kyi khu ba dang sbyar te nyi tshan gyi drod kyis bsros pas bskus na yang skra mi skye ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[270b.5\]]mig nad la phan par 'dod pas ni rtag tu mar btung ba dang /_'bras bu gsum gyi sman sbyar ba dang /_gtar ga gdab pa dang /_bkru sman btang zhing kha zas su 'bras dang /_mon sran sde'u dang /_nas dang /_ri dwags skam sa na gnas pa'i sha
[\[270b.6\]]bza' bar bya'o/_/mig sman gyi rgyud kyi le'u rtsa drug pa rdzogs so//_//sman dpyad gces pa grub pa zhes bya ba/_bam po bdun pa ste tha ma'o//_//de nas dug gso ba'i rgyud kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/_/dug ni rtsi dug dang /_sdig sbrul
[\[270b.7\]]gyi za dug dang rnam pa gnyis so/_/de la rtsi dug ni rtsa ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin/_phyi ma ni sbrul la sogs pa las byung ba yin no/_/dug la phan gnod rnam pa bcu yod de/_ya nga ba dang /_ro mi bro ba dang /_cha phras te rtsar 'gro ba dang /_rtsub
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]pa dang /_drod che ba dang /_myur ba dang /_khyab pa dang /_bad kan sdud cing 'dren pa dang /_dri sbyor ba dang /_rno ba rnams yin par bshad do/_/sbrul ni mgo che ba'i rigs dang /_lus 'khyil ba'i rigs dang /_khra bo'i rigs
[\[271a.2\]]'di gsum gyi bye brag las/_rlung gi rang bzhin can dang /_mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can dang /_bad kan gyi rang bzhin can dang gsum yod par bshad de/_go rim bzhin du so sor sbyar ro/_/rigs 'dres pa ni mtshan ma gnyis gnyis 'dres pa dang
[\[271a.3\]]ldan pa yin no/_/de la sbrul mgo chen po'i rigs kyis zin pa ni/_rma kha gnag pa yin no/_/rlung nad kyi rnam grangs dang /_mtshan ma thams cad bskyed do/_/sbrul lus 'khyil ba'i rigs kyis zin pa ni/_rma kha che la mdog ser zhing skrangs
[\[271a.4\]]pa yin te/_mkhris pa'i nad gyi sna grangs dang mtshan ma thams cad skyed do/_/sbrul khra bo'i rigs kyis zin pa ni/_rma dbal skya zhing /_skrangs pa myur du 'dzub tu mi btub la 'byil zhing snum pa dang /_khrag 'dzag pa shin tu bska ba rnams yin te/
[\[271a.5\]]bad kan gyi nad kyi sna grangs dang /_mtshan ma thams cad skyed do/_/rgyu skar mchu dang /_lag dang /_smin drug dang /_skag dang /_bra nye dang /_gre dang /_chu stod dang /_khrums smad rnams kyi nyin par sbrul gyis zin pa ni shin tu bsgrims na
[\[271a.6\]]'ga' zhig 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/tshes bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_drug dang /_dgu dang /_nyi shu dgu dang /_dus tshigs gnyis te/_nam langs ka dang /_nam tshab tshub dang /_'di rnams kyi dus su sbrul gyis zin pa yang mi bzad pa yin par bshad do/_/
[\[271a.7\]]sbrul gyis zin pa las/_skra 'byi ba dang /_lus phrugs sam blud na/_rjes mi snang ba dang /_shin tu grang mos kyang ba spu mi ldang zhing /_grang 'brum mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni sbang bar bya'o/_/de la thog ma zin ma thag tu snying la dug mi 'dzin par bsrung
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]ba'i phyir smyur te mar sbyin no/_/de nas gang zin pa bcing ba dang /_brdabs ru la sogs pas gzhib cing drang ba dang /_gar zin pa chu bkor du bcas pa dang /_rma kha bsreg pa dang /_rma kha dang /_nyen kor nas gtar zhing khrag dbyung ba rnams bya bar bshad do/_/
[\[271b.2\]]de la sbrul mgo chen po'i rigs kyis zin pa la ni/_nir rgun thi dang /_shwe ti'i khu ba 'thungs na sel bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na srin bu ba ra dza'i rtsa ba'i phye ma rang gi khu ba dang brdzis te skams la slar yang brdzi zhing bskam pa de lta bur lan mang du bskol te btung bar
[\[271b.3\]]bya'o/_/sbrul lus 'khyil ba'i rigs kyis zin pa la ni/_shing ba ta'i yal ga'i thor to dang /_btsod dang /_dzi ba ka dang /_zangs tsi ba dang /_kha ra dang /_taM ba la dang /_shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba'am chu bskol te bsgrangs ba dang
[\[271b.4\]]sbyar ba btung ngo /_/sbrul khro bo'i rigs kyis zin pa la ni/_ha re Nu ka dang /_ru rta dang /_rgya spos dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_pu tse shel dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_shing mngar dang /_khyim gyi dud pa rnams kyi phye ma chu bskol ba grang mo dang sbyar te 'thungs na
[\[271b.5\]]dug sel bar byed do/_/spang spos dang /_tsan dan dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_pi pi ling dang /_shing mngar dang /_na le sham dang /_ut+pal dang /_ba lang gi mkhris pa rnams kyi phye ma chu dang sbyar te btsags la mig bskus na dug gis phog ste brgyal ba slar
[\[271b.6\]]langs par 'gyur ro/_/yang na na k+ta ma la dang /_po son cha dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_bilba'i rtsa ba dang /_yung dang /_skyer pa dang /_byi'u rug gi me tog dang /_'di rnams phye ma ra gcin dang sbyar te btsags pas mig bskus na yang slar dran par
[\[271b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/ma yu ra ka'i sa bon dang /_shi ri sha'i sa bon dang /_rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma 'am/_yang na nas dang /_po son cha'i sa bon dang /_pa ta rnams kyi phye ma chu dang sbyar te btsags pa snar blugs na yang slar dran par 'gyur ro/_/sman karko ta'i
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]rtsa ba'i phye ma ra gcin gyis lan mang du bsgos la/_rtsabs dang lhan cig tu btags te btsags pa stsar blugs na yang dug gis sems nyams par byas pa las slar dran par 'gyur ro/_/shi ri sha dang /_a rish+ta dang /_nak+ta
[\[272a.2\]]ma la dang /_ba la dang /_do dasha ta ka'i 'bras bu rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang lhan cig tu btags te btsags pa ni dug sman gyi mchog yin te/_btung ba la sogs pa byas na dug sel bar byed do/_/a ko ta dang /_a rish+ta dang /_d+ha dur dang /
[\[272a.3\]]snu hak+Shi ri dang /_karany+dza dang /_a sho ma ra dang /_pu na rna ba dang /_kru trug tres dang /_pha li dang /_sna ma'i me tog dang /_dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang /_arka rnams sbyar ba yang dug sman chen po yin no/_/rgya spos dang /_na le sham dang /
[\[272a.4\]]ldong res dang /_thang shing dang /_nak+tam la dang /_arka dang /_yung dang /_skyer pa dang /_shi ri sha dang /_pi pi ling rnams sbyar ba yang dug sman yin te/_dug sel bar byed do/_/sku ba ro kha ba'i sa bon ba lang gi mkhris pa dang lhan cig tu btags
[\[272a.5\]]pa 'di ni tshangs pa'i dug sman zhes bya ste btung ba la sogs pa byas na dug thams cad sel to/_/shi ri shi'i rtsa ba dang /_shun lpags dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_sa bon rnam pa 'di lnga ba gcin dang lhan cig tu btags pa'i sman 'di
[\[272a.6\]]yang dug sel ba yin no/_/btsod dang /_sug smel dang /_yung dang /_skyer pa dang /_rgya skyegs dang /_spang spos dang /_shing mngar dang /_ha re Nu ka rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'di yang dug sman yin te/_dug sel ba dang /_brgyal
[\[272a.7\]]ba las slar dran par byed pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed do/_/lan tshwa rnam pa lnga dang /_shing nye rong dang /_dan+ti mu la dang /_ba shi la dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_yung dang /_skyer pa dang /_btsod rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i dug
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]sman dwa'i nang du bzhag pa yang las thams cad byed pa yin no/_/tsan dan dang /_ba bla dang /_ldong ros dang /_ru rta dang /_shing tsha dang /_gan+d+ha pa tra dang /_sug smel dang /_gla sgang dang /_yungs kar dang /_spang spos dang /_shug pa dang /_rgya
[\[272b.2\]]spos dang /_gur gum dang /_bye'u rug pa dang /_e ka hA dang /_smyig rkang dang /_spri ka dang /_shing kun dang /_ba la ka dang /_la mats+tsha dang /_shu ti dang /_gan+d+ha pri yaM ku rnams kyi phye ma sbyar ba'i dug sman gyi ming ni/_zla shar zhes bya ste dug thams cad
[\[272b.3\]]'joms par byed do/_/shing nye rong dang /_nAg ge sar dang /_pa ta li dang /_pi piling dang /_btsod dang /_ki ni hi dang /_ldong ros dang /_go byi tar dang /_na le sham dang /_rgya spos dang /_yung dang /_skyer pa dang /_pog dkar po dang /_a pa ra
[\[272b.4\]]dzi ta dang /_briha tI dang /_shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang lhan cig btags pa'i dug sman 'di'i ming ni/_nyi shar zhes bya ste/_dug dang gdon thub po/_/i shwar dang /_chu shing dang /_nagi dang /_tsan dra dang /_shwe ta dang /_mon sne'u
[\[272b.5\]]dmar ru dang /_nirgun+ti rnams sbyar ba'am/_yang na re re yang rung ste dug gsod pa'i mchog yin no/_/rgya skyegs shing gi thal ba pa chu dang sbyar te btsags la dri ma dang snyigs ma bor ba'i nang du/_ha re Nu ka dang /_ru rta dang /_rgya spos dang /_tsha ba
[\[272b.6\]]gsum dang /_bye'u rug pa dang /_thal tres dang /_gla sgang dang /_spang spos dang /_shing kun dang /_yung dang /_skyer pa dang /_shing mngar dang /_byi dang ga dang rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma bskol te gzar bu la chags su btub pa tsam du tshos nas/
[\[272b.7\]]rwa'i nang du bzhag pa las nang re bzhin rgya shug gi 'brum bu tsam re re 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba'am/_'o ma'am char pa'i chu gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na dug gi mthu chen po yang sel cing /_gcong dang /_skran dang /_dmu rdzings dang /_gzhang
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]'brum dang /_gcin snyi ba'i nad dang /_drod chung ba dang /_rims rnams med par byed do/_/yang na dug 'thungs pa la/_ba lang gi gci ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i skyug sman blud de skyug tu gzhug go/_dug sman gyi sbyor ba mang
[\[273a.2\]]po rnams las gang gtang yang rung ste/_thog mar snying la dug mi 'dzin par bsrung ba'i phyir smyur te mar blud par bya'o/_/rtsa ba'i dug dang /_mda' dug can gyis rmas pa la ni/_yung dang /_rgyam tshwa dang /_sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar ba'i mar mchog tu bzang ste btung
[\[273a.3\]]bar bya'o/_/zangs dang /_gser gyi phye ma khar dang sbrang rtsis sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na dug sbyar ma shin tu drag po thams cad kyang zhi bar byed do/_/sdig pas zin pa la ni shing tA la'i lo ma dang /_nim+pa'i lo ma dang /_skra dang /_ras rnying pa rnams mar dang sbyar te bsregs
[\[273a.4\]]pa'i dud pa'am/_yang na rma bya'i sgro 'o ma dang skyar te bsregs pa'i dud pas bdugs par bya'o/_/yang na pa la sha'i sa bon shing arka'i 'o ma dang lhan gcig btags pa'i lde khu dang /_yang na pi pi ling dang shi ri sha'i 'bras bu sbyar ba'i lde gus rma khar skus na
[\[273a.5\]]sdig pa'i dug gis nyam thag pa sel to/_/yang na ldong ros dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_shing kun dang /_sna ma'i lo ma dang /_bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma ba lang gi lci ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te btang la ri lu byas pa yang sdig pa'i dug gis nyam thag pa sel to/_/byi ba'i
[\[273a.6\]]sos zin pa'i dug la ni/_til gyi rtsa ba dang /_karko ta'i rtsa ba dang /_til ka'i rtsa ba dang /_gi karni ka'i rtsa ba rnams [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]phye ma kha ra dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar dang /_sbyar te 'thung na byi bas zin pa'i dug sel to/_/yang
[\[273a.7\]]na byi bas zin pa'i dug la/_ha tsa ra'i rtsa ba'i phye ma dang /_sbrang rtsi 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na ti la ka'i me tog gam lo ma gang yang rung ba 'o ma dang /_lhan cig tu btags te btung bar
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]bya'o/_/yang na byi la'i sha'am/_ne'u le'i sha gang yang rung ba btsos pa'i khu ba 'thungs na/_byi bas zin pa'i dug bla gnyan gyi nad dang bcas pa yang myur du sel to/_/khyi smyon gyis zos pa la ni/_shing a ko ta'i yal ga'i thor to dang rtsa ba bskol te
[\[273b.2\]]gdus pa'i khu ba srang gsum gyi nang du zhun mar srang gcig btab ste 'thungs na khyi smyon gyis zin pa'i dug sel to/_/yang na bu mar dang /_til btags pa'i phye ma shing arka'i 'o ma dang til mar gyis sbyar te 'thungs na khyi so gdug pas zin pa'i
[\[273b.3\]]dug 'tsho dka' ba yang myur du sel bar byed do/_/srog chags phra mo'o cog gis zin pa'i dug sman ni/_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /_swa rtsi ka'i thal ba dang /_tsha ba gsum dang /_shu dag dang /_shing kun dang /_byi dang ka dang /_rgyam tsha
[\[273b.4\]]dang /_rgya spos dang /_aM brta dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_ru rta rnams kyi phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu bar btab cing bsku bar bya'o/_/shing nye rong gi rtsa ba dang /_mon sne'u dmar ru'i phye ma cha bsnyams te/_mar dang sbyar ba 'thungs na yang srog
[\[273b.5\]]chags phra mo thams cad kyi dug shin tu mthu che ba yang myur du sel lo/_/yang phug ron gyi rtug pa dang /_dan ti mul dang /_ba lang gi so dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_shing nye rong dang /_le brgan rtsi'i sa bon dang /_slu ha shiri dang /_kru trug tres dang /
[\[273b.6\]]karni kar rnams sbyar ba yang srog chags phra mo'i dug sel ba'i mchog yin no/_/tsan dan dang /_shug pa dang /_ru rta dang /_rgya spos dang /_pu shel tse dang /_pa ta la dang /_nirgun thi dang /_thal tres dang /_she lu rnams sbyar ba ni srog chags
[\[273b.7\]]phra mos kha dug go cog gi dug sel ba'i sman yin no/_/ka pit+tha dang /_pa ta li dang /_she lu dang /_shi ri sha dang /_pu na rna ba rnam gnyis dang /_shwe ta rnam gnyis dang /_'di rnams sbyar ba yang srog chags phra mos kha dug go cog gi dug thams cad
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]sel ba'i sman yin no/_/sdig pas zin pa'i dug ma gtogs pa dug gis nyam thag pa gzhan thams cad la ni/_kha zas dang /_sman la sogs pa bsil ba'i cho ga rnams bya'o/_/dug gis phog go cog la khro ba dang /_nyi ma la
[\[274a.2\]]'dug pa dang /_nyin bar nyal ba dang /_nyal po rnams byar mi rung ngo /_/dug gis phog pa las rims la sogs pa'i bla gnyan gyi nad gzhan gyis thebs pa rnams la ni so so'i sman gang yin pa smyur te gso bar bya'o/_/dug gis nyam thag pa rnams
[\[274a.3\]]la kha zas kyang tsha ba bskyed par mi 'gyur ba rnams bza' zhing btung bar bya'o/_/dug gso ba'i rgyud kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so//_//de nas sman bcud kyis len dang /_ro tsa bar bya ba'i rgyud kyi le'u ba shad par bya'o/_/de la sman
[\[274a.4\]]gang skra dkar ba dang /_na ba med bar byed ba de ni bcud kyis len zhes bya ba yin no/_/de yang na tshong dang /_pho gzhon nu'i tshe'am/_yang na bar ma'i tshe bsgrub par bya ste/_sngar skyug sman dang /_bkru sman dang /_khrus la sogs pas lus kyi phyi nang dag
[\[274a.5\]]par byas nas brtsam par bya'o/_/de la sgrub pa'i thabs ni/_mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_lcags kyi phye ma dang /_skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu'i phye ma rnams sbyar pas bum pa bkang la/_lo phyed kyi bar du nas kyi dkyil du bzhag pa las rgyun tu bran par zos
[\[274a.6\]]na/_skra dkar por gyur pa med par byed do/_/yang na a ru ra dang /_pi pi ling dang /_byi dang ga dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_kha ra rnams kyi phye ma dang /_lcags kyi phye ma rnams mar dang til mar dang sbyar te zos na rgas pas mi tshugs so/_/byi dang ga dang /
[\[274a.7\]]sa p+ta par+Na dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_lcags byi bye ma rnams sbrang rtsi dang /_mar dang /_til mar rnams dang sbyar ba ji ste mis zos nas gzhon nur gyur pa de ni ngo mtshar mi che'o/_/byi dang ka dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma dang /
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]lcags kyi phye ma rnams mar dang /_kha ra dang /_sbrang rtsi rnams dang sbyar te rgyun tu zos na yang rgas pa dang /_skra dkar por gyur pa sel to/_/lcags kyi phye ma dang /_kha ra dang /_bca' sga dang /_pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma dang /_mar dang /_til mar
[\[274b.2\]]rnams 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du blugs te/_gzar bu la chags su btub pa tsam du bskol ba yang sman bcud kyis len du 'gyur ro/_/lcags glebs te dmar por bsregs la 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du smyug cing
[\[274b.3\]]khol bcad par bya ba de lta bur lan mang du byas pa'i lcags te se brdar gyis brdar ba'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang mar dang sbyar te zos na yang tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na skyu ru ra bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_mar sbrang rtsi rnams cha bsnyams te srang brgya brgya dang /_lcags
[\[274b.4\]]kyi phye ma srang nyis brgya dang /_'di rnams sbyar ba lcags kyi snod du blugs te bzhag pa yang tshe ring bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/drub mar chang dang /_'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma dang /_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na yang /_gshin rje'i snga ltas skra dkar
[\[274b.5\]]por gyur ba med par byed do/_/byi dang ga'i phye ma dang /_mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_lcags kyi phye ma rnams cha bsnyams te sbyar ba bum pa'i nang du blugs la/_mon sran sde'u'i dkyil du bzhag pa las ran par zos na/_skra mthing gar 'gyur zhing stobs
[\[274b.6\]]dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/taM pa la phye ma srang brgya dang /_mar dang /_sbrang rtsi srang brgya sbyar te zla ba gcig gi bar du snod kyi nang du bzhag pa las/_rgyun tu zos la kha zas 'o ma dang ldan par zos na skra dkar po med par byed cing zla ba bzhin du mdzes par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[274b.7\]]sman par hi'i rtsa ba'i phye ma srang brgya sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/_mthar gyis za zhing 'o mas phul la kha zas 'o ma dang mar dang ldan par za zhing /_nan tan du byas na lang tsho dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/yang na zla ba gcig gi bar du sman ba ra hi zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma sbrang
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu zos la/_de'i 'og tu ba ra hi'i phyi ma 'o ma dang bskol te bsgrangs la btsags pa 'thungs na yang sman bcud kyi len du 'gyur ro/_/pu na rna ba'i rtsa ba zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma srang phyed 'o ma bskol te phyung ba'i nang du btab
[\[275a.2\]]ste zla ba gnyis sam lo gcig gi bar du rgyun du 'thungs na yang rga ba med par 'gyur ro/_/nye 'u shing dang /_sab+ta bar+Na dang /_pu shel tse dang /_pa tha dang /_ba la dang /_na ga ba la dang /_bi di ra dang /_thal tres dang /_bya g+t+ri rnams kyang re re nas bun
[\[275a.3\]]rna ba'i cho ga gong du bshad pa bzhin du byas na/_yon tan de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/sha skye bar 'dod pa la ni/_zla ba phyed kyi bar du/_sman a sho gan+d+ha'i phye ma/_til mar dang /_mar dang 'o ma dang /_chu bskol ba dron so rnams las gang yang rung ba dang
[\[275a.4\]]sbyar te 'thungs nas kha zas 'phrod pa bza' bar bya'o/_/sman bcud kyis len sgrub par 'dod pa rnams kyis ni/_rtag tu kha zas 'bras zhag drug cus smin pa'i chan 'o ma dang /_mon sran sde'u'i khu bcud dang /_rkang 'gros dang /_ri dwags skams na
[\[275a.5\]]gnas pa'i sha khu rnams las gang yang rung ba dang bsreg cing bza' bar bya'o/_/ro tsa bar bya ba'i cho ga ni/_shing mngar gyi phye ma zho gnyis mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/_rtag tu zos la de'i rjes la 'o ma 'thungs na rgan po yang ro tsa bar byed do/_/mon
[\[275a.6\]]swan sde'u srang re re cho ga gong ma ltar byas na yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/ad+ma gup+ta'i sa bon dang /_gze ma'i rtsa ba dang /_kha ra rnams kyi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na sman uts+tsha de'i phye ma kha ra dang /_'o ma dang sbyar ba 'thungs na yang /_ro tsa bar 'gyur
[\[275a.7\]]ro/_/byi da ra'i phye ma de nyid kyi khu bas lan mang du bsgos pa btags te/_mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gus ni shin tu ro tsa bar bshad do/_/ra dug pa'i ldag pa'i 'bras bu 'o ma'i nang du legs par btsos te zhu bar byas pa'i nang du/_til lan mang du
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]bsgos pa zos ba'i rjes la/_'o ma 'thungs pa gang yin pa de'i pho mtshan rtag tu bsgreng bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na mon sran sde'u shun lpags bshus te zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma 'o ma dang mar gyi nang du bskol te/_thug pa bska rab tu gyur nas phyung la
[\[275b.2\]]bsgrangs te sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i ri lu shing bilba'i 'bras bu tsam du byas pa nyin gcig bzhin du zos na yang /_pho mtshan bsgreng zhing nyal po nus par 'gyur ro/_/'bras phye'i nang du til dang /_ad+ma gup+ta dang /_mon sran sde'u rnams kyi phye mas bsres te/
[\[275b.3\]]'o ma dang sprus pa'i khu ba mar gyi nang du btsos pa zos na yang shin tu ro tsa bar bshad do/_/kha zas dang /_btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_rol mo sgra skad yid du 'ong ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa la sogs pa dri zhim po sna tshogs dang /_me tog dang /_phreng
[\[275b.4\]]ba dang /_gos dang /_rgyan bzang po la sogs pa yang mi ro tsa bar byed pa'i rgyu yin no/_/sman bcud kyi sa len dang /_ro tsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//de nas byis pa'i rgyud kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/_/de la bud med ni dga'
[\[275b.5\]]bar bya ste/_gnas dam pa yin la/_bu rin thang med pa bskyed pa yin pas/_de'i mo mtshan la nad byung na dga' ba dang bu 'byung ba gnyig med par 'gyur te/_de bas na de gso ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad kyi mtshan
[\[275b.6\]]ma ni/_mo mtshan na ba dang /_mdog rtsub pa dang /_yon por 'gyur ba dang /_mkhrang pa dang /_phal phal byed pa rnams yin no/_/mkhris pa 'khrugs pa'i mtshan ma las gyur pa ni/_mo mtshan tsha ba 'ur 'ur por byed pa dang /_khrag 'dzag pa dang /_rims
[\[275b.7\]]kyis 'debs pa rnams las rtogs par bya'o/_/bad kan 'khrugs pa las gyur pa'i mo mtshan g.yeng ba dang /_grang ba dang /_bem bem por 'dug pa dang /_'bras khu 'dra bar dkar zhing /_sbyin po 'byar 'byar po 'dzag pa rnams yin no/_/de la rlung
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad gso ba'i cho ga ni/_'bras kyi 'o thug gi dugs sam/_mon sran sde'u'i chan gyi dugs sam/_yang na ras ma 'jam po til mar dron po'i nang du smyugs pa'i nang du btso zhing dugs bya'o/_/mdor na rlung
[\[276a.2\]]las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad la ni/_sman mar btung ba dang /_dugs bya ba dang /_sman mas btang ba rnams bzang ngo /_/yang na mo mtshan gyi nad la ni/_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_zin thig le'i rtsa ba'i phye ma chang dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na pi pi ling dang /_u
[\[276a.3\]]bkun rtsi ka'i sa bon dang /_kha ru ch+wa rnams kyi phye mchang dang sbyar te blud do/_/pha bong gi dreg pa dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_b+ha rgi dang /_ra sna dang /_sle tres dang /_nye'u shing dang /_yung dang /_skyer pa dang /_pu na rna ba dang /_med dang /_'di rnams kyi phye
[\[276a.4\]]ma zho gnyis gnyis/_mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_'o ma mar gyi tshad kyi nang du bskol te mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa la ran par 'thungs na yang rlung las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad sel zhing /_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad la yang bzang la/
[\[276a.5\]]bu chags par byed pa'i mchog kyang yin no/_/mkhris pa 'khrugs pa las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad la ni/_khrag lud pa'i nad bsal ba'i cho ga sngar bshad pa bzhin du bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad la ni/_dong ga la sogs pa'i sde
[\[276a.6\]]tshan gyi btung ba dang /_bkru ba dang /_steng du blug pa dang /_byug pa la sogs pa thams cad bya'o/_/de ltar mo mtshan gyi nyes pa dang /_nad med par byas nas bu chags par bya ba'i thabs ni/_skyes pa snga nas sman dang kha zas bzang pos lus brta zhing
[\[276a.7\]]nyal po mi bya bar 'dug la/_bud med zla mtshan byung nas zhag bzhi lon pa'i 'og tu khrus byas nas nyal na bu 'chags par 'gyur te/_de la zla mtshan byung nas zhag bzhi lon pa dang /_zhag drug dang /_brgyad dang /_bcu dang /_bcu gnyis lon pa'i tshe/
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]nyal na bu khye'ur 'gyur ro/_/zla mtshan byung nas zhag lnga dang /_bdun dang /_dgu dang /_bcu gcig lon pa'i tshe nyal na bu mor 'gyur ro/_/de la skyes pa'i khu ba mang la bud med kyi khrag nyung na ni khye'ur 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa'i khu ba nyung la bud med
[\[276b.2\]]kyi khrag mang na ni bu mor 'gyur ro/_/zla mtshan byung nas zhag bcu lon gsum lon phan chad ni bur mi 'gyur ro/_/de la khye'ur 'gyur bar 'dod na/_rgyam tsha 'am shing pa ta'i yal ga'am rtse mo gang yang rung ba'i phye ma 'o ma dang btags te btsags pa'i khu
[\[276b.3\]]ba las thigs pa bzhi ma nyal ba'i snga rol tu bud med kyi sna g.yon par blugs na khye'ur 'gyur ro/_/bud med zla mtshan dang ldan pa'i tshe/_kha lung gi sa bon nam/_nA ga ge sar gang yang rung ba'i phye ma mar khu dang sbyar te bud med kyis 'thungs la skyes pa dang
[\[276b.4\]]nyal na yang bu chags par 'gyur ro/_/de la bu 'chags pa'i mtshan ma ni nu ma'i thor to mdog sngo skya bar 'dug na bu yod par shes par gyis shig_/de ltar sbrum mar gyur nas las drag shul can dang /_mya ngan dang /_'tsher ba dang /_khro ba'i bag bsrung zhing
[\[276b.5\]]gang yid la 'dod pa dang 'phrod pa rnams sbyin par bya'o/_/'jigs shing skrag pa dang /_brdegs shing snad pa dang kha zas dang skom po tsha ba dang brod ches bzos shing 'thungs na ni bu 'byil bar 'gyur te/_de yang khrag 'dzag cing na ba'i mtshan mas shes par
[\[276b.6\]]byas la slar gso ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/de lta bu gso ba la ni/_sman gyi khu ba grang mo lus la blugs pa dang sman gyi khu ba grang mo'i nang du 'jug pa dang sman bsil ba'i bag gis lus byugs pa rnams bzang ngo /_/gzhan yang bu 'byil du byed pa slar gso ba'i sman ni/
[\[276b.7\]]sman 'tsho byed sna bcu 'o ma dang bskol te btsags la kha ra dang sbyar te blud do/_/yang tsan dan dkar po dang /_bu tshang rto dang /_rgun dang /_bu shel tse dang /_kha ra rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_shing mngar dang /_rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang /_sug
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]smel dang /_btsod dang /_d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang kha ra rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig sbyar ba dang /_kha ra dang /_ut+pal dang /_shing mngar dang /_seng phrom dang /_tsan dan dkar po dang /_thal tres rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /
[\[277a.2\]]sman gyi sbyor ba 'di gsum las gang yang rung ba 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar te blud do/_/yang na sman gyi sde tshan sngar bshad pa'i nang nas/_ut+pal la sogs pa'i sde tshan smos pa rnams btags la/_kha ra dang 'o mar sbyar te blud do/_/yang na n+ya gro d+ha la
[\[277a.3\]]sogs pa'i sde tshan rnams kyi lo ma gzhon nu 'am/_yang na de rnams kyi shun lpags kyi phye ma gang yang rung ba kha ra dang 'o mas sbyar te blud do/_/yang na pad+ma la sogs pa'i chu'i nang nas skyes pa'i rtsa ba'i sman rnams bskol ba'i khu ba btsags pa 'bras phye dang kha
[\[277a.4\]]ras sbyar ba'am/_yang na rtsa ba'i sman de rnams 'o ma dang bskol te btsags la kha ra dang sbyar ba blud do/_/sbrum pa'i kha zas ni thog ma sbrum nas zla ba gcig dang /_gnyis dang /_gsum lon gyi bar du mngar bag dang /_bsil ba'i kha zas sbyin no/_/zla ba
[\[277a.5\]]bzhi la bab pa'i tshe ni kha zas mar dang ldan par sbyin no/_/zla ba lnga la bab pa'i tshe ni kha zas zhun mar dang 'o ma dang ldan par sbyin no/_/zla ba drug dang bdun la bab pa'i tshe ni thug pa bzang po dang /_gze ma la sogs pa'i sman mar ram/_sngar bstan pas btab pa
[\[277a.6\]]blud do/_/zla ba brgyad pa'i tshe kha zas 'o ma dang ldan par sbyin zhing /_til mar dang /_shing mngar 'o mar bskol te til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i bcud mas btang ngo /_/de phan chad kyi kha zas ni thug pa dang /_rkang 'gros dang /_ri dgas skam sa
[\[277a.7\]]na gnas pa'i sha khu snum che bas sngag cing zos na bzang ngo /_/de nas byis pa btsas na/_de'i lte bsor brgyad tsam lus pa bcad de/_chu dro 'jam tsam gyis byis pa bkrus la/_zhun mar dang /_sbrang rtsi cha mi mnyam pa mang du sbyar ba cung zad tsam khar gzhug
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]go/_/de nas gser gyi phye ma dang /_shu dag dang /_sman bram+hi dang /_a ru ra dang /_ru rta rnams kyi phye ma zhib mo zhun mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'am/_yang na gser gyi phye ma/_sman bra m+ti bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba las nyung ngu nyung ngu rgyun du
[\[277b.2\]]byin na bu de yid gzhungs shing mdog bzang bar 'ong ngo /_/bud med bu ma byung ba de ni/_thog ma bu byung nas zhag gsum mam/_zhag lnga'i bar du til mar ram/_mar khu tshod ran par blud cing /_kha zas snum bag yod pa sbyin no/_/sha ma 'byung du mi btub
[\[277b.3\]]pa la ni/_pi pi ling la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad pa rnams kyi phye ma chang dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na 'bras kyi rtsa ba'i bye ma zho gnyis tsam pa gcin rtsa bas skyur bo gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te blud na 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/zla ba grangs tshang na yang 'byung du mi btub
[\[277b.4\]]pa la ni/_shing ba du sha ka'i rtsa ba dang /_lang ga li dang /_ba sha ka rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma mar dang sbyar bas mo mtshan dang lte bar bskus na 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bu byung ba'i 'og tu bud med la nad a la ka zhes bya ba 'byung ste/_de'i mtshan ma
[\[277b.5\]]ni snying na ba dang /_klad pa dang /_klad pa chu sor zug cing na ba yin te/_de la nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal pa mar ram yang na chu bskol ba dron po gang yang rung ba dang sbyar ba'am/_yang na pi pi la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba rgyam tsha dang sbyar ba'am/
[\[277b.6\]]yang na 'u su'i 'bras bu bskol ba'i khu ba/_bu mar dang /_tsha ba gsum dang dri sna gsum zhes bya ba shing tsha dang /_sug smel dang /_gan+d+ha pa tra rnams kyi phye ma dang sbyar te blud do/_/yang na bu byung ba las nad du gyur pa la ni/_rtsa ba lnga skol ba'i khu ba'i nang
[\[277b.7\]]du lcags dmar po bsregs /_pa gzhug cing /_de lta bu lan mang du byas pa'am/_yang na chang gi nang du snga ma ltar lcags bsregs pa bcug ste blud na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bu'i ma'am/_nu ma snun pa'i ma mas kha zas dang btung ba lci ba'i bag zos shing 'thungs
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]pa dang /_dus snga phyi dang /_tshad che chung zos shing 'thungs pas rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi gsum 'khrugs nas nu zho ma rung bar gyur pa las ni bu la nad rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la nu zho rlung gis ma rung bar byas
[\[278a.2\]]pa'i mtshan ma ni/_nu zho nyid ro bska zhing chu'i nang du blugs na steng du 'byung bar 'gyur ba las rtogs par bya'o/_/nu zho mkhris pa las ma rung par byas pa'i mtshan ma ni/_nu zho ro tsha skyur/_nu zho chu'i nang du blugs na steng du ser po shar shar por 'byung ba yin
[\[278a.3\]]no/_/nu zho bad kan gyis ma rung bar byas pa'i mtshan ma ni nu zho skam zhing shin tu lci ba 'byar 'byar po chu'i nang du blugs na zhabs su 'bying ba yin no/_/nu zho nad gzhi rnams kyis ma rung bar gyur pa ma yin pa tha ma la ni chu'i nang du blugs na chu dang 'dres par
[\[278a.4\]]gyur cing mdog skya bor 'dug pa yin no/_/de la nad gzhi rnams kyis nu zho ma rung bar bur pa'i nyes pa bsal zhing slar gso ba'i thabs ni/_bu'i ma'am/_nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma thog mar mar khu blud la/_de'i 'og tu pi pi ling gi phye ma dang /_sbrang rtsi nim+pa
[\[278a.5\]]bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'i skyug sman blud de skyug tu gzhug go_/kha zas ni mon sran sde'u'i khu bcud dang /_sha khu dang ldan par sbyin no/_/yang na nu zhom rung par gyur pa la ni tshos par byed pa'i sman/_brgi dang /_thang shing dang /_shu dag dang /_pa tha dang /
[\[278a.6\]]bong nga dkar po rnams bskol ba'i khu ba'am/_yang na dang ga la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba'am/_yang na gla sgang la sogs pa sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba 'thungs pas sbyang bar bya'o/_/byis pa'i rims kyis thebs pa la ni/_'bras brngos pa dang /
[\[278a.7\]]skyer khaN+Da dang /_kha ra dang /_smyig rkang dang /_shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma cha bsnyams te/_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na rims thams cad sel to/_/yang na pi pi ling dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_bu bran shing rnams btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]ba'am/_yang na bong nga dkar po gcig bu'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na/_rims dang /_lud pa dang /_skyug pa'i nad rnams sel to/_/'bras yos dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_shing long kog rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na skyug pa'i
[\[278b.2\]]nad sel to/_/smyig rkang dang /_sbrang rtsi dang skyar ba'i lde gu byin na yang byis pa'i lud pa dang /_dbugs mi bde ba'i nad sel to/_/'bras yos dang /_rgyam tsho'i phye ma/_kha lung gi shing thog gi phye mas sbyar ba'i lde gu'am/_yang na 'bras yos dang /_kha ra dang /
[\[278b.3\]]rgyam tsha dang /_mar dang /_sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na yang skyug pa dang /_skyigs bu'i nad sel to/_/pi pi ling chen po dang /_d+haha ki dang /_seng phrom dang /_bi lnga dang /_ba la ka rnams btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'am/_yang na sman
[\[278b.4\]]de dag nyid bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba byin na byis pa'i dmu rdzings dang /_lto ba cher skyes pa sel to/_/sa maM ga dang /_d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang /_thal tres dang /_seng phrom rnams bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs la/_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te byin na yang dmu
[\[278b.5\]]rdzings sel to/_/byis pa rnams kyi mig nad dang /_ku ku la zhes bya ba dang /_bod thaka ces bya ba la ni/_la la phud dang /_byi dang ka dang /_ba li dang /_ldong ros dang /_skyer pa dang /_rgya skyegs dang /_bcag yug snam rnams kyi phye ma'i mig sman blug
[\[278b.6\]]par bya'o/_/yang na thang shing dang /_btsag dang /_bla sgang rnams kyi phye ma ra'i 'o ma dang ltan cig tu btsags pa'i lde gus mig gi phyi rol bskus na mig nad sel to/_/byis pa'i khar 'brum pa byung ste btsa' langs pa la ni/_shing a sho tha'i shun lpags
[\[278b.7\]]dang /_ru rta'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu'am/_yang na skyer pa dang /_shing mngar dang /_a ru ra dang /_sna ma'i lo ma rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba bsku bar bya'o/_/sman go'u ri dang /_shing mngar dang /_nye'u shing gi rtsa ba dang /_seng
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]phrom dang /_sa la par+Na dang /_priSh+Na par+Na dang /_ra dza dan dang /_kha ra dang /_shug pa dang /_tsan dan dang /_rgun dang /_me tog pad+ma dang /_ku mu ta dang /_ut+pal dang /_dzi ba ka dang /_zangs rtsi ba dang /_me ta dang /_bu tshang rto
[\[279a.2\]]dang /_mar nye ba dang /_thal tres rnam gnyis dang /_'di rnams kyi phye ma dang /_'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang /_shun lpags rnam lnga zhes bya ba/_shing n+ya gro d+ha'i shun lpags dang /_u dum+ba ra'i shun lpags dang /_a shwat+tha'i shun lpags dang /
[\[279a.3\]]p+lak+Sha'i shun lpags dang /_be ta'i sa'i shun lpags rnams dang /_rtsa ba lnga pa dang /_'di rnams bskol ba'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/_mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni/_go'u ri la sogs pa'i sman mar zhes bya ste/_nad dz+yo ti ka
[\[279a.4\]]zhes bya ba dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i me dbal dang /_btsa' nad khar 'brum pa 'ong ba dang /_gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bzang ste/_ran par blud na byis pa'i nad do cog sel to/_/byis pa mtshan mo gnyid log tu mi btub par ngu zhing nur mi btub pa dang /
[\[279a.5\]]dri mi zhim par gyur pa dang /_lus dang rkang lag g.yob pa la sogs pa'i tshul sna tshogs byed de/_so 'cha' zhing sen mo 'brad par byed pa rnams ni gdon nad las gyur pa yin te/_de la ni sgog skya dang /_nim+pa'i lo ma dang /_rgya skyegs dang /_smyig ma'i shun
[\[279a.6\]]lpags lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_yungs kar dang /_nim+la'i lo ma dang /_smyig ma'i shun lpags dang /_rgya skyegs rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/_sbrul gyi lpags pa brjes pa dang /_sgra dang lha la phul ba'i me tog rnyings pa dang /_yungs kar rnams
[\[279a.7\]]lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /_bdug pa sbyar ba rnam pa 'di gsum las gang yang rung ba mar dang sbyar te bsregs ba'i du bas bdugs na gdon thams cad sel to/_/shing sap+ta par+Na'i shun lpags dang /_mur+pa dang /_pu tse shel rnams btags pa'i phye ma chu dang
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]sbyar bas byis pa'i lus dril na yang gdon thams cad sel to/_/ma d+hu ka'i me tog dang /_shing a shwa t+tha dang /_sab+ta par+Na dang /_be lu ka dang /_'di rnams kyi lo ma lhan cig bskol ba'i khu ba grang mos khrus byas na yang gdon sel to/_/yang na gdon
[\[279b.2\]]zhi bar bya ba'i phyir las thams cad byed pa'i sngags 'dis gtor ma sbyin pa dang /_zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi las rnams bya ba dang /_sngags kyis sbud pa gdags pa la sogs pa bya'o/_/de la sngags ni/_na mo spag pa ste/_ga ru DA ya/_na masta ma ba ka ya/
[\[279b.3\]]sat+ya sat+ya ta nu te swA hA/_byis ba'i rgyud kyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa rdzogs so//_//de nas las rnam lnga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/las rnam pa lnga ni/_skyug sman dang /_bkru sman dang /_sman snar blugs pa dang /_bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang /
[\[279b.4\]]'jam rtsi mas btang ba rnams yin par shes par bya ste/_de dag gi cho ga bshad par bya'o/_/de la skyug sman mas btang ba'i thabs ni/_thog mar sman pas nad pa la mar dang /_til mar la sogs pa snum bag gang yang rung ba'i 'jam rtsi blud la/
[\[279b.5\]]de'i 'og tu dugs rnam lnga zhes bya ba khyim dron por lus mes bsro ba dang /_rdo bsregs pa'i steng du chu blugs pa'i rlangs pas bdug cing rngul gdon pa dang /_nyi tshan gyis bdug pa dang /_dugs kyi sman bsros pa'i phur mas dugs bya ba dang /
[\[279b.6\]]gos dang /rdo la sogs pa bsros pa'i dugs rnam pa 'di lnga gang yang rung bas lus legs par dros par byas nas gos dron po bskon te/_skyug sman btang /_rkub rten pus mor phyin tsam gyi steng du 'dug ste/_e raN+Da'i sdong bu 'am/_bya sgro la
[\[279b.7\]]sogs pa 'jam pos gre ba nas dkrug cing skyug tu gzhug go/_/de la skyug sman ni/_pi pi ling dang /_po son cha dang /_rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_shing mngar bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba 'di ni skyug sman gyi mchog yin te/
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]dron por 'og dros kyis gzung ste blud la skyug tu gzhug go_/yang na sbyar dug ces bya ba/_'bras dang til dang /_mon sran sde'u gsum bsregs pa'i thug ba/_po son cha dang /_legs par btsos pa'am/_yang na po
[\[280a.2\]]son cha'i sa bon 'o ma dang sbyar te bskol ba 'am/_yang na pi pi ling la sogs pa'i skyug sman sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa gong du smos pa rnams po son cha'i 'bras bu lnga bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te dron por 'thungs na snying tshim par skyugs par 'gyur ro/_/ku
[\[280a.3\]]ba ro kha ba dang /_thang shing dang /_dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu dang /_kri ta b+ha tan dang /_d+ha marga ba rnams kyang skyug sman yin te/_so sor po son cha dang 'dra bar sbyar ro/_/de nas skyugs pa'i rjes la/_mkhris pa byung ba dang /_lto dang /_snying kha dang /
[\[280a.4\]]mgo bo yang bar gyur na skyug sman legs pa yin no/_/'di ltar ma gyur pa ni/_skyug sman ma legs pa yin par bshad do/_/skyug pa'i tshod ma rig ste drags na nad du 'gyur te/_de'i mtshan ma ni/_snying ga na ba dang /_glo 'grams pa dang /
[\[280a.5\]]mgul pa snad pa dang /_dran pa nyams shing myos pa dang /_lus 'dar ba dang /_khrag skyugs pa rnams las rtogs par bya'o/_/de la skyug sman ni/_bad kan las gyur pa'i nad dang /_cham pa drag po dang /_gcin snyi ba'i nad dang /_mdze nad dang /
[\[280a.6\]]lkog nad lha gor dang /_dug 'thungs pa dang /_bsud pa rnams la nyams stobs dang sbyar te gtang bar bya'o/_/mig nad rab rib yod pa dang /_da mu rdzings can dang /_skran dang /_skom pa'i nad dang /_rtug skam gyi nad kyis nyam thag pa dang /
[\[280a.7\]]sbrum pa dang /_rlung nad can dang /_skya rbab kyi nad yod pa rnams la ni/_skyug sman du btang du mi rung ngo /_/bkru sman btang ba'i thabs ni/_thog mar mar dang til mar la sogs pa snum bag gang yang rung ba'i 'jam rtsi blud la/_de'i 'og tu sngar bshad pa
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]bzhin du dugs kyis lus bsros te skyug sman btang la/_de'i 'og tu bkru sman btang /_bkru sman btang ba'i thabs de ltar ma byas te cho ga log par byas na pho ba'i nad skyed par bshad do/_/de la mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi ni lto snyi'o/_/rlung dang bad kan gyi
[\[280b.2\]]rang bzhin can gyi mi ni lto sra ba yin no/_/nad gzhi rnams stobs mnyam pa'i lto ni 'bring ste/_de dag la sman gyi tshod ci rigs par dpag cing gtang bar bya'o/_/de la rlung las gyur pa'i nad kyis nyam thag pa'i mi la bkru sman btang ba'i thabs ni/_shing nye rong dang /
[\[280b.3\]]rgyam tsha dang /_ba bla/_sga rnams kyi phye ma rtsabs skyur po'am/_rkang 'gros dang /_ri dgas skam sa na gnas pa'i sha'i khu ba gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad yod pa la ni/_shing nye rong phye ma sman ro mngar ba
[\[280b.4\]]dang /_kha ba la sogs pa mkhris pa'i nad la phan pa'i sman gang yang rung ba bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i nad kyis gnod par gyur pa la ni/_'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba tsha ba gsum gyi phye
[\[280b.5\]]ma dang ba gcin gyis sbyar ba'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o/_/pi pi ling dang /_bca' sga dang /_shing nye rong dang /_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'di ni bad kan las gyur pa'i nad do cog gi bkru sman gyi mchog
[\[280b.6\]]yin te bza' bar bya'o/_/a ru ra dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma chur bskol ba'i khu ba dron po dang sbyar ba'i bkru sman lcags mda' zhes bya ba 'di ni nad do cog sel ba'i bkru sman gyi mchog yin te btung bar bya'o/_/hwags srang
[\[280b.7\]]gcig dang /_shing nye rong gi phye ma srang gcig dang /_pi pi ling gi phye ma zho gnyis te 'di rnams sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu'i bkru sman las ren par zos na yang nad do cog sel to/_/tsha ba gsum dang /_dan+da'i rtsa ba dang /_shing nye rong dang /
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]a ru ra dang /_shing dong rnams kyi phye ma dang /_dri sna gsum zhes bya ba shing cha dang /_sug smel dang /_gan+d+ha ba tra rnams kyi phye ma btab la/_bu mar dang sbyar te/_gong bur bsgongs ba'i bkru sman gyis kyang nad do cog sel to/
[\[281a.2\]]dmu rdzings la sogs pa la ni/_shing nye rong dang /_shing dod kyi phye ma/_shing snu ha'i lo mas lan mang du bsgos la/_bu mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar te dri sna gsum gyis btab pa'i lde gu'i bkru sman btang ngo /_/de nas 'khrus pa'i rjes la/_bad kan byung
[\[281a.3\]]ba dang /_bkres par gyur pa dang /_lus yang ba dang /_mdangs gsal bar gyur na bkru sman legs pa yin no/_/lus g.ya' ba dang /_lus la thig le khra bor byung ba dang /_lus lci bar gyur pa rnams ni bkru sman ma legs pa'i mtshan mar
[\[281a.4\]]shes par bya'o/_/bkru sman drags pa'i mtshan ma ni/_na ba dang /_brgyal ba dang /_gzhang 'brum 'byung ba dang /_rlung 'jug pa dang /_dran pa nyams pa dang /_sha rjen bkrus pa'i khu ba 'dra ba mthur du 'byung ba rnams yin no/_/de la bkru sman ni/
[\[281a.5\]]mdze dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_sren bu'i nad dang /_me dbal dang /_dreg dang skya sbab kyi nad yod pa rnams la gtang bar bya'o/_/zad kyi nad yod pa dang /_rid ba dang /_bud med sgrum ma rnams la ni bkru sman btang du mi rung ngo /_/skyug sman btang
[\[281a.6\]]ba las ha cang mang du skyug cing 'chad du mi btub pa la ni/_sman pas bkru sman zhim zhing yid gar 'ong ba las chung zad tsam byin na skyug pa 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/bkru sman btang ba las ha cang mang du 'khru zhing 'chad du mi btub pa la ni skyug sman cung
[\[281a.7\]]zad btab na 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/bkru sman ha cang drags pa ni/_shug pa dang /_bu shel tse dang /_nAg ge sar dang /_tsan dan rnams kyis lus byugs pa dang /_lus blugs pa dang btung ba rnams bya'o/_/sman snar blugs pa zhes bya ba ni/
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]mar dang /_til mar ram sman snar blugs pa yin te/_de yang mar ram til mar nyi tshe snar blugs pa dang /_sman mar ram sman gyi til mar blugs shing /_bad kan dang chu ser sna nas drang ba dang /_snum gyis sna'i nang du bsku ba dang /_sman gyi
[\[281b.2\]]phur ma sna sgor btsir zhing blugs pa dang /_sman gyi phye ma lce'i nang du blugs te/_snar bud pa dang /_rnam pa lnga yod par shes par bya ste/_sman snar blugs pa'i rnam grangs de dag btang ba'i thabs ni/_nad thang ba'i nyin par/_zan ma zos pa'i snga rol tu
[\[281b.3\]]lag pa gnyis drag du drud pa'i drod kyis/_kha sna dang /_gdor thams cad legs par mnye zhing bsros la/_kha sna dang mtshul ba'i dri ma thams cad dag par bsal nas mgo smad de gtang bar bya'o/_/sman snar blugs pa'i cho ga byed pa des mgo bkru
[\[281b.4\]]ba dang /_khro ba dang /_nyal po dang /_nyin par gnyid log pa la sogs pa mi rung ba rnams spang bar bya'o/_/de la mar dang til mar snar blugs pa'i tshod ni thigs pa brgyad dam/_yang na mdzub mo'i tshigs pa gnyis phan chad lan gcig smyugs
[\[281b.5\]]pa la ci chags pa snar blugs so/_/tshad rnam gcig ni/_srang phyed snar blugs pa yin no/_/tshad rnam gcig ni nyams stobs che chung las dpags te thigs pa bzhi 'am drug gam brgyad blugs par bya ste/_tshad kyi sna grangs mang po bstan pa
[\[281b.6\]]'di kun kyang nad pa'i nyams stobs che chung dang sbyar zhing gtang bar bya'o/_/sman mar ram/_til mar snar blugs shing bad kan dang chu ser sna nas drang ba ni nam tshong yan chad kyi nad rnams la btang ba yin no//_//da ni sman mar gyi 'jam
[\[281b.7\]]rtsi dang /_bcud mas btang ba'i cho ga bshad de/_sman mas btang ba'i dpyad ni/_lcags dang zangs la sogs pa gang yang rung ba las byas pa'i gce'u srid sor bcu gnyis pa la/_gnag gi mjug snying gi dbyibs bzhin du byin gyis phra zhing zlum
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]par byas la/_rtsa ba sboms pa ni the bong shong tsam du bya/_thor to phra mo ni srin shong tsam la 'jam por byas te/_thor to phra mo logs nas sor gsum gyi tshu rol du phang lo tsam zhig gags byas la/_rtsa ba sbom po logs kyi khar yang
[\[282a.2\]]sman blugs pa'i snod gnag gi lgang pa bzang po dam por gdags shing /_lgang pa mi 'bud pa'i gags ci ran pa kha gnyis su bcad la de'i bar du lgang pa'i kha bcing bar bya'o/_/de nas sman btang ba'i tshe sngar kha zas zos nas glo g.yon phyogs kyis
[\[282a.3\]]nyal la/_rkang pa g.yon pa ni brkyang /_g.yas pa ni bskums te/_gzhang kha dang lce'u snum gyis byugs la/_sman shu ti dang /_rgyam tsha'i phye ma mar ram til mar dang /_chu dang ldan par bskol la/_mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'am/_sman gzhan
[\[282a.4\]]yang rung ste/_tshad srang gnyis sam/_srang gsum mam/_srang bzhi mi nyid kyi nyams stobs dang sbyar zhing tshod ran pa dang /_dron por mas btang zhing gce'u'i rtse mo nang du bcug la/_gags la thug par byas te/_lag pa g.yon pas gce'u'i
[\[282a.5\]]sked pa nas dam du bzung zhing lgang pa'i nang du rlung ma song bar byas te/_ha cang mi drag mi ngal ba dang /_bar du mi gda' mi bcad cing /_rgyun chags par lan gcig gis rdzogs par lag pa g.yas pas lgang pa btsir la rlung nang du mi 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir
[\[282a.6\]]sman gyi lhag ma chung zad tsam lus par bya'o/_/sman btang zin nas gan rkyal du bsnyal te/_rkang lag bzhi char gyen du bteg la lan gsum gyi bar du drag tu brkyang zhing bskum pa byas nas/_kha sbub tu zlog ste/_bdag nyid kyi rting pas rkub tshos la
[\[282a.7\]]lan gnyis gsum du brdabs la/_de'i 'og tu mi gzhan gyis rkang pa'i mthil du khu tshur gyis lan gnyis gsum du brdegs nas/_ro smad stod de nyal du gzhug go/_sman mar gyi cho ga 'di ni zhag lon gyi bar du 'khyil te phyir ma byung yang mi
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]rung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas kyang yun ring du phyir 'byung du ma btub na/_phyi sa 'gags pa'i cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du/_sman gyi reng bu mas gzhug pa'am/_yang na bkru sman 'jam pos myur du dbyung zhing sbyang bar bya'o/_/ji ste phyir ma byung yang mi bde
[\[282b.2\]]ba'am lci ba'i bag med cing /_tha mal bar 'dug pa la ni bkru sman la sogs pa btang mi dgos te/_chu bskol ba'i dron po 'thungs pas kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la mar dang phyi sa 'dres par 'byung ba ni sman legs pa'i mtshan ma yin no/_/phyi
[\[282b.3\]]sa ma 'dres par mar nyi tshe 'byung ba dang lus tsha bar gyur pa ni sman ma legs pa'i mtshan ma yin no/_/mar ni ma byung la phyi sa ni tha mal par byung la/_lto mi bde ba'i bag tu ma gyur na yang me'i drod che bas sman khong du zhu bar gyur pa yin te mi rung ba med do/_/
[\[282b.4\]]kha zas ni sman btang nas nam bkres par gyur na/_gdod yang zhid 'phrod pa'i bag las bza'o/_sman mas btang nas ring po ma lon par phyir byung na sman don du ma gyur ba yin te/_yang na cho ga snga ma bzhin du bzlas te gtang bar bya'o/_/de la sman mar
[\[282b.5\]]gyi 'jam rtsi'i bcud mas btang ba dang /_bkru sman drag po mas btang ba gnyi ga yang rlung nad kyi bag yod pa la gtong bar bya'o/_/zad byed kyi nad dang /_mdze nad dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_skyug pa'i nad dang /_gcin snyi ba'i nad dang /_dmu rdzings yod pa
[\[282b.6\]]la sogs pa la ni gtang du mi rung ngo /_/bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i cho ga ni sngar zhag gnyis gsum gyi snga rol du sman mar gyi 'jam rtsi mas btang la bkru sran drag po nyid mas btang ba'i nyin par nyi ma dron po la snga dro nas lus snum gyis byug cing mnye ba dang /
[\[282b.7\]]dugs sna tshogs kyis lus shin tu dros shing sha grol bar byas la/_nang par nas kha zas kyi bag mi bza' mi btung bar nyi ma phyed yol tsam na sman mas gtang bar bya'o/_/de la btang ba'i thabs ni gan rkyal du bsnyal la sman mar gyi bcud mas btang ba bzhin du
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]gce'u dang lgang par sbyar nas sman ha cang mi tsha ha cang mi grang bar dron por byas te lgang pa lag bas btsir la/_ha cang mi drag mi ngal ba dang /_bar du mi gda' mi bcad par rgyun chags par lan gcig gis rdzogs par btang ngo /_/dri
[\[283a.2\]]ma byung ba'i snod dam/_khung bu yang snga nas drung du bsnyen la/_sems gud du mi g.yeng bar sman lto na 'dug pa rnams 'byung la thug go snyam du bsam pa gtad par bya'o/_/de la dbyung ba'i tshod ni/_sman mas btang nas yi ge'i 'bru sum cu drag dal ran
[\[283a.3\]]tsam du brjod cing zin tsam na 'byung ba'i rigs te/_tha mal pa tsog tsog por 'dug la dbyung bar bya'o/_/de nas nad ma phyin tam/_ma zhag par gyur na bsnan bzod dang mi bzod mi'i nyams stobs las dpags te/_bzod pa 'dra na snga ma bzhin du
[\[283a.4\]]lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bsnan te bkrus nas/_de'i 'og tu chu dron pos khrus byas la/_kha zas sha khu dang ldan pa bzang po zos nas/_de'i rjes la lus rlung 'jug pa lta na/_de'i mod la mar gyi 'jam rtsi'i bcud mas btang ba cho ga
[\[283a.5\]]sngar bshad pa bzhin du bya'o/_/'phral du rlung 'jug pa'i dogs pa med na/_zhag gnyis sam gsum gyis bcad de/_gdod mar gyi 'jam rtsi'i bcud mas btang ngo /_/bkru sman drag po khong du btang ba des ma byung na/_phyi sa 'gags pa'i nad dang /
[\[283a.6\]]zug cing na ba dang /_lto spo ba la sogs pa'i nad mang por 'gyur te/_nyen che bas na de la ni/_du 'byung ran pa'i dus las yol ma thag tu 'jam rtsi snon po mas btang ba dang /_bkru sman btung ba dang /_skrag par bya ba la sogs pa'i cho ga byas na
[\[283a.7\]]bzang ngo /_/bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i cho ga 'di ni phan yon che zhing nyen yang che bas na gya tshom du btang du mi rung ste/_cho ga de la mkhas pa'i sman pa mang po tshogs pas legs par dpyad cing gtang bar bya'o/_/de la bkru sman drag pa mas btang
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]ba la ni/_sman gyi khu bsrang drug dang /_mar ram til mar cha gcig dang /_sman gyi phye ma srang gsum dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_sbrang rtsi ci ran pa dang /_'di rnams ni spyi'i cho ga yin te/_gzhi 'di rnams kyi steng du/_rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad
[\[283b.2\]]kan gang gi sman du btang ba las/_de dag so so'i sman 'og nas 'gyung ba bzhin du bsnan te/_skam gsher spyir srang nyi shu rtsa bzhi byung bar grangs bkang zhing cho ga 'og nas rgyas par 'byung ba bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de la rlung nad bsal ba'i bkru sman drag po
[\[283b.3\]]mas btang ba ni/_rlung sel ba'i sman gang yin pa rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_shing nye rong gi phye ma dang /_rgyam tsha bro ba tsam dang /_rtsa bas skyur po rnams lhan cig tu sbyar te dron por btang ngo /_/rgya shug la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang /_rtsa ba bcu dang /
[\[283b.4\]]rgya sran dang /_la phug skam po rnams las sna re re yang srang gnyis gnyis lhan cig tu chu phul gang la srang brgyad du brtsis pa chu phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du bskol te/_chu'i brgyad cha gcig lus pa btsags pa dang /_shu dag dang /_u pa kuny+dzi ka dang /
[\[283b.5\]]pi pi ling dang /_shu nyi dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_gla sgang rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang /_rtsa bas skyur po dang ba gcin rnams sbyar ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba yang rlung nad sel bar byed do/_/mkhris pa bsal ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i sman
[\[283b.6\]]ni/_shing n+ya grod+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_bu tshang rto la sogs pa'i sde tshan btags pa'i phye ma dang /_mar dang /_'o ma dang /_kha ra rnams sbyar ba btang na mkhris pa sel to/_/bad kan sel ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i sman ni/
[\[283b.7\]]dong ga la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_pi pi ling la sogs pa'i sde tshan btags pa'i phye ma dang /_ba gcin dang sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar te btang na bad kan sel to/_/bu tse shel dang /_gla sgang dang /_pu shel tse dang /_btsod dang /
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]ba la dang /_ra sna dang /_bu na rna ba dang /_gra ha tI dang /_sle tres dang /_sa la bar+No dang /_priSh+Na bar+Ni dang /_dong ka dang /_ba ru ra dang /_gze ma dang /_po son cha rnams las srang re re lhan cig tu chu phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du
[\[284a.2\]]bskol te khu ba brgyad cha gcig lus pa btsags la/_'o ma phul brgyad dang bskol te/_'o ma nyi tshe lus pa'i nang du/_gan+d+ha pri yaM ku dang /_shing mngar dang /_sha ti dang /_dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang /_ba ru ra rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis dang /_rgyam
[\[284a.3\]]tsha dang /_mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_srog chags skam sa na gnas pa'i sha khu rnams ci ran pa dang /_'di rnams sbyar ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba 'di ni rlung dang mkhris pa sel ba yin te/_ro tsa bar byed cing me drod shin tu bskyed pa dang na ba dang /_skran
[\[284a.4\]]dang /_glo rdol ba dang /_gcong chen po za byed kyi nad dang /_gcin 'gag pa dang /_phyi sa 'gags pa rnams kyang sel to/_/sbrang rtsi dang /_til mar cha bsnyams la de gnyis bsdoms pa'i tshad kyi kru trug tres bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_shu ti'i phye ma
[\[284a.5\]]srang gcig dang /_rgyam tsha zho gnyis 'di rnams sbyar ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba 'di ni cho ga bsrung mi dgos te ro tsa bar bya ba dang /_me'i drod bskyed pa dang /_sha skye bar bya ba dang /_phyi sa 'gag pa dang /_srin bu dang /_skran rnams bsal
[\[284a.6\]]ba la dge ba yin te/_gnod pa'i nyen du mi 'gyur ro/_/sbrang rtsi dang /_mar dang /_'o ma dang /_til mar rnams las srang gnyis gnyis dang /_spa ma'i 'bras bu dang /_rgyam tsha zho gnyis gnyis te 'di rnams sbyar ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba ni
[\[284a.7\]]brtag par byed pa'i mchog yin te/_de la mar gyi 'jam rtsi'i bcud mas btang ba'i tshad ni spyir srang gsum du bya'o/_/bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i tshad ni de'i brgyad du bya'o/_/tshos par byed pa'i sman dang /_bkru sman gnyis la ni sman gyi phye ma srang
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]re re btang ngo /_/yang nyams stobs kyis ji tsam nus pa dang sbyar ro/_/ji ltar shing gi rtsa ba chus bran na/_lo ma sngo zhing snum pa skye ba de bzhin du mi la yang mar gyi 'jam rtsi'i bcud mas btang ba dang /_bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i cho ga 'di dag ltar
[\[284b.2\]]btang na mdog snum zhing nyams stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/las rnam lnga'i le'u ste sum cu pa rdzogs so//_//da ni cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/sgog skya la ni ro rnam pa drug las/_skyur ba ma gtogs par mang ra ba dang /_kha ba
[\[284b.3\]]dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba dang /_lan tshwa'i ro 'di lnga yang yod de/_de ni tshim pa med par byed pa yin no/_/de sman gzhan dang sbyar na nad gzhi gsum char yang sel to/_/de la mi mi na ba nyams stobs skye bar 'dod pas ni/_dpyid zla 'bring po'i ngo la
[\[284b.4\]]bza' bar bya'o/_/nad yod pa la ni dus kun yang bza' bar bya'o/_/sgog skya nar son cing rdo gu grung bor gyur la/_skyon med cing yon tan dang ldan pa de nyid kyi khu ba cho ga bsrung bzhin du/_gzar zhing zho gnyis gnyis kyis bskyed de btung bar bya'o/_/

[\[284b.6\]]pa la ni 'o ma 'am/_khu ba mngar po rnams kyis dbul lo/_/kha zas ni gro las byas pa'i bag_/skam sa na gnas pa'i bya sha gang yin pa rnams kyi sha khu dang ldan par za zhing /_khro ba dang /_nyal po dang /_mya ngan la sogs pa dang /_sman

[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]mkhris pa sel to/_/til mar dang sbyar ba ni bad kan dang rlung sel to/_/tshil lam rkang dang sbyar ba ni glo brdol ba'am zad byed kyi nad las brta bar byed do/_/sgog skya zhib tu brdungs la 'o ma dang bskol te kha ra dang sbyar ba 'thung

[\[285a.3\]]cing na ba dang /_srin bu'i nad dang /_khu ba zad pa dang /_mo gsham rnams la bzang ngo /_/gzhang 'brum can dang /_tshad pa be'u snabs su 'byung bas nyam thag pa dang /_'bras kyi phreng ba yod pa dang /_lus shin tu rid pa dang /_bud med sbrum pa dang /

[\[285a.5\]]dang /_srog chags skam sa na gnas pa'i sha khu rnams las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te/_bsros la nyams stobs dang sbyar zhing tshod ran par btung bar bya'o/_/e raN+Da'i mar 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te btang na/_bad kan dang mkhris
[\[285a.6\]]pa sel to/_/rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te btang na rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad sel to/_/ra'i 'o ma 'am/_rgun chang gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na gcin sri ba dang rde'us 'gags pa sel to/_/'o ma dang sbyar na rlung skran
[\[285a.7\]]sel to/_/mig ser dang /_skya rbab dang /_tshad par 'khru ba dang /_skyugs pa dang /_mdze dang /_rims dang /_bad kan nyi tshe dang /_khrag lud pa nyi tshe ba rnams kyis ni btung bar mi bya'o/_/go byi'i cho ga ni go byi'i 'bras bu lnga cho ga bzhin du
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]ba'i gcin gyi nang du bskol te bzhi cha lus nas mnyes la tshig ma bor ba'i khu ba grang mo mchu dang rkan mar gyis bskus te btung zhing thabs de ltar nyin gcig bzhin du go byi'i 'bras bu lnga lngas bskyed/_go byi'i 'bras bu bdun cu la thug gi bar du snga ma

[\[285b.6\]]dang /_rims la sogs pas 'debs par 'gyur te/_de la ni sman bsil ba'i lde gu'am khu ba grang mos lus byug pa dang /_steng du blugs pa dang btung ba rnams bya'o/_/pi pi ling bskyed pa'i cho ga ni/_'o ma bskol te phyed du nas phyung ba'i nang du/_pi

[\[286a.1\]]kha zas 'o ma dang ldan par bza' zhing cho gas bsrungs na/_dreg dang /_skya rbab dang /_skran dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_skrangs pa dang /_dmu rdzings rnams sil zhing rims ldang dub kyis dus mi 'dra ba med par

[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]mo nyung gi shun lpags dang sbyar na gzhang 'brum sel to/_/'di ltar bdag gis tshe'i rig byed kyi rgya mtsho drang srong gzhung la skyes kyi bu dang /_drang srong rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa'i gzhung rnams bltas nas/_gso ba'i dpyad kyi zer tsam gyi rgyud le'u sum cu

[\[286b.6\]]@##/_/srid pa gsum gyi bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa klu sgrub zhal snga nas/_/bkod par gyur pa rtsa ba'i mdzod/_/sems can kun la rjes brtse bas/_/bdag gis rab tu brjod par bya/_/ka na ka pany+tsa d+gi blangs nas a lam bu Sha

[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]ba lA dang /_'di dag thams cad gcig tu byas nas nyed par byas na sbom por byed pa'i mchog go/_/gtun shing lta bur 'gyur ro/_/mar sar dang /_shu dag dang /_ru rta dang /_ba lA dang /_/nA ga ba lA rnams kyis nu ma mchog tu mnyes na

[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_kha la byabs shing /_gos la mdud pa byas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal bo khros pa rab tu dang bar 'gyur ro/_/ba lang gi so dang bya rog gi brun mnyam par btags te/_gang gi mgo la gtor ba de thams cad dbang du

[\[287b.3\]]dang /_phob ris dang /_'jam 'bras dang /_yung ba dang /_skyer pa dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_ri'i bi lba dang /_rgya spos kyi rtsa ba dang /_saM khya nA b+hi ste/_'di dag thams cad chu la btags te mig sman byas na/_rab rib ma lus pa sel bar byed do/

[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]lhan cig spyar te/_pya ba'i dus su skye gnas byugs te/_bud med gang la skyes bu mngon par bsgrod par byed na de dang po bzhin du skyes ba de'i bur 'gyur ro/_/dgon pa'i 'ug pa bzung nas de'i mig dang pi pi ling gis byugs te/
[\[288a.2\]]de'i rngul lhung bas mig la mig sman byas na/_de sbas pa de mi mthong ngo /_/sA pI ti ta byA d+ha tra ro paN+naM pra ya ts+tsha ti/_nas kyi phye ma dang /_yung ba'i phye ma dang /_ba'i chu dang /_mar dang /_spos dkar dang /_shing mngar rnams mnyam par sbyar te/_gdong
[\[288a.3\]]la dril phyi byas na/_gdong pad+ma lta bur 'gyur ro/_/rkang pa dag pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bur 'gyur ro/_/bud med thams cad rgyal po'i pho brang du mdzes shing sdug par 'gyur ro/_/yang shing mngar dang btags te ril bu sbyar nas chu'i bum par bcug na/
[\[288a.4\]]bsil bar 'gyur ro/_/oM ma hA ba li dza ye swA hA/_gos la yongs su bzlas te bsgos na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dzin pas spre'u'i 'jug ma blangs te sbrang dang btags nas lte ba'i phyogs su byugs na ling ga gyen du 'gyur bar/

[\[288a.6\]]shu dag dang /_ru rta dang /_kaN+Da ka ri dang /_sa tA ba ri dang /_'di dag cha mnyam par byas nas til mar gyis smin par byas pa'i til mar des/_ling+ga nyed par byas na sbom par byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/lce'i dri ma dang /_shu dag dang /_ru
[\[288a.7\]]rta dang /_ni rma la cha mnyam par phye mar byas nas gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/a ga ru dang /_gu gul dang /_sheng shu Sh+ka dang /_ut+pal sngon po dang /_bu ram sbyar bas bdug pa byas nas bdag nyid rgyal po'i pho brang du song na mchod pa chen po thob
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]cing btsun mo rnams kyis dri snom par byed do/_/bye'u kha ny+tsa rI Ta'i brun blangs te/_si ri sa'i sa bon byugs pas 'chi ba sel to/_/bya rog gi lce dang /_shu dag dang /_ru rta dang /_pi pi ling dang /_'bras bu thug po che bdun dang /_bdag nyid kyi khu sbyar te gang
[\[288b.2\]]la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/shu dag dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /_gi wang lhan cig btags te de'i thig le byas nas gang la bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_daN+Do t+pa la'i rtsa ba dang /_sbrang rtsi lhan cig btags te ril bu byas nas gang la byin nas gang las rtsi dang lhan cig byin pa de
[\[288b.3\]]dbang du 'gyur ro/_/oM bA ra s+ya mu kham dri Sh+TA bA la rkas ma te dza sA/_tsa tu r+tha ka m+ma hA g+hor ma k+Shi pra me ba bra ta s+ya ti/_sngags 'di gro ga'i 'dab ma la bris te lag pa la btags na rims nyin bzhi pa phral du nyams par byed do/_/bA gu dzi ka'i 'bras bu'i phye ma
[\[288b.4\]]dar ba dang lhan cig btags nas de dril te/_dar ba'i zan dang /_skyur ba thams cad dang lhan cig zos na gzhang 'brum dang /_rkang 'bam dang /_'brum phran dang /_mdze dang /_mtshan bar rdol ba dang dug rnams sel bar byed do/_/bA gu dzi ka'i 'bras
[\[288b.5\]]bu dar ba dang lhan cig btags nas de dril bas mdze thams cad dang /_bitsa rtsi ka la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/pA gu dza ga bre gang dang /_seng ldeng zho gang mnyam par byas te/_chu bre brgyad dang bskol bar bya'o/_/de ni cha phyed lus pa na btud sa te/_bya
[\[288b.6\]]rog gi lce dang /_shu dag dang /_ru rta dang /_bilbi'i 'dab ma dang /_gur gum dang /_bdag nyid kyi khrag dang mnyam par sbyar bas shing yang dbang di byed do/_/o pi shA tsI rU be NA lid+ba ya tsu m+ba ya/_b+ha gaM sa ny+tse ya nya swA hA/_sngags kyi tshig 'di chu khyor ba gang la
[\[288b.7\]]lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te nyal ba'i dus su rig ma gang gi ming smos nas btab na/_zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis mi'i dbang po'i btsan mo yin na'ang dbang du 'gyur na gzhan lta ci smos/_khrag skrod pa'i rtsa ba/_ka rmar ng+ga'i rtsa ba dang si h+ya'i lo ma dang /
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]'di dag mnyam par byas rkang pa'i mthil la byugs na sa bon 'ching bar byed do/_/a ru ra dang/__zhu mkhan dang /_lung thang gi 'dab ma dang /_d+ha dur dang/_sa 'bru'i shun pa dang /_sa kha s+ya na d+ga pra ma do mA nAM tA ye paSh+Ti sa si khaM ka
[\[289a.2\]]ro ti/_oM ra tsa NI ma hAr d+NA ya swA hA/_sngags 'dis bdun du mngon par bsngags nas gos la sogs par mdud pa byas na bya ba ma lus pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_na ma:sA k+Shi:ka pA la mA li thA hA/_gzhan yang byi la'i khrag blangs nas/_'jam 'bras til
[\[289a.3\]]mar gyis bsgos te/_pad+ma'i skud pas sdong bu byas nas dbang phyug gi mdun du dud pa 'chags par byas te mig la byugs pa tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_oM tsi ti he he/_sngags 'dis chu dkrugs te mig byugs na the tshom med par grub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[289a.4\]]bya rog gi khrag dang /_ce spyang gi mkhris pa dang /_'ug pa'i rus pa dang /_'di dag cha mnyam pa'i phye ma zhib mor byas te/_rgyur skar nabs sol btags te/_mig la byugs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sA la pa r+Ni lag pa la bcings nas/_sa ma re
[\[289a.5\]]kA N+Ta zlog par byed do/_/na ma sh+tsa N+Da badzra bA Na ye ma hA ya k+Sha senA pa ta ye/_ta d+ya thA/_oM badzra hri k+ShI s+phaT/_rig sngags 'di lan cig brjod cing /_oM saM tso raM staM b+ha ya swA hA/_kA la si mI ka'i rtsa ba dang /_ga bur dang /_pad+ma ge sar dang /_'di dag cha mnyam
[\[289a.6\]]par byas nas/_chu dang btags te ril bu byas nas grib ma la bskams te/_ril bu de la yang dag par reg pa'i skyes bu'i lag pa g.yas par pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa kun nas bris te/_lag pa des bud med kyi lag pa g.yas pa bzung na bud med de mod la
[\[289a.7\]]dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dri bzang chen po'i rtsa ba rked la bcings na khu ba rengs par byed pa'i mchog tu bstan no/_/ba rA ha kA n+ta'i rtsa ba chu dang btags te rkang pa'i mthil la byugs na khu ba rengs par byed do/_/namaHsarba si d+ha b+h+yaHsid+he r+b+ha ba tra me swA hA/
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]sngags 'dis mngon par bsngags te/_ba bla dang /_ldong ros dang /_spang spos dang /_ru rta dang /_mu sta ka ste thams cad gcig tu cha mnyam par byas nas/_zhib tu btags te bud med kyi mgo la bsnun na/_mngag gzhug tu 'gyur ro/_/namaH
[\[289b.2\]]kriSh+Na sarba rA ya ma sa kA nAM ku N+DaM bam+d+hA mi swA hA/_ji srid nyi ma shar gyi bar du/_oM ra k+Sha ra k+Sha ra k+Sha swA hA/_sngags 'dis chu khyor ba gang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_phyogs bzhir gtor na/_sbrang bu rnams skrod par byed do/_/ka ra bI ra dmar po'i rtsa ba
[\[289b.3\]]lan bdun bsngags te bud med kyi mdun du gtor na bud med de'i mod kho na la dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bra h+ma daNI dang /_shu dag dang /_lo ma rnams sbrang dang lhan cig btags nas ling+ga la byugs nas 'dod pa byas na bdag po gzhan 'dod par mi byed do/_/
[\[289b.4\]]pa tsa ka'i mig blangs nas dzA hi dang sun+d+ha dang lhan cig gcig tu byas nas phye ma des mig sman byas nas/_skyes bu dbang du 'gyur ro/_/be tsa ka'i snum blangs nas ba'i mar dang lhan cig gcig tu byas nas dud pa dbab par bya'o/_/ris mig sman byas nas
[\[289b.5\]]'byung bo dang sha za rnams kyi dbus su rtse bar byed do/_/be tsa ka'i snying blangs nas chang dang lhan cig lus la byugs nas 'dod pa spyad na bud med thams cad skyes pa'i dbang du 'gyur ro/_tshangs pa'i shing gi rtsa ba khar bcug na khu ba rengs par byed do/_/
[\[289b.6\]]lga dang /_pi pi ling dang /_na le sham dang /_rgya skyegs dang /_zir dang /_zi ra nag po dang /_shing kun dang /_sgog pa dang /_lan tsha dang /_'dab ma dang /_ku Ta rnams chang dang btags te/_phra hA ro s+thi te na/_a she ShA dzi r+NA
[\[289b.7\]]ta n+ha bA shwar+ya ro bya:/_thams cad nyams par byed do/_/gang zhig su N+Thi bcu gnyis 'thungs/_/bad kan tshogs ni 'joms byed cing /_/rlung yang nye bar 'dren par byed/_/a dzi r+Na dzir sa r+ya su pI ha ma Sh+To da ka ni saM/_rang dga' ba/_a dza mo da tsha ba gsum/_/
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]rgyam tsha zi ra rnam gnyis dang /_/shing kun cha brgyad mnyam par bzung /_/'di yi phye ma mar sar dang /_/skye bo gang zhig za byed pa/_/rlung gi nad ni sel bar byed/_/mU la ma ya stu pu na b+hu ba ya:_bi ba ti k+Shi ra Na ba pra t+ya
[\[290a.2\]]tsu r+Na n+tA s+ya gu Do sam hi ta ba to dzI r+Ne ya Sh+Ta si na: hI nAM go \u0f85 pi sadzA ya to\u0f85 rtsi ta pI lAM haM sen+d+ra ku n+tA pra b+h+raM/_mra so ni bar+ng+hi ra ShU ba r+Sha ba ya sA mu k+Sho dza rA byA d+hi b+hi:a ru ra srang gcig_/ba ru ra srang gcig_/skyu ru ra srang gcig_/ci tra kaM srang gsum/
[\[290a.3\]]lga srang gcig_/pi pi ling srang gcig/_/na le sha ma srang gcig/_nA ga ge sar gyi phye ma zho bzhi/_pho ba ris dkar po zho do/_/sdig srin rwa zho do/_/dug zho do/_/'di dag thams cad phye ma zhi ba mor byas nas bu ram srang lnga bcu rtsa lnga dang
[\[290a.4\]]bsres te gang gis zos pa de me stobs su 'gyur ro/_/thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/mdze nad bco brgyad nyams par 'gyur ro/_/thang byed kyi nad dang /_glo dang 'bugs dang /_de bzhin du/_mchin nad dang /_skya rbab dang /_'bras
[\[290a.5\]]dang /_rlung nad dang /_sprul dang /_srin bu lU ta dang /_dug nad sel bar byed do/_/de bzhin du brtag pa dang g.yo ba 'ang ngo /_/stobs glang po che dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/shugs rta lta bur 'gyur ro/_/zla ba gcig gis mer 'gyur
[\[290a.6\]]ro/_/rna ba phag lta bur 'gyur ro/_/mig bya rgod lta bur 'gyur ro/_/'di thams cad kyis mi 'dregs par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i ril bu yongs su rdzogs so//_//[{D4436}]na mo ra t+na tra yA ya/_na ma sh+tsa N+Da badzra pA NaM ye ma
[\[290a.7\]]hA ya k+Sha se na pa ta ya/_ta t+ya thA/_oM dz+wa ra gri Nu dz+wa ra gri Nu gardza gardza/_ts+chardu ts+tsha rdu/_muny+tsa mu ny+tsa/_nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa dang /_rims mi bzad pa rnams/_aT ha Ta phyag na rdo rje'i bka'
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]bzhin du/_hu ru hu ru/_d+hu na d+hu na/_bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/_si ri muny+tsa ka NAM muny+tsa twa zhi da yaM muny+tsa muny+tsa/_Da da raM muny+tsa/_ka Ti muny+tsa muny+tsa ka N+tha muny+tsa/_ha sti muny+tsa/_bA do muny+tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT che ge mo'i rims nyams par gyis shig swA hA/_rims bzlog
[\[290b.2\]]pa'o/_/dbang po'i nas dang /_zhu mkhan dang /_pu she tsi dang ma sar/_spos dkar/_pa ma/_bI tA/_ni phaTa'i 'dab ma rnams gcig tu byas nas btags te gdong la byugs na gdong zla ba lta bar 'gyur ro/_kA ma yA'i rtsa ba gcug tu bcings
[\[290b.3\]]na gnyid du 'gyur ro/_/ku ThA ra ts+tshi N+ma'i rtsa ba khar bcug na ral gri la sogs pa zlog par byed do/_/a laM muShA'i rtsa ba rna ba gnyis la bcings na rims nyin bzhi pa nyams par byed do/_/dur khrod du skyes pa'i dro Na pu Sh+pa'i khu bas mig bkang na mig
[\[290b.4\]]gi me tog sel bar byed do/_/k+Shu dgra i ni ka'i rtsa ba dang /_gi waM lha cig btags nas thig le byas na rgyal po'i sgor mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/shri gA la bstu kA'i rtsa ba rna ba la bcings na mig nad sel bar byed do/_/sa kho Ta ka'i rtsa bas
[\[290b.5\]]mgul nad sel bar byed do/_/b+hu mi tsam pa ka'i rtsa ba btags nas btungs na lto ba'i zug sel bar byed do/_/dka' thub pa'i chu 'ongs pa dang/_'bras sA lu dang /_'bras thug po che dang/_ka ra dkar po dang lhan cig btungs na
