[\[290b.6\]]bud med rnams kyi khrag 'bab pa sel bar bar byed do/_/tri shru li ka'i rtsa ba khar bcug na glang po che dbang du 'gyur ro/_/pr-i ha tI dkar po'i rtsa ba 'bras thug po che'i chu dang btags nas btungs na rde nad sel bar byed do/_/su bAN+Na se phA li
[\[290b.7\]]ka'i rtsa ba dar ba dang lhan cig btags nas byug pa byas na khyi rdo sel bar byed do/_/mngon par bgrod pa'i dus su a g+ni ba stu ka'i rtsa ba khar bcug na mod la bud med dbang du 'gyur ro/_/a la mu ShA'i rtsa ba kaM dzi ka dang btags
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]nas mgo bo la byabs na mgo'i nad sel bar byed do/_/arka dkar po'i rtsa ba dar ba dang btags nas btungs na mig ser sel bar byed do/_/nA ga lam dzA ti'i rtsa ba khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'o ma dang lhan cig
[\[291a.2\]]zos nas chags pa byas na bu skyes bar 'gyur ro/_/b+ho dza nany+tsa e ka ba la yA dug+hi na sa ha kA ra dang /_mkhan pa'i rtsa ba dang /_dro Na pu Sh+pa'i rtsa ba dang /_yung ba dang /_'bras thug po che lhan cig byas nas/_dri la phyi byas te/_chus dkrus na gsal
[\[291a.3\]]por smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du nA ga ge sar dang /_s+tha la ku m+b+hI dang /_nAg dam na ka dang /_dmar ka puSha pa rnams kyi rtsa bas dril phyis byas te chus bkrus na/_klu nor rgyas kyi bu'ang dbang du 'gyur ro/_/na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye ma hA ya k+Sha se
[\[291a.4\]]nA pa ta ye/_ta d+ya thA/_a na le a na le hu tu sA hA/_sngags 'di tsha ba'i til mar la brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas te rkang pa gnyis la byugs na dpag tshad du mar mi ngal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas pas
[\[291a.5\]]so/_/mkha' 'gro rnams kyis phyag rgya 'byed par 'gyur ro/_/bcings pa grol ba las bzlas bar bya'o/_/na ma:ku su mA li kA ya hi ma ra dU re sa ba ri swA hA/_byi ba sgrib par byad pa'i sngags so/_/a pA marga'i rtsa ba la bdun bsngags pa'i
[\[291a.6\]]srad bu yongs su bcings na rims nyin gcig pa sel bar byed do/_/ba rA ha krAn+ta'i rtsa ba lag pa la bcings na lang tsho nyams pa la'ang bu 'byung ngo /_/daN+Do t+pa la'i rtsa ba dang /_gi waM lhan cig btags nas thig le byas te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/
[\[291a.7\]]rgyal po'i pho brang la sogs pa yul 'khor kyi skye bo dga' bar 'gyur ro/_phag gnon pa/_/ka ke la'i rtsa ba phrad par byas na so'i zug rngu sel bar byed do/_/tang s+thA kr-im ya:nA sha ya ti/_b+h+ri ga rA dza'i rtsa ba dang /_a par dzi ta'i rtsa ba dang /_me tog phyungs
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]te mgrin par bcings na lkog 'bras sel bar byed do/_/bstu ka'i rtsa ba bA sa'i chu dang bcas pa btungs na skya rbab kyi nad sel bar byed do/_ti k+ta la shu'i rtsa ba kany+dzi ka dang btags te spyi bor byugs na mgo bo'i zug sel bar byed do/_/su bar+Nase phA li ka'i rtsa
[\[291b.2\]]ba sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig btungs na/_dri chu 'gags pa sel bar byed do/_sidz+dza'i rtsa ba bu ram dang lhan cig zos na gnyid du 'gyur ro/_/baTa'i rtsa ba btags nas byin na mig ser sel bar byed do/_/kaN+Ta kA ra'i rtsa ba rked pa la bcings na mig nad sel
[\[291b.3\]]bar byed do/_/sU ma pa t+ta dang /_b+hany+dza na'i rtsa ba btags nas lga'i khu ba dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_til mar lhan cig bsres te rna ba bkang na rna ba'i zug rngu sel bar byed do/_kriSh+na sA ka'i rtsa ba btags na so'i zug rngu sel bar byed do/_/guny+dza'i rtsA ba dum du
[\[291b.4\]]bdun du byas nas srad bu bdun rked par bcings na gzhang 'brum gyi nad sel bar byed do/_/na ba ma li'i rtsa ba ma bkrus pa bya rog ma grag pa'i dus su bde bar phyung nas srad bu bdun dang bcas ba rked par bcings na tsi tUn sel bar byed do/_sma ru mgo nag/
[\[291b.5\]]pa T+yA'al ka'i rtsa ba'i sa shing zos na mig ser sel bar byed do/_/sba'i rtsa ba bskol nas btungs na mdze nad sel bar byed do/_/skyu ru ra dang ni m+pa'i lo ma lhan cig btags nas zos te/_sA kho Ta ka'i rtsa ba dang /_kany+dzi ka btags nas byugs na rlung /
[\[291b.6\]]'bras sel bar byed do/_/sa Na'i rtsa ba so rtsi dang lhan cig thos na dbang po'i nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'dab ma dang bcas pa'i dman ka'i rtsa ba btags nas btungs na yongs su 'gyur ba'i zug rngu sel bar byed do/_/su wa r+Na sa phA li ka'i rtsa ba khar
[\[291b.7\]]btsug na rgyan rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/ba so rta ra'i si pha phyung nas lte ba'i phyogs su bcings na bud med bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dza ya n+ti'i rtsa ba khar bcug na tha snyad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/b.rA ha kA n+ta'i rtsa ba lag pa la bcings na tha snyad kyis
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/a par dzi ta'i rtsa ba skar ma rgyal la phyung nas ras bal la snum byugs te dud pa dbab bar bya'o/_/des mig sman byas na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/kunA'i rtsa ba skar ma rgyal la byung ste/_bu sA
[\[292a.2\]]ra ka'i gnas su bzhag na tshong rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/ma yu ra si khA'i rtsa ba rang gi khu ba dang btags nas sor mo la byugs na bud med 'dzag par the tshom med do/_/rnya ma dA ti'i rtsa ba 'dab ma dang bcas pa btags nas se phal byugs na bud med 'dzag go_/nA
[\[292a.3\]]ga ge sar gyi yu ba/_a sho ka'i rtsa ba dang /_so rtsi dang chang _rma bya'i gtsug phud _gang la sbyin pa de'i a mats+tsha ka zhi bar byed do/_/su ri dang su nA la so rtsi bcos bzos na/_khu ba rengs ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/d+h+ri d+ga rA dza'i rtsa ba rang gi khu bar btags bas
[\[292a.4\]]mig sman byas na/_gang dang gang mthong ba de dang de dbang du byed do/_/rang gi khrag dang gi waM gis thig le byas na bud med gang mthong ba de dbang du byed do/_/byi tang ga dang /_b+ha l+lA ta ka dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_a b+ha yA dang /_da mong sha _sa nA ga rA dang mnyam pa'i
[\[292a.5\]]ril bus mar sar lhags na gang ngal bar 'gro ba'i skyes bu de rlung dang mtshungs bar 'gyur ro/_/bud shing gi khu ba dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_lcags kyi phye ma dang /_bdam gyi pad+ma dang /_b+h+ri d+ha'i khu bas kyang ngo /_/a rma pa b+hu thun mos ba ni Sh+TaM/
[\[292a.6\]]rany+dza ti ka sha ka pA lan san+ha haM/_gu ny+dza dkar po'i rtsa ba skar ma rgyal byung nas/_te na daSh+Ta ka s+ya na sa bA ma nA si kA ya:_pra Te pra do t+te tsan+tsha te/_buny+dza dkar po'i rtsa ba rked pa la bcings na bdag nyid kyi khrag sel bar byed do/_/de'i rtsa ba skye gnas la
[\[292a.7\]]byugs par byin na mngal bsdams pa bca' bar byed do/_/guny+dza dkar po'i rtsa ba phye ma zhib mor byas nas ma he'i 'o ma la bcug na zho smin par 'gyur ro/_/sA kho Ta ka'i 'o ma thigs pa gnyis bcug ste/_legs par smin pa nyi ma gsum pa la bsrubs
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]pa'i mar gsar blangs te/_dar ba/_ta kra ny+dza dza hra sA pa ya/_me tog dkar po gtor bya'o/_nyi ma gzhan la de'i me tog nag por 'gyur ro/_mar sar des thod par mig sman du 'gyur ro/_/dzaM bI ra'i rtsa ba btags na/_dza n+ti ka'i nad sel bar byed do/_/
[\[292b.2\]]pan+nAg pa ti ka'i rtsa ba btags na bems po'i nad sel bar byed do/_/r-i tubI tI'i 'byung po'i nyi ma bzhi pa la nA ga ge sar gyi lo ma dang /_kha dog gcig pa'i ba'i 'o ma btungs na/_nyi ma bzhi pa la skyes bu'i mdze nad sel bar byed do/_/skyu ru ra ge sar las
[\[292b.3\]]skyes ba'i khu ba dang lhan cig lcags kyi snod du btags te mig sman byas na rab rib sel bar byed do/_pU na rna wa'i rtsa ba dang /_so so b+ha ny+dza na'i rtsa ba dang /_'bras thug po che'i chu dang btags nas de nyid btungs na mkhris pa sel ba'i mchog go_/ta n+Tu li kA'i
[\[292b.4\]]rtsa bas mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dag gis bzung ba'i snying gi zug rngu sel bar byed do/_/ka ny+tsa nA'i rtsa ba dang /_shun pa dang /_dar ba mnyam par btungs na zas kyis brnabs pa sel bar byed do/_/I shra ra'i rtsa ba dang kany+dzi ka btags nas byugs na gdug
[\[292b.5\]]pa'i rma sel bar byed do/_/de bzhin du gdug pa'i rma'i gnas su byug par yang bya'o/_/tri sU li kA'i rtsa ba btags nas byug par byin na/_dug nad sel bar byed do/_/ta N+Du li kA'i 'dab ma dang bcas pa'i rtsa ba dang /_a g+ni bstu ka'i rtsa ba'i khu ba btags
[\[292b.6\]]nas lus la byugs na bcud skam sel bar byed do/_/su da r+sha ka'i rtsa ba btags nas byugs na mig nad zhi bar byed do/_/go dzi hwe'i rtsa ba ras bal la bcings na tha snyad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/a shwa gan+ng+ha'i rtsa ba mar dang lhan cig btugs na mang la
[\[292b.7\]]brtan par byed pa'i mchog go/_/su ra b+ha ti ga ra'i rtsa ba btags nas byugs na srin bu lU ta'i dug sel bar byed do/_/gi rI ka r+Ni ka'i rtsa ba btags na lkog 'bras sel bar byed do/_/u t+pal sngon po dang /_gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsa ba so rtsir byin na
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]dbang du byed pa'i mchog go/_/a pA mA rga'i rtsa ba dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_gam dzi ka lhan cig zangs kyi snod du sbyar nas mig sman byas na mig tshag pa sel bar byed do/_/dza yan+ta'i rtsa ba til mar gyis smin par byas na zos na bcud
[\[293a.2\]]nyams par byed do/_/ka rany+dza'i rtsa ba dang /_ma hA kA la'i rtsa ba dang /_ta Ni la'i chu btung bar byin na sa'i dug sel bar byed do/_/de bzhin du bu na rna bA dkar po'i rtsa ba phyung nas sna bug tu byin na gdug pa'i dug sel bar byed do/_/pA tha'i rtsa ba dang
[\[293a.3\]]ba dang lhan cig btags na tshad pas 'khru ba sel bar byed do/_/man+dA rA'i rtsa ba 'o ma dang lhan cig btungs na rlung nad sel bar byed do/_/arka'i rtsa ba dang /_ri Shi pU To li ka'i rtsa ba sa bon dang lhan cig cha mnyam par byas nas chu dang btags te ra shang lam
[\[293a.4\]]du byugs na gzhang 'brum sel bar byed do/_/dri sI li ka'i rtsar 'o ma dang btags te gi wi rang lhan cig zangs kyi snod du bzhag nas mig la byugs na/_rab rib sel bar byed do/_/a ru ra dang /_zhu mkhan dang /_lung thang gi 'dab ma dang /_shing khun dang /
[\[293a.5\]]shu dag rnams cha dang lhan cig btags nas gal te sos btab na 'chi bde'i tshe yang 'di byin na rnal du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/ko ki lA k+Sha'i rtsa ba dang /_ku DU tsi dang /_dbyug pa'i ut+pal dang /_su wa rtses ph+wa li ka'i sa bon dang /_bri ha ti'i rtsa
[\[293a.6\]]ba dang /_cha mnyam par byas nas yungs kar gyi snum dang lhan cig btungs na rkang 'bam dang rlung nad sel bar byed do/_/go dzi tra'i rtsa ba dar ba dang lhan cig btungs na rked pa'i nad sel bar byed do/_/ut+pala'i rtsa ba ba'i mar dang lhan cig btungs na pri Sha Na'i klu
[\[293a.7\]]sel bar byad do/_/ku dza Ta'i rtsa ba phye mar byas nas sprang dang lhan cig byin na rtsa'i rma sel bar byed do/_/pa ra me swa ra'i rtsa ba dang shu dag byugs na 'bras sel bar byed do/_su NI kA'i rtsa ba dang /_lga dang lhan cig lag pa la byugs na mi rengs par byed do/_/ban+d+hu
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]ki'i rtsa ba snar byin na sna nad sel bar byed do/_/bA rA ha krAn+ta'i rtsa ba yungs kar gyi mar dang lhan cig khar bcug na/_skye bo thams cad kyi mig 'ching bar byed do/_/bra thA mA laM/_oM khang+ga wA ri NI swA hA/_zhes pa'i sngags kyis kha la btabs nas mtshon bza' bar bya'o/
[\[293b.2\]]a ga ru dang /_gu gul dang /_shrI wA sa dang /_tsan dan dang /_ne pA li kA'i 'dab ma dang /_ni rmAs rnams bu ram dang lhan cig cha mnyam par byas nas bdag nyid bdugs te/_rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin na skye bo thams cad kyis de'i dri snom par byed cing /_thams
[\[293b.3\]]cad mngag gzhug tu 'gyur ro/_/til nag po dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_b+h+ri ng+ga rA dza dang /_'di dag cha mnyam par byas nas mar dang lhan cig zos na skra dkar dang /_rab rib dang /_skya rbab rnams sel bar byed do/_/kA ka dzi g+ha'i rang bzhin bshad par bya ste/_sman
[\[293b.4\]]chen po kA ka dzi g+ha a ti bA lA/_de bzhin du ba la NaM dang /_ba ra N+Du'i 'dab ma dang /_khu ba dang /_yungs kar dkar po dang /_maN+Du ka'i ril ma bre gang gis smin par byas te/_'dis rtsa ba bkrus na chu klung gi shugs kyang zhi bar byed do/_/kA ka dzi g+hA'i khu ba
[\[293b.5\]]blangs te/_'di'i rtsa ba dang btags nas rma la btab na rma gso ba'i mchog go_/'di'i 'dab ma dang /_'bras thub po che'i chu dang btags te bkrus shang bskams nas rma til mar gyis bkang na rtsa gso ba'i mchog go_/'di'i 'dab ma'i khu ba dang /_ba
[\[293b.6\]]lang gi chu lhan cig khar bzung na kha'i nad sel bar byed do/_/kA ka dzi g+hA dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_ba ru ra dang /_b+h+ra d+ga rA dza'i khu ba blangs nas/_til mar gyis smin par byas na khi nya 'phel bar byed do/_/thos pa rengs pa sel bar byed do/_/sbrang dang lhan cig
[\[293b.7\]]gis lkog 'bras sel bar byed do/_b+hal+lA ta ka dang /_lhan cig zos na mdze nad sel bar byed do/_/mar sar dang lhan cig gis skyigs bu'i nad sel bar byed do/_/spos dkar dang lhan cig gis mtshan bar rdol ba sel bar byed do/_/spos dkar dang lhan cig gis mtshan bar rdol ba sel bar byed do/_/kha N+Da dang lhan cig gis kha
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]nad sel bar byed do/_/ba'i chu dang lhan cig gis me dbal sel bar byed do/_/'phags pa rtsa ba'i mdzod sman chen po'i rim pa slob dpon dpal ldan 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//[{D4437}]pri yaM
[\[294a.2\]]ku dang /_ka ko la dang /_shu dag dang /_ru rta dang /_yungs kar dkar po dang /_nA ga pu ShA dang /_spos dkar rnams kyi bdug pa byas na myur du tshor 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sgog pa zos na a ru dang /_ku Ta btags na dri ma med par 'gyur ro/_/chang btungs
[\[294a.3\]]nas du rba btags na dri ma med par 'gyur ro/_/pa ro lI'i khu ba btab na chang dkar por 'gyur ro/_/yang /_so so'i bI ra btab na rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/kA ra sum kha dkar po'i rtsa ba dang rma bya'i gtsug phud kyi rtsa ba dang /_gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar
[\[294a.4\]]bo'i rtsa ba rnams gcig tu byas nas btags te grib ma la bskams pa'i ril bu khar bcug cing /_lus la byugs pa byas na g.yul las mtshon cha bzlog par byed do/_skyu ru ra'i rtsa ba dang /_me tog phyung nas khar bcug na g.yul las mtshon cha rengs bar byed do/
[\[294a.5\]]u ng+d+ha d+t+ha ga l-i taM ba nA ni si k+ta mr-i t+ti kAM gr-i d+ya dak+to da ra ma d+h+ye pra kI s+ya ya ta gr-i ha phaT la sbrA ye ta/_ha hra i Sh+mi kA ya tan+ti/_tsa tu rda sh+yAM/_ba tu bA ra bri k+Sha s+ya dak+Shi Na sA khAM gr-i h+ya ka ra yi tA shri d+ga ma tI sh+ma shad g+ni/_tA d+hi taM/_phug ron gyi brun dang /_lham bu chu gsher gyi chu
[\[294a.6\]]dang /_gu gul dang /_shing tsha dang /_na gi dang /_ru rta dang /_gan ka'i sa bon dang /_'di dag gis bdugs pa'i ril bu sbyar te/_bdug spos 'dis rnyed pa dang bcas pa'i tshong 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sngags ni 'di 'o/_/oM na mo ca N+Da ku Sha ku ru ku ru sA hA/
[\[294a.7\]]'di ni byams gling gi gzims khang du rgya dpe bzhugs pa las chos rje rin po che ngag gi dbang phyug bsod nams rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i bka' bzhin du/_zha lu lo tsA ba dge slong chos skyong bzang pos rgya dpe bzhin ji ltar go ba rnams bsgyur ro//_//bla ma
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]dang sangs rgyas sman gyi bla drang srong tshe'i rig byed 'dzin pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thog mar nad kyi mtshan nyid brtag ba ni/_/pho ba'i nad rnams rlung la brten/_sems 'khrul pa dang za zir 'byung ba mkhris pa la brten/_rang bzhin gyis 'khrul ba bad kan
[\[294b.2\]]la brten/_tshad pa ma 'ju ba la brten/_rlung gi chad pa'i nad yun gyin tshad zhag bdun/_mkhris tshad zhag bcu/_bad kan tshad pa zhag bcu gnyis/_rlung tshad kyi brtan pa ni/_tshigs rnams brdungs pa lta bur na/_g.yal stong 'byung zhing bya snyong byed snying 'dod/
[\[294b.3\]]grang shum shin tu che/_lus kyi ba spu ldang /_mgo dang chu rgyus rtsib logs mur gong rkang mthil rnams lhag par na/_sgreg pa yang yang 'byung /_rna ba 'on/_kha la ro bska/_mig dang sen mo shin tu dmar/_lus la rngul 'byung /_de rnams chang ba 'am shas che na
[\[294b.4\]]nges par rlung dang ldan pa'o/_/rtags de rnams shas che zhing rtsar mkhris pa dang bad kan gnyis ka 'dug na 'dus pa'i rtags so/_mkhris tshad kyi rtags la/_chu yang yang 'tshag snying 'dod cing btsags tshe na zug kyang cung zad 'byung /_lus drod shin tu che/
[\[294b.5\]]mchu skam/_kha'i nang dang lce sogs la thor pa chung ngu mang du 'byung /_sna khrag 'bab/_mig mnan pa lta bu 'degs dka'/_gos gon 'bud byed snying 'dod/_mig dang sen mo mdog ser/_kha nas dri ngan pa 'byung /_kha ra ro kha/_de rnams tshang ba'am shas che
[\[294b.6\]]na mkhris pa ldan pa'o/_/rtags 'di rnams shas che zhing rtsar rlung rtsa dang bad kan gnyis ka 'dug na 'dus pa'i nad kyi rtags so/_bad kan kyi rtags la/_lus dang shes pa l+tsi bas gang yang byed mi 'dod pa/_dang kha 'gags shing zas gang la'ang bro ba med
[\[294b.7\]]mig mnan pa lta bur lci ba/_lus rtse ba yang byed/_lus la drod cung zad yod pa/_sems rtsa 'khrug/_/nyal snying 'dod/_kha la ro skyur/_mchil ma mang du 'byung zhing skyur dgos ba/_lus mdog mdangs med thal kha dang tshi che/_mig dang sen mo'i mdog
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]ljang /_de rnams tshang ba'am shas che na bad kan yin zhing /_gong gi rtags rnams phal cher tshang la rtsar rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis ka ldan pa 'dus pa'i rtags so/_/gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rtags la gtam chal chol smra/_gnyid che
[\[295a.2\]]mig dmar zhing mchi ma 'dzag/_/l+tse 'gags so/_/nad glo bur ba'i rtags la/_mig mdongs nas blta nan che zhing g.yo 'gul nyung /_lus sdod mi tshugs so/_/de ltar rtags dang rtsa mthun na rkyang pa dang /_dper na rlung gi rtags la mkhris pa'i rtsa/_mkhris
[\[295a.3\]]pa'i rtags la rlung gi rtsa lta bu 'dug na mkhris rlung ste des rigs bsgres te shes par bya'o/_/rtsa la brtag pa la/_rtsa ba rlung mkhris bad kan gsum gyi rtsa/_de las gyes ba bcu bzhi ste/_rlung gi gnas su rlung /_mkhris pa/_bad kan dang nye ba'i rlung /
[\[295a.4\]]mkhris pa'i gnas su mkhris pa/_rlung /_bad kan/_bad kan dang nye ba'i mkhris pa/_bad kan gyi gnas su bad kan/_rlung /_mkhris pa/_mkhris pa dang nye ba'i bad kan te bcu gnyis/_gsum ga'i gnas su rgyu ba'i khrag dang chu'i rtsa ste bcu bzhi'o/_/de
[\[295a.5\]]la rlung gi rtsa ni sbom la mgyogs/_mkhris pa'i rtsa ni grims la mgyogs/_bad kan gyi rtsa ni lhod la dal ba yin la/_de yang zhogs pa las ma 'khrugs shing zas gang yang ma zos gong du blta ste mkhrig ma'i gnyer ma dang po nas rim bzhin nam mkha'/_rlung /
[\[295a.6\]]me/_chu/_sa lnga las nam mkha' dang sa'i gnas bor bi rlung me chu gsum gyi gnas mtshon kan chag gsum gyi 'og tu rim pa ltar rlung mkhris bad kan gsum gyi gnas su bzung la/_rlung gnas rang gi rlung /_mkhris pa'i gnas kyi rlung /_bad kan gyi gnas
[\[295a.7\]]kyi rlung gsum/_de yang rlung gnas rang gi rlung rtsa _sarba _sbrul gyi 'gros lta bur 'phar/_mkhris gnas kyi rlung _b+ha i ba _bya rog gi 'gros ltar 'phar/_bad kan gnas kyi rlung rma _ma yU ra _bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar/_de bzhin du mkhris gnas rang gi mkhris rtsa la bsreg
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]pa 'phur ltar 'phar/_rlung gnas kyi mkhris rtsa shing gi 'gros ltar 'phar/_bad kan gnas kyi mkhris rtsa 'bab chu ltar 'phar ba/_bad kan rang gnas kyi rtsa ngang ba'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar/_rlung gnas kyi bad kan gyi rtsa sin 'bu pad+ma can gyi 'gros ltar
[\[295b.2\]]'phar/_mkhris gnas kyi bad kan gyi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros _dzuM_ ltar 'phar/_khrag la'ang gsum ste rlung _pA Ni _gnas kyi khrag rtsa nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar/_haMs rA dza _mkhris gnas kyi khrag rtsa'i byi'u'i skad ltar 'phar/_dzo 'u ka _bad kan gnas kyi khrag rtsa
[\[295b.3\]]phu ron gyi 'gros ltar 'phar/_chu la _maN+Du ka_gnyis te rlung gnas dang mkhris gnas kyi chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar/_bad kan _mcho li_gnas kyi chu'i rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar la/_rlung _ci re _gi gnas su sbrul gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na rang gnas su rang
[\[295b.4\]]ka bU ta/_/'gros te nad med kyi rtsa/_sreg pa'i 'gros ltar 'phar na mkhris rlung gi nad tshan _re wa_che zhing bcos dka'/_chu'i 'gros ltar 'phar na 'bring _kya kuTi _shig gi 'gros ltar 'phar na mkhris rlung yin kyang tshan chung la bcos sla/_go rim de bzhin ngang pa'i
[\[295b.5\]]rgyal bo sbal ba srin bu pad+ma can gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na bad rlung che 'bring chung gsum/_nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na khrag rlung yin kyang tshan chung /_bye'u ltar 'phar na khrag rlung 'bring po/_phug ron ltar 'phar na khrag rlung gi nad babs lci/_de bzhin du rta'i 'gros
[\[295b.6\]]ltar 'phar na rlung gi chu gso sla/_khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na gzhi che/_mkhris pa'i gnas su sreg pa 'phar ba ltar 'phar na rang gnas su rang ste nad med kyi rtsa/_sbrul dang rma bya'i 'gros bya rog gi skad gsum rim pa ltar mkhris rlung che 'breng chung gsum
[\[295b.7\]]ngang ba'i rgyal po srid 'bu pad+ma can/_sbal pa gsum gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na bad mkhris che 'breng chung gsum/_byi'u'i skad ltar 'phar na khrag 'phar na khrag mkhris chung ngu /_nya dang khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na khrag mkhris tshan che/_rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na chu
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]dang mkhris pa gzhe chung /_khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na gzhi che/_bad kan gyi gnas su ngang pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar na rang gnas su rang ste nad med/_sbrul dang bya rog rma bya gsum rim pa ltar bad rlung che 'breng chung
[\[296a.2\]]gsum/_sreg pa shig chu gsum bad mkhris che 'breng chung gsum/_nya byi'u phug ron gsum par khrag che 'breng chung gsum/_rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na chu dang bad kan shas che/_khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na chu dang bad kan yin kyang shas chung ngo /_de yang
[\[296a.3\]]mtshon gyi mas sner mkhris rtsa dang /_dkan gyi yas snar rlung rtsa/_dkan gyi mas sner bad kan gyi rtsa dang /_chag gi yas sner mkhris pa'i rtsa 'phar na nye ba'i gnas yin pas skyon chung ngo /_/rlung gi gnas su mkhris rtsa shig gi 'gros ltar 'phar na rlung mkhris
[\[296a.4\]]yin kyang bcos na myur du bde zhing ma bcos kyang 'cho'o/_/rlung gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa srin bu pad+ma can gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na mgo na/_glo dgog pa sogs 'byung zhing skyon chung yang ma bcos na ngang pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar song dogs pa'i nyin yod do/_/
[\[296a.5\]]'phral du nad zug gzer che yang rlung gi gnas su khrag gi rtsa nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na bcos kyang myur du bde zhing ma bcos kyang mi ring par 'tsho ba'o/_/rlung gi gnas su chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros lta bu 'phar na dbugs kha mi bde ba/_mig dmar zhing mig 'dag
[\[296a.6\]]mang pa sogs 'byung /_mkhris pa'i gnas su rlung rtsa bya rog gi 'gros ltar 'phar na kha skam skom dad che/_tshags tshogs sogs khol bur na yang gso sla/_mkhris pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros ltar 'phar na mgo bo na/_kha nas mchil ma
[\[296a.7\]]yang yang 'bo dgos shing mkhris pa'ang cung zad skyug go_/mkhris pa'i gnas su khrag gi rtsa byi'u'i skad ltar 'phar na lus la rtse yas byed ci _nas khrag cung zad 'dzag pa dang /_thor ba chung ngu 'byung /_mig gi
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]mdangs dmar ser du 'ong ngo /_/mkhris ba'i gnas su chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros lta bur 'phar na dngas ma 'dzag_/lus 'khyoms shing 'khor/_mig na zhing mig chu 'dzag go_/bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi rtsa rma bya'i 'gros lar 'phar na lus grang shum byed cing rkang
[\[296b.2\]]lag gi mgo drod med/_mdog snum/_zhag chung zhing skya thal po baspos pa dang 'khrog pa 'byung ngo /_/bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i rtsa 'bab chu'i 'gros ltar 'phar na glo dgog/_/brang tsha/_'grim zhing dbugs mi bde/_bad kan gyi gnas su khrag gi rtsa
[\[296b.3\]]phug ron gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na lus drod che/_rngul 'bab/_'og sgor khrag cung zad 'dzag_/'phongs lug pa sogs 'byung /_bad kan gyi gnas su rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na tshigs na zhing cung zad skrangs pa/_lus kyi mdangs mi gsal zhing tshi
[\[296b.4\]]che/_lus dri mi zhim mo/_/rlung gi gnas su mkhris pa'i rtsa sreg pa 'phur ba lta bur 'phar na/_dngas ma 'dzag_/rked pa na/_lus drod che/_lus las rngul mang du 'dzag_/lus gyong /_mkhris pa skyug_/mig ser/_chu ser por 'bab pa sogs
[\[296b.5\]]'byung zhing 'di ni mkhris rlung gi gtso bo ste bcos la bzab po/_/rlung gi sa ru mkhris pa'i rlung gi rtsa bya rog gi 'gros lta bur 'phar na/_lus brdungs ba ltar na/_pho ba sbos/_rna ba 'on/_lus la thor pa dang shu ba sogs 'byung ngo /_/rlung gi gnas su
[\[296b.6\]]mkhris pa'i bad kan gyi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros ltar 'bar na/_lus 'dar zhing g.yo/_gos gon mi 'dod/_cung zad 'thur du 'khru/_bya snyong dang /_g.yal stong byed/_pho ba 'khrogs pa sogs 'byung /_rlung gi gnas su mkhris pa'i khrag gi rtsa byi'u'i
[\[296b.7\]]'gros ltar 'phar na/_lus la za phrug byed/_tshags chigs dang mgo bo na/_mig na ba sogs 'byung /_rlung gi gnas su mkhris pa'i chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/_so rnyi la skrangs shing chu ser dang khrag 'byung /_mkhris tshad bskyed/_dbugs
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]mi bde/_gnyid che/_lus lci ba sogs 'byung ngo /_/rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa ngang ba'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar na lus brdungs shing gcus pa ltar na/_mgo bo 'khor/_dang kha 'gags/_lus khol bur
[\[297a.2\]]na/_chu gtong dka' ba sogs 'byung zhing 'di ni bad rlung gi gtso bo ste bcos la bzab po/_/rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi rlung gi rtsa rma bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na pho ba gcus pa ltar na/_rtsa gtor dka'/_rked pa dang chu rgyus na/_rlung [\[]sgra na[\]] sogs
[\[297a.3\]]'byung ngo /_/rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi mkhris pa'i rtsa 'bab chu'i 'gros ltar 'phar na brang tsha/_grang bsil che/_kha skom/_mig dang sen mo'i mdog ljang khur snang ba/_dngas ma 'dzag pa sogs 'byung ngo /_/rlung gi gnas su bad kan kyi
[\[297a.4\]]khrag gi rtsa phug ron gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na/_rngul 'dzag_/shu ba dang thor ba 'ong /_/mig dmar zhing 'byed 'dzums nyung ba sogs 'byung ngo /_/rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi chu'i rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na mig 'grib/_pags pa gyong /
[\[297a.5\]]chu gsog 'byung /_rtsa 'bur mor dod/_za 'phrug long zhing brad pa dang chu ser 'dzag_/pho bar srin 'bu 'phel ba sogs 'byung ngo /_/mkhris gnas su rlung gi rtsa sbrul lnga bur 'phar na/_lus kyi tshags tshigs brdungs pa ltar na/_chu 'tshag
[\[297a.6\]]dka' zhing zug che/_kha skom zhing thor pa mang /_grang bsil che/_skom dad che/_pho ba na ba sogs 'byung zhing 'di ni mkhris rlung gtso bo ste bcos la bzab pa gces/_mkhris gnas su rlung gi mkhris pa'i rtsa shig gi 'gros ltar 'phar na/_tshad pa
[\[297a.7\]]bskyed/_lus skam zhing drod che/_mig mi gsal/_kha rlungs dang rkang mthil drod che ba sogs 'byung /_mkhris gnas su rlung gi bad kan gyi rtsa srin bu pad ma can ltar 'phar na/_sbyi bo na/_le lo dang gnyid che/_mchil ma mang /_khar ro kha ba
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]sogs 'byung ngo /_/mkhris gnas su rlung gi khrag rtsa nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/_lus mdog dmar zhing ba sbu'i bu ga nas khrag kyang cud zad 'dzag_/mig chu mang ba sogs 'byung ngo /_mkhris gnas su rlung gi rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/_pho ba
[\[297b.2\]]sbos/_yan lag skam zhing tshigs dang gdong skrangs/_dri chu khrag ltar bab ba sogs 'byung /_mkhris gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa ngang ba'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar na khar ro mngar/_khong du srin 'bu 'phel/_khog par zo ba'i zho drag chags pa lta
[\[297b.3\]]bu 'byung ngo /_/lus kyi gting drod cung zad che zhing tshags tshigs sogs khol bur na/_mkhris skran 'cha' pa sogs 'byung ste bad mkhris kyi gtso bo yin pas btsos la gzab pa gces so/_/mkhris pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi rlung gi rtsa rma bya'i 'gros
[\[297b.4\]]ltar 'phar na/_nyin res 'jog tu na/_lus la rngul 'byung zhing dri mi zhim/_mig gi mdangs dkar por 'gro/_/mchil ma mang ba sogs 'byung /_mkhris pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi mkhris rtsa chu'i 'gros ltar bur 'phar na/_gnyid che/_lce
[\[297b.5\]]'gas/_lus gyong /_khrag cung zad skyug pa sogs 'byung ngo /_/mkhris pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi khrag rtsa phug ron gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na/_sna khrag 'bab/_khrag skran 'cha'/_lte ba gcu zhing gzer/_me lce 'khor lo 'byung /_mkhris
[\[297b.6\]]pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi chu'i rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros lta bur 'phar na/_dang kha mi bde/_me drod 'chor/_ma 'ju ba'i nad dang 'gro 'dug dka' ba sogs 'byung /_bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi rtsa sbrul gyi 'gros ltar 'gros ltar 'phar na/_rkang pa na/
[\[297b.7\]]'grims/_kha dri mi zhim/_mgo bo 'khor /_chu'i mdog ser ba sogs 'byung ste 'di ni bad rlung gi rtsa ba yin pas gzab bar bcos/_bad kan gyi gnas sa rlung gi mkhris rtsa shing gi mkhris rtsa shig gis 'gros ltar 'phar na/_dngas ma 'dzag
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]lus stobs nyams/_ngas chad pa sogs 'byung /_bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi bad kan gyi rtsa srin bu pad ma can gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na/_be snabs skyug cing glo che/_skya rbab dang mig
[\[298a.2\]]'dag mang ba sogs 'byung ngo /_bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi khrag gi rtsa nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/_pho ba 'khrog cing na/_dngas ma skams pas lus stobs nyams/_srong long 'byung /_nyin re mos kyis na
[\[298a.3\]]ba'o/_/bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/_pags nad kho la bu na ba sen mo btab kyang reg pa mi tshor ba/_yan lag skam/_dngas ma 'dzag_/lus mgo mjug thams cad na ba sogs
[\[298a.4\]]'byung /_bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i rtsa sreg pa 'phur ba ltar 'phar na/_nyal na ldang 'dod/_ldang na nyal 'dod/_zas skom mi 'dod pa dang chu skyur skyug_/lus drod che ba sogs 'byung ste/_'di yang bad
[\[298a.5\]]mkhris [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]gtso bo yin pas bcos la bzab/_bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i mkhris pa'i rlung rtsa bya rog gi 'gros ltar 'phar na/_gsus pa spo/_mas rlung gyen du ldog_/gzhang 'brum 'ong ba sogs 'byung /_bad
[\[298a.6\]]kan gyi gnas su mkhris ba'i bad kan gyi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/_khrag 'grims/_be snams skyugs/_lus dri mi zhim pa sogs 'byung /_bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i khrag gi rtsa byi'u'i skad
[\[298a.7\]]ltar 'phar na/_chu sogs 'byung /_brang tsha/_rtsib logs dang mchin pa na/_dang kha mi bde zhing zas mi 'ju ba sogs 'byung /_bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/_mig
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]kyong du rdib/_chus lus skrangs/_kha 'grig_/tshigs re mos su na ba sogs 'byung ngo /_/mkhris pa'i gnas su mkhris [(]par nga [,]pa rang [)]gi rtsa sbal ba'i 'gros dang khrag rtsa bye'u'i skad ltar dang /_rlung gi mkhris rtsa
[\[298b.2\]]shig gi 'gros gsum res 'jog tu 'phar na 'dus pa ste kha skom zhing 'grig_/skom dad che/_lus lci/_shes pa mi gsal na de ni myur du 'chi zhing mi 'tsho'o/_/bad kan gyi gnas su bad kan rang gi rtsa
[\[298b.3\]]ngang ba'i rgyal po'i 'gros dang rlung gi mkhris rtsa shig gi 'gros so/_/mkhris pa'i bad kan gyi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros gsum res 'jog du 'bar na/_de yang nad gsum 'dus pa ste mi 'tsho'o/_/lus 'khru ba/
[\[298b.4\]]skyugs pa/_mgo dang tshags tshigs na ba/_so dang lce nag por song ba/_pho ba dang stod la gzer ba sogs nad rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ga'i rtags tshang zhing /_rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa ngang
[\[298b.5\]]pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/_de ni nges par mi 'tsho'o/_rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ka'i gnas su 'gros rnams nges med sna tshogs su rgyu na nad yun ring zhing 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rlung gi
[\[298b.6\]]gnas su rlung dang /_mkhris pa'i gnas su 'ang rlung rtsa 'phar na ma 'dzu ba'i nad ste gso sla'o/_/de ltar rtsa'i dbye ba rnams ma nor bar gtan la phab ste nad gang yin ngos zin pa dang /_de'i sman dang sbyod
[\[298b.7\]]lam rnams bya ba ni gnad do/_/zhes drang srong chen po da nan+d+ra ste sbyin pa'i dbang ba'i mdzad pa'i rtsa ba rtag cing gtan la 'bebs pa'i rab tu dbye ba rdzogs so//_//
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]{D4438}]@/_/mtshon 'og 'byung ba rlung gi sa rlung gi gnas so/_/rkang 'og 'byung ba me'i sa mkhris pa'i gnas so/_/chag gi 'og 'byung ba chu'i sa bdag na gyi gnas so/_/zas dang spyod lam bstan pa ni/_rlung gi nad mtha' dag la/_dro sar dal bar 'dug_/me la sro zhing byug pa byed/_rtsam pa
[\[299a.2\]]bA da/_pi ta/_ka pha/_bA da/_sarba/_pi ta/_bA da/_ka pa/_pi ta/_ka pa/_bA da/_pi ta/_ka pha/_dang mar/_sha dang de'i khu ba gtong /_mkhris pa'i nad la bA la dang shri khaN gnyis zhib par btags la chur sbyar ba'i byug pa byed/
[\[299a.3\]]rlang _mkhris pa _bad kan rlung _sbrul _mkhris pa _rlung _bad kan_mkhris pa_bad kan _rlung _mkhris pa/_bad kan_grang sar bsdad/_nad tshabs che na lto bkag gtong /_gzhan pag thug kho na bsten no/_/bad kun la grang dro ran par byas la dal
[\[299a.4\]]dzuM/_dza lu ka_/rak+ta/_la bka_/ba is/_ma Tu ka_haM sa radza/_ma yU ra/_pA Ni/_rak+ta/_bus 'chag_/sran rtsam sogs zas yang zhing 'ju ba'i rigs bsten/_bcud can dang lci ba'i rigs 'dzem mo/_/dngul chu 'dul
[\[299a.5\]]shag_srin bu pad+ma can_khrag_phreg ba_bya rog_sbal pa_ngang pa'i rkyal po _rma bya _chu _khrag _lugs la/_rdo gzhong gi nang du dngul chu zho nyi shu rtsa bzhi blug_/de dang rdza rnying pa'am so phag khyor gang tsam dang mnyam du nyin gnyis
[\[299a.6\]]pA Ni/_ma tsha li/_re ba/_rak+ta/_pA Ni/_tsi ri/_re ba/_pA Ni/_ka phu tra/_ku k+ki+uTi/_kyi bar du nyed/_de nas chu gtsang mar bsrings te dngul chu dang sa rang sar phye/_chu khog ma phyed tsam blug de la 'bras bu gsum dang
[\[299a.7\]]chu _nya_rta_khrag_chu _byi'u _rta_chu_phug ron _khyim bya _rgya gar stod ja zhib par btags pa khyor gang tsam zhig blug_/gong gi dngul chu ras gtsang mas dril la skud pas kha bsdams te
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]chur sor bzhi tsam ma reg par khebs gcod la gtags te kha legs par bsgrigs nas rlangs pa mi 'chor ba byed/_nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig tsam me btang la rlangs pas btsos/_chu grang thag chod pa dang bton te rdo gzhong legs par bkrus pa'i nang du
[\[299b.2\]]blugs la shing g+hi wa kwa ra'i shing gzhogs dang mnyam du nyin gsum gyi bar grib ma la brdung ba dang nyi ma la bsro ba chu tshod re tsam gyi bar re mos su byed/_de nas shing che la chang gar mas khu ba byas nas nyin gsum gyi bar la nyed cing /_'di nas
[\[299b.3\]]gzung nyin rer nyi mar 'jog thengs gnyis tsam las sngon ma lugs kyi re mos mi dgos/_de nas skyes pa'i chu dang ra'i 'o ma/_ba'i 'om/_ba sar pa'i chu rnams dang mnyam du rim pa bzhin nyin gsum re nyed/_de nas nyi ma me tog gi lo ma
[\[299b.4\]]logs su brdungs pa'i khu ba/_sgog skya rdzogs pa'i khu ba/_ba sar pa'i chu rnams dang mnyam du go rim bzhin nyin re nyed/_de nas mu zi ser po zho nyi shu rtsa bzhi zhib par btags/_lcags snod du ba mar sar pa bskol ba'i btsag chod ba dang
[\[299b.5\]]btab la me cung zad btang nas ba'i 'o ma'i nang du dal bus blug la snyigs ma ma shor ba byed cing /_'khang pa dang /_mar dang 'o ma gnyis 'dres nas mu zi gting du 'khur ba ltar chags yod pa de dang gong gi dngul chu gnyis bsres nas cung zad nyed/
[\[299b.6\]]rdo gzhong zhig tu su ma la zho phyed bzhir ra'i 'o ma cung zad re blug nas nyed/_yang skam pa dang ldugs pa sogs nyin gsum gyi bar byed/_ba sar pa'i chu dang 'o ma so sor rim bzhin nyin gsum re'i bar gong bzhin skam 'thag byas la tshar ba dang gong
[\[299b.7\]]gi dngul chu dang mu zi'i zla la bsres/_rdo gzhong nang du rgya tsha zho do skyes pa'i chu dang mnyam du skam 'thag gong bzhin nyin gsum gyi bar byas nas dngul chu'i zla la bsres pa de rnams rdo gzhong gi nang du nyin bdun gyi bar du skam nyed byed/_de nas bzhu
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]shel gyi dam pe ras kyis dril la 'jim pa byugs/_de skams pa dang yang ras dang 'jim pa rim pa bdun gyi bar dril ba'i nang du gsum gnyis tsam gang ba blug_/lcags kyi skya ba dam per bcug_/rdza'i khog ma gting du bye ma
[\[300a.2\]]sor gsum tsam gting ba'i steng du bzhag se kha 'tshams shepar bye mas stems/_dam pe'i nang du zha nye zho phyed do blug ste/_lcags mdas dal bus dkrugs pa dang nyi shar nas nyi ma rgas tsam gyi bar me gtong /_de nas lcags mda' bton la kha
[\[300a.3\]]rgya cha btags pa'i chus brdzis pa'i 'dam gyis bcad/_de steng bye ma bkab ste khebs rgyab la nyin zhag phrug gcig gi par me shin tu tsha ba mtshams ma chad par btang /_de nas bye ma grang thag ma chod ring tho ma btang bar bzhag_/grang nges pa
[\[300a.4\]]dang bton la dal bus dam pe bcag la phyung bas dngul chu dug bral lhad med du yod do/_!_/yang lugs gcig la/_dngul chu zho do/_/mu zi ser po zho do/_/shing a d+ha dza ri gsum/_na kA tsa le tshom pa re/_tu la pa'i khu ba rnams sgang
[\[300a.5\]]sgogs nang du blugs/_'jim pa spyin pos kha legs par bcad/_de nas ras bdun brtsegs par 'jim pa dang bcas gril lugs gong ltar byas la khog ma'i nang du bye ma blugs nas bye ma dang bcas me gtong lugs gong 'dra'i nyin zhag phyed
[\[300a.6\]]par btang la grang ba dang bton te sgo nga dal bus bcags pas dngul chu dug bral lhad med du 'byung ngo /_/yang lugs gcig la dngul chu zho bdun dang pi pi la'i shun pa nyag gang bcas rdo gzhong du nyin bdun gyi bar du nyid/_b+ha ga re'i thang chu
[\[300a.7\]]blug la slar yang nyin bdun nyed/_de nas rdza sa'i bar du skam thag legs par chod pa'i nang du li shi zho do dang bcas blug la kha legs par bcad bar du _pi pi ling 'jim pa blug pa'i ras rim pa gsum gyis dril/_khog ma bye mas brgyangs
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]par kha bcad de me gtong lugs sogs gong bzhin nyin zhag phrugs gcig gi bar byas te grang ba dang bton pas kyang dug bral lhad med du 'byung /_zha nye dkar po/_zha nye nag po/_gsha' tshe gsum mang nyung ji ltar byed kyang cha bsnyams la khog ma'i
[\[300b.2\]]nang du blug_/de la me btang ste zhu ba dang snod gzhan zhig tu ba mar sar pa btsags legs par bcad/__de nas lcags skyogs chung ngu zhig gis mar _rang+ka _nyung zad re blug la nyishu _khas rba lha _ti tsha yang zer/_dkrug_/mar blug pa'i du ba yal ba dang yang
[\[300b.3\]]mar blugs pa sogs lan bdun gyi bar byas/_de nas byA Ta'i lo ma dang d+hu ti gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i phye ma gsha' dkar sogs mi mngon par 'debs shing dkrugs/_de nas kha bcad la nyi ma'i bzhi cha tsam gyi bar la me shin tu che ba
[\[300b.4\]]btang /_de nas me thag bcad de grang ba dang bton la/__se ba bzhi nas phyed gsum gyi bar nad babs lci yang dang bstun te btang bas rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ka la phan zhing nA ga ra sa ste de dang ka ra bsres nas zos na dwangs ma 'dzag pa la mchog tu phan/
[\[300b.5\]]a ru ra bsnan nas btang na mgo bo na ba la phan no/_/rdza'i par bu'i nang du zha nye dkar po nyag gang blug___/de la me btang nas zhu ba dang dngul chu nyag phyed blugs la me mtshams ma bcad par gtong zhing skya bas dkrug pa dang mnyam du ba bla btags
[\[300b.2\]]nang du blug_/de la me btang ste zhu ba dang snod gzhan zhig tu ba mar sar pa btsags legs par bcad/_de nas lcags skyogs chung ngu zhig gis mar _rang+ka _nyung zad re blug la nyishu _khas rba lha _ti tsha yang zer/_dkrug_/mar blug pa'i du ba yal ba dang yang
[\[300b.3\]]mar blugs pa sogs lan bdun gyi bar byas/_de nas byA Ta'i lo ma dang d+hu ti gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i phye ma gsha' thudakar sogs mi mngon par 'debs shing dkrugs/_de nas kha bcad la nyi ma'i bzhi cha tsam gyi bar la me shin tu che ba
[\[300b.4\]]btang /_de nas me thag bcad de grang ba dang bton la/_se ba bzhi nas phyed gsum gyi bar nad babs lci yang dang bstun te btang bas rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ka la phan zhing nA ga ra sa ste de dang ka ra bsres nas zos na dwangs ma 'dzag pa la mchog tu phan/
[\[300b.5\]]a ru ra bsnan nas btang na mgo bo na ba la phan no/_/rdza'i par bu'i nang du zha nye dkar po nyag gang blug_/de la me btang nas zhu ba dang dngul chu nyag phyed blugs la me mtshams ma bcad par gtong zhing skya bas dkrug pa dang mnyam du ba bla btags
[\[300b.6\]]pa nyag phyed rim bzhin btab ste gsum ga legs par 'dres pa dang par bu'i kha bcad rlung mi 'chor bar bya/_de nas ras dang rdzas khrag gang rigs kyis brdzis pa'i 'jim pa byugs shing yang ras dkri ba sogs rim pa sum brtsegs su byas/
[\[300b.7\]]de skams pa dang nyin zhag lnga me mtshams ma chad par btang /_de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton/_ba'i zho ras la btsags te khu ba legs par bton pas brdzis pa srab 'thug sor gang tsam yod pa'i sgor mor btang la ras kyis bdun brtsegs
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]tsam dril nas skud pas bsdams te gci ba'i me'i dkyil du bcug la ras tshig tsam gyi tshod bzhag_/de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton la phye mar nyes pa dang zhos khu ba byas nas brdzis te bsreg pa sogs gong ltar lan nyi shu'i bar byas
[\[301a.2\]]pa ni bang+ge shwa ra zer te stobs bskyed dang /_nad tsha grang gsar rnying thams cad la phan zhing /_nad gzhi che ba la gtong na thun tshad sran ma tsam dang /_gzhi chung ba dang nad med la 'bras nyis 'gyur tsam re gtong ngo /_/'di'i phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab
[\[301a.3\]]po/_/zangs mang nyung ci 'dod pa sbrang gshog legs par brdungs/_rdza snod kyi nang du ba'i gcin la chu cung zad bsres par kha ri lu Na dang mnyam du btab la nyin phyed kyi bar du me btang la btsos/_de nas bton la snod bkrus pa'i nang du slar yang
[\[301a.4\]]das+b+ha aM baM li'i 'bru chur btab pa'i nang du nyin phyed 'tshed/_de nas chu de pho la snod bkrus te sgyu ru ra chur btab pa'i nang du nyin phyed 'tshed/_de nas ba'i dar bar kha ri lu Na btab pa'i nang du zhag bdun gyi bar du 'jog cing 'di skabs me gtong mi
[\[301a.5\]]dgos/_de nas zangs gshog ston la legs par bkrus te mu zi ser po dang cha mnyam bteg pa phye mar byas la rdza'i par bu'i nang du mu zi bting /_de steng zangs gshog gcig bzhag_/yang mu zi bting /_de steng zangs gshog 'jog pa yogs kyi
[\[301a.6\]]zangs gshog grangs du yod par brtsegs la kha 'grig par bcad de rlung mi 'chor bar byas/_de ras kyis gtums shing 'jim pas 'byug pa sogs sum rim tsam byas la slar yang phyi 'jim pas legs par gtums la skam thag chod pa dang /_de
[\[301a.7\]]nas sa dong brus par gci ba'i me'i nang du nyin gcig gi bar du bsregs/_thal ba grang thag chod pa dang btan la rdo gzhong gi nang du nyes nas phye mar byas la thun sran ma bzhi tsam gyi tshod re btang bas grang ba'i rigs dang /_rlung /_bad rlung /_dang kha 'byed pa/
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]lus stobs bskyed pa/_rked pa na ba rnams la phan/_yang sho mos zho gang phe mar btags pa dang gong gi zangs thal se ba bzhi bsres pa thun re byas btang bas yan lag zha 'khums la mchog tu phan no/_/su ma sog gser zho do dang se ba brgyad la sbrang gshog
[\[301b.2\]]'than/_mtshal seb bco lnga dang bil ba'i nang gi 'bru _mithi gnyis zhib par btags par chu cung zad kyang blugs pa'i skyo ma gser shog la byugs_/de nas gser shog sgril la bil ba'i nang du bcug_kho Da yon sog gser _kha legs par bcad de ras kyis dril
[\[301b.3\]]la 'jim pa sor phyed tsam byugs/_skam thag chod pa dang sa dong brus par gci ba'i me nang du nyin gcig bsregs la grang thag chod pa dang bton te phye mar byas la 'bras nyis 'gyur tsam kyi tshad lga ser dang mnyam du zos na glo nad dang dbugs mi bde ba g.yal ba
[\[301b.4\]]rnams la phan zhing skyug pa chod/_ba'i gci ba'i thal ba dang mnyam du zos na dang kha dang skom nad la phan/_lga dang mnyam du btang na skran/_shu ba'am khye rngo /_pho srin/_rlung skran rnams rtsa ba nas 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/lcags phye nyag gang la dngul chu nyag phyed
[\[301b.5\]]bsres te zhib par nyes/_chu la shing gi wa kwa ra'i khu ba blugs nas gar sla zho tsam byas la/_rdo gzhong nang du nyi mar nyed cing skams pa dang khu ba gar sla sogs gong ltar byas pa lan brgya dang brgyad kyi bar byed/_de nas rdza'i par bu'i nang du blug_/kha rlung mi 'chor bar
[\[301b.6\]]legs par bcad/_de nas 'jim pa dang ras spel mar lan bdun gyi bar sgril bskam thag chod pa dang rdza'i khog ma che ba mthil du bug pa rgya khab kyi rtse tshud pa tsam yod pa zhig bye mas brdzangs pa'i dkyil du bcug_/kha legs par bsgrigs te rlung sogs ye mi 'chor ba byas
[\[301b.7\]]te nyin zhag bzhi'i ring me shin tu tsha ba mtshams ma chad pa gtong /_'di skabs las byed mi ma gtogs 'grul gcod/_de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton la thun tshad 'bras tsam re bya/_'di ni spyi 'joms chen mo ste/_rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa rims sogs nad gsar
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]rnying gar dang gang la yang 'dis mi phan pa med pas sman thams cad kyi rgyal po lta bu'o/_/zha nye nag po nyag phyed lcags snod kyi nang du bzhu/_sa ser zhib par btags pa'i nang du blug_/yang bton la bzhu ba sogs lan nyer gcig gi bar byed/_ldong
[\[302a.2\]]ros dang tsha la nyag re bsres la zhib par btags/_rdza snod du zha nye blug la me btang ste zhu ba dang gong gi tsha la sdong ros bsres pa'i phye ma cung zad re 'debs pa dang mnyam du skya bas dkrugs/_legs par 'dres nas thal bar song ba dang shing gi wa nam sil
[\[302a.3\]]krara'i khu _so sngag _ba blug ste skya bas dkrug cing nyin phyed kyi bar me btang /_thal bar song ba dang kha legs par bcad la nyin mtshan lnga dang nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig gi bar me btang /_de nas grang ba dang bton la thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du btang na
[\[302a.4\]]rlung gi nad gsar rnying thams cad la phan/_ka ra dang mnyam du btang na khrag gi rigs la phan/_lga dang mnyam du btang na bad kan gyi rigs dang ma 'ju ba sogs pho ba'i nad la phan/_a ru ra'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na mkhres pa'i rigs la phan/pi pi ling dang
[\[302a.5\]]mnyam du btang na dang kha 'byed/_khrag dang rlung la brten nas dwangs ma 'dzag na bu ram rnying pa dang mnyam du btang /_mkhris pa la brten nas 'dzag na a ru ra dang mnyam du btang /_ba mar gsar pa dang mnyam du zos na stobs skyed par byed/_gcong gis zin pa'i nad
[\[302a.6\]]lus shin tu rid dun gur gum dang mnyam du gtong zhing gzhan yang nad tshod dang bstun te kha bsgyur byas te btang bas kun la phan par 'gyur ro/_/ti tsha'am gsha' tshe nyag gang rdza snod du bzhu la pa ra ki ri nyag phyed dang /_so ra nyag phyed bsres te zhib par btags pa'i phye
[\[302a.7\]]ma cung zad re 'debs/_shing lcags kyi gzar bu chung ngu'i ltag pas nyed cing dkrug nyin phyed kyi bar byas pas 'dres te thal bar song ba dang khed sa rgyab la nye ma'i bzhi cha gcig me btang /_grang thag chod pa dang bton la phye mar byas te dar la btsags/_de nas phye ma de
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]dang /_li shi/_/dzA ti gsum se ba re/_po ris/_lga/_pi pi ling gsum se ba gsum re rnams zhib par btags/_sbrang rtsis rta byas la ril bu sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam sgril la ril bu re btang bas byis pa 'khru ba'i nad dang 'cham pa la phan zhing gnyid ma khug par btang bas kyang
[\[302b.2\]]la lbaMb/_gnyid dza yi pa la du 'gro/_a mir tse shut+Thi pi pi li ru ra dang bsres nas btang na dbug sa mi bde ba la phan/_mgo bo na na ril bu chur brdar la sna bug tu blug pas phan par 'gyur/_ga bur dang bsres nas btang na kha'i dri ngan pa rtsa ba nas 'byin/_zho dang mnyam du btang na skran
[\[302b.3\]]thon/_kha ru tsha dang mnyam du btang na ma 'ju ba'i nad sel lo/_/zangs mang nyung gang byed kyang sbrang gshog legs par 'than la jem rtses chung ngur gtubs pa dang mu zi ser po zangs che chung gang yin gyi phyed mar gtang ba dam pe'i khog par blug la skyu ru ra dang nem bu'i chu blug
[\[302b.4\]]la kha legs par bcad de nas kyi dkyil du zla ba gcig bzhag_/de nas bton la phye mar byas te thun tshad se ba bzhi'i rtsis chu grang gis 'phul la btang na dug dang mkhris pa'i nad 'phral du skyugs nas phan zhing srin nad la btang na yang 'khru sgyug yong la/_gzhan
[\[302b.5\]]yang skyugs kyis phan pa'i nad gang la 'ang btang bas sgyug sman gyi mchog go/_/kha par+sang+ha nyag phyed pa brdar ba'i phye ma dang /_mu zi ser po nyag phyed/_dngul chu spor gang gsum rdo gzhong du nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig gi ring zhib par nyes la gi wa kra ra'i khu bas gar sla zho tsam
[\[302b.6\]]byas pa nyi ma dang grib ma phyed khyer du nyes/_skam thag chod pa dang slar yang khya ba lugs ti tsha'am gsha' cha/_pa sogs nyin bcu gsum gyi bar byed/_bzhu shel gyi dam per ras dang 'jim pa spel mar byugs pa bdun brtsegs byas pa skam thag chod pa dang blug la kha rdzas
[\[302b.7\]]spyin po mgar ba'i so rdog_/a ra ka_/bu ram/_rgya gar stod ja rnams cha mnyam pa zhib par btags pa ba'i 'o mas brdzis la 'dam btags nyin gcig byas pa'i 'jim pas dam pe'i kha shin tu dam par bkag_/de ras kyis gtums la gong gi 'jim pas dam pe yongs
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]rdzogs la 'byug_/de skam pa dang khog ma che ba zhig gi nang bye ma'i dkyil du bcug la kha legs par bcad de nyin zhag bzhi'i bar me mtshams ma chad par btang /_de nas grang ba dang bton la nad babs che na sran ma gcig tsam nas nad med la 'bras
[\[303a.2\]]nyis 'gyur gyi bar 'os 'gab btang bas nad ngos zin ma zin gsar rnying gang la yang phan zhing /_nad med kyis zos na rgas kha sra ba dang stobs bskyed pa la sogs pa phan yon bsam mi khyab po/_/zha nye dkar po nyag gang lugs kong du bzhu la legs par bzhu ba
[\[303a.3\]]dang snum gyi dkyil du blug_/de 'khang pa dang yang bzhu blug gong ltar lan gsum gyi bar du byed/_de nas snod che ba zhig tu bzhu la 'bras bu gsum zhib par btags pa'i bye ma thal 'debs pa ltar rim bzhin btabs nas thal bar ma song bar lcags skyogs chung ngu'i
[\[303a.4\]]ltag pas nyid/_de nas kha legs par bcad la nyi ma'i brgyad cha tsam rmi bar me btang /_grang thag chod pa dang bton la zho ras la btsags te khu ba legs par bton pas brdzis te srab ma thug sor gang tsam yod pa'i sgor mor btang /_de ras kyis bdun brtsegs tsam dril
[\[303a.5\]]la skud pas bsdoms/_gci ba'i me'i dkyil du bcug la ras tshig tsam gyi tshad bzhag_/de nas me shi zhing grang thag chod pa dang bton la zhib par btags/_yang lugs gcig la/_gsha' dkar srab ma thug shog bu tsam brdungs la/_bod kyi so ma ra ce'i lo ma zhib
[\[303a.6\]]par 'phur ba/_ras kha gang las phad bu bzos pa'i nang du so ma ra tsa bting la/_gsha' dkar sbrang gshog de'i steng du rim brtsegs su bzhag pa'i bar mtshams su so ma ra tsa sor gsum yod pa byas la kha btsems te/_steng 'og thams cad la lci ba ser kha ma sor bzhi re
[\[303a.7\]]yod pa'i dkyil du bcug ste me chung ngu btang shing lci ba tshig pa dang grang du bcug_/de nas lci thal bsal te so ma ra tsa'i dkyil du tshal dkar me la bsregs rtepa ltar 'ong ba de gzhan dang ma 'dres par 'don/_so ma ra tsa nyung ba dang me tshas na gsha' dkar thig bur 'dril 'ong bas
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]ran pa gal che/_de ba sing+ng+hi bang+ga zer te thun tshad se ba gsum nas bzhi'i bar nad gzhi che chung dang bstun nas gtong /_de kha bsgyur byed lugs ni/_ga pur cung zad dang mnyam du zos na kha'i dri ngan pa sel/_dzAti nyis 'gyur bsres nas btang na lus kyi stobs 'phel bar
[\[303b.2\]]'gyur/_yang ba mar dang mnyam du btang kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra/_tul pa'i lo ma'i thang chu dang bsres nas btang na dwangs ma tsha grang gang gis 'dzag pa yang chod/_shel dkar dang mnyam du btang kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra/_ba mar sar pas rta byas btang na mkhris pa
[\[303b.3\]]sha ser dang grang rlung la phan/_ra ma'i chus rta byas btang na rlung gis lto ba sbos pa sel/_tsha la mer bsregs pa'i phye mdang mnyam du btang na khrag skran thon par 'gyur/_yung ba dang mnyam du btang na khrag mkhris thon par 'gyur zhing grang mkhris la phan/
[\[303b.4\]]bye kar dang mnyam du btang na bad kan smug po la phan/_pA na dang mnyam du btang na dwangs ma 'phel/_pi pi ling dang mnyam du btang na dang kha 'byed/_'o mas rta byas btang kyang gong dang 'dra/_a ru ra dang mnyam du btang na steng rlung dang dbugs kha mi bde ba la
[\[303b.5\]]phan/_sa mu dwa phal dang mnyam du btang na sna'i nad la phan/_li shi dang mnyam du btang na pho nad la phan/_gla rtsi dang mnyam du btang na rdo rje las su rung zhing 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro/_/yang khang byil gyi brun chur sbyangs la lte bar byugs te sman
[\[303b.6\]]zos kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra/_go yu'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na ma 'ju ba'i nad sel/_sgog skya dang mnyam du btang na yan lag gum pa la phan/_bdar dang mnyam du btang na mig ser la phan/_se 'bru'i shing gi lo ma dang mnyam du
[\[303b.7\]]btang na skyug sman gyi mchog tu 'gyur te zas spyod skabs dang sbyar ro/_/daN+Da'i rtsa ba/_'u su'i rtsa ba/_sle tres/__gla sgang /_purna na ba/_lga rnams cha mnyam gyi thang chu sum gnyis la bsdus te a nAr btang na rlung la brten pa'i
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]nad thams cad la phan/_gla sgang /_lga/_kuT ki/_tig ta/__'u su'i 'bru rnams cha mnyam gyi thang gong bzhin btang na mkhris pa la brten pa'i nad thams cad la phan/_'ba' zho rgun 'brum li shi_/pi pi ling /_a ka ra/__lga/
[\[304a.2\]]la la phud chung ba rnams cha mnyam/_tsI rA ya ta cha gnyis bcas chur ri nga yar btab la sum gnyis bsdus pa'i thang zhag gsum gyi bar du btang na tshad pa'i nad rigs kun la phan zhing gos kyis byibs la rngul kyang 'don no/_/shing kun dkar cha
[\[304a.3\]]gcig_/zi ra dkar po dang cha gsum re/_kha ru tsha cha gnyis rnams chu la bsdus pa'i thang btang na rlung dang pho ba'i nad la tsha log byed pa zas ma 'ju ba rnams la phan/_rgya skyegs/_'u su/_la la phud rnams cha mnyam chur zhag gcig spangs pa'i thang
[\[304a.4\]]ka ras rta byas tho rengs btang na lus drod me ltar 'bar ba la phan/_'u su dang kha ru tsha mnyam pa'i thang btang na rlung dang pho ba'i nad la tsha log byed pa zas ma 'ju ba rnams la phan/_a karkA ra/_la la phud/_ku ba_kha ru tsha/_lga rnams cha mnyam gyi
[\[304a.5\]]thang gong bzhin bsdus la btang na bad kan la brten pa'i nad thams cad la phan/_sle tres/_gla sgang /_u tI sa'i rtsa ba/'u su'i 'bru/_lga/_ku ba rnams cha mnyam gyi thang gong bzhin bskol nas btang na 'dus pa'i nad thams cad la phan
[\[304a.6\]]no/_/gur guM/_gla rtsi/_gi waM/_ga pur/_shrI khan+Da rnams cha mnyam phye mar btags la chus khu ba byas te lus la bsku mnye byas na/_rlung mkhris bad kan la brten pa'i sha drod che ba lus rngul 'dar shing ba spu sgreng ba/_shes pa 'khrug shing 'gro sdong sna
[\[304a.7\]]tshogs byed pa/_gdon _b+he _gyis tsan+da kar po zin pa lta bus mig 'bur tshugs su blta zhing /_mig sngar sna tshogs mthong ba/_nyin gnyid mi thub cing shes pa zi ba/_gos yang yang 'bud pa sogs nad glor bur ba la phan no/_/spyi 'joms mu sa la'i
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]sbyor ba ni/_mu sa ya rdza snod gsar pa'i nang du blug par ba'i 'o ma lhad med sor gang tsam gyis mtho ba blug_/kha legs par bcad de rlung mi 'chor bar byed/_me chung ngu yun ring pos khu ba rang thim par 'tshed/_de nas grib bskams byas la skam pa dang zhib par
[\[304b.2\]]btags pa dar la btsags pa nyag gang /li shi la waM ga dang dza yi pha la zho bzhi re/_mi ra tsa dang su tha/_pi pa la gsum zho bcu gnyis re rnams zhib par btags la ba'i chus rta byas nas btang na chu bsags la phan zhing gzhan yang rtag pa'i rims dang
[\[304b.3\]]khrag bshal ba dang /_chu lam du khrag 'dzag pa rnams la mchog dzAti phan no/__/bo ris chu grang lga gis pi pi ling /_rta byas la btang na rims nyin gcig pa dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang rims drag po dang /_rlung nad kyis lus drod med
[\[304b.4\]]pa rnams la phan no/_/sbrang rtsis rta byas la btang na tshad pa gsar rnying dang mkhris pa sha ser la phan no/_/nim bu'i khu bas rta byas nas btang na mkhris pa mig ser la mchog tu phan/_li shi bsnan te zos na glo la phan/_ba mar sar pa btsags bcad
[\[304b.5\]]pas rta byas nas btang na lus stobs shor nas spyod mi nus par dwangs ma 'phel bar 'gyur/_lasu na brdungs pa'i khu bas rta byas te ril bu dril bas btang na skad 'gag pa la phan zhing skad sman yang yang ngo /_/chang gis rta byas nas btang na byis pa
[\[304b.6\]]btsa' ma thub pa myur du btsa' bar 'gyur/_ku me DA'i khu bas rta byas nas btang na chu rlung gis lto ba sbos pa sel/_dzA mu Na'i 'bru dang pags pa brdungs pa'i khu bas rta byas nas sna bug la blug na mi rga zer ba'i mgo bor 'bu yod pa'i nang chu/_me/_nyi ma/
[\[304b.7\]]'od can sogs mthong bas rkyen byas nas rgyal zal lta bu zhig long ba de la phan no/_/rgya gar stod ja dang mnyam du btang na pho dbang las su rung bar 'gyur ro/_/shu dag_/btsa dang mnyam du btang na tsha ba'i skom dad kyi rigs dang srod long la phan/_mu zi ser
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]po dang cha mnyam btags la btang na rlung gis rna ba 'on pa dang mig gis mi mthong ba la phan/_gong gi mu sa li'i gcig po dang /_pho ril/_pi pi ling /_lga bzhi cha mnyam btags la sman thun che phyogs gnyis kyi rtsis chu grang gis 'phul
[\[305a.2\]]nas btang na rgyu dang mi rgyu/_sbyar dug sha dug sogs dug rigs kun la phan te 'di yan mu sa lir kha bsgyur byas pa'i spyor sde'i 'phros don yin no/_/nad gzhi che ba'i rigs la sbyong gtong ba'i shal sman ni/_smin drug_/mgo_/rgyal/_mchu rnams kyi zla ba
[\[305a.3\]]la/_dze+e pa la se ba bcu gnyis/_hA Da Da se ba ni/_mi ra tsa zho gang /_tsu ka se ba phyed gsum zhib par btags la ril bu lnga byas/_thun tshad ril bu rer mar sar gyis dril la mid/_de'i rjes su chu bskol hub gsum tsam re btang pag nad ro rnams sbyangs nas
[\[305a.4\]]mang du _dan rog _bshal bar 'gyur/_a ru ra_/sbyangs zin __pho ris _nas _ni mkhu'i chu _gcod sman a phI ma/_dzA ti/_am+b+ha ki ko li/_bi dza ya rnams cha mnyam thog mar dzA ti dang a shI ma gnyis mar sar chung ngu dang mnyam du btags/_de nas bzhi ga chabs cig
[\[305a.5\]]zhib par btags la bye kar ram sbrang gang rigs kyis rta byas la ril bu sgyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam sgril nas ril _sha 'bras kyi nang /_so mar tsa _bu re btang /_des 'grim pa'i rigs gang yin kyang chod do/_/yang na dzA ti'i khog brus pa'i nang du a phI ma sran ma nyis
[\[305a.6\]]'gyur tsam zhig blug ste kha bcad la gro zhib kyi pag gis dril la gci ba'i me du ba yal ba'i dkyil du bsregs/_bag de bag leb tshos pa tsam gyi tshad du sleb pa dang bton la dzA ti de nas thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam re zos pas nges par chod do/_/yang
[\[305a.7\]]na zla ba gong gi bzhi po la sbyongs sman/_ngan rog dzai pa la/_dngul chu pA ra/_mu zi ser po gan+ng+ha ka po ris _/mi ro tsa/_pi pi ling pi pa la/_lga shuNI rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags/_thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam re chu skol gyis phul nas btang na nad ro sbyong bar
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/de gcod lugs gong dang 'dra'o/_/yang na dzai pa la se ba bcu gnyis/_mi ra tsa zho do/_tsa lbo la 'bru lnga bcu rnams zhib par btags pa skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu'i tshod tsam re mar sar gyis dril la btang /_de'i rjes su chu skol hub gsum tsam re 'thung /
[\[305b.2\]]yang na se hUM Da/_du ba ral pa/_r+b+hau rA Da/_ha ra ta ka'i tshig gu'i nang gi snying po rnams/_po ril cha mnyam 'bram btags la thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam re bu ram gyis dril la btang /_de rjes chu skol phul gang tsam re 'thungs pas bshal sgyug gnyis ka
[\[305b.3\]]shri Sharta 'byung /_yang na dzai pa la pags pa bshus pa zho brgyad kyi tshod tsam ras dri ma med pas gtums la skud pas kha bsdams/_snod gang rigs su 'o ma bre do tsam blugs la gong gi ras thum de sor bzhi tsam 'o mar ma reg pa skud pas khebs gcod la
[\[305b.4\]]btags/_de nas khebs _dan rog _rgyab la rlangs pa mi 'chor bar gtums nas 'o ma de phyed tsam skam tshod kyi bar la me btang /_de nas sman phyung gshags la lce bton/_de dang shwa ta dzi ra/_a dze ba Na/_mir tsa/_pi pa le lnga cha bsnyams la btags/_de nas gong
[\[305b.5\]]gi 'o mas khu ba byas nas ril bu skyu ru ra tsam dril/_ril bu re btang la de nas chu skol 'thung ngo /_/dbo/_nag pa/_nya/_snron/_chu stod/_dbyu gu rnams kyi a ram Da'i 'bras bu/_dzai pa la/_zir dkar gol la phung _phi ris _pi pi ling _Shai ra/_tsa lpol/_sen+ng+ha/_tsir tsa rnams cha
[\[305b.6\]]mnyam btags la bod kyi thun tshad che phyogs tsam chu grang gis rta byas gtong /_zla ba'i khyad ma gtogs phan yon dang nus pa 'dra/_yang na dzai pa la btul ma/_daN+Da pi pa la/_dan ngog mi ra tsa/_shwe ta dzi ra/_tsuka rnams cha mnyam btags/_pho ris
[\[305b.7\]]lga'i chu'i nang du zhag gcig sbangs lag nas snon te rdzogs nas ras kyi khung du bcir ba'i khu bas rta byas la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril/_ril bu re dan rog chu grang gis rta byas nas gtong _bo ris _zir dkar po _ngo /_/yang na dzai pa la dan rog _chu'i khol thengs
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]re la brje thengs re byas pa lan brgyad kyi bar btsos/_de nas lce bton/_de dang a ga ra/_khaN+Da gsum cha mnyam la zhib par btags thun tshad bod dang 'dra ba chu grang gis rta byas la btang ngo /_/yang na/_ni la ka waM gis brdungs pa'i
[\[306a.2\]]khu bar skyu ru ra zhib par btags pa btab nim+bu'i chu cung zad blug lcags skyogs kyi nang du zhag ar skya gcig bye kar bzhag_/skra dang sma ra dkar por song bar zhag gsum gyi bar/_nyin re la 'khru thengs re la byugs thengs re byed/_sla dkar nA
[\[306a.3\]]gong bzhin byed/_me la ka rA sa/_bud med kyi 'o ma gsum sbyar la lte sa byugs pas kyang phebs so/_yang na/_suM Da/_kA ka Da sing+gi /_ng+ha b.ra'i me tog gsum cha mnyam la bu ram gyis dril la btang thun tshad gong dang 'dra'o/_/gcod sman gong dang 'dra/
[\[306a.4\]]bse dug gi sman la/_pi lo wa/_a dza lba Na/_bu ram rnying pa gsum zho bcu gnyis re cha mnyam btags la/_dngul chu se ba bzhi bsres de la ril bu dgu bcos la nyi ma dgu'i bar re re khyur mid byed/_de'i bar pag dang thug pa tshwa sor med pa ma gtogs gzhan
[\[306a.5\]]ma za btung thams cad 'dzem/_mnu zag can la la phung des 'phral du phan par 'gyur ro/_/yang na ha ra Da/_mi ra tsa/_ni la tho tha gsum cha mnyam zhib par btags te sman tshags la btsags la ba mar sar bar sbyar nas rma gang 'dug la byugs pas 'phral du phan par
[\[306a.6\]]'gyur zhing de yang gdon/_chu 'tshag pa sogs nas 'gos pa yin na phan sla'o/_/yang na/_a rung _pA ra/_pho ris _phig pan _gan+ng+ha ka _/gro/_zhib dar btsags/_bu ram rnams cha mnyam la zhib par btags/_a d+ha dz+ha ra chu ru sbangs pa'i khu bas rta byas la ril bu skyu ru ra
[\[306a.7\]]tsam sgril la ril bu re khyur mid byed do/_/ldong ros/_/yang na ma na si la/_ba bla hA rita la/_ru rta ku Tha/_yung ba ha dra tul chul nga /_mu zi ser po/_khyung sder smyug po gu Ni pu ts+tsha'i rtsa ba rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba'i chus rta byas nas khong du gtong /_sman de ra'i 'om la
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]sbyar nas rma gang yod la 'byug go_/yang pA rA/_gan+ng+ha ka_/hA ri ta la/_dza yi pha la/_/dza mu Na'i pags pa'i phye ma rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags sbrang gis rta byas la ril bu sgyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas te mid par bya'o/_/yang na/_pA ra se ba bzhi/_ha la da
[\[306b.2\]]se ba bzhi/_a dzAwa Na se ba bzhi/_Shai ra se ba _dngul _chu mu zi ser po _ba bla _bzhi/_dzAti _bil wa zho gang /_laDa_ gu Da se ba bcu drug rnams zhib par btags la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam byas nyi ma bdun gyi bar la re re za zhing sman zos nas ma 'ju bar dngul chu la dro yul ba
[\[306b.3\]]bcos byed do/_la la phud_/yang pA rA/_til nag_/gan+ng+ha ga_/a dza lba Na/_su nya/_guDa rnams man nu khrag can se ba bu ram bzhi re/_bil wa zho do se ba brgyad rnams zhib par btags/_auM gA chu la sbangs pa'i khu bas rta byas la ril bu sgyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam dril la
[\[306b.4\]]gtong zhing de bar zas dngul chu 'bras dang 'o ma le la chu ring po/_la la bud lga_ma gtogs _bu ram _'dzem/_so rnyil dang rke la sogs mnu khrag can pa skrangs kyang sman lngar chags su btang bas grol bar 'gyur ro/_/yang smyug ma'i lo ma'i rtse/_saM b+hA lu'i lo ma/_oM
[\[306b.5\]]gA'i lo ma/_swe ta d+hU pa'i lo ma/_hing+gu la rnams se ba bzhi re cha mnyam pa btags la thun bcu bzhi bzo la thun re gang sa gsar pa lta bur 'than nas mgo lus gtums te du ba rma gang yod la 'bung /_de'i bar la dro bcos dang rlung ma 'phog pa gal
[\[306b.6\]]che'o/_/yang /_dza hu'i me tog zhib _mtshal par btags pa dar la btsags bu ram dang cha mnyam la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam dril ba nyin bdun gyi bar re re khong du btang /_pA rA/_ni ba gnyis se ba bzhi bzhi zhib par btags/_nim+bu'i thang chus 'khar
[\[306b.7\]]sder gyi nang du sbrus la rkang pa dang lag pa la sman za ba dang mnyam du byugs/_de'i bar gyi dri chu rdza snod lta bur bsags pa'i chu'i nang du gong gi dngul chu se ba'i grangs gang btang ba de yong zhing de 'phral phan par 'gyur ro/
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]'di'i bar la bag thug las dngar sgyur sogs 'dzem/_gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang mtshan bar rdol pa la/_pi pi la'i pags pa zhib par btags pa thur mgo do tsam pa'i zho phul gang tsam la btab ste 'thungs pas myur du phan/_yang na/
[\[307a.2\]]nad pa mgo zhabs bzlog ste rkang pa gdung ma lta bur btags la ba'i gci bas rtsa lam nan cher bkrus/_de nas ma nu khrag can gyi khrag bton la byugs/_de steng u da zhib par btags pa'i phye ma chus sbrus pa'i pag gis bkab/_de'i thog tu sol me lta bu me rdog
[\[307a.3\]]chung ngu zhig chu tshod gcig tsam gyi bar bzhag_/de nas me bsal la de shul du su ma la sro ma tsam zhig chu tshod gcig tsam gyi bar bzhag_/de nas bag dang bcas pa bsal bas 'bu mang du thon 'ong zhing phan no/_/yang na bu ram dang pi pi leng cha mnyam la pi pi ling zhib
[\[307a.4\]]par btags pa bu ram gyis rta byas ril bu go yu tsam re zos na phan par 'gyur zhing 'di khyad par byis pa chung ngu la phan no/_/yang na lugs snod nang mar gsar pa'i nang du a ru ra sol bar ma song tsam btsos/_de nas bton te zhib par btags pa'i phye ma slar yang
[\[307a.5\]]gong gi mar de la btab nas ril bu dzAti tsam re zos pas kyang phan par 'gyur ro/_/yang na/_til/_bil ba/_ang Da/_guDa/_tsi tA rnams cha mnyam la zhib par btags/_sbrang rtsis rta byas la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam byas nas zos na yang phan no/_/yang na/__ha la
[\[307a.6\]]da zhib par btags pa dang ni/_hUM shi khaN+Da cha bsnyams pa rtsa lam gyi khung btab khams kyis bsdams te bzhag pas kyang phan no/_/yang 'phongs lugs gci ba'i me du ba med pa'i steng du sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa btab pa'i du ba bdug sa na 'phral du phan/_dzA rAM ku sha _phung ba
[\[307a.7\]]ste rims 'phrog lcags kyu'i spyor ba bdun pa ni/_dan rog dug bral/_dngul chu dug bral/_btsan dug_/pho ris/_pi pi ling/_lga/_tsha la bsregs pa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad sran ma tsam bu ram kyis ril bu byas nas btang na grang rlung sogs
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]grang ba'i rigs thams cad la phan zhing cung zad thur du'ang 'khru'o/_/btsan dug phyung la mu zi bsnan te thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam bye dkar gyis ril lu byas btang na khrag tshad/_mkhris tshad/_rlung tshad/_bad kan gyi tshad pa sogs tshad pa gsar rnying thams cad la
[\[307b.2\]]phan no/_/dan rog dug bral/_/dngul chu btul ma/_mu zi ser po/_tsha la bsregs pa'i thal ba/_mtshal rnams cha mnyam btags pa nim+bu'i khu bas ril bu sma ru mgo nag tsam sgril la btang na rlung mkhris bad kan sogs nad kyi rigs gsar rnying gang la yang phan
[\[307b.3\]]no|_/dan rog dug bral/_dngul chu btul ma/_mu zi ser po/_mtshal/_ba ru ra/_a rur rnams cha mnyam btags pa bye dkar gyis rta byas nas ril bu sma ru mgo nag tsam dril la btang na tshad pa gsar rnying pa dang mkhris pa dang tsha ba'i rigs la phan/_dan
[\[307b.4\]]rog dug bral/_dngul chu btul ma/_mu thi ser po/_mtshal/_zangs phye btul _ling nga _ma/_tsi tA/_pi pi ling /_a ru ra/_ba ru ra/_skyu ru ra rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la/_b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i chus sbrus la skam thag chod pa dang phye ma thur mgo re tsam btang
[\[307b.5\]]bas rims tshad kyi rigs mtha' dag la phan no/_/dan rog dug bral/_dngul chu btul ma/_mu zi ser po/_pho ris/_pi pi ling /_tsha _am la _la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la bye dkar dang mnyam du ba mar gsar pas sgril la btang na khrag tshad/
[\[307b.6\]]mkhris tshad/_rlung tshad/_bad kan gyi tshad pa/_rgyu tshad/_cham tshad/_'khrugs tshad/_rims tshad de tshad pa brgyad la mchog tu phan no/_/dan rog dug bral dang daN+Da se ba bcu gnyis/_pho ris/_tshal bsregs pa'i thal ba/_pi pi ling gsum se ba bzhi re
[\[307b.7\]]rnams zhib par btags/_b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i khu bas sbrus la ril bu sma ru mgo nag tsam byas pa thun tshad ril bu gsum re btang bas rims tshad kyi rigs mtha' dag la phan no/_/des rims 'phrog lcags kyu'i sbyor ba bdun pa rdzogs so//_//go yu/_supa ri mu
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]sa li/_'jam 'bras kyi 'bru/_pi pi ling dang pi pi ling gi rtsa ba/_lga/_po Sha ra'i rtsa ba/_pho ris/_la la phud/_seng+ga Da/_a shwagan+b+ha/_byi thang ka_/la la phud chung ba/__b+haugi rnams zho bco lnga re cha mnyam zhib par btags/
[\[308a.2\]]bi ra kan d+huzho bzhi zhib par btags te chus btsos la gar sla bag tsam du song dus sman rnams dang bsregs/_so ma ra tsa zho brgyad cu/_chu khar khal gcig tsam gyi nang du btab la chu bre gsum tsam du skam skam par gdus grang ba dang ras la btsags pa
[\[308a.3\]]la _dug mo nyung _gong gi sman btab nas 'dres par byas/_de nas ba'i 'o ma lhad med khal gcig tsam snod du mer _go mu'i bzhi 'gyur _mgar ba byas gdus nas sum gcig tsam du lus pa dang /_de la blug ste skya bas dkrug cing skyo ma gar ba tsam du 'dus pa
[\[308a.4\]]dang ta'u Shi rang nyab la dkrug cing zan dron tsam du sleb pa dang me thag bcad de grang du bcug la ril bu skyu ru ra che phyogs tsam re btang bas 'di ni go yur brten pa'i spyi 'joms chen mo ste rlung mkhris/_bad kan/_'dus pa/_tshad pa gsar rnying /_dug gi rigs/
[\[308a.5\]]skran/_dmu chu/_khrag sogs mdor na nad kyi rigs gang la'ang 'dis mi phan pa med do/_/yang gong gi ril bu dang mnyam pa'i shel kar lcags snod du chu cung zad blugs la sgor/_chu thag chod nas/_dzA ti/_li shi/_dzA ti'i me tog_/sug smel bzhi
[\[308a.6\]]shel kar gyi bcu cha re zhib par btags pa dang gong gi ril bu btab la cung zad sgor te ril bu sgyu ru ra nyes 'gyur tsam sgril la tho rangs zas ma zos pa'i gong du ril bu re rgyun du bsten na stobs 'phel zhing rgas kha sra ba/_lus yang ba/_dong kha bde ba/_rtsal che ba/_blo
[\[308a.7\]]rno ba|_mig gsal ba/_rna ba gsang gso brtan pa/_skra dkar gnyer ma mi 'byung ba/_'dod pa spyod nus pa/_nad dkon pa sogs phan yon bsam las 'das so/_/chu bsags tsha grang gang la'ang bi sa lo tsa na/_cu gang/_se ma la khA ra dkar po
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]dang ser po/_rgya gar stod ja/_bi la wa rnams cha mnyam pa zhib par btags pa na'i khu bas zho sla ba tsam byas pa nyin gsum gyi bar rdo gzhong gi nang du nyes te bag tsam song ba dang ril bu sran chung tsam byas pa skrangs che na ril bu gnyis dang gzhan la re ste
[\[308b.2\]]ba mar gsar pa btsags bcad pas 'phul la _ma nu khrag can _btang /_sman gtong ring pag thug dang mar gsar ma gtogs gzhan 'dzem/_nad ji ltar tshan che yang thun bdun gyis nges par thon no/_/bAMg dang ShADa cha mnyam la phye mar btags so/_/
[\[308b.3\]]ba'i zho phul gyi sum cha tsam la btab nas 'thungs na yang phan par 'gyur zhing /_bcos byed ring dmar skyur dang kha tsha rul sums 'dzem/_so mar tsa dang bye dkar cha mnyam pa zho hub gang la sbyar nas btang na _som ra _byo kar _ khrag mkhris las gyur pa'i chu nad
[\[308b.4\]]thon zhing mkhris pas 'grim pa yang tshod do/_/yang tshod dang rgyas par dus kyi rtsa ba gang byas khog ma'i nang du blug la de ltar yang khebs gcod rgyab la rlangs pa mi 'chor ba byas pa'i chu sum gnyis bsdus pa'i khu ba tshan mo phor pa gang
[\[308b.5\]]btungs la gos kyis byebs la rngul thon par byed pa gnad du che'o/_/tsan dan dmar po dang btsag rdo gnyis cha mnyam pa zhib par btags la chus rta byas ril bu go yu'i 'bru tsam dril te btang bas kyang phan no/_/'u su lo ma 'dru bcas rdzogs
[\[308b.6\]]pa'i khu bas bsku mnye byas kyang skrangs pa 'phral du 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/sa mu dra pha la _ge tu _mang nyung ji tsam yod kyang ra'i gcin gyi kha phrus nyin re la lan gsum re btab pa/_de bzhin ba'i 'o ma/_b+h+ring+ga ra dza'i khu ba rnams kyis nyin bdun re
[\[308b.7\]]skem bkru byed/_de nas zhib par btags la thun tshad sran ma gsum nas gcig gi bar nad babs che chung skabs dang bstun/_ra ma'i gcin gyis khu ba byas nas mgo phyed na bar gang na ba'i phyogs kyi mig la 'byug pa'am sna la blug pas phan zhing mig
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]la byugs pas mig ser por song ba la yang phan/_bye ma ka ra dang mnyam du btang na tshad pa gsar rnying thams cad la phan/_ba'i dar bas rta byas te 'thungs na rlung rgyu mkhris kyi nad zug bzhin du che ba la phan/_hing+ga dang mnyam du btang na mkhris srin skye
[\[309a.2\]]thur gzugs dang srin leb srin 'bu chung ngu sogs len nas bde bar 'gyur ro/_/sbrang rtsi la sbyar nas bse dug gi rma dang thor ba la bskus na 'phral du phan par 'gyur zhing /_lce dig pas gtam yun ring mi thon pa dang pho ba shing kun sbos pa la khong du btang bas phan/
[\[309a.3\]]yung ba dang mnyam du btang na skyug sman gyi mchog tu 'gyur/_rang chu 'am ra ma'i chus rta byas btang na ma 'ju ba la phan zhing sbyongs kyang phebs par 'gyur ro/_/b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i khu bas ril bu byas la btang na mig ser la phan/_pi pa la'i pags pa dang
[\[309a.4\]]mnyam du zos na mas rlung gyen ldog dang rlung rgyu mkhris la mchog tu phan no/_/yang ra ma'i chus rta byas btang na skya rbab la phan/_a jo dzA Da'i khu bas ril bu byas btang na dwangs ma 'dzag pa la phan no/_/la la phud dang mnyam du btung na rims nad nyi ma
[\[309a.5\]]re mos kyis na ba la phan no/_/ba'i 'o ma dang mnyam du btang na stobs bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/lga dang mnyam du btang na dwangs ma 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/a ka la ka ra phye mar byas pa dang mnyam du btang na khong pa'i srin 'bu thams cad phyir 'thon nas
[\[309a.6\]]bde'o/_/nim bu'i khya ba dang mnyam du btang na 'dus pa'i nad la phan no/_/rang chu khyor gsum gyis 'phul te btang bas ni nA bI zer ba'i rkang lag gi sor mo dang sna gang la thebs kyang chad 'gro ba zhig yong ba de la phan/_yang nad de la sngags byed na/
[\[309a.7\]]sang bcos kha byed rgyu'i do nub nad pa'i lus bkrus la mal bde bar nyal bcug sang zhogs sngags mkhan gyis phyin la nad pa las 'dom do tsam gyis 'gyangs byas la bsdad/_rkang lag gang na ba de bstan la 'og gi sngags 'dren pa dang mnyam du 'bras
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]sin+ng+hAr bsres pas nad pa brab/_rkang lag gang yin kyang mi gnyis tsam gyis zin kyang mi thub par sngags mkhan gyi sngar sleb yong bas khru gang tsam du sleb pa dang gris 'phred la re khA gsum 'then/_gang na ba de 'bras btsos pa'i zan dang sin+ng+hU ra bsres pas
[\[309b.2\]]gtums la bzhag pas phan no/_/sngags ni/_oM gA rdza ta g+ho rata A ba tA tsha ra tshe du u tA ra ta a ba tA ha ya/_na ba nA ri ba ha tra ko Sh+Tha su Sha ba ra tA A ba ta ha ya/_kA hA te A ba ra ha ya ga D+ng+ha ga ya ni te A ba tA ha ya/_kA ba ru ko ko ta bA la
[\[309b.3\]]di lI ko pa ta sA ha/_se Sha silA ra ru ru ka ni ke pu ta ma ha ma dA pi ra man+t+ra pa D+ng+ha ta/_ba d+hiShu rA sa na b+he dz+ye b+hu ta pAM ng+haMpre ta pAM d+hipre ta pAM ng+nyi dA nobAMng+ti/_ma ri yA ma sA na bAM d+hi kAl b+hi ro bAMd+hi/_aSh+Ta b+hai ra ba pAM d+hi lo ha ro ha bo nA si d+ha sha d+ha paM d+hi pA na phu la ko bAM ng+hi/_te la ta le ko
[\[309b.4\]]pAM d+hi b+hA ta du d+ha ko pAMd+hi/_ka ra na ka ra tu ti ko bAd+ha Shi ra She raM She hra pA la bAM ng+haM/_a Tho ta ra so nInA i pAM d+hi bA rA s+ya ma sAn pAM ng+hi te rA s+ya ka ru bA pAM d+hi/_tso dA s+ya b+haMsA su ra pAM d+hi saM Sha nI Di ka nI pAM d+hi pa ta/_tsha nI pAM d+hi b+he ga na pAM d+ha to bA bA A da ma kI do hA I/_bi bi phAta
[\[309b.5\]]mA ki du hA i su ba ra mu ra DA/_pi pi phA ta mA ke dA ba na gi ra/_na ba lA Sha a si ha dzA ra pi ra pi kaM ba ra bA ng+hi Da ri/_a ba de Shore ma ha ma dwA pi te re man+ta ki sak+tI/_u ta ra ko u ta ra pAM d+hI/_da tsha na ko da tsha na nAM ng+hi pa tshI ma ko pa tshi ma b-I d+hi/_purba ko purba
[\[309b.6\]]pAMd+hi/_kA Tha kI ro Ti bAM d+hi phi re ma ha ma dA pi rA se Sha si la ra paT+d+ta ta man+t+ra/_bA d+hi DA rI me rI b+hak+tIgu ru kI sik+ta phu ro man+t+ra sI swa ri bA tsA/_zhes pa'o/_/rA sa rA dze shwa ra te bcud len dbang phyug rgyal po'i sbyor ba ni/_dngul chu dug bral/_mu zi ser po/_/mr-i ta
[\[309b.7\]]sA ra/_chu shing nag pos go chod tsam/_zangs phye/_tA la ka_/btsan dug_/tshal dkar/_si maM la/_ldong ros_/rgya tshwa/_lcags phye/_zha nye dkar po'i phye ma/_dzAti/_bong nga dmar po nang /_hi ti m+b+hi si _ljang gu/_mu sa li/_dza ba Sha ra/_nI ba/
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]pa ya bi rang+ga/_skyer pa/_a ka la ka ra/_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba/_gur gum/_nA ga ge sar chung ba/_tsu ka_/ru d+ha/_kA ka ra seng+gi/_ma la kA na/_gu ni/_bong nga dmar po/_la la phud/_khu ra sa ni a dza wa na/_musha m+ba ra/
[\[310a.2\]]sa mu dra pha la/_lga/_pi pi ling /_da tu ha ri dra _pho ba ris/_'bras bu gsum/_zi ra nag po rnams cha mnyam dang ga pur nyis 'gyur/_kuT_de thams cad dang dan rog dug dbyung tshar ba _ni ri b+hi si/_bsnyams par btags la dar la btsags/_b+hing+ga rA dza'i khu
[\[310a.3\]]bas sgrus la zhag nyer gcig gi bar btags te ril bu pho ris tsam sgril/_ril bu re b+h+ring+ga _kAradzIr/_rA dza'i khu bas rta byas _kru'am/_btang na rlung tshad gsar rnying thams cad la phan/_bye kar dang mnyam du btang na mkhris tshad gsar rnying thams cad la phan zhing
[\[310a.4\]]zas gang zos kyang 'grims 'gro ba la btang na yang chad par 'gyur ro/_/chang la pi pi ling phye ma btab pas rta byas btang na bad kan la brten pa'i tshad pa 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/ra ma'i gcin gyis rta byas nas btang na pho ba'i nad mA la dz+wa re la phan/
[\[310a.5\]]so pha dang pho ris bsna nal btang na tshad pa'i rigs thams cad la phan/_skyu rur dang ba'i mar bsnun la btang na pho bo na zhing dbugs mi thon pa la phan/_nI ba'i lo ma dang mnyam du zos na i ka'i nad la phan/_b+h+ring+ga ra'i khu bar _dang ga mi 'deb dang lcags dreg gi nad
[\[310a.6\]]go snyod _sbyar te mig la byugs na mig ser la phan no/_/so pha dang ya la phud pa snad ti byin na bud mad kyi bu btsas pa'i rjes su sked pa dang tshang ran pa la phan/_ka ra dang mnyam du btang na zas _skyis bu'i _skom tsha grang gang 'grims pa gcod par 'gyur ro/_/pA na dang
[\[310a.7\]]mnyam du btang na mkhris pa'i nad la phan/_ba'i mar sar dang mnyam du zos na bud med mngal chags nas mi gnas pa gnas par 'gyur ro/_/ra'i 'o mas rta byas btang na dwangs ma 'dzag pa chod do/_/skyu ru ra'i khu bas rta byas te btang na dmu chu 'jog pa la phan
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/nim bu'i khu bar sbyar la sna bug tu blug na mgo phyed na ba la phan zhing mig la byugs na 'byung po'i gnod pa la phan/_'u su dang ba mar bsnan nas btang na sbrul gyi dug la phan/_lga'i khu bas rta byas nas btang na sdig pa'i dug la phan/
[\[310b.2\]]nA ga put+pa dang mnyam du btang na gnyid chung ngu 'gro'o/_/ma la kang+gu ni dang mnyam du btang na lus stobs 'phel lo/_/gong gsal rnams nyin bdun re'i bar gtong zhing zas spyod nad so so'i skabs thob sbyor/_spyi sman go ra tso le'i spyor ba ni/
[\[310b.3\]]li shi/_gla lgang _dzA ti'i me tog_/sman chen/_ku Ta ki/_mu sa li/_sug sme la/_ba ya pi rang+ga /_ma nu khrag can/_gi waM/_ko ra/_ma ra ha Ti/_dngul chu/_bong nga dmar po/_/mu zi ser po/_ba bla/_dan rog dug bral rnams zho gsum re
[\[310b.4\]]dang /_dze la batri/_la la phud zho bco lnga rnams zhib par btags pa dar _al tsi _la btsags/_zho phyed gnyis _b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i khya bas sbrus la rdo gzhong nang du nyin nyi _bong nga dkar po bcag nas dkyil lgang khu yod pa gnyis _shu rtsa gcig gi bar nyed cing skabs
[\[310b.5\]]skabs su nyi mar cung zad bstan/_sa ha de pa'i khu bas sbrus la nyin gsum gyi bar nyes la ril bu sma ru mgo nag tsam sgril zhos rta byas nas btang na chu ser rlung ldan la phan/_nyin bdun gyi bar btang ngo /_/dan+da phye mar btags/_gong gi ril bu las sum
[\[310b.6\]]'gyur gyis che ba bcas btang na sbyongs phebs so/_/ba mar gsar pas khu ba byas nyin rer ril bu bzhi re nyi ma bdun gyi bar btang na rlung gi nad dang me drod nyams pa mig gi rab rib la phan no/_/b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i _araN+DaM _khu bas rta byas nyi ma gcig la ril bu bzhi
[\[310b.7\]]btang na rlung rigs 'dar bu la phan no/_/ra'i 'o mas rta byas nas btang na dwangs ma 'dzag pa tsha grang gang la yang phan/_pa'i chus rta byas te btang na nas pa gong dang 'dra'o/_/yang dwangs ma chu dang mnyam du 'dzag cing nad zug byed na go yu dang mnyam du btang bas
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]phan no/_/yang khrag tu 'dzag na a ba la'i khu bas rta byas btang na phan par 'gyur ro/_/nim bu'i khu bar sbyar la mig la byugs na 'byung po gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed do/_/'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma thur mgo gsum tsam dang
[\[311a.2\]]ril bu bzhi mnyam du btang na mas rlung gyen log dang stod _sku rur _rlung sogs rlung rigs dang yan lag zha ba la phan/_yang zi ra dkar po dang mnyam du btang na yang mas rlung gyen log dang stod rlung sogs rlung rigs la phan no/_/a ma li zho gang dang ril
[\[311a.3\]]bu bzhi mnyam du btang na chu 'tshag rgyu chen po med pa la lang yang 'tshag dgos shing btsags pa dang na tsha chen po yong ba la phan/_sho mo sa dang mnyam du btang na dwangs ma 'phel zhing 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro/_/zi ra nag po dang mnyam du chur brdar nas so
[\[311a.4\]]na ba'i thad kyi phyir la byugs na zug gzer 'phral du zhi'o/_/thang phrom [(]ng+ha d+hu ra [)]gyi lo ma nyung zad dang ril bu re btang na grang mkhris kyi nad la phan/_mi thi_si bA ra chu dar sngon po dang lhan du brdar nas bse dug gi rma dang shu ba la byugs na 'phral du phan/_'bras chur sbangs pa'i khu
[\[311a.5\]]bas rta byas btang na btsan dug sbyar dug gyur dug sogs dug rigs thams cad la mchog tu phan no/_/bod sdangs kyi khu ba la sbyar nas lus _chu dang sngon po _la bsku mnye byas na 'dus pa'i nad la phan no/_/b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i khu bas rta byas khong du btang kyang 'dus nad
[\[311a.6\]]la phan no/_/phag brun mer bsregs pa'i thal ba dang bong bu'i gcin la ril bu brdar nas sna khan gsum gyi la blug na mi rgi'i mgo la 'bu yod pa'i me chu nyi zla sogs 'od can la bltas nas rgyal zer gyi 'gyel 'gro ba'i nad la mchog tu phan/_chang gis rta byas nas btang na
[\[311a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/shing a ka la ka ra'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na bad kan skya smug mtha' _khan gsum gyi_dag la phan no/_/zangs kyi snod du ba'i zho khyor gang tsam blug par ril bu btab ste legs par bsnur la khong du btang na ma 'ju ba'i rigs thams cad la phan no/
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]bye kar dang mnyam du btang na mkhris pa la phan/_sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du zos na lus stobs bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/pa thu ba'i lo ma brdungs pa dang mnyam du btang na mkhris pa sha ser dang rdel nad la phan/_ma nu khrag can chung ngu dang mnyam du btang na gseb
[\[311b.2\]]dri sogs lus kyi rngul chen po'i dri dang chu rtags kyi dri ngan pa la phan/_spe tres dang mnyam du btang na grang ba 'dzag pa tsha grang mtha' spyo dag la phan/_nye shing pa dang mnyam du btang na rlung gis na zug byed pa dang ba byi ba sogs la phan/_la la phud shu dag gnyis phye
[\[311b.3\]]mar btags pa dang mnyam du btang na rked pa na ba la phan/_bag ni dri la nas za_chus rta byas nas lo gsum zla ba gsum zhag gsum nyi ma'i sum cha gsum gyi bar ril bu re bar ma chad par bsten na lus kyi nad gsar rnying thams cad 'byang zhing lus stobs 'phel ba dang rgas kha srab
[\[311b.4\]]sogs phan yon bsam las 'das so/_/nad par gtong skabs zas spyod sogs nad babs dang bstun te skabs dang sbyar ro /_/skran gyi sman la dan+da'i rtsa ba zho bzhi/_lga dang kha ru tsha zho phye do re/_shing kun se ba lnga rnams chu phor pa gsum la btab la tsha gnyis
[\[311b.5\]]gdus pa'i phor gang khong du btang na rlung skran 'phral du zhig par 'gyur ro/_/yang 'gron bu mer bsregs pa'i thal ba_pho ris_pi pi ling /_lga/_tsi tra/_so tsal lo Na_kha ru tshwa rnams zhib par btags pa dang la btsags la thur mgo do
[\[311b.6\]]tsam chu skol gyis rta byas btang na skran gyi rigs thams cad la phan no/_/shing kun cha phyed/_zi ra dkar po/_lga/_kha ru tsha/_'u su rnams cha re bcas thang thun tsam chu phor pa gsum gyi nang du btab/_cha gnyis gdus la btang na mkhris skran zhig par
