[\[311b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/kA ka ra sing+gi/_d+ha ba ra'i me tog_/lga/_bu ram rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i ril bu ba ru ra tsam re btang na _ng+hani nya_pho skran zhig par 'gyur ro/_/rgya tsha/_sots+ng+ho/_/ba ru tshe/_tsi tra/_lga/_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba rnams cha mnyam
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]dang shing tsha phyed bcas zhib par btags la zur mgo do tsam chu skol gyis rta byas btang na skran gyi rigs mtha' dag la phan/_ke la ka'i rtsa ba/_dan+da'i rtsa ba/_lga/_tsi tra/_rgyam tsha rnams cha mnyam dang shing kun cha phyed bcas
[\[312a.2\]]dang thun tsam chur gdu lugs gong bzhin byas btang na rlung la brten pa'i ma zhu ba'i skran zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/a ru ra dang lga cha mnyam la shing kun cha phyed bcas zhib par btags pa thur mgo do tsam chu skol gyis 'phul te btang na me drod nyams pa'i skran zhi
[\[312a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/rgyam tsha/_kha ru tsha/_lga/_tsi tra/_ba ru ra/_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba rnams cha mnyam pa dang shing kun cha phyed bcas zhib par btags la thun tshad gong bzhin chu skol gyis 'phul te btang na khrag la brten pa'i ma 'ju ba'i skran zhi bar 'gyur
[\[312a.4\]]ro/_/'gron thal/_lga/_pi pi ling /_li shi/_dzA ti/_kha ru tshwa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyis 'phul btang na rlung skran zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/pho ris/_pi pi ling /_lga/_la la phud/_zi ra nag po rnams cha mnyam dang shing kun
[\[312a.5\]]cha phyed bcas phye mar btags la chu skol gyis 'phul nas btang na chu skran zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/pho ris/_pi pi ling /_lga/_la la phud/_rgyam tsha/_tsi tra/_zi ra nag po/_shing kun rnams cha bsnyams pa zhib par btags la chu skol gyis 'phul
[\[312a.6\]]nas btang na skran gyi rigs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lga/_tig ta/_pi pi ling /_la la phud/_a ka la ka ra/_li shi/_khu ra sha lang thang rtse na/_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba rnams cha mnyam thang thun tsam chu sum gnyis gdus pa'i khu ba phor gang btang na
[\[312a.7\]]mkhris skran zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/pho ris/_pi pi ling /_lga/_tsitAyata/_rgyam tsha/_la la phud rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba mar _lang thang rtsa _btsags bcad pas rta byas gtong zhing cung zad lus la byugs na bud med bu btsas pa'i rjes su khrag
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]mkhris kyi skran byung ba la phan no/_/sbrul sha dang lga cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags te se ba bcu drug re chu bskol gyis rta byas btang na dmu chu/_skya rbab kyis skrangs pa/_mkhris pa/_rlung /_mgo na ba/_pho ba na ba sogs nad gsar rnying
[\[312b.2\]]mtha' dag la phan/_sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa me la bsregs pa zhib par btags pa mig la byugs na mig gi nad thams cad la phan zhing mig gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/sbrul shun dang ba'i 'o ma mkhur bkang byas na so'i nad thams cad la phan no/_/
[\[312b.3\]]sbrul shun zhib par btags pa ba zho btsags pas sbrus la ril bu sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam sgril la khong du btang na za 'phrug la phan/_gnyen 'bur gyis skrangs par sbrul gyi khrag byugs na myur du phan/_rma bya'i sgo mdongs me la bsregs pa'i thal ba chu grang
[\[312b.4\]]gis 'phul nas btang na khrag sogs skyug pa'i rigs chod par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa mer bsregs pa'i thal ba sran ma tsam chu grang gis rta byas btang na rdel nad 'phral du sel zhing bud med kyi nu ma skrangs pa la yang phan no/_/sdig pa mer bsregs pa'i du ba khong
[\[312b.5\]]par btang na srog chags kyi gnod pa mi 'byung /_mi thod zhib par nyes la chur _b+hi tshu li_sbyar te byugs na 'bras bu skrangs pa la phan/_mi thod mer bsregs la thur mgo do tsam re khong du zhag bdun gyi bar btang na 'bras bu skrangs shin tu che ba la phan no/_/
[\[312b.6\]]rkang lag gi sen mo gog pa'i nad pa khang byil gyi klad pa byugs na 'phral du phan/_gdong la gro thig yod par khang byil gyi brun chu la sbyar la nyin bdun gyi bar du byugs na med par 'gyur ro/_/spyi ther sogs mgo la skra med par rta'i klad pa nyin bdun gyi bar du
[\[312b.7\]]byugs na skra skye bar 'gyur zhing rgya dang sma ra/_ciDi_sogs 'dod kyang gong 'dod par byugs _dz+ha ming _pas skye bar 'gyur ro/_/ma he'i ra _ma he ka sing+ga _skyu ru ra dang mnyam du chu la btsos tshos pa dang bton spyol mer bsregs pa'i _g+ho rag na g+dza_thal ba gong gi
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]chu ra btab ste mgo bor byugs na skra shin tu bzang ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i rjes su pags mtshams la chu ser 'phel ba'i rtags byung na rwa snum gyi dkyil du btsos la byugs pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/pags nad khol bu ba sen mo btab kyang reg pa mi
[\[313a.2\]]tshor ba dang skom pa la byi ba'i brun chur brdar ba byugs pas phan no/_/mdze'i bcos thabs ni/_thog mar mdze la rigs rnam pa bdun te/_luta kuSh+Tha/_sarba ng+hA tu kuSh+Tha/_pi tsi tra kuSh+Tha/_lA la kuSh+Tha/_su ya kuSh+Tha/_tsan+d+rakuSh+Tha/_Sha Shen+d+rikuSh+Tha/_rnams te de
[\[313a.3\]]yang chung gi mdze la thog mar sha lkags khol bur za zhing bradan chu ser mang du don yong /_mkhris rlung la gzhan ma gong dang _cha rlung rbabs la brten pa'i mdze _mabris rlung la brten pa'i mdze _grang rlung la brtan pa'i mdze _khrag la brten pa'i mdze_khrag mkhris la brten pa'i mdzo grang mdze sha bas 'dra ba
[\[313a.4\]]la dod shin tu che zhing mdog kyang cung zad dmar la brang na khrag kyang 'byung ba'o/_/grang rlung la thog mar lus khol bur skrangs shing mdog kyang khra bor yod la rjes su tshigs che chung thams cad skrangs shing chu ser 'dzag pa'o/_/khrag mdze la yan lag dang rna ba sna sogs kyi rtse
[\[313a.5\]]chad cing rnag khrag 'dzag cing mdog kyang dmar por 'ong ngo /_/khrag mkhris la brten pa gzhan ma gong dang 'dra ba la drod shin tu che ba'o/_/grang mdzes mdog dkar zhing rnag khrag chu ser mang du 'dzag go/_/sha bkra la rtogs par sla ba'o/_/de dag gi sman ni/_a
[\[313a.6\]]ru ra gser mdog dang ma chung /_btsod/_du ba ral pa/_btsan dug_/ka na bi ra'i rtsa ba rnams zhib par btags la ba'i chus sbrus nas nad gang yod la byugs na chu rlung gi mdze dang mkhris rlung gi mdze la phan no/_/zangs kyi par bu'i nang du/_mu zi ser po/
[\[313a.7\]]tsha la/_yung ba/_dz+hiriTaraDa/_nanyiSh+Tha_graMrkyang ng+ha rasta a ma pa'i sha 'bras kyi skogs pa 'bras bu rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la tsi tA'i shing gong gi cha gcig dang /_gi wa kwa ra'i shing cha gsum bcas blugs la kha legs par bcad/_de rdza'i khog ma che ba zhig gi nang du bcug
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]la kha bsdams te thab me rtag pa'i thab gong du zla ba drug gi bar du bzhag_/de nas bton bul phye mar byas te ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar nas byugs pas grang rlung gi mdzes tshigs skrangs pa 'phral du zhi'o/_/mu zi ser po/_thang phrom gnyis til snum gyi nang du bskyur
[\[313b.2\]]dul ma tshig par me btang /_de nas grang thag chod pa dang byugs pas mkhris rlung la brten pa'i mdze la phan no/_mu zi ser po/_/'bras bu gsum/_ma nu khrag can/__sgron me shing gi 'bru mngar skyur gnyis yong ba'i skyur ba/_til nag rnams cha
[\[313b.3\]]mnyam b+h+r-ing+ga rA dza'i thang chu dang mnyam du btags la byugs na khrag mdze la phan no/_kon po dang pags bse ko ltar sang ba'i za phrug la phan/_/hi rim bi cha gcig_/pho ris cha gnyis/_tsiDa_mi thod bsregs pa'i thal ba cha gsum rnams zhib par btags la chu grang
[\[313b.4\]]gis rta byas btang bas mdze nad kyi rigs thams cad la phan no/_/khyung sder smug po/_/dong ga'i 'bru/_nI ba/_bA ya bi rang+ga/_bod da dmar po nang ljang gu/_pi pi ling /_tsi tra/_mu zi ser po/_bong dmar nang ljang rnams cha mnyam zhib par _thur mgo do tsam
[\[313b.5\]]btags la thun thur mgo ngo tsam re chu grang gi rta byas btang na yang mdze rigs_guri bu cha_rAdz-i br-ik+Sha _kun la phan/_lga/_pi pi ling /_pho ris/_dong ga'i 'bru/_bong dmar/_skyu ru ra/_ba ru ra rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba'i zhun mar la sbyar te
[\[313b.6\]]byugs na chu rlung la brten pa'i mdze la phan/_sgog skya/_nI pa/_tsitra/_ba lba/_mu zi ser po/_/ka na pi ra'i rtsa ba/_sarmuM/_ru d+ha/_sho mo sa lcags btul ma rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chang gis khu ba byas nas rdza snod du blug kha legs
[\[313b.7\]]par bcad/_gci ba dang rta sbangs rnyid pa'i _la bun_ dkyil du zhag nyer gcig gi bar bsnyal/_de nas bton la byugs na_sad kha _grang rlung la brten pa'i mdze dang khrag mkhris la brten pa gnyis la mchog tu phan/_kha ru tsha/_dan rog_/sma ru mgo nag rwatihUM g+ha tsi
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]de steng go ra tsi li'i sbyor ba dang po'i ril bu rnams cha mnyam pa zhib par btags pa grang mje'i rma gang yod la gtsags bu rnon pos rtsa bas de la btab pas phan no/_/mu zi ser po/_/'bras bu gsum/_ma nu khrag can/_tig nag_/sgron me
[\[314a.2\]]shing gi 'bru rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i khu ba dang sbyar nas byugs na yang grang mdze zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/dan rog_/sma ru mgo nag_/tsi tA rnams cha re/_rdzauSha ra cha gsum/_lga cha bzhi/_nI ba cha lnga rnams zhib par btags chu la sbyar
[\[314a.3\]]nas byugs na yang grang mdze zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/dong ga'i 'bru/_til nag_/lga/_bu ram rnams cha mnyam la zhib par btags pa ril bu skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam byas btang _tshwa'i rigs lce 'bigs ba lta bu _na grang mdze dang sha bkra la phan no/_/sman de rnams
[\[314a.4\]]gtong ba'i ring pag thug ma gtogs dkar skyur dmar gsum thams cad 'dzem/_ya ma'i bcos la yang rigs gsum ste/_a da si si/_pi nA sa/_na thu ra rnams so/_/de rnams kyi sman ni/_phag tshil/_bu ram _/_lug gi mar gsum cha mnyam
[\[314a.5\]]mer bskol la grang ba dang snar blugs na ya ma dkar po la phan no/_/bye kar/_kung+gu/_ba mar/_gsum cha mnyam pa mer _yam dkar po _ya mkhra po _ya ma nag po _tshag rdol rgyal yod__bskol ba grang ba dang snar blugs kyang phan par 'gyur ro/_/yang na/_shing
[\[314a.6\]]mngar/_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba gnyis zhib par btags pa'i mar btsags bcad pa dang sbyar la snar blugs kyang phan no/_/pho ris _mgo 'og zhogs byed pa _sna dmar por 'gro _'bru gsum/_a tu sa'i lo ma'i khu ba dang mnyam du nyes la snar blugs kyang phan no/_/khra bo
[\[314a.7\]]dzenya ma ng+hu _la/_tsha la/_pi pi ling /_shug pa/_rebad+h+wa rma/_dzo Sha ra/_dan+da'i rtsa ba rnams cha bsnyams pa zhib par btags/_lcags snod du snum la btab ste btsag chod pa dang grang du bcug la snang blugs na phan no/_/ya ma nag po/_yang na/_yung ba/_mu zi ser po/
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]tsha ba gsum/_zi ra dar/_bye kar/_a ma li'i 'bru/_ru rta/_shu dag_/tsan dan dmar po/_a shwa gadz+ha rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba'i chu dang sbyar nas snar blugs na sna nas 'bu don yong zhing phan la mgo 'khor la yang phan no/_/yang pho ris
[\[314b.2\]]bu ram gnyis cha mnyam btags la chang skyur la sbyar nas snar blugs kyang phan no/_/'bras bu gsum dang pi pi ling cha mnyam btags la sbrang rtsis ril bu byas te khong du btang zhing /_sbrang rtsi chur sbyangs pas rta byas snar blugs kyang phan zhing sna khrag 'dzag pa
[\[314b.3\]]dang kha'i dri ngan pa la phan no/_/nag po la/_sgyu ru ra zhib par _mgo gzhogs phyed na bal _btags la ba mar ngar mnyam du bskol te gang na sar byugs pas phan/_se 'bru'i me tog dang dU ba gnyis kyi khu ba ra'i 'o ma dang bsres la snar blugs pas phan
[\[314b.4\]]no|_/yang pi pi ling /_suM har+ng+na'i 'bru/_bA ya bi rang+ga/_/pho ris rnams cha mnyam btags la pa'i chu la sbyar nas snar byug cing cung zad sna'i nang du btang bas kyang phan zhing sna khrag 'dzag pa yang chod do/_/bye kar dang sbrang rtsi gnyis pa'i 'o _ya ma nag po la
[\[314b.5\]]mar sbyar nas snar blugs na phan no/_/yang bal _byi thang ka_/po kha che/_se 'bru'i me tog dU ba rnams kyi khu ba ra'i 'o ma dang bsres la snar blugs na phan/_dza mu na'i 'bru/_dU ba/_se 'bru'i me tog gsum gyi khu ba snar blugs na phan zhing sna khrag
[\[314b.6\]]kyang 'chad do/_/yang na/_lga dang dan+Da'i rtsa ba chang skyur la_ku sum b+ha ba _sbyar nas gdan sar bsku mnye byas na phan/_yang lga zhib par btags la ba'i 'o mar sbyar nas snar blugs na phan no/_/b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i thang chu dang 'bras bu gsum zhib par
[\[314b.7\]]btags pa chu skol gyis rta byas btang na yang phan no/_/yung ba cha gcig_/se 'bru'i skogs cha gnyis/_gu ra'i 'bras bu skogs gsum/_star bu cha bzhi rnams btags pa ril bu byas/_ba'i chu dang sbyar te dpral bar byugs kyang phan no/_/des ya ma
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]dkar nag khra gsum gyi bcos rdzogs so//_//tsu ka_/se 'bru'i skogs/_spos dkar/_la la phud/_dzA ti/_a phI ma/_li ga dur rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad thur mgo do tsam chu grang gis rta
[\[315a.2\]]byas btang na rgyun du khrag 'grims pa 'phral du chod par 'gyur ro/_/gla sgang /_spos dkar/_sha 'bras kyi _nI ra la _skogs/_nA ga ge sar gyi thang chu/_sa gnab de _ma dzu'i 'bras bu/_bil ba'i nang gi 'bru/_d+ha ya'i me tog_/dzA nyi/_so ma
[\[315a.3\]]ra tsa/_a phI ma/_li ga dur/_kel me tog_/ka ka Na sing+ga /_li shi/_la la phud rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags te thur mgo do tsam re ba'i zho dang mnyam du btang na 'grims b+hil ka_nad tsha grang yang 'phral du chod do/_/pi pi
[\[315a.4\]]ling gi shing gi pags pa/_po Sha ra'i rtsa ba/_d+ha wa'i me tog_/mu sa li/_sha 'bras kyi skogs/_tri gu Da'i rtsa ba/_zi ra dkar po/_rgya gar stod ja/_a phI ma rnams cha mnyam btags pa dar la btsags/_thun tshad gong 'dra sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du
[\[315a.5\]]btang na khrag 'grims pa gcod do/_/a phri ma/_ke la'i me tog_/pho ris/_la la phud rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu grang gis rta byas btang na yang nus pa gong dang 'dra'o/_/drag shul la brten pa'i lte ba'i rtsa 'phyus pa'i nad gang zos pa dang khrag rgyun
[\[315a.6\]]par 'grims shing nad zug yod sar 'phar ba zhig yod/_de'i bcos la/_sa 'bras kyi shing gi pags pa/_nA ga ge sar gyi thang chu/_a phI ma/_la la phud/_li ga dur/_phaT ka Di rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la dar la btsags pa thur mgo do
[\[315a.7\]]tsam sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du btang na myur du phan zhing gzhan yang khrag 'grims pa la phan no/_/yang gong gi lte ba 'phyus pa'i nad de la nad pa rang gis rgyab tu lag pa g.yas kyis rkang pa g.yon gyi mthe bong zin/__lag pa g.yon gyis rkang pa g.yas kyi mthe bong zin/
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]de nas mi zhig gis lag pa bsnol mtshams nas lan bdun gyi bar du btegs pas kyang 'phral du phan zhing nad par 'phral du zug gzer che bar yod yang de la tshad mi dgos so/_/dzA ti/_a phI ma/_ga bur/_glartsi/_thang phrom/_so ma ra tsa rnams cha
[\[315b.2\]]mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags pa thun tshad skyu ru ra tsam sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du btang na zas mdog dang khrag sogs gang 'grims pa'i rigs gsar rnying tsha grang kun la phan/_tshad pa sogs _kaspur _kastu ri _skom nad sel ba'i sman ni/_'bras
[\[315b.3\]]bu gsum/_rgyam tshwa/_la la phud rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thur mgo do tsam re chu phor gang gi nang du blugs la phyed tsam skam pa dang grang thag bcad ras la btsags te khong du btang na phan no/_/yang mkhris tshad la brten pa kho nas skom na/_bo ris
[\[315b.4\]]dang bye kar cha mnyam zhib par btags pa ka ka ra sing+ga'i khu bas rta byas btang na phan/_chu bsgrims pa la/_tsha la mer bsregs pa'i thal ba thur mgo do tsam ba dar gyis rta byas btang na myur du phebs so/_/rgyam tsha dang kha ru tsha zhib par btags la chu bcus
[\[315b.5\]]nas zhag gcig song bas rta byas btang na yang phebs so/_/byi ba'i brun ba'i dar bas khub byas brdar la rdo rje dang 'bras bu gnyis dang mgo bo'i mchog ma la byugs khong du yang cung zad btang bas myur du phebs nges so/_'jam 'bras kyi snying po zhib par btags
[\[315b.6\]]shel kar dang mnyam du chus rta byas la btang na yang phebs so/_/lha mo dbu mas lha dbang phyug chen po la gsol pa/_kye lha yi lha mchog dbang phyug che/_/khyed ni 'jig rten byed po ste/_/nad kun zhi zhing blo 'phel ba'i/_/kam tsha_sman mchog bdag la bstan du
[\[315b.7\]]gsol/_/zhes gsol pa dang /_dbang phyug gis bka' stsal pa/_nyon cig ri sras dpal chen mo/_/nad 'joms blo 'phel yon tan gter/_/sman mchog ma la kAMgu ni'i/_/bsten thabs phan yon bshad par bya/_/de la dang por bshal skyugs
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]kyis lus dag par bkrus la nyin dang por ma la rmA gu ni'i 'bru gcig/_/gnyis par gnyis/_de nas rim bzhin nyin bdun gyi par 'bru re spar/_nyin bdun nas bzung zla ba gcig dang zhag bcu'i bar 'bru bdun re bsten/_de bar
[\[316a.2\]]zas gang la'ang tshwa ba'i rigs 'joms pas rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa sogs tsha grang gsar rnying thams cad rtsa ba nas 'byin par byed cing /_lus brtan pa dang /_gzi brjid che ba dang /_nad dkon pa/_mig gsal ba/_stobs 'phel ba sogs
[\[316a.3\]]yon tan mtha' yas shing /_khyad par blo gros pad+ma kha phye ba ltar gyur nas blo rno ba/_'dzin bzang ba/_rig pa gsal ba/_brjed mi 'gro ba/_rtsod pa bzang ba sogs blo 'phel gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/yang tshes bco lnga dang gza' nyi ma 'dzom
[\[316a.4\]]pa'i mtshan mo ma la kAM gu ni'i snum gyi sgron me sbar/_de la rkun po'i thod pa bkab nas du ba chags su bcug pa de mig la byugs na mig chus ma dag par lha 'dre mi gsum gang gis kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yang gza' lhag pa yod pa'i nyi ma kAM gu ni'i snum
[\[316a.5\]]khol ma rnying pa'i nang du chu blug_/de steng ma la kAM gu ni'i zhing par btags pa btab la bskol ba grangs su bcug pa'i snum kha zhag ltar yong ba zos la rting par byugs na mdze rigs kyis yan lag chad 'gro ba sos par 'gyur zhing gdong mdzes shing mdangs dang
[\[316a.6\]]ldan par 'gyur ro/_/nyin nyer gcig gi bar snum se ba bcu gnyis re khong du btang na mdze'i rigs mtha' dag rtsa ba nas thon par 'gyur ro/_/yang gza' nyi ma yod pa'i nyin snod gtsang mar ba nag mo'i 'o ma bskol/_de la ma la kAM gu ni'i zhib par btags la
[\[316a.7\]]btab ste ru ma dang bcas zho bsnyal/_de dkrogs te mar bcos la 'bras ba nag mo'i 'o mar bcos pa'i mar de nas se ba bcu gnyis re btab pa zla ba gcig dang zhag bcu'i bar zos na/_skra dang sma ra dkar por song ba slar yang nag por 'gyur ro/_/gza' mig
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]dmar yod pa'i nyin ba nag mo'i mar btsags bcad la phyed tsam grang bar ma la kAM gu ni'i 'bru dang tel nag cha mnyam phye mar btags pa blug ste nyin dang por se ba bcu gnyis/_gnyis par zho gang se ba bzhi sogs nyin bdun gyi bar du cha re spar/_de nas rgyun du bsten
[\[316b.2\]]thub na rab de min zla gcig dang zhag bcu'i bar du bsten na tshe shin tu ring bar 'gyur zhing gong du 'gro yang mgyogs bul rta dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/zhes lha dbang phyug gis lha mo dbu mar gdams pa rdzogs so//_//a shwa gan+ng+ha zhib par btags pa'i phye
[\[316b.3\]]ma zho gsum/_ba dkar rkyang nag rkyang lta bu spu mdog gang yin kyang mdog gzhan ma 'dres pa'i kha gtsang gi mar btsags bcad pa'i nang du btab ste 'khang pa dang bud med dus bab kyi zla mtshan 'dzag nas tshad pa'i nyin khong du btang na bud med phru gu mi yong
[\[316b.4\]]ba'ang nges par sbrum par 'gyur ro/_/yang siM g+haDa/_lga/_b+ha Ta ka Ti ya/_pi pi ling /_nA ga ge sar rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags pa thur mgo gsum pa mdog gcig gi 'o ma khyor gang tsam la btab ste dus gong mtshungs la byin
[\[316b.5\]]na'ang nges par mngal dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/ma la chags kyang mi gnas par 'jig na/_lA la ka ma la'i rtsa ba ba'i 'o mar btsos/_de nas slar yang ba mar gyi nang du btsos la zhib par btags la gong gi ba mar bzhu ba dang mnyam du btang na 'jig
[\[316b.6\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/yang bilba'i 'bru dang smyug ma'i lo ma cha mnyam zhib par btags la chus rta byas nas nyin bdun gyi bar btang kyang mi 'jig go/_/mig sman gyi _zhag bdun nad kyang grag 'ong
[\[316b.7\]]sbyor thabs ni/_surma/_ldong ros/_sa mu dra pha la rgya mtsho _sa bu dra phen _lbu ba/_mu tig_/byi dang ga _bsdu ba Sha pa ri ya/_phaT ki Di/_byu ru/_lo d+ha/_pho ris rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags dar la legs par btsags/
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]'khar snod du tsan dan dmar po'i skya ba'i mjug zangs dmar gyis gtums pas nyin phyed tsam skam nyed bya/_de nas bcus nas zhag gcig song ba'i chu cung zad blugs la nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig tsam bsnur la ril bur dril/_skam pa dang
[\[317a.2\]]rdo 'jam po'i ngos su chu dang lhan du brdar nas mig la byugs na ling tog_/steng 'og gi 'gribs/_sha 'dzer/_mig chu 'dzag pa/_rgyang mig mi gsal ba sogs mig gi nad mtha' dag la phan no/_/ki ka ra'i me tog_/rgya gar stod ja/_gla sgang /
[\[317a.3\]]khi r+Na'i 'bru/_pa Ta ki ri rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags/_ra'i 'o mas khu ba byas la ril bu sgril bzhos khu ba byas brdar nas mig steng 'og gang rigs kyis bsgribs nas mi mthong bar byugs na mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/ri phyugs kyi gci
[\[317a.4\]]ba ser kha ma me la bsregs pa'i thal ba zhib par btags/_der chur blugs la ras sam dar la tshags thengs gnyis byas/_de nas chu de dwangs su bcug la dal bus pho bas mthil du chags pa'i thal ba de skams pa dang /_'khar snod du pang kha'i skum
[\[317a.5\]]dang lhan _tsan dan gyi skya ba zangs gtums can gyis nyi ma gsum gyi bar bsnur ba chung ngu re mig la byugs na sha 'dzer dang /_dmar por song ba sogs khrag la brten pa'i mig nad thams cad la phan/_bdud rtsi mig sman gyi sbyor ba ni/_surma/_gser rdo/_so na mak+Shi/
[\[317a.6\]]ldong ros/_big pan/_pa Ti ka Ti hirma dzi/_pi pi ling /_pho ris/_rgyam tsha/_ku ru pA la/_ba ru ra'i 'bru'i nang gi snying po/_Sha pa ri ya rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsogs/_rdo gzhong shin tu 'jam po'i nang du _son mak+Shi
[\[317a.7\]]chu bcus nas zhag gcig song bas gar sla zho tsam sbrus pa skam thag ma chod par nyed thengs gcig_/de nas nyi mar cung zad cig bzhag_/yang bud med bu skyes pa'i 'o mas gar sla gong tsam byas pa ma skam par nyed thengs gcig_/de bzhin du pa'i 'o mas thengs
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]gcig_/ra'i 'o mas thongs gcig sbrus pa'i ma skam tsam la ril bu sgril la skam thag chod pa dang sbrang rtsis rta byas brdar nas mig la byugs na rlung la brten pa'i mig nad thams cad la phan/_ra'i 'o mas khu ba byas nas byugs na srod long la phan/_bud
[\[317b.2\]]med kyi 'o mas khu ba byas nas byugs na khrag rlung la brten pa'i mig nad thams cad la phan/_ba'i gcin gyis khu ba byas nas byugs na mig tsha zhing mig rnag mang du 'dzag pa la phan/_'u su'i khu bas rta byas byugs na sha 'dzer dang mig dmar por mod
[\[317b.3\]]ba la phan no/_/de rnams ni bdud rtsi mig sman gyi sbyor ba kha bsgyur dang bcas pa rdzogs so//_//ni ram li/_ra tan dze ti skyur ba gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags 'o mar sbyar te byugs na rgyang mig mi gsal ba la phan/_du ba ral
[\[317b.4\]]pa zho gang /_dngul chu zho gang /_rdo thal/_dan rog brgya tham pa lce ston/_pho ris brgyad cu/_dan+da drug cu tham pa rnams _ka yib la zer _zhib par btags nim+bu'i khu bas 'dam btags byas la ril bu dril te pad kha tsam re chu la sbyar nas
[\[317b.5\]]byugs na 'byung ngo /_/sha za yi dwags la sogs pa gnod pas mig na ba la phan no/_/'khar snod du nim+bu'i chur sma ru mgo nag dkar po zhib par brdar te steng glang po che'i rmig pa nyis 'gyur gyis mang ba zhig tu brdar/_de steng ku kum sma ru mgo nag gi
[\[317b.6\]]gsum cha gnyis tsam brdar/_de rnams legs par 'dres pa dang mig la nyin gsum nas bdun gyi bar gang rigs 'byug cing sman zhag gang 'byug gi ring phyir mi 'don/_khyad par rlung gi rigs ma phog pa byas pas ling tog_/rwa/_sha 'dzer/
[\[317b.7\]]'gribs sogs mig nad mtha' dag la mchog tu phan no/_/surma/_mi'i skra/_yung ba chung ngu bcas brdar la mi'i 'o mas khu ba byas nas mig la byugs na khrag gis mig dmar por song ba dang sha 'dzer la phan/_hong len bab ra na
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]ser po dang gla rtsi sbyar la byugs na tsha 'khrug mig chu 'dzag ste za phrug byed pa rnams la phan/_rgya mtsho lbu ba/_a phI ma/_si ra sa'i 'bru rnams se ba bzhi re'i rtsis zhib par btags/_ba gsar pa'i chu bye
[\[318a.2\]]gsum lcags snod nang du skya ba'i mgo zangs kyis gtums pas dkrugs pa dang me btang la chu phyed tsam skams pa dang /_gong gi sman btab ste skyo ma gar phyogs tsam byas slar 'byug skabs pa'i chus klad la byugs na bar 'grib chu 'dzag pa
[\[318a.3\]]za 'phrug_/rdzi ma mig la zug pa sogs mig gi nad thams cad la phan no/_/ka ye pha la zhib mor btags pa chur sbyar te byugs na srod long la phan no/_/rwa ling shin tu che bas khebs shing na na ni m+bu'i khu bar rgya tshwa yungs 'bru tsam re brdar
[\[318a.4\]]nas ra ling gi thog tu nyin gsum gyi bar blugs pas 'phral du zug gzer cung zad 'byung yang myur du phan par 'gyur ro/_'o ma thang gis _/yang mig la ra ling gis cher na na bzhu shel snying po pho ris tsam re zhib par btags la chur sbyar nas nyin gsum kyi bar
[\[318a.5\]]blugs na nyin dang por zug gzer cung zad ldang /_gnyis par mig skrangs po shin tu che zhing zug gzer kyang 'byung /_nyin gsum par shug gzer skrangs po zhi ba dang /_mnyam du rwa ling gang yang med par 'gyur zhing 'og 'grib kyis mi mthong ba yang
[\[318a.6\]]gsal bar byed do/_/mig gangs phyid kyis na ba'i zug gzer che na chu grang gtsang ma snod gang yang rung bar blugs la mig ma btsums par gdong chu'i nang du bcug la zug gzer chag par bdugs pas myur du phan par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin yan lag
[\[318a.7\]]kha bas phyid pa yang chu grang mo'i nang du bdugs pas phan no/_/dbang sdong gi thang chu/_ha la d+ha/_phaT ki ri rnams cha mnyam ste ni mA'i khu ba byung na rab de min chur sbyangs nas mig gi phyi nang la byugs pas mig 'bras chen por song zhing mig sprin dmar ba nyin
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]mtshan gnyis kar nad zug shin tu che ba la phan/_ka ni ya ra'i rtsa ba/_mtshal/_tsha la/_ni la tho da/_pi pi ling /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba/_pho ris/_lga bzang po rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags/_lga bzang ba chur sbangs pas khu ba byas nas ril
[\[318b.2\]]bu sran ma tsam dril la btang bas khrag la brten pa'i tshigs na ba thams cad la phan/_'o ma bu'i rtsa ba/_lcang nag madz+hanagi rtsa ba dang lo ma/_skyi pa'i ba rtsa ba sdong po lo ma 'bras bu/_gze ma rnams cha mnyam la 'o ma bu dang lcang nag gi rtsa ba cung zad mang ba bcas
[\[318b.3\]]gzhogs la khog ma che ba mthil du bug pa nas shong ba tsam yod pa zhig gi nang du blugs/_dz+hayu_khebs _madz+han _gcod rgyab la _myu ba_rlangs pa mi 'chor ba kha legs _go sha ru _bar bcad de mtshams rdza sa'i 'jim pas gtums ras kyis
[\[318b.4\]]dril yang 'jim pa 'byug pa dang ras kyis dril ba sogs lnga brtsegs tsam byas/_sa dong brus pa khog ma cung zad chung ba zhig bcug la sas stems/_de'i khar gong gi khog ma bzhag_/khog ma gnyis kyi mtshams legs par bsgrigs la 'jim pas
[\[318b.5\]]rlung mi 'chor bar byas/_de nas khog ma che ba shing dang gci ba'i dkyil du bcug la nyi ma'i bzhi cha tsam zhig me shin tu tsha ba btang /_de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton pas khog ma chung bar gsham du chu dang khar snum spris ma ltar chags yod pa de bton la thur
[\[318b.6\]]mgo re tsam lga dang mnyam du btang na bse dug min pa'i rlung la brten pa'i nad tsha grang thams cad la phan/_li shi dang mnyam du btang na grang ba la brten pa'i nad thams cad la phan/_yung ba dang mnyam du btang na khrag la brten pa'i nad gsar rnying
[\[318b.7\]]thams cad la phan/_rtsam pa'i pag dang mnyam du btang na bad kan gyi rigs thams cad la phan/_gzhan 'dres med pa'i mkhris pa rkyang pa'i nad dang 'grim pa gnyis por ba'i gzhan ma nad gang la yang mi 'grib med cing khyad par yan lag zha ba
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]skams pa rnams la khong du btang zhing snum byugs pas nad med lta bur sos par 'gyur ro/_/phug ron/_khyim bya/_khang byil/_ri bong /_rnga mong rnams kyi brun gang legs par byas pa'i skam po khog ma steng
[\[319a.2\]]shod du ldugs lugs sogs gong ltar byas pas snum bton la a ka ra ka ra/_lga bzang ba/_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba/_ka ru dang _u ni_pi pi ling /_tsi ri _shag_uDa _la la phud chung ba/_so ma ra tsa rnams cha mnyam zhib
[\[319a.3\]]par btags pa dar la btsags/_de thams cad dang cha mnyam pa'i snum blugs la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam dril la btang na/_rlung /_bad kan/_khrag grang ba/_chu ser rnams la phan zhing lus stobs rgyas pa dang khu ba 'phel bas 'dod pa spyod
[\[319a.4\]]nus pa/_dang kha 'byed pa sogs la phan no/_/ri byugs lo gcig tsam 'gro ba'i lci ba/_ra'i ril ma gnyis skam thag bcad cing gang legs par byas/_khog ma steng shod du me gtong lugs sogs gong ltar byas pas snum 'byung ba sbrang rtsi
[\[319a.5\]]dang yung ba gang rung dang mnyam du khong du btang zhing snum rgyang pas phyi ma bsku mnye byas pas chu pags 'grams/_za phrug/tshags tshigs na ba sogs chu ser gyi nad thams cad la mchog tu phan zhing mig la 'khyugs kyang rlung chu ser la brten
[\[319a.6\]]pa'i mig nad la phan no/_/gro dang skyer pa mang nyung mnyam pa dang /_shu dag de'i sum cha tsam bcas pas snod du blugs la snum 'don lugs gong ltar byas pa se ba bzhi tsam re khong du btang na'ang nad tsha grang gsar rnying kun la phan pa'i spyi
[\[319a.7\]]'joms so/_/bri tsha/_song _rgyam tsha/_Da ru ha lad _pha Ta ki Di rnams cha mnyam bzhu shel gyi dam pe 'jim pa dang ras bsnol mar lnga brtsegs byugs pa zhig gi nang du phyed tsam gong ba blugs/_rdza snod che ba zhig gi phyed tsam gci ba'i mes
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]bkang ba'i nang du gong gi dam pe gyen bsregs nyal stabs su bzhag_/khardza snod kyi phyir 'ong ba byas la steng du'ang me btang /_khog ma de rdo'i sgyed pu gsum sgram lta bur bzhag pa'i mthil nas kyang me cung zad gtong /_khog ma'i phyir bzhu
[\[319b.2\]]shel gyi dam pe gcig bzhag la dam pe gnyis kyi kha sprad pa'i mtshams la lhang tsher bkab la phyir 'jim pa byugs te rlung mi 'chor ba byas/_me nyi ma'i brgyad cha tsam zhig btang bas/_dam pe phyi ma'i nang du snum 'ong ba de thigs pa gsum tsam re
[\[319b.3\]]dang /_la la phud se ba bzhi tsam zhib par btags pa dang mnyam du btang bas nad tsha grang gsar rnying thams cad la ni mi phan pa med do/_/ze tsha/_rgyam tsha/_pha Ta ki Di/_su ma la dkar po dang ser po/_dza ba Sha ra/_mtshal cog la ma
[\[319b.4\]]rnams cha mnyam btags pa bzhu shel gyi dam per blugs la snum 'don lugs gong mtshungs byas pa'i snum de mdze'i rma'am/_shu pa gsar rnying /_phol mig sogs la byugs na phan no/_/a ru ra/_tsi tra/_pi pi ling /_rgyam tsha/
[\[319b.5\]]a ru bsregs pa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags/_lga sbangs pa'i chus sbrus la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril ba ril bu re btang na glo dang mgo bo na ba la phan zhing dang kha 'byed do/_/ma ru rtse'i 'bras bu zhib par
[\[319b.6\]]btags _ba la sha_la chu grang gis rta byas btang na glo ba'i rnag thon par 'gyur ro/_/sbyi bzhur brdungs pa'i khu ba khong du btang na phyi nang gi rtsa 'phyus pa'i rigs la phan no/_/tha ram brdungs pa'i 'byar khyis rmugs pa'i rma la
[\[319b.7\]]dkris na phan/_lung kha ri/__lpa tsha yin/_zhes pa'i sman tshad par phan/_dkar sha/_shing sha sogs sha mo'i rigs gang rnyed bye kar dang mnyam du sbyar ba'i thang khong du btang na mkhal nad gzer zug 'phral du gcog
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]/mkhan pa brdungs pa'i khu bar pho ris zhib par btags la btab ste khong du btang na khog pa'i srin nad kun la phan/_mkhan pa'i dugs byas na pho long 'khrog pa myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/spa yag pas skrangs po dang
[\[320a.2\]]rma la phan/_la la phud cha lnga/_na rub _tsi ta cha bdun/_a ru ra cha drug rnams zhib par btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang na ma 'ju ba/_me drod nyams pa/_glang thabs rnams la phan no/_/bad mar ma dang bu ram sbyar ba chus 'phul
[\[320a.3\]]la btang na sha ser dang mig ser la phan no/_/ba dmar lga ser gyis khu ba byas la steng grib kyi nad mgor thebs na rna bar blug cing lus gzhan la thebs na khong du btang bas gza'i rigs mtha' _tsi tu lbatuT zhing chu la sogs la yid ba'i srog chags dmar po chung du zhig song /
[\[320a.4\]]dag la phan no/_/de yang gza' nad la/_rA hu'i dug 'phog pa yin na lo phyed gsum/_spen pa'i dug phog na lo lnga/_ke tu'i dug phog na brgyad de de bsgral nas gza'i nad kyis 'tsho 'chi gang byed las mi gnas so/_/rgya khur dang bye kar dang
[\[320a.5\]]cha mnyam sbyar ba khong du btang bas mi phyugs gang gi yang chu 'gags pa sel lo/_/a ru ra gnyis sbrel mgo gzhogs phyed na ba la gang na phyogs su bsdams pas phan zhing sna khrag kyang chod la ya ma'i 'bus na ba sel lo/_/tsan dan dmar po dang /_ng+hu ri
[\[320a.6\]]btsag zhib par btags khong du'ang cung zad btang zhing gang na sar byugs pas me lce 'khor lo la phan no/_/tsan dan su ra zhib par btags la chu skol gyis 'phul nas btang na khrag la phan no/_/tsha la bsregs pa'i thal ba/_zi ra dkar po/_kha ru
[\[320a.7\]]tsha rnams zhib par btags la thun tshad thur mgo do tsam re btang na pho bar na zug byed pa rlung dang ma 'ju ba'i rigs kun la phan zhing dang kha 'byed do/_/la la phud cha gnyis/_kha ru tsha cha gcig_/tsi tra cha gsum/_pi pi ling cha bzhi/
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]lga dkar po cha drug_/a ru ra cha drug rnams zhib par btags dar la btsags te/_thun tshad gong bzhin btang bas ldan 'dus kyi nad gdong ser po dang dmar por song ba mig mi gsal shed chung ba'i mgo bo 'khor ba rnams la phan no/_/
[\[320b.2\]]a ru ra mer bsregs pa'i thal ba/_tsi tra/_pi pi ling /_kha ru tsha /_a ru nag chung rnams zhib par btags la lga'i khu bas ril bu sgyu ru ra tsam byas la gong du btang krun glo nad kun dang pho bar rlung zhugs pa khrag skran rus tshad/_dang kha
[\[320b.3\]]byed cha tsam _'gags pa rnams la phan/_phag brun bsregs pa'i thal ba bong bu'i gcin gyis khu ba byas nas snal blugs pas ya ma klad gzer nya la phan/_ka rany+dza ba'i 'o mar btab pa'i khu ba khong du btang bas khog srin dang gzhang srin kyi nad la
[\[320b.4\]]phan|_sha 'bras dang bye kar cha bsnyams zhib par btags la zho dang sbyar nas btang na tshad 'khru chod par 'gyur ro/_/'gron bu bsregs pa'i thal ba mi'i 'o mar sbyar la rna bar blugs na rnag 'dzag pa chod do/_/dza mu ni zhib par btags
[\[320b.5\]]pa chu la sbyar nas byugs na grang thor rgyab pa la phan/_skyu ru ra a rag gi nang du sbangs pa'i khya ba byugs na skra tshan che bar 'gyur ro/_/phur mong nag po sha'i srubs rnams la rdzongs na 'bu mi 'byung zhing shing kun dri mas kyang thub bo/_/a ru
[\[320b.6\]]ra/_pi pi ling /_kha ru tsha gsum cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang na pho ba dang rked pa na bar phan/_ku Ta ki cha gnyis/_pho ris cha gcig_/tshwa cha phyed rnams zhib par btags pa chur sbyar te byugs
[\[320b.7\]]na so rtsa dam zhing brtan par 'gyur ro/_/la la phud mer bsregs pa'i du ba kha la btang na so srin na ba la phan/_pa Ta ki Ti _hong phen _i'i 'bru'i du ba 'then pas so srin la phan/_rgun _da'i kha_'brum dkar po mkhris pa dang
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]lce skam pa la phan/_ma nu khrag can gyi nang gi khrag rkang lag gi ser kar byugs kyang phan zhing spos dkar gyi phye ma btab kyang phan no/_/bil ba'i nang gi 'bru/_ma dzu pha la/_lga gsum cha mnyam sbrang rtsir sbyar
[\[321a.2\]]ba btang na khrag 'grim pa'i rigs chod do/_/mtshal/_ldong ros/_dngul chu/_shu dag dkar po/_/btsan dug_/mu zi ser po rnams cha mnyam/_pho ris nyis 'gyur bcas zhag brgyad tsam gyi bar zhib par btags la 'bras
[\[321a.3\]]tsam re rgyun du bsten na lus stobs rgyas/_dang kha 'byed/_drod che/_rlung rnams 'joms so/_/bu kar mul/_shu dag_/pho ris/_kha ru tsha/_mtshal/_li shi/_dzA ti/_a ru ra rnams zhib par btags te ba
[\[321a.4\]]mar dang sbyar nas skyu ru ra tsam re khong du btang na rlung khrag bad kan sogs 'dus pa'i nad kyis pho long gi yul zug gzer che ba rnams 'joms shing phan la sman bsten ring la 'o ma/_'bras pag thug rnams las gzhan mi za'o/_/
[\[321a.5\]]sha ma la Do Da'i dkyil gyi ljang gu de bzhi lnga re nyin ltar gyis zos na bad rlung mgo 'khor dang mig mi gsal ba la phan no/_/dngul chu/_so ma la kha ra/_mu zi ser po/_zi ra dkar po rnams cha mnyam phye mar byas pa lugs
[\[321a.6\]]che chung ril ma las che tsam ma dog smug snum phreng ba byed ba de yin/_kong nang du blug ste kha dam par bcad la rlung mi 'chor bar byas/_de steng ras dang 'jim pas lan gsum gyi bar du sgril la me nyor kyi nang du zhag bdun gyi ring bzhag_/de nas
[\[321a.7\]]sa dong brus la me shin tu tsha pas nyin phyed kyi bar bsregs la grang ba dang bton te b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i khu ba sbyar te lus la bsku mnye byas na kong po dang za 'phrug shu thor sogs la phan no/_/ka ye_rak+ta na dze ti yang zer _pha la'i pags pa dang
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]bye kar cha mnyam btags la btang na dngas ma tsha grang gis 'dzags kyang phan par 'gyur ro/_/yang ka ye pha la'i phags pa dang rgya gar stod ja gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags pa gri khyi sogs rma gsar rnying gang la 'ang btab ste ras kyis
[\[321b.2\]]bsdams la zhag gsum gyi ring kha ma phye bar bzhag des phan nges so/_/'bras dang shu ba gang la yang thog mar sa b+hu Na'i khu bas shin tu dag par bkrus/_de nas nI la tho tha'i phye ma btab la nyin gcig bzhag_/nyin phyi ma
[\[321b.3\]]nI la tho tha dang spos dkar cha mnyam zhib par btags pa til gyi snum dang bsres te cung zad nyed/_de nas chu _glang klad _cung zad re blugs pa dang lhan du nyin phyed tsam gyi bar du nyes pas mdog shin tu dkar ba zhig 'ong la de byugs
[\[321b.4\]]pas myur du phan no/_/gnyan 'bur gyis skrangs par ba'i gci ba dang snum bsres pa'i skyo ma drod ma yal ba skrangs pa gang yin la byugs/_de ras kyis bsdams grang ba dang yang brje ba sogs byas pas myur du rnag tu smin par
[\[321b.5\]]nus shing smin pa de brtol ba la lda ser mer bsregs pa chur brdar la gang brtol sar bug che chung ji ltar 'dod kyi rgyar yang yang byug pas myur du rdol 'ong ngo /_spra tshil bzhu ste ras la btsags/_de steng ba mar btsags bcad pa
[\[321b.6\]]blug ste dkrugs pas legs par 'dres pa mchu dang rkang lag gas par byugs na 'phral du phan no/_/tshigs pa drug pa'i phan tshun du sor bzhi re gzhal sar rtsa hrang nge ba yod pa de'i nang 'debs su me btsa' bzhag pas rlung khrag gis mgo bo na
[\[321b.7\]]ba dang rtsa dkar la phan/_tshigs pa bco brgyad pa'i g.yas g.yon du sor gsum re gzhal ba'i sa dang bco brgyad rang gi steng ste gsum du me btsa' re bzhag pas rlung /_grang ba/_rked pa na ba/_mkhal rtsa bral ba rnams la phan/
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]tshigs pa lnga pa drug pa bdun pa gsum dang mdun gyi dkar nag mtshams su me btsa' re bzhag pas khrag gis brang tsha ba dang stod na ba sogs la phan zhing stod 'tshangs la de steng rke stong bya ra khung du'ang gcig bzhag pas
[\[322a.2\]]phan no/_/lheng lheng rtse dbus su bzhag pa'i rgya gram sor gsum bsregs pas mkhris pa bad kan mchin skran rlung rnams la phan/_rke stong bya ra khung du me sgor mo a long lta bu bzhag na khrag skyugs pa dang khrag rlung la phan/_me nyams
[\[322a.3\]]gsang gi g.yas g.yon mtshon re gzhal ba'i sar tshugs re bzhag pas rlung khrag dang khrag skran la pan/_pus mor tshigs chu 'khor na me long ru bzhir tshugs re bzhag pas khrag rlung chu ser sogs sel zhing khyad par rkyang bskum mi
[\[322a.4\]]thub pa la phan/_zas 'grangs ltogs ma snyoms pa'i po ma 'ju glang thabs la mthil bzhir lcags leb me la dmar por song ba bsregs pa'i 'od ma reg tsam dang ras kyis dar ba 'byug bye pa res 'jog tu byas pas dri shin tu ngan pa zhig don
[\[322a.5\]]yong zhing de nas myur du phan par 'gyur ro/_/nywa log 'khru skyugs kyi nad la zhag bzhi tshun du lag pa'i mkhrig ma gnyis sam de 'og bsgrad mkhyid gang gis/_dpung 'og gi nywa gnyis sog pa'i mthil gnyis/_brla'i nang gi nywa
[\[322a.6\]]gnyis/_phyin dkyil gyi nywa nyis rnams la lcags mda' sor gsum pa zhig gis ser mdog thon tsam bsregs pas phan zhing tshan che na ltag khung spu 'khyel gyi thad kyi ltag pa'i chu leb gnyis dang rkang mthil gnyis bsregs na des phan
[\[322a.7\]]nges so/_/sngar spyod kyi skyon yon rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba dang lus kyi gzi mdangs bzang ba ngan pa dang ngan pa bzang bar 'gyur ba byung na klu gdon gyi nad zhugs pa'i rtags yin pas sor mo nyi shu'i sen snying gi mtshams dang skra mtshams
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]su 'phred la sor lnga ser mdog thon tsam bsregs pas de'i nad sel lo/_/rdo thal chu la sbyangs pa dang so phag rnying pa bsregs pa'i khu ba gnyis gang rung gi gdus du thang btang bas nywa log 'khru skyugs kyi skyug pa sogs skyug pa'i rigs
[\[322b.2\]]mtha' dag chod do /_!_/shrI ga Na shA ya na maH_dpal tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi gdams pa/_phyogs gang du 'gro yang lam du nad gdon gnod pa sogs nyer 'tshe gang yang mi 'byung zhing /_bya ba gang dang gang yin pa de bde blag tu
[\[322b.3\]]'grub pa dang /_zas gos gnas ma la sogs 'bad med du 'byur bar 'don na/_oMhrIhrIM/_glI pau/_/gAMgAM/_zhes pa 'di thog mar yan lag lnga khrus byas/_gu gul sogs spos kyi dud pa sngags bzla ba'i bar rgyun ma chad pa
[\[322b.4\]]dang bcas zhag nyer gcig gi ring nyin rer brgya rtsa re ma chag par bzla ba bsnyen pa dang /_de nas las spyor nye ring gang du 'gro ba'i dus tshar bdun re'am tha na'ang tshar re bzlas nas phyin na gong du smos pa ltar gnod pa med cing bsam pa thams
[\[322b.5\]]cad 'grub par 'gyur ba sogs yon tan bsam las 'das pa 'byung nges so/_/na mas+s+wa ra s+t+yai/_'phags ma dbyangs can ma'i bden tshig gi sngags/_ye ye/_sa paM/_prI yA bi duH_ma haM hrIM/_bA ge shwa rI/_shrI ma hi ta no shak+ti/
[\[322b.6\]]pra tso da ya ta/_ces pa 'di gza' mig dmar gyi res dang gnam gang nam byung la dri bzang po'i dud pa dang bcas tshar bdun re bzlas na bsam pa'i re ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhing /_khyad par blo rno ba dang shes rab che bar 'gyur ro/_/oM A
[\[322b.7\]]de sha gu ru sa ha ra kA ba ru/_kA mi k+Shu de bI/_ta ha bA sha/_a dza pAM rA Ni/_a dza r+pA rA d+d+hA ke pu tra/_sA ta ko na ko na/_tA ba ban+ng+ho/_tI dzA ri ban+ng+ho/_e kAM ta ra ban+ng+ho/_be haM ka rA ban+ng+ho/_na dI ban+ng+ho/_nA la ban+ng+ho/_nA le
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]kA ka nA rA bad+hehUM /_/i sa g+ha Ta/_paN+Di ra ha to/_a dza pAM rA nI/_lA dza me ri b+ha k+tI/_/ku ru ki shak+ti/_a dze pA la yo gi la dze phu ro/_man+t+ra I shwa rI bA tsA/_zhes pa'i sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas te nas la
[\[323a.2\]]phu btab/_tshad pa'i rims nyin gcig pa/_gnyis pa/_gsum pa/_bzhi pa rnams gcig la phyi ma phan/_pa'i tshad rims rnams kyis na bar/_zla bo zhig gis thog mar nad pa'i mgo
[\[323a.3\]]bo ras kyis bsdams te bzung la rang gis sngags 'dren zhing phus btab pa'i nas des mgo bo brab/_de nas nad par nad ga na 'dug dris la mgo bo phan na skye/_de nas stod/_sked pa sogs rim bzhin ras kyis bsdams pa spo zhing nas
[\[323a.4\]]kyis brab pas mthar rkang pa'i mtheb mo'i bar byas pas nges par phan par 'gyur zhing slar yang mi 'byung ba'i ched du srad bur mdud pa bdun/_mdud pa rer sngags tshar re bzlas pa'i phus btab pa rke la btags so/_/shin tu zab/
[\[323a.5\]]grong dang grong rdal gang la'ang mi phyugs kyi rims bsrung bar 'dod na thog mar lcags kyi gzer sor bzhi pa gzer mgo can bzhi/_de'i gdan gro gar chos 'byung gru gsum nyis brtsegs bris pa bzhi/_bya pho nag po gcig_/chang
[\[323a.6\]]bum pa gang /_nas/_gro/_sran chung ma/_sran ma/_'bras/_pad kha/_bra'o /_/gzhan 'bru sna gang 'dzom tshon pa re rnams sta gon byas/_tho rengs shin tu snga bar rang gi mchan khung g.yon du bya pho kha phyir bstan la bcug_/lcags
[\[323a.7\]]gzer dang dril bu lag g.yon gyis 'khrol zhing bzung /_lag g.yas kyis 'bru sna 'thor zhing ngag bsdams la 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags 'dren/_zla bo zhig la chang bum bskur la des ku sha lta bus rang gang 'gro'i rjes la chang 'thor zhing yong /
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]thog ma grong khyer gyi shar du slebs pa dang grogs chos 'byung gi re khA can sar bzhag_/de steng 'bru sna cung zad blug cing chang gtor te chos 'byung gi dkyil du lcags gzer 'debs shing sngags tshar gcig 'don pa slar yang 'bru sna dang chang
[\[323b.2\]]cung zad blugs nas bzhag_/de nas lho/_nub rnams rim par gzer 'debs lugs sogs gong ltar byas rjes byang du sleb pa dang gzer chos 'byung gi steng du nyal stabs su bzhag la sngags 'dren zhing 'bru sna dang chang blug_/sngags tshar
[\[323b.3\]]gcig song ba dang /_gro ga_/gzer/_'bru sna'i lhag_/chang dang bcas khyer la lung stong mi med sa zhig tu phyin la bya pho kha phyir bstan la slong /_de rjes su chang dang 'bru sna'i lhag phol khyim du log_/thog ma khyem nas thon nas nang du ma sleb
[\[323b.4\]]bar ngag dang phyir mig ma shor ba gal che zhing /_nad log pa byung na slar yang 'dab bo/_/'dis ni mi phyugs gang gi yang rims sogs 'gos nad kyi rigs bsrung ba mi thub pa mi srid pa shin tu zab po/_/sngags ni/_o a saM ku bu tra brad+mA ki wa tsa bI
[\[323b.5\]]tsa De/_nA ba ni raM ta rab+ha ye/_rAb+ha bA DI kA ra na ka re ni ta ShA dza la ga be/_a tsa la dI The stA ba na mi The ba ma ba na/_pha la to Da Sha i/_i ka Da bI ka Te tsa Da Sha ye/_tso ta tse ta ri de lbI bi ra ha na ba tA A ye/_me rI sa ka ta/_gu ru tI b+hak+ti phu ro man+t+ro I swa rI bA tsA
[\[323b.6\]]ka Ta si re kI pA pi Da ga dza ma tIn ko hA ra pa n+yA ni gA lI pa n+yA Ti laM ka ki ya/_dza har laM ka kA ko Ta sa muM dra ki ShA I b+hA ga b+ha ga si ka nI Da ka ni na b+ha ga ta ba bI ra ha na baM ta kI do hA yI/_zhes pa'o/_/dgra jag rkun ma sogs kyis glags mi rnyed pa'i thabs ni/_oMn
[\[323b.7\]]mo brah+ma I sa ri ra rak+Sha Tha Tha/_zhes pa 'di rngo kham bu tsam bdun la rdo re ra tshar btab ste sked ba'i g.yas g.yon dang rgyab tu rdo re bsdams/_lag pa gnyis su rdo gnyis re bzung la bsngags 'dren zhing phyin pas dgra jag gang gi 'ang glags mi rnyed do/
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]byis pa skyes nas yang yang mi 'tsho ba la 'khor lo 'di gro ga la/_gla rtsi/_tsan+dan dkar po/_/ga bu ra/_gi haM/_gur gum/_si la/_a ka ru/_shug pa rnams cha mnyam brdar ba'i khu bas bris _la srud pa gang rung gis bcings te mgul la btags na nges par 'tsho/_bud med mngal du byis pa chags kyang yang yang shor nas phan ma thogs pa'i rigs la 'khor lo 'di gro gar gong gi dri brgyud kyis bris la srad bus bcings te bud med de'i zla mtshan babs nas zhag gsum gyi thog sked par btags na 'jur bar mi 'gyur zhing nges par phan thogs so/_/'khor lo 'di gro ga la gur gum gyis bris/_gu gul gyi dud pas bdugs srad bu sna lngas bcings te mgul par btags na dug rigs thams cad thub nges so/_/'khor lo 'di gro gar dri brgyud kyis bris la /_mgul la btags na 'byung po dang yi dwags gang gis kyang gnod pa mi 'byung ngo /_/pho ba'i skran gyis na ba la/_gang na ba'i thad der 'be ta chus bkang ba bzung /_de steng du 'khor lo 'di shog bur bris pa mes bsregs/_thal ba chu nang du 'bab pa byas/_chu de phyir pho/_de ltar nad ma drag par byas pas skran nad thon nges so/_/phru gu skye ma thub pa la 'khor lo 'di li sder la snag tshas bris te nad pa'i mig la bstan la re'u mig gi grangs dang ang+gi rnams 'di dang_'di zhes ngo sprod/_de nas chus 'khor lo bkrus la cung zad khong du btang zhing mgo nas bzung rim bzhin garong bas myur du btsa' bar 'gyur ro//_phrug gu skyes nas ma la 'o ma 'thung rgyu med na/_'khor lo 'di gza' mig dmar yod pa'i nyin gro gar/_si la/_tsan+dan dkar po/_/ga bur/_a ga ru/_gur gum rnams kyis bris la skud pas bcings te mgul du btags na 'o ma nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro/_|_/nas gos sogs nang gi yo byad dang zhing sogs gang la'ang byi ba'i gnod pa srung na/_'khor lo 'di gza' nyi ma yod pa'i nyin shog bur gur gum gyis tshar gyis tshar lnga bris te bsrung bya de'i zur bzhi dang /_dbus su re re sbas na byi ba gnas gzhan du 'gro zhing /_'khor lo sbas pa'i nang tshun la gnod pa mi 'byung nges pa yang dag pa'o//_/_ya ma sogs mgo bo phyed na ba la 'khor lo 'di gza' nyi ma yod lta bu'i 'og mnan na tshong gang 'dod pa de thogs med 'ong zhing rang rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/bza' mi rgyun du mi 'cham par 'thab mo kho na rgyag par/_'khor lo 'di gro gar gi haM dang gur gum gyis bris kyis bris/_gu gul gyis bdugs te mgul du btags na/_shags 'gyed ba sogs la rang gis gang lar bden par gyur zhing pha rol po gnyis nas grangs med kyi bar ma la ngan gros rtsom pa sogs la 'di dag gi mdun ma zhig par gyur nas rang gi ngag btsan zhing dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rang gi gnyin bshes sogs mthun pa'i mi thag ring por song nas slar ma ldog na 'khor lo 'di shog bur bris la nyin bdun gyi bar nyin re bzhin 'khor lo re gang du song ba'i lam der 'phangs na nges par myur du 'ong bar 'gyur so/_/sbrum ma matsa' ma thub par 'khor lo 'di li sder la bris/_de thog mar bud med gyi mig la bstan/_de nas snum gyis 'khor lo bkrus te pho bar byugs na myur du btsa' bar 'gyur ro/_!_'khor lo 'di gza' nyi ma'i nyin snag tshas shog bur bris la skud pas bcings te mgul la btags na rtsa dkar gyi nad thams cad la so ma ra tsa thun tshad chung phyogs tsam zhig bzhag_/de la sngags ni/_oM hri/_hUM ldu swA hA/_zhes pa 'di brgya rtsa gcig bzlas la phus btab ste nad pa'i khong du btang na myur du chad nges so/_/mi bkrus/_de khong du btang bas myur du phebs par 'gyur ro/_/nad pa tshad rlung 'thab pa sogs kha nas gang lab med pa byed pa sngangs sogs smyon pa lta bu 'chol zhing mtshan mo gnyid mi khugs pa sogs la/_grong bdun nas sol ba rdog po bdun gzhan gyis ma mthong ba byas la bslang /_phyogs gang rigs nas rde'u bdun sgrugs te lam rgya gram yod pa'i 'dzom du rde'u re la sol rdog res gong gi 'khor lo zur sbyar nas byugs pas myur du phan par 'gyur zhing /_til ma 'byor kyang sngags kho nas zug gzer drag par 'gyur ro/_/mi phyugs gang yin kyang chur shor nas khog pa chus gang ste 'chi bar thug pa la/_oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/_ru drwa ya dza lo s+t+waM b+ha ya/_baHpaH_zhes pa 'di gang mang bzlas la rkang pa nas yar phus btab na 'bral du skyug par 'gyur zhing chu nad kyis zin pa la sngags 'di bzlas la rma bya'i sgro la bsngags te mgo bo nas mar byabs pas phan par 'gyur ro/_ !_/'khor lo 'di shog bur rgyal dang phur bu 'jom pa'i nyin bris/_tsan dan dkar po/_/gla rtsi/_gur gum/_gsum byugs/_tshon skud sna lngas bcings la sker btags na tshe ring ba/_nad med pa/__longs spyod 'phel ba gzhan gyi yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa yon tan dpag tu med cing /_khyad par rang la brnag pa'i dgra gang yin pa de dbang du 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/gshin 'dre'i gnod pa la/_'khor lo 'di gshin 'dre de'i 'chi sa gang yin gyi sa rtsad chod na de dang /_bsrung bya gang yin de'i phyi sgo la sin+d+hU ra'i khu bas bris na khyem de'i mi nor gang la'ang gnod pa mi 'byung nges dag pa'o/_/pho mo gang la'ang 'dra ste zha 'og skrangs nas na ba la/_oM re tsho ra~M` ra~M` oM ra~M` tsho ra~M` oM/_zhes pa'i sngags yig 'bru bcu pa 'di gci ba'i thal bar bsngags thute byugs na myur du phan par 'gyur ro/_/rkang lag gi tshigs chen sogs rus pa na zhing khyug la gzer na/_badzraM kI ShI bi lo he kA ko ShA/_i shwa ra ku tsi/_brad+mA tA laH_I sa piN+Da ha mA re pa ya Tha/_i sha paN+Di ku/_dza tI go ra Sha rak+Sha ba la/_zhes pa'i sngags 'di rma bya'i sgro mdongs la bsngags te lan bdun byabs na phan par 'gyur ro/_!_/khyi smyon gyi bcos la/_hA kA tse lA/_bra sa kA/_g+ha Da ShIlu/_sI ba ka ru/_la ka DI/_nI li pi le/_ka pa Di/_li yA brah+ma kA/_dreSha/_tuMhaM/_tshoN+Da naM/_ga phi ra mu kha kA de sa/_zhes pa'aM sngags 'dis sbyin po'i 'dam bag lag gnyis kyis snol zhing sngags tshar gsum re bzlas nas phus btab la nad pa'i mgo bo nas rkang pa'i bar byabs/_yang gong bzhin sngags bsgrangs la 'jim par phus btab nad par byabs/_de 'dra lan kha yar byas nas 'jim pa bcad la bltas pas khye dkar pos 'changs pa yin na khye spu dkar po dang /_nag po yin na nag po sogs khye gang yin gyi mdog dang mthun pa'i khye spu 'byung la/_de yang khyi spu grangs bdun nam byung bar bldabs nas bya/_bdun byung ba dang 'jim pa chur skyur bas nad de las nges par grol lo/_!_/so na ba la/_shog bur nad pa'i ming bris/_de ka ba'am gdung gi logs la sbyar/_lcags gzer sor gsum pa zhig ming yig gi steng du bzung la/_oM na mo A de sha gu ru kuM/_ha Di/_ku ha Di/_la ga ki Da/_a si b+har+Sha ki/_ban+ng+ho pi Da/_ki Da dza re/_pi Da mA re/_sa ma ya la/_dzo gi ki/_bA tsa/_me ri/_bak+ta/_gu ru ki shak+ti/_phu ro man+d+ra/_oM na mo A de sha/_zhes pa'i sngags 'di tshar re bzlas la lugs gzer la tho ba cung zad re brdeg_/tshar bdun song ba dang sor do tsam gyi bar stim pas myur du phan cing /_gzer ma bud bar slar yang na bar mi 'gyur ro/_!_/'khor lo 'di gza' zla ba'i nyin gro gar gi haM dang gur gum gyes bris la/_mgul du btags na bkra shis shing bsam pa'i don thams cad 'grub bo/_/lha mo dbu mas dbang phyug la gsol pa/_'jig rten kun gyi byed po dbang phyug che/_/kun la phan phyir 'chi med che'i bcud len/_/bskal pa bskal par rdo rje ltar gnas pa/_/nga yis 'dri yi khyod kyis bshad du gsol/_/zhes gsol pas dbang phyug gis bka' stsal pa/_nyon cig lha sras yid 'ong ma/_/kun phan 'chi med che'i bcud len/_/karko Ti yi cho ga rnams/_/legs par bstan gyis yid la zung /_/de la karkoTi yod sar phyin gza' nyi ma yod pa'i dus la lus legs par bkrus te/_oM na mo ma he sho ri sid+hi shwa ra brnya brnya hu hu phaT swA hA/_zhes pa'i sngags 'di bzla zhing rtsa rtse ma lus pa brkos te gtsang sar grib bskam bya/_bskams pa dang zhib par btags gza' nyi ma yod pa'i dus pa se ba bzhi tsam ba'i 'o ma dang sbrang rtsir sbyar/_nang 'gol sar mtshams bcad/_'bras btsos pa dang ba'i 'o ma cung zad re las gzhan za btung gi rigs mi byed cing khyad par tshwa ma shor ba gal che zhing tho rengs thang re gtong ba zla ba drug gi bar bsten pas zla ba bzhi song ba dang /_skra/_kha spu/_ba spu sogs/_lus kyi spu thams cad byi 'gro zhing /_de nas zla ba phyed gnyis tshun la skra dang kha spu sogs gsar pa shin tu legs pa skyel/_skyes pa dang zla ba phyed gnyis kyi bar karko Ta'i 'bru kho na zhib par btags pa thun tshad gong bzhin sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa zos pas lus yang ba dang /_gzi brjid che ba dang /_sems bde ba dang /_nad med pa sogs 'byung zhing /_bya rog gnyis kyi tshe tshad ste lo stong gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas zla ba gnyis dang zhag nyi shu'i bar 'bras bu mar dang bsres pa bsten pas bya rog gnyis kyi tshe tshad ste lo nyis stong thub cing nyis stong du slebs pa dang gnyid du song ba lta bu'i lus sems ma bral kyang smra brjod sogs mi thub pa zhig 'ong skebs karko Ta'i 'bru dang dngul chu/_mu zi ser po gsum cha mnyam b+h+ring+ga rA dza' khya bas rta byas nas gtong lugs slob ma lta bur bslabs la bzhag_/de nas dran pa rnyed pa dang de ga'i mu 'thud la lo gcig gi bar zos pas lo bzhi stong thub cing /_de nas kyang mu 'thud du zos pas chu la mi 'bying /_mkha' la bya ltar 'phur ba dang /_lus la me chu mtshon la sogs pas mi phigs te/_de ni lus rdo rje dang 'dra ba'o/_/kye rigs sras lha mo/_/'di'i nus pa dang phan yon ni tshul bzhin du ngas kyang brjod par mi nus mod/_'on kyang cho ga sogs rags pa tsam zhig bstan zin gyis snying dang 'dra bar chongs la 'gro ba'i don gyis shig ces gdams so/_/'khor lo 'di gro ga 'am shog bu la ba'i 'o mas bris la srad bu dkar pos bcings te btags na nad rims thams cad thub cing yod la 'dod pa 'grub po/_/'khor lo 'di tA la'i lo ma'am grog la mu zi ser posad bris la btags na shin tu mgyog pas rkang pa na bar mi 'gyur ro/_/tsa kra 'di gro ga la gi haM gis bris la bu dkar pos bcings te btags na rgyal po dang blon po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo 'di shog bu la/_tsan dan dmar po/_gi haM ga bur/_a ka ru gla rtsi gu gul gumar gum rnams kyis bris la mgul du btags na gang 'dod pa dbang du 'gyur ro/_'khor lo 'di gro ga 'am sin+d+hU ras bris te gu gul gyi dud pa btang ste lag pa g.yas la btags na bud med dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo 'di shog bu la ri dwags kyi khrag gis bris te btags na ri dwags 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo 'di gro ga 'am shog bu la dri brgyad kyis bris te btags na 'byung bo dang yi dwags kyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo /_/'khor lo 'di gi haM gis grog la bris te btags na grags pa che bar 'gyur ro/_/ri sgog rtsa rtse ma rnyings ma rul ba grib bskam byas la zhib par btags ba mar gsar pas rta byas la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam re btang na grang ba dang rlung gi rigs mtha' dag la phan zhing lus kyis sobs 'phel zhing 'dod pa spyod mi nus pa yang nus par 'gyur ro/_gong gi ri sgog sbrang rtsis rta byas nas btang na bud med zla mtshan ma babs pa'i khrag gi nad la mchog tu phan no/_/chu grang gis rta byas nas sna khrag gang gis kyang mchod pa'i snar blug na myur du chod par 'gyur ro/_/yang sna khrag kyang 'dzag cing mgo bo na na/_ri sgog gi 'bras bu mar btsags bcad pa'i nang du ma tshig par bcos pa dang pi pi ling cha mnyam pa zhib par btags pa bod kyi thun tshad gsum tsam re khong du btang bas khrag chod cing nad kyang phan no//zhum bu'i lce grib skam byas la zhib par btags la se ba bcu drug tsam re btang
