[\[331b.1\]]
[\[331b.2\]]na ma'i khong nas smra mi shes pa'i lkugs pa kha 'bye bar 'gyur zhing dbang po yang gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/zhum bu'i khrag ma rul ba grib bskam byas te zhib par btags la mig la btab na sha 'dzer ling tog sogs mig nad mtha' dag la phan no/_/mgo
[\[331b.3\]]bo sman gang btang kyang mi phan par na ba la zhum bu'i pags pa'i zhwa gyon na phan par 'gyur ro/_/sgra dang rgya kha spu sogs med par 'dod na thog mar legs par bzhar/_de nas pha wang gi klad pas bsku mnye thengs gsum tsam re byas na phyis nas skye bar mi 'gyur
[\[331b.4\]]ro|_/pa wang gi phrug gu'i ro ma me la bsregs pa'i thal ba mig la byugs na/_steng 'grib/_bar 'grib/_sha 'dzer/_ling tog_/skrangs pa sogs mig nad mtha' dag la phan no/_/sbrul gyi khrag dang byi ba'i khrag bsres pa sna mdog
[\[331b.5\]]dmar por 'gyur zhing za phrug gis na ba la gyugs na myur du phan par 'gyur ro/_/bud med sbrum ma btsa' ma thub pa dad bu ro ma thon par sbrul gyi klad pa mo mtshan gyi nang du byugs na myur du thon par 'gyur ro/_/sbrul gyi pags pa mer bsregs
[\[331b.6\]]pa'i thal bas mig dmar por song zhing na ba la phan no/_/rnga mong gi klad pa se ba bcu drug tsam re khong du btang na rlung gi nad mtha' dag la phan zhing mig shed chung ba'ang che bar 'gyur ro/_/rnga mong gi spu mer bsregs pa'i thal ba sna bug gi nang du phus
[\[331b.7\]]btab na sna khrag ma chod pa myur du chod par 'gyur ro/_/gos dar bsregs pa'i thal ba snar btab kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra/_yang na chu ba la sngon po spyi bor bkab kyang chod do/_/yang chu bal dang shing kun mnyam du btags la chur sbyar ba'i skyo ma
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]mer bsros pa'i dron mo so gang na sar byugs na phral du phan par 'gyur ro/_/ni la ka wang gi rtsa ba/_lo ma/_rkang rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa cha gcig_/shing kun dang sdum cha bzhi bsres pa lte bar byugs na sbos
[\[332a.2\]]khrog rlung gi regs mtha' dag la phan/_phur mong ka ra dang bsres nas khong du btang na mkhris nad la phan/_su Na Na ba 'am/_sa kra/_g+haN+Da pu Na zhes ming gi rnam grangs/_ra'i mar dang sbyar na mig gi ling tog la phan/_sbrang dang sbyar na mchim
[\[332a.3\]]'dzag pa la phan/_til snum dang sbyar na mig gi za phrug la phan/_chu dang sbyar na mig gi mthong snang skar ma 'dra ba la phan no/_/zho'i chu dang sbyar na srod long la phan/_zha nye'i brag zhun mdog dkar ba 'o ma 'dra ba mchog_/gzhan brag zhun gyi rigs gang
[\[332a.4\]]byung yang de'i khu bas yan lag la sogs mtha' dag la phan no/_/zi ra dkar po/_/yung ba zho bzhi/_mud+ha sang g+ti lo phaT ki zho re/_gla sgang a phim pho ris rnams rim _gcig kyang khong bar btang na bcud len gyi mchog _pas cha bskyung /_de rnams thang
[\[332a.5\]]tsam brdungs/_/grang 'thag mig la bdugs pas tsha ba dang /_mig chu 'dzag pa dang /_dmar por song ba la phan/_shi la dza d+hu gdus pa'i thang /_/khong du btang bas yan lag rtsa 'dar rnams/_/b+hi kha snum la btsos pas phyi la byugs/_/
[\[332a.6\]]phyi nang ltag sprad byas pas nges par phan/_/mgo dang yan lag rus chag la sogs dang /_/rtsa rgyus 'khum chad gsar rnying rma rigs la/_/shi la dza d+hu gdus pa'i thang de ni/_/phyi la byugs dang khong du btang ba yis/_/de rnams kun la phan pa myong bas
[\[332a.7\]]grub|_/shi la dza ng+hu gdus pa thang du btang/_/bu bcas sked pa na dang pho na 'joms/_/dug nyung phag brun sbre ro ma nyid brun/_byung na rab _cha mnyam nus ldan bsregs pa snum dang sbyar/_/khong btang phyi la byugs pas zha grum nad/_/gsar rnying kun la btang
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]bas 'joms par nges/_/glang chen lci ba'i dud pa mngal na btang /_/bu dang sha ma phral du thon par nges/_!_/bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/grub thob chen po gorga nA thas gsungs pa'i dri chu'i rtags la nyin re'i legs nyes brtag pa ni/_dge slong
[\[332b.2\]]lta bu khrims ldan la shin tu bden cing /_khyim pa'ang brtag rung ba ste/_de yang tho rangs kyi dri chu thog ma la brtag pa byed rgyu'i dgongs nyal po drag shul chang 'thung ba sogs spang zhing /_srod 'khor tsam la dri chu lan gcig dor/_de nas sang lus kyi
[\[332b.3\]]ba spu mthong ba tsam la dri chu dor la de la brtag pa ste/_gsang gnas kyi kha nas dri chu g.yas ngos su 'khyogs nas 'gro na de'i nyin bkra shis shing bde legs dang ldan la bya ba gang brtsams kyang 'grub pa sogs shin tu legs so/_/gzhogs g.yon du 'gro na
[\[332b.4\]]'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'phrog bcom sogs 'byung zhing bya ba brtsams kyang mi 'grub la/_gtam mi snyan pa thos pa sogs 'byung ngo /_/chu bying thad kar 'gro zhing gsar gnas kyi mtshams nas 'og tu thigs pa babs na zas gos sogs yid dang mthun pa'i
[\[332b.5\]]nor zhig nges par rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/gsang gnas kyi mtshams nas chu rkang gcig la de nas gnyis su gyes shing slar gcig tu 'dril nas 'gro na nye du mdza' bshes sogs yid dang mthun pa'i mi phyogs su song ba zhig nges par 'khor zhing 'phrad par 'gyur ro/_/thog
[\[332b.6\]]mar 'dril zhing de nas leb mo srab por 'gro la slar yang 'dril nas 'gro na rgyal po'i chad pa'am rku jag stor sogs nor la god kha 'byung ngo /_/chu bying lbu ba dang bcas nas 'gro zhing 'og tu thigs pa yang 'bab la sar babs pa rnams kyang 'khor zhing lbu ba dang bcas
[\[332b.7\]]na char chen po 'byung ngo /_/sgra dang bcas te byung na mi 'gyangs par byes su 'gro dgos 'byung ngo /_/dgo ru ltar g.yon du gcus nas thad kar 'gro na de nyin nor stor ba rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/chu phar mi 'gro ba gyen du tshur log nas gsang gnas kyi steng du 'bab na zhag
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]bcu gsum song ba'i nyin nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/g.yas su gcus nas 'gro na nor stor ba'ang zhag khungs 'dzol ba lta bu ma rnyed pa zhig rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de rnams rnam dpyod dang ldan pas ma 'khrul bar brtags nas
[\[333a.2\]]so sor bshad pa'i 'bras bu nges par 'byung ba ni myong bas grub pa'o/_!_/zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dga' byed kyi bden pa'i gtam rang gi lus kyi grib mar legs nyes brtag pa ni/_tshes bco lnga'i mi khye'i skad sogs sems can mi gnas pa'i rkyen med pa'i
[\[333a.3\]]gnas dben par nam mkha' sprin dang khug rdul sogs kyi grib ma med pa'i shin tu dwangs pa'i skabs brtag ste/_lus gcer bur phyung la lus drong por bsrangs te langs lag pa gnyis cha mnyam du brkyengs/_zla ba rgyab tu khur te brtags la/_de yang
[\[333a.4\]]thog mar sa la shar ba'i grib ma'i mthe bong nas rim bzhin gyen du 'dzegs te mig dang thad mnyam gyen phyogs kyi nam mkha' la grib ma sprin lta bu zhig 'char la/_de yang nam mkha' 'char ba'i grib ma der lus kyi dbyebs med par zla ba nya lta bu'i bzo dbyibs
[\[333a.5\]]la shin tu dkar ba zhig snang na tshe ring nad med sdug bsngal mi 'byung /_bsod nams dang longs spyod mnga' thang rgyas/_grags pas sa steng khyab pa sogs shin tu legs so/_/lus gzhan mi gsal bar mgrin pa gcig po mthong na sems la sdug
[\[333a.6\]]bsngal chen po 'byung ngo /_/lus thams cad tshang zhing de yang skrangs pa'i dbyibs lta bu sbom por mthong na myur du nad drag po 'byung ngo /_/tshad dbyibs sbom phra sogs rang gi lus dang mtshungs par mthong na nad mi 'byung zhing legs so/_/lus bying gsal la mgo
[\[333a.7\]]bo med na zla ba drug nas nges par 'chi'o/_/lag pa gnyis mi gsal na rang la yang nad 'byung zhing spun zla gcig nges par 'chi'o/_/kha dog nag por snang na nor la god kha chen po 'byung ngo /_/brla g.yas g.yon gang rigs la bug pa 'dug na chung ma nges par 'chi'o/
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]lte ba'i thad du bug pa 'dug na 'thab mo dang kha mchu rtsod pa sogs 'byung ngo /_/gib ma shin tu ring zhing mgrin pa mi mthong na/_yul gyi rgyal po sogs mi chen po zhig 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/sol ba'i mdog lta bu nag por mthong na/_sa zhing dang nor rdzas la sogs
[\[333b.2\]]pa longs spyod gzhan gyis 'phrog par 'gyur ro/_/ser por mthong na gzhan gyi mi kha 'bab po/_/dkar por mthong na nad med cing longs spyod thob pa sogs mchog tu legs so/_/mig mi mthong na yid dang mthun pa'i mdza' grogs 'chi ba'am nor stor ba sogs
[\[333b.3\]]kyis sems la sdug bsngal 'byung ngo /_/lus kyi cha shas thams cad tshang zhing gsal la kha dog dkar zhing bkrag dang ldan na lo drug tshun chad du 'chi pa'i 'jigs pa med cing nad drag po mi 'byung ngo /_/longs spyod dang snyan grags 'phel zhing bde skyid phun sum
[\[333b.4\]]tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba 'di yang dag pa'o/_/zhes phyi nang drang srong gi tshe'i rig byed rgya mtsho lta bu'i nang nas mang dag yul dbus 'gyur 'chang du gtsug lag gnyis pa shes pa'i mkhas mang la bsten nas dar rgyas su yod pa'i sman dpyad la mkhas pa kha ba can gyi
[\[333b.5\]]ljongs 'dir du ma zhig 'ongs tshod du 'dug rung paN+Di ta smr-i ti phan tshun skad kyi brda ma 'phrod pas rta nag tu lug rdzi mdzad pa'i lo rgyus ltar ci yin cha ma 'tshal bar rang yul du phyir ldog ste gzhan phan gyi 'phrin las ma byung ba dang /_la las tshe'i rig byed shes pa'i rna
[\[333b.6\]]thos tsam go yang bod kyi gso rig pas chog shes pas/_legs bshad rin po cher/_tsan dan gser las rin che ba/_/blun pos sol bar byas la ltos/_/zhes pa ltar shes bzhin khyad gsod kyis dor ba'ang mchis rung rab byung bcu gcig pa'i shing
[\[333b.7\]]'brug gi lor shAkya mu ne'i pho brang chen po'i mdun phyogs rgya gar ba'i mi rigs du ma tshogs khrod du sman pa mkhas pa zhig yod dam zer ba'i gtam thos pas rkyen byas 'dar pa lo chen dri mol byed du bcug pa 'phags yul nub phyogs ma ho ra'i sa'i char bram ze gtsang
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]ma'i rigs su skyes pa saM n+ya se go da ra rany+tsor ste khyim spangs sa spyod ces bya bas rgya gar dbus/_shar/_nub/_lho/_byang /_nai pA la dang bcas pa chu bzhin myul nas slob dpon go ta ma b+har+thi/_ut+tA ma gi ri/_u kA ra b+har+thi sogs
[\[334a.2\]]gus pas bsten pa'i mkhas pa chen por rtogs te 'dar pa paN chen gyis lo tsA ba kyis dar mo sman rams par bslab tu bcug par gso rig gi lag len ngo mtshar ba du ma byung rung phyogs 'dir mi rnyed pa'i sman gyi rigs 'tshol bar rgya bal phyogs su phyir bteg_/
[\[334a.3\]]bal po yam bu'i rgyal blon la rogs don dgos tshul gyi sde pa'i hung rgya'i mtshams sbyor song ba la brten sman gyi rigs rnam grangs shin tu mang ba dang bcas me mo sbrul lo'i dbyar 'byor pa'i rgya bal gyi slob dpon mkhas pa rnams kyi zhal gyi bdud rtsi las 'ongs pa'i tshe'i
[\[334a.4\]]rigs byed kyi man ngag gnad kyi snying po bsdus pa 'di nyid mi chos gnad phreng las/_sngon dus bod 'di srin po'i rgyal khams 'dra/_/ding sang dus su rgya gar 'phags yul 'dra/_/bsams kyin lo tsA bod la dka' drin che/_/zhes dang /_sa skya paN+Di tas/
[\[334a.5\]]bde bar gshegs pa'i gzhung lugs bla na med/_/zhu chen sgyur byed mchan bu'i gnas thob pa/_/skad gnyis smra mkhas lo tsA de dag ni/_/de dag bdag cag rnams kyi mig bzhin gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar/_pA Ni byA ka ra Na sogs sgra mdo chen po bzhi la
[\[334a.6\]]blo gros kyi lang tsho mchog tu rgyas pa se dkar rigs kyi thig le 'dar pa lo tsA ngag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub kyis bsgyur cing gso ba rig pa'i gzhung lugs la slob dpon mkhas pa bcu phrag tsam bsten nas sbyangs pa'i yar stod dar mo sman rams pa blo bzang
[\[334a.7\]]chos grags kyis 'bad pa chen pos gtan la phab pa'o/_/chu gter slar yang ma bsrubs sngon med pa'i/_/rig byed bdud rtsi'i bum pa thob pa'i tshe/_/mes pos dran pa'i gso dpyad dbyar skyes kyi/_/rnga gsangs de la mos pa cung zad lhod/_/ti
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]se'i mdangs ltar rab dkar lhag pa'i yid/_/lus can tshogs la rjes chags kun+da'i tshal/_/'dzum pa'i cho ga gtong min sems bskyed kyi/_/bsil sbyin mkhan po'i cha shas nye bar dgang /_/phyogs brgyar zegs ma 'thor ba kaSh+pu ra'i/_/dad pas
[\[334b.2\]]tsha gdung bcil la mtshar 'dzin na/_/yongs grub brgya dang rtsa gcig bro nad gnyen/_/sman gyi dpag bsam 'khri shing 'di sus bskrun/_/ris su ma chad 'gro ba 'jigs bral ba'i/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs rgyal sras kyi/_/rlabs chen spyod la 'jug rnams
[\[334b.3\]]sangs rgyas zhes/_/grags can bgrod dka'i sa de mi ring snyam/_/bzod min tshor ba drag po'i nad gnod dang /_/de rgyu sgrib gnyis lus pa med bcas pa/_/'joms pa'i sman pa ches mchog rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'grub pa'i skal ba bzang por bdag 'gyur shog_/
[\[334b.4\]]tsan dan 'byug dang te'us brdeg pa la/_/snyoms par zhal 'che'i thugs rje snyigs dus 'dir/_/bskul na 'jig rten gsum gyi duHkha rnams/_/mkhyen brtse nus pas pha mthar mdzad du gsol/_/'gro mang srog zungs bcud len bdud rtsi'i gter/_/myangs pa'i
[\[334b.5\]]'bras bu nam mkhas gzhal dka' ba'i/_/dge tshogs ma lus mtha' bral sems can kun/_/bla med byang chub 'thob pa'i rgyu ru bsngo/_/zhes tshe'i rig byed mtha' dag gi snying po bsdus pa'i glegs bam gyi che brjod bsgyur byang smon lam gyi rim pa 'di ni za hor gyi ban+de
[\[334b.6\]]tshangs sras bzhad pa'i rdo rjes dmar ser can gye lo khrums kyi zla ba'i dkar cha'i rgyal ba dang po'i tshes la rgyal khab chen po po ta lar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong 'jam dbyangs grags pas bgyis pa dza yan+tu//_//[{D4439}]@/_/'phags yul pha ha'i sman pa da na da sa'i sman bcos rnams bzhugs so/_/
[\[334b.7\]]dan rog dang mu zi ser po gnyis cha gnyis re/_dngul chu/_rgya mtshal/_tshal dkar cha re rnams zhib par btags pa'i phye ma la bye dkar sbyar nas chu skol gyis phul nas btang na/_chu nad tsha grang med par sbyong /_lus zungs nad stobs dang sbyar te thun gyi kha grangs
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]dpag ste bya/_lcag sogs sgyi dang 'dra/_phyi'i byug sman la/_thar nu khaN+Da/_cu gang /_shing mngar/_rgya gar stod ja rnams zho do re/_shu dag_/gser mdog_/zi ra dmar po rnams zho gsum re/_sman chen zho gang /_gla rtsi se ba brgyad/
[\[335a.2\]]du ba ral pa zho brgyad rnams thog mar so sor btags la bsres nas btags pa'i phye ma lcags snod du chu la sbyar te gar sla zho tsam byas byugs pas phan no/_/ga pur/_zi ra dkar po/_pho ba ris/_rgyam tsha/_sbrang rnams cha re/_bye dkar cha gnyis rnams zhib par
[\[335a.3\]]btags pa'i ril bu sgyu ngur tsam chu grang gis rta byas btang bas bad kan dang rlung /_tshad pa rnyings pa rnams la brten pa'i glo la phan/_ga bur/_ku ci la/_mer bsregs nas pags pa phud pa/_sa mu dra so Sha/_a phi ma/_a ka ra ka ra rnams cha mnyam zhib
[\[335a.4\]]btags lug gi ril ma tsam re chu grang gis phyul te nyin bcu bzhi'i bar bsten na dbang po las su rung shing 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro/_/gi haM dang 'jam 'bras zho re/_dom mkhris dang ni la tho tha zho phyed/_ba bla se ba bco lnga rnams zhib par btags thun tshad bod dang
[\[335a.5\]]'dra ba chu grang gis phul te btang na se dug gsar rnying thams cad la phan no/_/yang se dug gi rma gsar rnying gang yin kyang chu dron mos bkrus la stod ja dang go yu bsregs pa zho do re/_ni la tho tha dang gla rtsi zho phyed re bcas zhib btags nad pa'i mchil mas khu ba byas bya
[\[335a.6\]]rog gi sgros rma gar yod la byugs pas myur du sos par 'gyur ro/_/'jam 'bras/_shing kun /_pho ris rnams zho re/_dan rog zho phyed/_zi ra dkar po zho do rnams zhib par btags pa thun tshad bod dang 'dra ba chu skol gyis rta byas btang bas pho ba sbos khrog_/dbugs
[\[335a.7\]]mi bde ba rnams la phan no/_/rgya gar gyi sha tshe dkar po lcags snod du legs par bzhu la lugs kong lta bu snod mi 'dzag pa zhig tu blug_/de steng dngul chu zho gang blug_/de nyid 'dres nas khengs pa dang slar bteg pas zho gsum 'byung la/_de ras rnyings pas lan
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]grangs mang por che chung mgo tsam ma byung bar dkris/_de khog ma lta bu'i nang du me shin tu tsha ba'i dkyil du ras rnams rim gyis tshig nas bton pas dngul dkar gyi mdog lta bu 'byung /_de nas zho char bteg pa'i ljid nas dang mnyam pa re ba na dang mnyam du btang na mdze
[\[335b.2\]]rigs gang la yang phan no/_/gong gi sman thun che ba tsam la dzAti rdog po phyed shing tsha dang li shi gnyis se ba bzhi re rnams zhib par btags ljid nas rdog che ba gnyis dang mnyam pa pa na dang mnyam du btang na lus stobs bskyed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/bar skran rlung
[\[335b.3\]]la brten pa 'don na khong sman gong gi ka rany+dza brgyad pa khong du btang /_skran gang yin la snum byugs la mtha' nas btsir te dung 'khor lta bu'i dkyil du bcur/_de yang phyogs bzhi nas mdzub mos mnan/_dkyil du rgya khab kyi rtse me la bsregs pa sor gang tsam skran
[\[335b.4\]]thog tu btang /_kro srin zhes pa rdo'i rtse snum la bcug ste me la bsros nas khab kyi shul du tshugs ltar mnan pas skran rigs de dag la phan par 'gyur ro/_/gro phye na kha ro spu che/_so ma ra tsa/_spos dkar/_rgya mtshal/_sbug chi rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags
[\[335b.5\]]pa phye me la btab pa'i du ba bshang lam gyi phar tshur du gzhang 'brum gyi me tog rgyas pa'i khar du bas bdugs pa'i rjes gong gi se dug gi byug sman de rma'i khar nad pa'i mchil mar sbyar te pho rog sgros ma drag par byugs pas sel/_stod ja/_shing sol/_'bu skyogs
[\[335b.6\]]me la bsregs pa'i thal ba de gsum cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i phye ma bshang lam nang gi 'brum pa bcad rjes khrag rlung gis brgyal 'gro ba 'jigs mi dgos/_de rjes kro se na'i rdo'i rtse snum la bcug ste me la bsros nas shin tu tsha bar byas te 'brum pa bcad
[\[335b.7\]]shul bsregs sa pa'i rjes gong gi sman sna gsum po srin bal gyi steng du snum dang sbyar te phong gi nang du bcug_/de'i khar ras kyis kha dam par bsdams te ma grag gi bar du bzhag pas phan no/_/gzhang srin nad la se dug gi byug sman gyi steng du nim bu bsnan te
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]zhib par btags lcags snod du nad pa'i mchil ma dang sbyar ba gzhang srin kyis za phrug gang byed pa'i mthar ma grag par byugs shing skam pas sel lo/_/ya mas mgo bo'i rtsa rgyud glog ltar 'khyug pa la ya khung gi rtsa steng dang ltag pa'i spu 'khyil
[\[336a.2\]]gyi rtsa steng bsregs pas khrag dang rlung la brten pa'i ya ma'i rigs la phan no/_/mig phye ba'i rjes nyin dang po gu yu dang ni ra mu li gnyis brdar ba'i khu ba mig la byugs te/_de steng srin bal yung ba'i chur sbangs la bkab/_gnyis par skyu ru ra shas che ba/_yung ba cung zad brdar
[\[336a.3\]]ba'i khu ba mig la byugs srin bal gong ltar bkab mig gi phyi skrangs na kha che sha kham/_skyu ru ra sga ser/_gi ru rnams cha mnyam/_a phi ma cung zad sbyar ba zhib btags chu la sbyar mig gi gang na sar byugs/_mig 'bye dus klo byung na glo sman la/_a dza wan cha gnyis/_d+ha tu ra cha
[\[336a.4\]]gcig_/pi pi ling cha phyed rnams zhib par btags pa chur sbyar la gro phye cung zad btab nas ril bu sran ma tsam sgril ba lto stong du so rtsag mchil ma dang lhan du mid pas phan/_mig 'bye gdong du ngar ma bcud can zos pa'i mi'i ris rnams la nyin zhag re'i zas kyi rigs bkag_/
[\[336a.5\]]skom kyang cung zad las mi gtong /_rgan rgon dang zas skya ba'i rigs la mtshan gang re gong bzhin bkag_/mig 'byed zas spyod spyi dang 'dra/_skyugs pa sogs byung na rma bya'i sgro mer bsregs pa'i phye ma lug ril tsam chu grang hub re dang sbyar ba khong du btab pas skyug pa thams
[\[336a.6\]]cad la phan no/_/mig gi 'bras bu dmar por song na/_skyu ru ra/_sha che ba/_sga ser cung zad sbyar ba'i khu bar srin bal sbyar nas mig la btab pas phan no/_/mig gi 'bras bu nag po dkar por song na pha Ta ki ri zho gsum/_tshwa zho gcig bcas zhib par btags pa'i phye
[\[336a.7\]]ma rdo'i steng du snum cung zad tsam blugs pa dang bsres te go yus 'dres par dkrugs pa'i khu ba mig sman ltar dkar po'i steng du blugs pas sel lo/_/mig gi 'bras bu'i nang du khrag gis dmar por song na/_rdo steng du chu thigs pa gcig blug_/de'i steng lan tshwa cung zad
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]brdar/_de steng go yu gong bzhin brdar/_de steng du snum thigs gcig blug_/de rnams go yus 'dres par brdar ba'i khu ba mig gi 'bras bu'i steng du mig sman ltar btab pa'i rjes mig btsums te srin bal la snum bskus par tshwa zhib btab pa srin bal gyi phyi la sbyar
[\[336b.2\]]mig gi steng du rdzas rnams phyi la 'ong ba byas te bkab pas phan no/_/'di dag lag len rgya gar dbus 'gyur pha ta ha'i yul gru nas 'ongs pa'i sman pa da na da sa ste/_sbyin pa'i 'bangs zhes pa las dar mo mtsho byed kyis rnyed pa'o/_/tig ta thang thun tsam zhig chu grang dkar
[\[336b.3\]]yol gsum gnyis tsam gyi nang du sbangs la kha gcod rgyab/_skar ma mthong sar sa rub nas nam langs par bzhag_/khu ba thon nges byas pa'i ro ma pho/_pi pi ling che chung 'bring gsum btags pa'i phye ma btab la zhag gsum gyi bar btungs pas nad zhi ba dang /_de min
[\[336b.4\]]tshad pa rnyings pa'i rigs la lan bdun btang bas tshad pa gsar rnyings thams cad la mi phan pa med do/_/bud med bu skyes pa'i 'o ma thur ma gang tsam la rgya mtsho'i ldu ba zhib par btags pa thun chung ngu zhig btab la/_me la 'jam tsam bsros la rna ba'i nad zug ma grag
[\[336b.5\]]par blug pas phan/_sman chen sran ma tsam/_sa mu dra pha la gcig zhib btags phye ma nas tsam snag khrag gang 'dzag pa'i rnag rnams srin bal gyis phyis/_de rjes ma grag par skam 'debs byas pas phan/_tsi tra ka'am tsi ta zhib par btags pa thun gsum tsam chu dkar
[\[336b.6\]]yol phyed tsam gyi nang du sbang ste khu ba btsags pa'i khar 'bu skyogs mer bsregs pa'i thal ba dkar po thun gcig btab pas chu de dmar por 'gro de btungs na mchin pa/_mtsher pa/_pho ba sogs la bad rlung gis sbos te nad zug byed pa la phan zhing kha dog dmar ser du 'grim 'ong du/_zas spyod rtsam
[\[336b.7\]]pa ja 'bras/_gro bag ma gtogs gzhan ma'i rigs 'dzem sman zhag gsum bar bsten dgos/_'u su dang 'jag ma rnyings pa cha mnyam nub gcig sbangs pa'i khu ba btsags par bye dkar cha gcig btab pa btungs pas chu lam tsha shar byed pa dang sa bon dkar dmar 'dzag pa la pan no//
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\](]gro ga la a Tha g+han+tas bris zhes pa/_gur gum gla rtsi ga bur gi haM tsan+dan dkar dmar/_a ka ru/_a ka ra/_go snyod ma rnams la/_a Tha g+han+tas gzer ro/_/'khor lo gnyis bris gcig mgul du gdags gcig chu la bkrus nas grog phyir phyung la bkrus pa'i chu de rang nyid 'thungs pas dug las rnam par rgyal lo/_/don gnyis 'khor lo/_/!_gong 'dra mgul lam rked pa'am dpung pa la gdags na/_'gron po slar log yong zhing yul gzhan par me 'dod ba'i thabs so/_/brgya bzhi'i 'khor lo/_!_gong 'dra mgul du gdags na gson 'dre'i gnod pa thams cad thub/_gcig chus bkrus nas 'thungs na phan no/_/'di mgul du gdags na 'dre gdon mtha' dag las rnam par rgyal lo/_!_/gong 'dra snyir gar gdags na mda' mi phog pa'i gdams pa'o/_/so brgyad 'khor lo/_!_gong dang 'dra ba'i 'khor lo mda' dung gi sgab la gdags nas bus na pha rol po 'pham zhing rang phyogs rgyal lo/_drug cu 'khor lo/_!_gong 'dra 'khoralo/_/bud med khyo la blo mi gtod pa la gdags na blo gtod par 'gyur ro/_/don lnga 'khor lo/_!_/gong 'dra mgul du gdags na/_rlung gi nad kyis gzugs po'i mgo mjug thams cad du srin bu rgyugs pa ltar khyugs pa la phan no/_/nyi shu bzhi'i 'khor lo/_/'di zhing gi zur bzhir gdags na btsa' sad ser ba sogs thog la gnod pa mi 'byung ngo /_/brgya dang brgyad cu'i 'khor lo/_/!_gong 'dra nas sogs kyi bong mdzod nang du bcug na rul ba sogs dri mi mnam pa'i thabs so/_/yang 'di ga dgos ma nag can btson nang nad 'thon no/_'bum 'khor lo/_/_!_grog la a tha g+han+has bris nas rked pa la gdags nas mdun phyogs su 'ongs pa byam na bud med bu mi chags par bshad do/_/brgya nyi shu 'khor lo/_!_/su hrug la khab kyis 'khor lo bris nas khyo'am skyes sman phyi dang mthun nang da \u0f74mi mthun na so sor gnyis kar gdags ma mthun par 'gyur ro/_/don drug 'khor lo/_!_gong 'dra byis nas g.yag gi rwa'am ze bar gdags na kha tsha zer ba'i phyugs nad phan no/_/so gnyis 'khor lo/_!_/gong 'dra phru gu nyin matsan du du bar mgul du gdags na phan no/_/bzhi bcu 'khor lo/_/_@#/_/gong 'dren/_nang gi zur bzhir gdags na/_mi shi nas 'drer skyes nas gnod pa byed pa mtha' gad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/don gnyis 'khor lo/_!_shing rngo ti'i myu gus gi haM tsan+dan dmar po pho rog khrag gis bod bu'i ba gas pa la bris rkang la gdags na/_gzhan gyis mithong ngo /_sgrib shing yin no/_!_gong 'dra rked pa gdag gan rkyal du nyal nas gang sar/_zangs lcags kyi snod gang rung gi nang du 'khor lo gcig me la ba sregs dang /_bsregs te khong du btang na/_srin nang gyi rigs mtha' dag la phan no/_gcig gis ma phan na slar gang dgos bskyar ro/_!_gong 'dra zhing gi zung bzhir shing gi mgo la gdags na 'brul gnod pa dang nad mi 'byung ngo /_/don brgyad 'khor lo/_!_gong 'dra ba la/_mtshon gyi rmas byung na/__rma gang byung ngu 'khor lo 'di gdags na rul mi 'ong zhing /_dri ngan pa mi 'byung ngo /_lnga bcu dgu'i 'khor lo/_!__gong 'dra rkang pa la gdags na 'grul drag po phyin kyang rkang pa na mi nus pa'i gdams pa'o/_/bcu dgu 'khor lo/_!_gong 'dra rnam mchog gang na ba'i phyogs su gdags na shin tu phan pa myong grub lags so/_/khur po khur nas dub mi yong ba la phan no/_/lnga bcu bzhi'i 'khor lo/__!_gong 'dra ste bag cus nas na ba la phan par byed de lte bar gdag na phan par 'gyur ro/_/brgya nyer gsum 'khor lo 'di bris nas/_sman khug gam/_sgro ba'i nang du gdags na nor rdzas 'bad med du 'byung ngo /_/re lta 'khor lo/_!_'dim gul du gdags san/_gnyid du song dus sdur ba mi 'byung ba'i gdams pa i thi/_!_'di sked pa la gdags na sha bkra khrag dang mkhris pa la brten nas 'byung na phan par 'gyur ro/_/nyis brgya gsum 'khor lo 'di byas pa nyin mtshan rtag tu mi nyan par du ba mgul du gdags na nyan par bshad do/_/brgya bdun cu 'khor lo/_/_!_gang 'dra rgyal po gcig gis gcig chom nas mi nor shor na slar mi gcig pa mgul du gdags na/_dgra de'i yul du btang na mi nor rnams log par 'gyur ro/_/don gnyis 'khor lo/_/!_/grog la gong 'dra bris mgu du gdags na gson 'dre mo'i gnod pa mi 'byung bar nges so/_!_/gong 'dra mgul du gdags na tshad pas nyin re thu nyin re bde ba la phan no/_/brgya drug cu'i 'khor lo/_!_/gong 'dra mgul dug gdags/_rdza 'dam 'khor lo 'di bzhin bris nas rdza 'dam rin bzhin bcag pas dkyil du khyi smyon gang gis 'jus pa'i kha dog dang mthun pa'i spu 'ongs pas/__des khyi smyo gyi dug las grol lo/_/gal te ma byung ba slar bskyar pas phan no/_/@#/_/'khor lo 'di rked la gdags na/_phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro 'dren gdon gyi gnod pas mi tshugs so/_/lnga bcu drug gi 'khor lo/_!_'khor lo 'di zhing gi zur bzhir gdags na then pas tshig 'gro mi nus par bshad do//_/brgya lnga bcu'i 'khor lo/_!_'khor lo 'di mgul lam lag pa g.yon dang rked pa gsum la gdags na mda' yol 'gro/_/brgya nyi shu'i 'khor lo/_'di mgul du gdags na/_bza' mi mi mthun pa la mthun par 'gyur pa yin/_gzhan mi mthun pa mtha' dag mthun no/_/lnga bcu nga drug 'khor lo/_/_!'khor lo 'di mgul du gdags na gnyid kyi nang du dngangs skrag 'ong ba la phan no/_/'khor lo 'di gdags na phru gu skye ma thub pa la skye thub pa'i gdams pa'o/_/stong phrag 'khor lo/_!_'khor lo 'di zho bsrubs kyi yub la gdags na dkar na gnod pa'i mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya bcu'i 'khor lo/_!_'khor lo 'di rked pa gdags nas mdun phyogs su 'ong ba byas na/_bud med bu yang yang shar 'gro bar/_gza' nyi ma'i nyin tshes nyer dgu la bris nas gdags na bu chags par 'gyur ro/_!_/gro ga la a Tha g+ha n+has bris nas mgu 'dug gdags na/_tshad pa'i rigs mtha' dag la phan no/_/brgya bcu'i 'khor lo/_/_!_'khor lo 'di gro ga la aTha g+nan+has gza' nyi ma'i nyin nas mgul du gdags na/_kha zas rnyed par bshad do/_nyer brgyad 'khor lo/__!_gro ga la aTha g+han+has bris nas sgo thog du gdags na/_khral 'u lag nyung ba'i gdams pa'o/_/drug cu 'khor lo/_!_'khor lo 'di mgul du gdags na mi gzhan gyi sems 'gro zhing byams par 'gyur ro/_/brgya go gnyis 'khor lo/_!_'khor 'di bris nas zho srubs kyi yu ba la gdags na dkar gyi gnod pa thams cad thub bo/_/sum cu gnyis 'khor lo grog la aTha g+han+has bris nas mgul du gdags na/_lha dang bla ma dpon po'i thugs rjes 'dzin lag pa la gdags na tshad pa'i rigs pa phan no/_/su hrug la khrag gis bris nas gdags na mdze nad la phan no/_/brgya cu 'khor lo/_!_'khor lo 'di bzhin bris la thum skogs dar dkar dmar ser ljang bzhis gtums la phyogs bzhir btsugs na/_chom rkun las rnam par rgyal lo/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor lo/_!_'khor lo 'di spyi gtsug tu gdags na/_kha mchu las rgyal lo/_'khor lo 'di rked pa la gdags na/_bad gan rlung gi be snabs khru ba la phan no/_nyis brgya 'khor lo/_!_'khor lo 'di mgul du gdags/_gcig gting gi lo gsal 'khor lo ltar bris na chus bkrus la khu ba 'thungs na/_bu skye ma thub pa la phan no/_bzhi bcu bzhi'i 'khor lo/_!_'khor lo 'di gro ga la a Tha g+han+has bris/_mgul du gdags na lam bar la rkang pa min khyis mi 'chang pa'i gdams pa'o/_/lnga bcu bzhi'i 'khor lo/_!_'khor lo 'di gro ga la a Tha g+han+has bris nas mgul du gdags na rlung ya mas mgo na ba la mchog tu phan par bshad do/_/drug cu re gnyis 'khor lo/_/_!_'khor lo 'di gro ga la aTha g+han+has bris nas/_gdags na pho ba bad rlung gi nad rnams la phan par 'gyur ro/_/nyi shu 'khor lo/_/'khor lo 'di gro gar tsan+dan dkar dmar dang gur gum gyis bris nas gdags na khrag rlung gis mgo na ba la mchog tu bshad do/_/bzhi bcu 'khor lo//_'khor lo 'di gro ga la a Tha g+han+has bris nas rked pa la gdags na/_bshal ba bcad pa'i mchog go_/zhe brgyad 'khor lo/_!_'khor lo 'di gro ga la a Tha g+han+has bris nas mgul du gdags na/_'khru ba mi phebs par lte ba na ba la phan no/_/brgya so gnyis 'khor lo/_!_'khor lo 'di gro ga la bris nas mgul du bzhi'i 'khor lo/_!_/gro ga la a Thag+han+has bris nas khang khyim gyi zur bzhir 'khor lo gdags nas/_skrad rnying gi dud pa btang na/_'dre gdon gyi gnod pas mi tshugs so/_/brgya nyer gnyis 'khor dang gya gnyis 'khor lo/_!_'khor lo 'di shog bur bris te mgul du gdags na/_so nad kyi rigs mtha' dag la phan no/_/_!_gri ga la a Tha g+han+has bris mgul du gdags na/_gnyid kyi nang du gad mo 'ong ba dza hA ra/_/@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_brah+ma be da sA dzA ga d+ha ra tsa ra ka nA ma/_bod skad du/_tshangs pa'i rig byed rgya mtsho'i tshangs pa'i rig byed rgya mtsho'i yan lag 'dzin pa g.yo ba can sogs bzhugs so/_/yan lag 'dzin pa g.yo ba can zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das ma tshangs pa'i bu mo dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshangs pa chen po'i tshe'i rig byed rgya mtsho lta bu las snying por phyung ba 'di la/_nad kyi brtag pa/_ngos 'dzin/_gso thabs sogs rim par bstan pa las/_thog mar rtsa la brtag pa ni/_nad pa skyes pa'i lag pa g.yas dang bud med kyi g.yon/_mthe bong rus 'bur 'og nas sor khrung /_sbal pa gsum gyi 'gros dang 'dra ste 'phar zhing mchong ba'i tshul can no/_/bad kan gyi rtsa ni ngang pa/_rma bya/_phug ron gsum gyi 'gros dang 'dra ste sbom zhing dal ba'i tshul can no/_/rlung gi rtsa ni sbrul dang dza lu ka'i 'gros lta bu ste 'khyog la pel ba'i tshul can no/_/'dus pa'i nad kyi rtsa ni mthing ril gyi 'gros dang 'dra ste myur la drag par 'phar zhing sdod la/_de la/_zas [)]
[\[337a.2\]]ro mngar ba/_tshwa/_zho/_'o ma/_shing tog_/chu mang du btungs pa/_nyin mo nyal ba rnams kyis slong ngo /_/rlung nad ldang ba'i dus ni/_mgo/_rgyal/_mchu/_mchu stod/_gro bzhin/_khrums stod kyi zla ba rnams la ldang la/_rkyen ni
[\[337a.3\]]zas bcud med pa zos pa/_gnyid chag pa/_glu dbyangs sogs skad chen po bton pa/_lus 'khyags pa/_sems mi bde ba sogs kyis slong ngo /_/mkhris pa'i nad langs pa'i rtags ni lud drod che zhing khol bur na/_kha skom zhing ro kha/_skom dad che ba
[\[337a.4\]]sogs 'byung la/_bad kan gyi nad langs pa'i rtags ni/_le lo che/_glo slong /_lud pa lu/_kha'i ro mngar/_dang kha mi bde/_brang tsha/_sbos 'khrog sogs 'ong la/_rlung nad langs pa'i rtags ni/_sems 'phyo/_lus 'dar/_mtshogs ma drod che
[\[337a.5\]]zhing lus bying drod chung /_'dug sar mi tshugs pa sogs 'byung ngo /_/'tsho ba dang mi 'tsho ba'i mtshan nyid brtag pa ni/_lte ba/_rkang lag bzhi'i mthil/_sna rnams drod dang ldan pa dang /_snas dri bzang ngan thams cad tshor zhing zas ro dang ldan la/_gnyid bde
[\[337a.6\]]zhing za zi med pa sems bde ba sogs byung na nges par 'tsho bas/_rtags de rnams dang ldan na sman gyis bcos par bya/_de las ldog cing khyad par nye ba'i rtags/_rlung gi gnas lte ba/_mkhris pa'i gnas mchin pa/_bad kan gyi gnas brang rnams yin

[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]la 'bad par bya'o/_/yang 'tsho 'chi ba rtag thabs kyi man ngag la/_snod gtsang mar chu blug_/de'i steng du mar dang snum bsres pa bskol nas bsgrangs pa blug ste legs par dkrugs la/_de'i nang du nad pa'i gzugs 'char du bcug ste bltas pas lus byings

[\[338a.1\]]so me ra tsa/_gsar rnyings/_rims drag pa/_rims nyin gcig pa/_rims nyin gnyis pa/_rims nyin gsum pa/_rims nyin bzhi pa/_rtag pa'i rims/_ma 'dzub rnams la mchog tu phan no/_/rims 'phrog lcags kyu grub pa'i sbyor ba ni/_shang+ga b+ha _dung thal

[\[339b.1\]]sha bo ru rta_'ishi_drod sman _tu phan no/_li la ba tib Ta'i sbyor ba ni/_ma ri tsi/_pho ris _masta ki/_nga Di ma/_se 'bru _lbaM sha lo tsan/_cu gang _am+pa/_an 'bras _lo da/_mar ha Thi/_ng+ha tri/_ng+ha ba kaphu la/_sna bka'i me tog_ma dzu pha la/_ma dzu'i 'bru
[\[339b.2\]]sim+pa ri/_kuSh+Tha/_dza yi pha la/_ba bu ra ka pa la/_kha yi ra/_ko ha Da ka pi dza rnams cha ma ma zhib par btags la ras la btsags te thun tshad che phyogs tsam po sta ka'i khu bas rta byas btang bas phan zhing /_sman gtong ring zas spyod 'bras zan ba'i dar ba dang
[\[339b.3\]]ma nurta rkang _sha pho ru rta _dzAti _ba bu ra'i 'bru _rgya gar stod dza_ko gar stod dza_koha Da'i 'bru _mnyam du cung zad re btang /__gzhan ma bza' btung gi rigs mi gtong /_rgyu tshad spyi 'joms __halo _bring+ng+ha gaM gAng+ha ra'i sbyor ba ni/_na gar mo tha/_shuN+Thi/_a ra lu/_ng+ha ba ka phu la/
[\[339b.4\]]bel/_ati sa/_mo tsa rA sa/_lo ng+ha/_ladza ru/_am+ba/_ka bi dza/_kuN+Tha/_in+d+ra ya ba/_bal lo tsa na rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad che phyogs re 'bras skam po _'phar bal ya ka 'dzin _ma ru gla sgang _lga _bkrus pa'i chu phul _d+ha ba'i me tog
[\[339b.5\]]ba'i ba_ma ru rta rkang gi thang chu _phyed sbrang ba ru ra tsam re dang mnyam du btang bas as 'bras _sha bo ngurta _gun mo nyung _'khru ba chod cing myur du phan par 'gyur ro/_/yang la gug ng+gAng+ha ra'i sbyor ba ni/_shuN+Thi/_ng+ha ba ka phu la/_mo tsa ras rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad che phyogs

[\[339b.7\]]dang sbyar te lte ba'i mtha' skor du sor gsum gyi rgya tsam la byugs pas kyang zugs gzer chag cing 'khru ba chod do/ am 'bras _dzAti _pil ba _rgya gar stong dza _yang rgyu tshad lan ga ri ng+ha'i thang gi sbyor ba ni/_shuN+Thi/_kuSh+Tha/_a tis/_hing+gu/_na gar mo tha rnams cha mnyam zhib
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]rtsing dang thun tshad bod kyi thang tsam chu phul brgyad la btab nas chu[\[]cha[\]]bdun ma skam par skol la/_de nas dro 'jam tsam la btungs pas phan par 'gyur ro/_/yang rgyu tshad kyis khrag kho _grong khyer las lhag pa _lga _sha phor rta _shing kun _ma nu gla sgang _na 'grim pa la/_ba la lo can/
[\[340a.2\]]kuSh+Tha/_a ti sa/_na ga ra mo tha/_be la rnams cha mnyam zhib rtsing dang thun tshad sogs gtong lugs gong bzhin byas pas myur du chod par 'gyur ro/_/yang /_lo d+ha/_in+d+ra ya ba/_mo tse ra sa/_na ga ra mo tha _be la/_d+ha ba ka phu la rnams cha mnyam zhib
[\[340a.3\]]par btags la bu ram _sha po ru rta _ma nu bla sgang _bil ba _gyis rta byas ril bu ba ru ra tsam sgril la btang bas kyang chod do/_/yang rgyu tshad kyis khrag dang ser po gnyis ka 'grims na/_dug ce sbyang _ma D+hu rta rkang gi thang shing _ma nu gla lgang _bil pa _ng+ha ba'i me tog_sen+ta lo Na/
[\[340a.4\]]sany+tsar lo Na/_hing+gu/_ba tsa/_ha rAM ta kA/_a ti sa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad che phyogs tsam re chu skol gyis rta byas btang bas myur du chod cing phan par 'gyur ro/_/pho ba'i me drod nyams nas zas gang zos kyang mi 'ju bar 'grim zhing sbos nyams _rgyab tsha
[\[340a.5\]]ba ru rga_shing kun_shu dag _a+ra_byed pa la/_dbang mi bde/_lus shed rim bzhin chag pa'i nad la/_d+ha ni ya/_na ga ra mo tha/_shuSh+Tha/_/mU li ka bi dza rnams cha mnyam thang tshad dang bsdu lugs gong bzhin btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/_/yang na/_na ga ra
[\[340a.6\]]mo tha/_shuSh+Tha/_a ti sa/_gi lo hi rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad che phyogs tsam re chu skol gyis _'u su _ma nu gla sgang _lga _la phug gi 'bru _rta byas btang bas kyang phan no/_/yang /_lo d+ha/_baD+hi/_la dza ru/_na ga ra mo tha/_bem/_shuh+Thi/
[\[340a.7\]]ma zhu gla sgang _lga _ng+ha ni ya/_a tis/_gurtsa/_ba la lo tsa na/_kuSh+Tha/_d+ha ba ka phul rnams cha mnyam gyi thang tshad dang bsdu lugs gong bzhin byas btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/_/gzhang 'brum gyi nad la/_ma ri tsi pho ris zho gang /_shuN+Thi zho do/_ma nu lgang _bil ba _lga _tsi ta zho
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]brgyad/_'u mu _likhri _likhri _su ra Na zho bcu drug rnams zhib _sha pho ru rta _ng+ha ba'i me tog_par btags la ril bu skyu ru ra las che tsam re btang bas phan zhing /_sman gtong ba'i bar la ro mngar ba/_kha ba/_pho ris _lga _lug gi sha rnams mi za'o_yang /_ar lu/
[\[340b.2\]]tsi ta/_in+d+ra ya ba/_shuN+Thi/_sin+ng+nya lo Na/_be la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la [(]thun [)]tshad che phyogs tsam re ba'i dar ba phul res rta byas btang na phan par 'gyur ro/_/yang gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis khrag 'dzag pa la/_dU di ba Thi dang la lbang+go rnams cha mnyam zhing
[\[340b.3\]]par btags pa mang _dug mo dung _lga _rgyam tshwa _bil ba _nyung zho bdun rer thun re bcad pa ba mar btsag bcad pas rta byas zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du btang bas nges par phan no/_/mtshan bar rdol ba'i nad la/_ha la ng+hi dang /_am+pa la gnyis chu'i nang du brdar la gar
[\[340b.4\]]sla zho tsam rma khar byugs la ras kyis khebs bkab nas bzhag pas phan par 'gyur ro/_/yang bi la yi ka ha Da zhib par btags pa 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba dang mnyam du legs par brdar la gar sla zho tsam byung _lga ser _skyu rur _ba dang rmar byugs te ras bkab pas
[\[340b.5\]]phan no/_/yang sen+ta lo Na/_shuN+Thi/_ha lang+hi/_b+ha Ta pa tragu rtsi 'bri dza ya tri rnams cha mnyam _bum bu'i rus pa _zhib par btags pa zho la sbyar nas rma khar byugs te ras bkab pas kyang phan par 'gyur ro/_/pho skran gyi nad la/_sany+tsa ra lo Na/_sen+ng+ha lo Na/
[\[340b.6\]]shuN+Thi/_hing+gu /_rgyam tshwa _lga_lga ser _a bya ya/_shing b+haTa'i lo ma _dzIto'i me tog _ping+pa la/_a dza mor/_ya ba khar/_ba yi bi rang+ga rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba mar gyis ril bu skyu rur tsam sgril nas btang bas zhi bar _kha ru tshwa _rgyam ch+wa _'gyur zhing
[\[340b.7\]]lga _shing kun _ma zhu ba'i nad gzhan la yang phan no/_/lus kyi mdog ser bor 'gyur zhing _drod sman _dbyi mong /_byi tsher _byI thang ga _skrangs na/_pip+pa la/_kaT li/_shuT+ThaM/_na gar mo tha/_tsi ta/_pip+pa la/_ka mu la/_ga dza pip+pa la rnams cha mnyam zhib bar btags
[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]la thun tshad che phyogs tsam re tshu skol gyis rta byas btang bas phan zhing khog skran dang dang kha mi bde ba la yang phan no/__/yang na/_shuN+Thi/_lga _ba yi bi rang+ga/_byi thang ka _drod sman _lga _ma [\[]ru[\]]gla sgang _drod sman gyi rtsa ba _kong po nas yong ba'i drod sman _ha ri ta ke _u rur de _ma da ru rnams_ shug la
[\[341a.2\]]cha mnyam zhib par la thun tshad che shos tsam chu skol gyis rta byas btang bas nus pa gong dang 'dra'o/_/yang na/_dA ru ha ri dra/_eraN+Daka pa la/_ti bi/_ba yi bir sga/_a ti sa/_ma ri tsi/_in+tha ya ba rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la
[\[341a.3\]]thun tshad che phyogs re chu skol gyis rta pyas btang bas phan bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na/_gu glu la/_ha ri ta ke/_ga dpur+Na/_dA ru ha didra/_gu rtsa _skyer pa dgo 'dra'i 'du _gyi thang ga rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la _pi ngis _dug mo nyung _ba'i chus rta byas btang bas nus
[\[341a.4\]]pa gong dang 'dra'o/_/srin nad la/_sen+ng+ha loN/_ti bi/_ba yi pir ng+ga/_bu la a rung gsum cha mnyam zhib par skyer ba li khri btags la thun tshad che phyogs gong dang 'dra ba chu skol gyis phul te btang bas phan no/_/yang na/_tri phal/_tri kuT/_ti bi/
[\[341a.5\]]ba ro/_nim+pa twa tsa/_kha yir/_kuSh+Tha/_rgya mtshwa _byi thang ka _ba yi pi ngang+ga rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba'i chus rta byas btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/_/pho ba rlung gis sbo sa nas na na/_sany+tsa ralo Na/_hing+g+ru/_shuN+Thi/_gsum cha mnyam 'bras bu gsum tshab gsum
[\[341a.6\]]shu dag _shing gi m+pu'i Sha pa _rgya gar snyo dar [\[\]]zhib par btags la byi thang ka thun tshad nyis 'gyur tsam re chu skol gyis rta byas btang na phan no/_/yang na/_ma ri tsi/_di b+ba la/_shuN+Thi/_hing+gu/_sen+ng+ha lo Na/_kha ru tshwa ji rba do/_thing dkar nag _/a dza mo da rnams cha mnyam zhib par
[\[341a.7\]]btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang bas phan bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na/_pib+pa la/_shuN+Thi/_ha ri ta ke/_sany+tsar lo Na/_ti bi rnams cha mnyam zhib par pho ris drod sman lga shin gun rgyam tshwa btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btar bas phan no/[ \[\] ]yang na/

[\[341b.1\]]shiN+Thi/_lga _ma ri tsi/_pho res _pipA la/_pi pi lir_sa[\[]dz+ng+hi bar[\]]tshwa _pi pi ling _lga _a ngur _kha ru tshwa _rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang bang phan no/_/skya sbab dang mig ser gyi nad la/_ga da pur+Na/_tri pha la/_'bras bu gsum/_kuSh+Tha/_ru rta/

[\[341b.3\]]tig ta _cham nyam zhib par btags _li khri _la thun tshad che shos tsam re ba marab ru ra tsam bzhu bar sbrang de nyis 'gyur gyi tshad tsam bcas btab la legs par 'dres pa dang btang na mchog tu phan no/_/mig ser kho na'i nad la/_tshes gsum _sga se+er _skyu ru ra _tri pha la/_lcegs phya kuSh+Tha/
[\[341b.4\]]ha la d+hi/__dA ru ha la dra skyer pa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la sbrang dang mar gyi sbyor lugs gong ltar bzos pas phan no/_/yang na/_ge ru/_ha lad+hi/_am+ba la gsum cha mnyam zhib par btags pa chu la sbyar nas mig la byugs pas phan no/_/glo 'grams [\[]'bras[\]]bu gsum [\[]rur+ha[\]]
[\[341b.5\]]lga ser _skye rab _kyi nad la/_as gan+g+ha/_shuN+Thi/_pip+pil/_la lbad+ga/_mi sri rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags _btsan _lga ser _skyu rur _la chu grang gis rta byas btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/_/yang na/_ya ka ban ka phu la dang la wang+ga gnyis cha mnyam
[\[341b.6\]]zhib par btags la chus ril _baspub _lga_drod smad_lishi_shel dkar_bu sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam sgril te btang bas phan no/_/yang na/_tri pha la/_shuN+Thi/_ba yi bi rang+ga /_/ma ri tsi/_bip+pa la/_nag ra mo tha/_a ka[\[]bzhi'i me tog[\]]'i shi _pip+pa la/

[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]pi pi ling gi rtsa ba _li shi _shug pa _ka ko la _chu grang gis rta byas _sbrang rtsi _nA ga ge sar _btang bas phan no/_/g.yig gu'i skyigs bu'i nad la/_ma ni tsha la/_ldongaros _ha la d+hi/_sga ser _ma ri tsi/_pho ris _mi sri/_shel dkar/_la lbang+ga _lishi_rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags

[\[342a.5\]]btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang kyang phan par 'gyur ro/_/dbugs mi bde zhing glo drag tul ngan/_shuN+Thi/_baDe ha/_pip+pa la/_khams kyi ngu nya _dkar sing+ga /_b+ha rang+gi /_ki pa ko ri rnams _lga _rgya sran _cha mnyam zhib par btags la chus ril bu skya ru ra tsam sgril te

[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]zhib par btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang bas phan no/_/yang na/_sen+d+ta lo Na/_ha ri ta ge/_pip+pa la/_tsita rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/_/yang na/_tri pha la/_tri ku Ta/_sany+tsa ra lo na/_hirgya/
[\[342b.2\]]a dza wa na rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i cha gcig dang /_rgyam tshwa _a ru ra _drod sman _bu ram gyi cha gcig byas pa'i ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril te btang bas kyang phan no/_/yang na/_ser+b+ha lo Na/_sany+tsar lo Na/_'bras bu gsum _tshes gsum _kha ru tshwa _shing kun
[\[342b.3\]]ba li bilgang/[ \[\]]ma ri tsi/_pip+pa la/_shuN+Thi/_ha ri ta ke/_beDa ha/_am+pa la/_ti bi/_la lbang+ga /_tsi dri ka/_hing+gu/_a dza lban/_dzi ra do/_/nag ra mo tha rnams cha mnyam zhib par _rgyam tshwa _ba ru tshwa _btags la star bu'i khu bas zan tsam brdzis pa skem thengs
[\[342b.4\]]byi thang ga_pho rim _drod sman _gsum byas _lga _a rur _ba rung _skyu rur _pa'i bye ma thun tshad nyis [\[]li shi[\]]shing kun mel bsregs pa _lal phud _zir dkar nag _ma nu gla sgang _'gyur tsam re btang bas than nges so/_/'bras bu skrangs pa'i nad la/_shweta dzi ra/_sen+ng+ha lo Na/

[\[342b.6\]]shen kun _so ma pha zhib par btags pa thun tshad che phyogs tsam re ba mar sgyu ru ra nyis 'gyur tsam dang pang kha'i snum sgong skogs phyed tsam sras par btab ste nyin bdun kyi bar btungs pas phan no/_/yang na/_shwe ta dze ra/_e raN shuSh+Tha/_ba tsa/_hu la hu la hu la ka pa dza rnams cha mnyam
[\[342b.7\]]zhib btags pa/_go snyon _chu bre do tsam gyi nang du 'bras rtsam la ltar btags pa bre gang tsam zhig blug nas me mdag gi steng du zhag gnyis gsum zhig bzhag nas chu de skyur mor song ba dang /_de la gong gi sman zing dkar po [\[\]]shun dag tu [\[\]]la'i 'thu _rnams btab ste byugs pas
[\[343a\]]
[\[343a.1\]]myur du skam par 'gyur ro/_/dngas ma 'dzag pa la/_an ra ki ga li dang shwe ta kha yir gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i cha gcig dang /_shel dkar cha gcig bsres te thun tshad che phyogs re tho rangs dang dgongs mo zhag bdun gyi ring star chags su
[\[343a.2\]]btang na chod par 'gyur ro/_/yang na/_e la yi rtsa dang shel dkar cha mnyam zhib _se 'bru'i me tog _stod ja dkar po _par btags la thun tshad nyis 'gyur tsam re zos pas phan zhing /_sman gtong ring ro skyur ba dang la phug sogs mi bza'/_yang na/_saM kha hu li/_sel
[\[343a.3\]]yi tsa/_se la dzi rta gsum cha mnyam _mug sme pa _zhib par btags pa'i cha gcig_/shel dkar gyi cha gcig byas la thun tshad nyis 'gyur tsam re chu grang gis kyi rta byas btang bas kyang phan no/_/yang chu dang mnyam du na zug dang bcas te 'dzag na/_e la yi tsa/_a ru sa/
[\[343a.4\]]sug smel _g+hoShur/_ba ma ne Thi/_pip+pa la/_e raN+Da rnams kyi thang thun tshad dang bsdu lugs gong ma rnams dang 'dra ba byas la/_de steng se la dzi ta dang sbrang cung zad re btab ste btung bas myur du phan par 'gyur zhing rdel nad kyang thon par 'gyur ro/[ \[\] ]/yang na/_/e raN+Di/
[\[343a.5\]]a ru sa/_gzam _dma' ru mgon gi rtsa ba _drong sman _dan+da _e la yi ca/_po sta ka bi dza rnams zhib par btags la ba'i zhos rta byas nas btang na yang phan no/_/chu 'gags pa la/_mu sa ka b+hiSh+Ta zhib par btags la chu zho tsam sbyar ba me la bsros te lte 'og nas spu dkar dan+da
[\[343a.6\]]zhag yan la byugs na myur du phan nges so/_/rdel nad dang chu 'gags _sug smekha _ta'o'i 'bru _gnyis 'dzom nas na na/_g+ho Shar_dza bas/_ha re ta ka_pa kha na be+e da rnams cha mnyam _bye ba'i brun _gyi shang tshad dang bsdu lugs gong dang 'dra ba byas la/_de steng sbrang cung zad tsam
[\[343a.7\]]zhig btab ste btung bas kyang phan no/_/yang na/_tri pha la/_bzang bu gsum _sen+ng+ha lo Na/_rgyas tshwa g+ho Sha ra/_gze ma _gze ma _a rur _ka re li_gser me tog _brag thun _rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad nyis 'gyur tsam re chu skol gyis phul nas btang bas rdel
[\[343b\]]
[\[343b.1\]]nad chu 'gags gnyis ka la phan no/_/yang rdel nad chu 'gags bcos thabs zab gnad khyad par can ni/_swa ha ga mer bsregs pa'i thal ba chu 'gags la phye ma cung zad re gsang gnas kyi nang du blugs pas de phral chu 'bab cing thun tshad chung

[\[343b.3\]]grang gis rta byas te btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/_/yang na/_tri pha la/_ma ny+dzuSh+Tha/_gurtsa/_kaT ki/_nim+pa/_ha lang+hi/_ba tsa/_da ru ha ridra/_'bram bu gsum _ba yi bi rang+ga /_a rus/_de lba da ru rnams _stod ja _li thi/_cha mnyam zhib par btags la thang thun chung
[\[343b.4\]]phyogs tsam re chu grang gis rta byas zhag nyer gcig gi bar la btang nas phan na dang /_'bras bu gsum _btsod _li khri _ma phan tshe zhag zhe dgu'i _lga ser _shu dag _skye ram_bar la btang bas phan la/_byi brang ka _shug pa _de'i bar rtsam pa dang 'bras kho na las zas gzhan mi gtong la/_sman 'ad za
[\[343b.5\]]phrug la yang phan no/_/khrag shas che ba'i mdze nad la/_mah+dzuSh+Tha/_tri pha la/_/kuSh+Tha/_ha la d+hi/_/de bad ru/_/btsa rnams kyi thang tshad dang bsdu lugs sngon ma rnams dang 'dra ba byas nas btang bas kyang phan par 'gyur ro/_/mdze dkar po la/_guny+dza/_/ni m+pa/_kuSh+Tha/
[\[343b.6\]]ba tsa/_/tsi tra ka_/cha mnyam zhib par btags la/_bcod _'bras bu pa gsum _ru rta _sga ser _zhug pa _shu dag_gong 'bras bu skrangs pa'i skabs su bstan pa'i 'bras phye btang ba'i chu skyur mo des khu ba byas nas gar sla zho tsam rma gang 'dug la byugs pas pan no/_de mar rnya mgon na ru rta
[\[343b.7\]]ru dag_yang na/_ma Ni tsha la/_ldong ros/_tsi tra ka_/ba ku tsi/_beng+ga na be ga na'i thal ba _b+ha sma rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags te gong gi chus rta byas nas byugs na yang phan no/_/za phrug gi nad la/_ma ri tse dang sen+d+tur gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags la mar la sbyar nas
[\[344a\]]
[\[344a.1\]]byug pa byas na sel bar 'gyur ro/_/za phrug_/g.yan pa/_shu ba gsum la/_ha la d+hi/_ba ku tse/_nimA da la/_am+ba la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba'i chus rta byas la nyin bdun gyi bar du btang bas phan no/_/yang na/
[\[344a.2\]]gan+d+ha ka/ba ku tse/_ba yi bi rang+ga /_kuSh+Tha/_sing+ga ra pha/_ha la ng+hi/_tsa ka baDa/_si[\[]n+d+tu[\]]ra rnams cha mnyam zhib par _sga ser [\[\]]skyu rur _btags la/_ng+ha tur/_nim+pa/_pA na gsum gyi khu bas sbyar nas byugs na phan no/_/yang na/_du ba dang ha la
[\[344a.3\]\[\]] rgya mtshwal _sga ser _thal dkar rta rje _btags la chu la sbyar nas byugs kyang phan no/_/yang na/_du ba/_ba ku tsi/_thang phrom_sen+ng+ha lo na/_se ba/_tsa ka ba Ta rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la gong gi chu skyur
[\[344a.4\]]mos sbyar te byugs kyang phan no/_/me lce 'khor lo la/_shwe ta tsan dan/_kuSh+Tha/_sam+b+ha lu/_ka ma la ka Ta/_ni mA rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu la sbyar nas byugs pas phan no/__/rgyam tshwa _a rur _thal dkar rdo rje _gnyan 'bur la/_sa rung me la phyed tsam bsregs
[\[344a.5\]]pa'i thal ba ba'i zhos rta byas thun tshad che phyogs tsam re nyin _tsar dan dbar tho _chu rta [\[\]]ba'i 'bu _bdun gyi bar btang na phan par 'gyur ro/_/grang rlung gi nad la/_a sa garnya/_shuN+Tha/_ka la ti la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i cha gcig[ \[\]]/shel dkar gyis cha
[\[344a.6\]]gcig byas pa thang thun chung phyogs tsam reb mar btsag bcad par btab ste btang na phan par 'gyur ro/_/yang na/_pip+pa la/_tsi tra ka_/a sa gan+ng+ha/_ba yi bi rang+ga /[\[\]]lba _til nag _a dzabA na/_shuN+Thi/_ka la bany+dzi/_pip+pa la ka mu la rnams cha mnyam zhib
[\[344a.7\]]par btags pa cha gcig_/bu ram gyi cha gnyis byas pa'i ril bu skyu ru ra nyis 'gyur tsam re btang bas phan no/_/drod sman/_/yang na/_basbru ba _byi thang ka _bAng+ga /_so mar tsa _sam+ng+ha lu/_bAng+ga ra/_la la lud _lga _pi pi lir gi rtsa ba _muN+Di rnams cha mnyam zhib par
[\[344b\]]
[\[344b.1\]]btags la chu skol gyis d+hirta byas btang kyang phan no/_/yang na/_shut+Thi/_a raN+Di/_rA san/_da ba da ru/_gurtsa rnams cha mnyam gyi thang bsnga lugs gong ma rnams dang 'dra bar byas nas btang na phan par 'gyur ro/_/grang rlung la brten pa'i yan lag na zhing zha grum skrangs
[\[344b.2\]]pa sogs la/_po sa ka bi dza/_/d+ha tu ra ka ra sa/_guny+tsa/_bi Sha/_lga _daN+Da _ng+hatu reka_/bi dza _shug pa _li khri _rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la til mar skol bar btab ste byugs na phan par 'gyur ro/_/stong sgyugs dang zas gang zos kyang skrugs na/_e la ya tsi/_/
[\[344b.3\]]ka ma la ka Ta/_na'o bi 'bru _thang phrom gyi thang chu _dmar du mgo nag/_sman chen thang phron [\[]gyi bru[\]]'bru kha sur pa ni tshu ba ra gsum cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu grang gis rta byas skyug pa ma chod bar du yang yang btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/_/bad kan la brten pa'i glo drag tu lang na/_ka kol
[\[344b.4\]]gam la'i 'bru _ke sa ra/_ma ri tsi/_pip+pa la/_tam+ba mar/_la wang+ga rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la 'byor na pA Na dang mnyam du bza' zhing ma rnyed na chu dro 'jam gyis phul la btang na phan zhing dbugs kha mi bde ba la yang phan no/_/yang na/_pip+pa la/_rang+ga ri/_la
[\[344b.5\]]lbang+ga /_parang+gi /_gur gum _pho ris _drod sman _zangs btal ma _li shi _shuN+Thi rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang kyang phan no/_/phol mig gi nad la/_pip+pa la/_ka tsa na ba ki b+ha ka li tri pha la rnams cha mnyam _drod sman _zhib par
[\[344b.6\]\[\]]btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang na bsos par 'gyur ro/_/lga_yang na/_ba rang+gi dang /_shuN+Di gnyis cha mnyam 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang mnyam du gar sla zho tsam _drod sman _ka can ra'i sogs pa _'bras bu gsum _brdar la rma gang yod la byugs pas
[\[344b.7\]]myur du bsos so/_/kha nad la/_ti khu ra/_tha rams e laya tsi/_kakol/_kha yi _stong ja_ra gsum zhib par _btags la chus ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril la khar bzung na phan no/_/so rnying nas khrag 'dzag na/_a ru sa/_na ga ra mo tha/_ma nugla sgang /_kha yi ra stod ja
[\[345a\]]
[\[345a.1\]]kuSh+Tha/_lo rda/_many+dzuSh+dza rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la so rtsar btab pas phan zhing so brtan par 'gyur ro/_/so srin byis na na/_tri pha la/_da kha/_gurtsa/_tsam+be li ke pa ta/_da ru ha ri dra rnams kyi thang gi steng du sbrang rtsi cung
[\[345a.2\]]zad re btab la khar bzung ru[\[]rta[\]]bcod _zhing pho bas phan no/_/sna ya mas skrangs nas na ba dang rnag gis tha ba la/_ku susba/_ha ri ha ke/_an rag phu la/_'bras bu gsum _rgun 'brum _li khri _tsam ba'i la'i log _skyer pa _'di bu ba then tsam las gong ma lugs bzhin gdu mi dgos bdub
[\[345a.3\]]rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa nu grang gis sbyar nas zhag drug tsam gyi ring snang blugs pas phan no/_/yang na/_/ma ri tsi rdog _bal po kha che _a rung _se 'bru'i me tog _gcig dang son ka sar ki pi dzi/_til 'bru tsam zhig chur brdar la sna nang du blug pas kyang phan no/_/
[\[345a.4\]]mig na ba la/_ra sa ba te/_sen+ng+ha lo Na/_ha ri ta ke/_ge ru/_/ha la da rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa chu la _kro res sbyar te mig gi mtha' skor la byugs pas phan par __son kara'i 'bru _'gyur ro/_/mig na mi na thams cad la phan pa'i mig sman ni/_ni ram li
[\[345a.5\]]dang rnga sta gnyis me ha ri'i khu _rgya mtsha _a rur _btsag _sga ser _bas rta byas brdar nas mig la byugs pas na zhi zhing gsal ba bstan pa sogs 'byung ngo /_/mig la srod long byung na/_su ra ma dang ha la d+hi gnyis dza ba tri'i khu bas khar ba'i snod du brdar la
[\[345a.6\]]sha dkar _mig la byugs pas phan no/_/mig dmar por song zhing na na/_ma ri tsi/_/ge ru/_/khi ri lo Na gsum cha mnyam zhib par btags pa chu la sbyar nas mig gi phyi'i mtha' skor la byugs na phan par 'gyur ro/_/khrag la brten pa'i
[\[345a.7\]]mig na na/_sen+ng+ha lo Na _rgya mtshwa _nas tsam ra snum la brdar nas mig gi nad la _lo nges _btsag _lnga tswa _byugs na phan no/_/rlung la brten pa'i mig mi gsal zhing /_khyad par rgyang mig mi gsal bal/_pa ra/_dngul chu/_dzasta/_sha dkar/_sing+gi mi sri/
[\[345b\]]
[\[345b.1\]]muk+ta ka/_uTi ka dam ta/_/a ru sa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la khar snod du ra'i 'o mas khu ba byas la legs par brdar nas mig nang du pyugs na phan par 'gyur zhing /_mig gi 'grib la yang phan no/_/yang na/_mr-i ta tam+ba/_dzasta/_nI la tho tha/_/pha Ta ki ri
[\[345b.2\]]su rten _rngo mong gi so _sa mu dra phe rnams cha mnyam zhib phar btags/_de nas khar snod du ba'i mar dang mnyam du legs par snur la mig nad la byugs pas kyang phan no/_/yang mig na ba la/_shwe ta dzi ta/_pha Ta ki ri/_zangs btub ma _sha dkar [\[]big ban[\]]tri pha la/
[\[345b.3\]]sba ba/_ra sa pa ti/_rgya mtsho lbu ba _ha lim/_ha la d+hi/_lo d+ha rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags/_ras dri med pa'i nang du gtums la chu gtsang ma cung zad bcug la/_de nas mig la bdugs na phan no/_/zir dkar po _yang mig gi rab rib la/_su ra ma/_'bras bu gsum
[\[345b.4\]]sen+ng+ha lo Na/_shang+kha/_ma ni tsha la/_tri ku Ta/_sga ser _ni ra ma li/_sing+gi mi sri/_sa mu dra phe na rnams zhib par btags la khar snod du ra'i 'o ma dang mnyam du snur la de nas mig nang du byugs pas phan zhing ling tog la yang phan no/_/yang mig 'grib pa/_ling tog_/sha
[\[345b.5\]\[\]]dung _sdong ros _tshab gsum _'dzer/_rab rib la sogs pa mig gi _rgya mtsho [\[]lbu ba[\] ]nad thams cad la phan pa'i spyi 'joms chen mo ni/_si sa bzhus pa ba dar zhag lon pa skyur mo'i nang du blug_/de khengs pa dang slang yang bzhu nas lugs thengs re la dar ba brje thengs
[\[345b.6\]]re byas pa lan bcu'i bar byas/_slar yang de bzhin gi ba ko Ti'i khu bar lugs thengs bcu byas /_a ka ba na'i khu bar lan bcu/_b+hang+ga ra'i khu bar lan bcu/_zhanye _ba'i chur lan bcu/_tri pha la'i khu bar lan bcu/_ba'i 'o ma'i spyir lan bcu/_ba'i gci brlon par lan bcu
[\[345b.7\]]ba'i zhor lan bcu/_til sgrum la lan bcu/_ba'i 'o mar lan bcu/_ba'i mar la lan bcu/_nim+nga'i khu bar lan bcu rnams bzhu lugs rim par byas/_slar bzhu ba'i nang du dngul chu zha nye 'bras bu gsum rang dang ljid mnyam pa zhig blug_/de nas 'khar snod gla rtsi dang
[\[346a\]]
[\[346a.1\]]mnyam du ra'i 'o mas khu ba byas nas brdar te mig la byugs pas kun la phan zhing mig 'grib zin yang bye bar 'gyur ro/_/rna ba na ba la/_a ka ka ra sa/_ka la ti la gsum cha mnyam bsres la rna bar blugs pas phan zhing rnab 'on
[\[346a.2\]]nas lo mang po ma song bas kyang thos par 'gyur ro/_/yang na/_de wa daru/_ba tsa/_shuN+Thi/_sen+ng+ha lo Na/_sany+tsa lo na rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa _a ka'i khu ba _sgog skya'i khum _ti lan ga _ra'i chul btab ste cung zad skol rna bar blugs na'ang nus pa gong dang
[\[346a.3\]]'dra'o/_/rlung la brten pa'i mgo bo na ba la/_de wa da ru/_shuN+Tha/_shug pa_shu dag_sga_rgya mtsha_kha ru tsha _ka yi pha la/_a raN+Da ka ta la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa bzo lugs gong du bstan pa'i 'gros byas nas blug pa'i chu skyur mo des khu ba byas te mar
[\[346a.4\]]cung zar skol la mgo bor byugs pas phan no/_/shug pa _ru rta_bad kan la brten pa'i mgo bo na na/_e raN+Da/_ras ni/_kuSh+Tha/_dan+da'i snum_many+dziSh+Tha/_btsa/_be bar/_na gar mo tha rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chur gar sla zho tsam sbyar me la cung zad bsros
[\[346a.5\]]te mgo bor byugs pas phan no/_/mkhris pa la brten pa'i mgo bo na na/_shwe ta tsan dan/_se ba/_dan+Da_du ba/_ka ta ra ki_ru rta_dza la/_am+ba la/_btsod_shu dag_ka ma la ka ba/_ma nu zla lgang _hu lu hu lu bi dza rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la mgo bor
[\[346a.6\]]byugs pas phan no/_/yang rlung mkhris bad kan sogs gang la brten kyang _tsan dan dkar po _a rung_mgo bon ba'i spyi sman ni/_ba ba'i tsa ba_skyu rur_kuSh+Tha/_ma ri tsi/_ka yi pha la/_ka ma la'i bzu _hu lu hu la'i 'bru_e raN+Da ka dza la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags nas gar
[\[346a.7\]]sla zho tsam chur sbyar la mer cung zad bsres te mgo bor byugs pas mgo nad kun la phan nges so/_/yang na/_pib+pe+e la/_drod sman/_ma ri tsi/_phoris _ru rta _pho ris_ha ri ta ke _arur_rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa gong gi chu skyur mos gar sla zho tsam sbyar la mgo
[\[346b\]]
[\[346b.1\]]bor byugs pas phan no/_/skra dkar nag por gtong na/_lu ha tsar+Na/_ni la tho tha /__tri pha la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags/_de nas lcags snod du/_b+hang+ga ra sa'i khu ba dang mnyam du nyin gsum gyi bar legs par snur la gar sla zho tsam byung ba
[\[346b.2\]]dang ra'i chus gar sla dang ba tsam sbyangs la srod la skra rgya sma ra sogs _lcags phye_big pan_'bras bu gsum _gang 'dod la bsku mnye legs par byas rjes ras bkab ste bzhag_/sang nyi ma shar ba dang chu dro mos bkrus pas nag por 'gyur nges shing /_slar yang dkar
[\[346b.3\]]po byung na gong bzhin byas pas phan no/_/bud med kyi mngal khrag mang du 'dzag nas na na/_ga dza ke sa re/_ti khu ra/_shwe ta tsan dan/_tsan dan dkar ngo /_ba la lo tsa na rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la'abras bkrus pa'i khu bas rta byas btang na chod par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[346b.4\]]yang na/_ga dza ka sa re dang si ta gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags pa thang thun chung phyogs tsam re 'bras _tha rams_bkrus pa'i khu bas gar slar zho tsam byas btang kyang phan no/_/yang bud med zla mtshan mi 'dzag cing phru gu mi yong ba la/_tum+bi ka bi dza/_ya ba
[\[346b.5\]]kha ra|__g+hu ra/_pip+pal/_shel dkar_men pa la/_ha la ng+hi rnams mnyam zhib par btags la si hu Da ka du dzas sbyar la ras lder byugs nas mtshan mar bcug pas zla mtshan dang ldan zhing mngal 'dzin par 'gyur la/_sha ma ma thon pa yang thon [\[\]]khru _byi tsha rang
[\[346b.6\]]zhing mo nad _bu ram _drod sman _dngos gzhi la yang phan no/_/ma na'i 'bras bu _lnga ser__/yang na/_si ra sa ka pa ta/_dza ye phal/_sa mu dra phan/_ba ye bi rang+ga /_e la ya dzi/_ga dza ke sa ra rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa thun tshad zho re chus ril bu sgril la ba mdog dkar rkyang ngam
[\[346b.7\]]nag rkyang sogs kha dog gang yin yang mdog gzhan 'dres pa med pa be'u pho skyes pa'i 'o mas _sing pa'i ngo ma _dzA nye'i lo ma_rgya mtsho'i lbu ba _byi thal ka _ka ki la_rta byas btang bas mngal dang ldan par 'gyur la/_sman gtong ring 'bras la ze ma cung zad btab pa/_mar/_sbrang rtsi
[\[347a\]]
[\[347a.1\]]ja 'jam po tshwa med rnams las bza' btung gzhan mi gtong /_yang na/_ma ri tse/_shuN+Thi/_pip+pa la/_ga dza ke sa ra/_rang+ga na rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba mar bzhus pas byas btang kyang mngal dang ldan par 'gyur
[\[347a.2\]]ro/_/yang na/_ga dza ke sa ra/_a sa gan+ng+ha/_sita/_go lo tsa na rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags _pho ris _lga_drod sman _la ba mdog gcig ma be'u pho skyes pa'i 'o mas rta byas btang na yang sbrum par 'gyur la/_sman gtong ring 'bras za zhing 'o ma 'thung
[\[347a.3\]]ngo /_/yang na/_ga dza ke so ra zhib par [ \[]bsgrub[\] ]kang _gi hang _btags la ba mar bzhus pas rta byas nas btungs kyang gong dang 'dra'o/_/yang nges par phrug gu yod pa'i sman myong grub ni/_lak+Shu ma na'i rtsa ba zhib par btags la ba mdog gcig ma be'u pho skyes pa'i 'o
[\[347a.4\]]mas rta byas te btang na nges par mngal dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/zas spyod gong dang 'dra/_bud med phrug gu 'jur nas mi sdod na/_d+ha ba ka phu la/_ka ma la ka Ta/_ba ma ne Thi/_la dza ru rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la/_'bras bkrus pa'i khu bas rta byas
[\[347a.5\]]btang na 'jur bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sbrum ma btsa' ma thub pa la/_se hu Da'i 'o ma rkang lag gi sor mo rnams dang lte bar byugs na myur du btsa' _ng+ha ba'i 'bru _kam la'i 'dru_dma' ru mgo nag gi rtsa ba _nges so/_/yang na/_muN+Da'i rtsa ba bud med kyi mkhrig ma g.yon la bsdams na
[\[347a.6\]]yang btsa' bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med kyi mtshan ma chung ngu gtong na/_ba hi/_ka se la/_pha Ta ki ri/_lo d+ha/_kaspu ra/_be ra dza re/_ka na ya la'i pags pa/_ma dzu'i 'bras bu rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la/_mtshan ma'i nang du blugs pas chung ngur 'gyur ro/_/
[\[347a.7\]]yang na/_ma yi/_d+ha ba'i me tog_/pha Ti ki ri/_ma dzu'i 'bras bu/_lo d+ha/_be ra dza ti/_chipakha'i rtsa ba/_ga pur__rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la mtshan ma'i nang du blugs na gong dang 'dra'o/_/yang na/_tri pha la _'bras bu gsum/_d+ha ba'i me tog_/dza mu ni
[\[347b\]]
[\[347b.1\]]katwa rtsa rnams zhib par btags la sbrang dang sbyar te byugs kyang gong dang 'dra'o/_/yang na/_kastu ri dang /_kuSh+Tha gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags la/_sbrang rtsis ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril ba mtshan mar bcug pas kyang gong dang 'dra'o/_/bud med kyi nu ma chung ngu gtong na/_a
[\[347b.2\]]dzi su na'i sags pa _sa gan+p+ha/_do na ga dza ke sar/_pep+pa la/_ka se la rnams cha mnyam zhib _gla rtsi_rurta _par btags la slar yang chu blug ste brdar la gar sla zho tsam nu mar byugs na chung zhing mdzes par 'gyur ro/_/yang bud med kyi nu ma skrangs na/_gi wa ko Ta'i shun pa
[\[347b.3\]]me la bsros nas _baspru ba_mkhan pa dkar po_drod sman _nu mar slan na 'phral du zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/pho rtags sbom ring mkhrang ba sogs 'dod na/_bang+ga dang d+ha dung cha mnyam a ma pha la'i khu ba dang mnyam du 'dam btags legs par byas te/_ril bu sgril la grib
[\[347b.4\]]mar skams/_de nas skyes pa gzhan dar ma'i chur zho tsam brdar la ring bar pho rtags kyi rgyab dang /_sbom ring mkhrang gsum _so mar tsa_bang phrom_ 'dod na/_sgyer lo man yongs rdzogs la byugs pas ji ltar 'dod pa 'byung ngo /_/yang pho rtags
[\[347b.5\]]a sa gan+ng+ha/__par/_ga dza pip+pa la ha la ng+hi/__ha ri ta ke rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la skyes pa gzhan gyi chus zho tsam sbyar la pho rtags kyi sgyer lo man la byugs pas las su rung bar 'gyur ro/_/yang 'dod pa spyod mi nus pa la/_la dza ru/
[\[347b.6\]]se dzu'i khu ba dang /_ba sbru ba _dngul chu _zod sman_sga ser _a rur _ra'i 'o mar brdar la rkang lag gi sen mo/_rkang mthil/_lte ba rnams la byugs na 'dod pa spyod nus so/_/yang dwangs ma 'phel zhing ro tsa bar 'dod na/_ta la ma kha na/_mU sa ri kan+da/
[\[347b.7\]]shuti+u/_lga_/go kha ru/_gze ma ra mag//_ka ba tsha ka bi dza/_ka ba tsha'i 'bru/_a sa gan+ng+ha/_basprub/_samA ri phu la/_pad+ma ge sar/_pa la lo tsa na/_sa ta ba ri/_mo tsa ra _mnu rta rkang /_sa'i thang chu rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad nyis 'gyur tsam re shel dkar mang nyung de dang
[\[348a\]]
[\[348a.1\]]'dra ba re dang mnyam du ba'i 'o ma phor gang tsam la btab nas nyin bcu bzhi'i bar btang bas stobs bskyed cing dwangs ma 'phel la 'dod pa ci 'dod spyod nus par 'gyur ro/_/yang na/_kud+kum/_/sing+gar ba__dza ye pha la/_tal mkhan/_ka ba tsha ka bi dza/_ta dza
[\[348a.2\]]masta ki/_a ka ra ka ra/_tum+ba lu/_la wang+ga/_te dze la tra rnams cha mnyam gyi cha gcig_/a phe ma cha gcig_/khu ra sa ni a dza wa ni cha gsum rnams zhib par btags/_de nas so ma ra _gur gum _rgya mtshal_dzA ti_tsa'i khu bas ril bu sran ma _ka ba tshe'i 'bru _nyis
[\[348a.3\]]'gyur tsam sgril la nyal gdong ril bu re zos _li shi_pas ci 'dod spyod nus so/_/lus kyi bse dri med par 'dod na/_na ga ra mo tha/_lal bud chung ba/_bel ka bi dza/_ha ri ta ka/__am+ba li ka pha la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chur sbyar nas mchan khung 'og la yang yang
[\[348a.4\]]byugs pas med par 'gyur ro/_/kha dri mi zhim pa la/_be la/_na ri ar ki ga ri/_i la yatsi/_dza ye pa tri/_ma nu gla sgang /_ta dza/_bil bu'i 'bru _a rur/_am+ba la'i 'bras bu/_ga dza ke sa ra/_dza ye phal rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la sbrang rtsis rta byas
[\[348a.5\]]ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril ba nyal gdong khar bcug nas gnyid du [ \[]b.li ba[\] ]pe re'i 'bras bu'i ring_ka kol _dra re'i me tog_nyal na dri ngan pa med par 'gyur ro/_/rlung gi nad rigs brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la thengs pas chog _dza ta_pa'i spyi 'joms 'chi med ril bu'i sbyor ba ni/_tsi tra ka
[\[348a.6\]]dang ha ri ta ke gnyis zho [\[]su pa [\]]sum cu re/_gan+ta ka zho nyishu/_shuN+Thi/_pip+pa la/__dipip+pa la ka mu la gsum zho bcu re/_kuSh+Tha/_nag ra mo tha/_elaya tsi/_bi Sha/_a ka ra ka ra ta/_ta dza rnams zho lnga re bcas zhib par btags la bu ram rnying pa zho sum cu so brgyad kyis
[\[348a.7\]]a rur_rta byas ra'i chu cung zad cig blug _mu zi mer po_lga_drod sman_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba _ste ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril _rtsasta_ma nu gla sgang_sug smel _sman chan_la btang bas rlung la brten pa'i nad tsha grang gsar rnying gang la yang 'dis mi phan pa med do/_/sman gtong ring ro skyur
[\[348b\]]
[\[348b.1\]]ba'i rigs dang la phug mi za'o/_/rig pa 'di ni rgya mtsho dang mtshungs te/_/mtsho las dbul sel rin chen mtha' dag 'byung /_/'di nyid las ni skye dgu'i tsha grang nad/_/zhi byed bdud rtsi ma tshang med par 'byung /_/'di don rtogs shing khongs su chud gyur na/_/rang gzhan kun
[\[348b.2\]]la phan bde ma lus pa/_/ster ba'i nor bu rin chen gzhan na med/_/tshul der 'bad pa drag pos 'jug par rigs/_/mes pos tshe rigs mtha' med rgya mtsho las/_/snying po'i bcud bsdus legs bshad g.yo ba can/_/ji srid nam mkha' gzugs su ma grub par/_/dar
[\[348b.3\]]rgyas skye dgu'i sdug bsngal sel gyur cig_/ces tshangs pa'i rig byed rgya mtsho'i yan lag 'dzin pa g.yo ba can zhes bya ba bram ze'i rigs las tshe'i rig byed rgya mtsho lta bu'i pha rol tu son pa sarba ha tI mr-i ta dat+ta ste kun phan bdud rtsi sbyin zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[348b.4\]{D4441}]@/_/lha dbang phyug gis tshogs bdag la gnang ba'i sa mu dra pha la'i spyor ba kha bsgyur dang bcas ni/_/de yang thog mar sa mu dra pha la mang nyung ci rigs pa rdza snod gtsang mar blug la zhag bdun gyi bar ra'i chus sbangs te khu ba pho/_de grib bskams byas la zha thag chod pa dang /
[\[348b.5\]]slar yang ba'i chus zhag bdun/_bang+ga ra'i khu bas zhag bdun/_ni ra guN+Da'i khu bas zhag bzhi/_da d+hu ra'i khu bas zhag gsum/_'bras chu skyur mos zhag gcig rnams spangs skems gong ltar rim bzhin byas la/_de nas zhib par btags la thun
[\[348b.6\]]tshad nyis 'gyur tsam re ni ra guN+Da'i khu bas rta byas btang bas mardze rigs brgyad gang gis na yang rtsa ba nas thon zhing khong skran dang yan lag khol bur skrangs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/ra'i chus rta byas khong du btang zhing dpal bar byugs na mgo bo na ba la phan no/_/ra'i chur
[\[348b.7\]]brdar te mig la byugs na ling tog med par 'gyur ro/_/shel dkar dang mnyam du btang na bud med bu btsas pa'i bang tshad sel bar 'gyur ro/_/ra'i chus rta byas btang na mkhris pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/ba'i dar ba dang mnyam du btang na pho ba na zhing sbos
[\[349a\]]
[\[349a.1\]]na sel bar 'gyur ro/_/a dza wa na dang mnyam du zos na dug rigs mtha' dag la phan no/_/hing+gu dang mnyam du zos na srin nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/ha ri tal btul ma dang mnyam du zos na mdze dkar po thon par 'gyur zhing rma gsar rnying thams cad la phan
[\[349a.2\]]no/_/nim+bu'i khu bas rta byas btang na pho ba'i gzer zhi _la la phud_bar 'gyur ro/_/nim+bu'i 'bru dang mnyam du _shing kun_btang na mkhris pa'i nad thams cad la phan no/[ \[]tha [\]]ba la_/ha la d+hi dang mnyam du btang kyang phan yon gong dang 'dra/_ra'i chus rta byas btang na lus stobs che
[\[349a.3\]]zhing mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/kung+ku ma'i khu ba dang mnyam du btang na skya rba ba la phan no/_/yang gur gum gyi khu bas rta byas khong du btang zhing rna bar yang blug na rna ba 'on _sga ser _pas thos par 'gyur ro/_/ra'i chu la brdar nas mig la byugs na spod long sel
[\[349a.4\]]lo|_/ra'i chus rta byas btang na dngugs _gung bum_stod du 'tshangs pa sel lo/_/ni ra guN+Tha'i khu bas rta byas zos na bud med dbang du 'dus so/_/sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du btang na lce'i dog sel lo/_/ko ci la 'bras tsam re dang mnyam du btang na skra rgya sma ra sogs dkar por
[\[349a.5\]]song ba slar yang nag por 'gyur ro/_/ni ra guN+Da'i khu ba dang mnyam du zos na skya rbab sel bar 'gyur zhing chu nad tsha grang gang la yang phan no/_/ha la ng+hi dang mnyam du btang na khrag mkhris kyi nad zhi bar byed do/_/ha la ng+hi dang mnyam du ba mar la sbyar nas lba ba la byugs na
[\[349a.6\]]skem par 'gyur ro/_/ba mdog gcig ma'i mar la sbyar nas mig la byugs na 'dre gdon gang gis kyang gnod pa mi 'byung ngo /_/til mar la sbyar _sga ser_nas mig la byugs na mig gi nad thams cad la phan _sga ser _zhing gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/ni ra guN+Da'i khu bar
[\[349a.7\]]sbyar la snar blug na ya mas mgo phyed na ba sel lo/_/ba dar gyis rta byas btang na dmu rjings kyi nad sel lo/_/tu la se ka tu ba pa'i me tog pa ta dang mnyam du zos na tsha ba'i nad thams cad sel lo/_/tsa ra tsi ri dang mnyam du zos na stobs glang po dang mnyam par
[\[349b\]]
[\[349b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/ka ro d+ha/_rang+ga ni/_bai ri gsum gyi khu bzho bzhi re dang mnyam du zos na dwangs ma 'phel zhing lus stobs che la mdangs gsal zhing gzhon sha chags pa sogs phan yon dpag tu med do/_/de rnams ni sa mu dra pha la kha sgyur dang bcas pa'o/_/b+hang+ga ra/_saM
[\[349b.2\]]b+ha lu'i 'bras bu/_lo ma/_gurtsa/_ha ri ta ke/_ba ya ra/_a m+wa la/_tsi ta'i 'dru/_shun pa rnams so sor zho drug cu re gnyis ra/_nag ri mu sa ri zhe lnga bcu nga dgu/_tsaka ba dza gzho nyi shu rtsa drug_/dA li tsi ni zho bco lnga rnams zhib par btags la/_bu ram zho drug
[\[349b.3\]]brgya dang mnyam du 'dres par [ \[\] ]a rur _ba rung[ \[\]]rur _snur la legs par 'dres pa dang ril bu sum brgya bsgril la/_da nas snga dro zas gang yang mazos pa'i sngon du ril bu re nyin ltar gyis zla ba _shing tshe_gcig gi bar zos na khog nang gi nad thams cad zhi bar
[\[349b.4\]]'gyur la/_zla ba gnyis kyi bar du zos na lus yang bar 'gyur ro/_/zla ba gsum gyi bar du zos na mdangs gsal/_zla ba bzhi'i bar du zos na stobs 'phel/_zla ba lnga'i bar du zos na skra dkar por song ba skra nag por 'gyur/_zla ba drug gi bar du zos na lus rgyags par
[\[349b.5\]]'gyur/_zla ba bdun gyi bar du zos na gla ba'i mig ltar gsal bar 'gyur la/_zla ba brgyad kyi bar du zos na sems dran pa gsal zhing sngar brjed pa rnams kyang dran par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba dgu'i bar du zos na rgyang ring po yang mig gis mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/zla ba bcu'i bar du zos
[\[349b.6\]]nas 'og gi gter mang po rnyed par 'gyur ba sogs yon tan mtha' yas so/_/ha ri ta ke/_ba yi ra/_am+ba la/_ca ka ba Da/_tsa ra tsi ri/_gurtsa/_b+hang+ga ra rnams so so nas srang bco lnga re/_sadz+ha khar dang lu ha tsur+Na gnyis zho bcu gnyis re/_te dza ba la zho gsum/
[\[349b.7\]]sesba ri mnurtarkang zho bzhi rnams zhib bar btags la bu ram rnying ba srang drug cu dang _a rur _ba rur_skyu rur_thab dkar rdo rje _mnyam du snur la legs _li khri_par 'dres pa dang ril bu sum brgya bsgril _zi tsha la de nas snga dro lto rtsags bye stong la ril bu re nyin ltar gyis zla ba gcig gi/
[\[350a\]]
[\[350a.1\]]bar zos pas khong nang gi nad dang mi gtsang ba mtha' dag dbyung ste lus shel gong ltar 'gyur ro/_/zla ba gnyis kyi bar zos na mdangs gsal bar 'gyur/_zla ba gsum gyi bar du zos na lus stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba bzhi'i bar du zos na
[\[350a.2\]]bad kan gyi nad thams cad rtsa ba nas thon par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba lnga'i bar du zos na skra dang kha spu dkar por song ba slar nag por 'gyur ro/_/zla ba drug gi bar du zos na so don pa slar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/zla ba bdun gyi bar du zos na mig shin tu gsal zhing rgyang ring po'ang
[\[350a.3\]]mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/zla ba brgyad kyi bar du zos na mdze'i rigs thams cad rtsa ba nas thon par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba dgu'i bar du zos na dwangs ma shin tu 'phel zhing lus gzi brjid dang ldan la 'dod pa'ang ci 'dod spyod nus par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba bcu'i bar du zos na
[\[350a.4\]]mngon par shes pa thogs med 'byung ba sogs phan yon bsam pa'i ra ba las 'das so/_/pa lag sha la brten pa'i man ngag khyad par can kun la med pa'i khyad chos/_slob dpon ha ri ha ri b+ha tsa'i gdams pa zab mo ni/_pa la sha ba dze'i snum legs par bton la/
[\[350a.5\]]snum se ba phyed/_sbrang rtsi se ba phyed gnyis/_ba mar se ba do ste yongs sgril se ba bzhi'i rtsis re grangs ltar chags rgyun du zos na nyin mo'ang skar ma thams cad mthong /_tshe ring thung lha dang mnyam/_gzhan gyis mthong na _ba yang sha'i 'bru _lus shin tu ring zhing sbom pa
[\[350a.6\]]blos mi 'khyud pa tsam du mthong /_gzi brjid nyi ma dang mnyam pas gzhan gyis glags lta bar mi nus/_lus mdzes shing blta na sdug pa 'dod lha dang mnyam/_gang 'dod du bsam pa tsam gyis sleb/_glo gros phur bu dang mnyam/_gang smras kun gyis bden par 'dzin zhing nyan
[\[350a.7\]]pa dga' byed dpa' bo dang mtshungs/_lus la gzhan gang gis kyang gnod pas mi tshugs/_rang nyid lus 'dor bar 'dod na ma gtogs stobs rtsal dang ldan par bskal pa grangs med kyi bar du gnas par 'gyur/_yang tho rangs gong bzhin la/_phyi dro pa la sha'i rtsa ba/
[\[350b\]]
[\[350b.1\]]shing /_lo ma/_me tog_/'bras bu lnga cha mnyam zhib par btags pa se ba bzhi/_ba mar dang sbrang rtsi se ba do re bcas zos na sa gzhir rkang pa khru gang tsam ma reg par bar snang la 'gro/_lcags dang zangs me la bsregs par dri chu bran na gser du 'gyur/_lus la grib
[\[350b.2\]]ma mi 'byung ba sogs yon tan dpag tu med pa thob/_de yang thog mar sman btang nas lo bcu gnyis tshun gong gi rtags de rnams rdzogs par rim can du 'byung ngo /_/thog ma sman spyor ba dang za ba gnyis ka gza' skar legs pa la byed do/_/nad gsar rnying tsha grang gang
[\[350b.3\]]la'ang sbyongs 'gro ba'i rigs la gtong na/_bi da ra zhib par btags la zho gsum chu skol gyis phul la btang nas lus ma 'khyags pa byas/_de nas ma dag par chu skol gyis lcag rim bzhin rgyab la gcod mtshams su sleb pa dang rkang lag chu grang mos bkrus par
[\[350b.4\]]chod la/_rjes kyi zas spyod sogs sbyong spyi dang 'dra'o/_/a dza mong /_tsi ta/_ma ri tsi/_pip+pa la/_ba yi birang+ga /_de ba da ru/_san+ng+halo Na/_pip+pa la ka mu la shuN+Thi/_si la dza ta rnams srang re/_ha ri ta ka srang lnga rnams zhib par btags la bu ram srang bco lngas rta
[\[350b.5\]]byas ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril la chu skol bzhi cha bsdus pa tsam _dbyi mong __gyis phul _pho ris _drod sman _byi thang ka _shug pa_rgyam tsha _pi pi ling gi rtsa pa _lga_nas tho rangs btang bas pho ba mi bde ba/_a rur_tshad pa/_bad kan/_rlung skran/_srin nad/_gzhang 'brum/
[\[350b.6\]]lte ba'i rlung gzer/_tshags tshigs na ba/_pho ba sgos 'khrog_/kha dri mi zhim pa/_rlung gi rigs/_'dus pa rnams la mchog tu phan zhing dang kha 'byed par 'gyur ro/_/ka ka dze+e gi'i rtsa ba nad pa'i chu la brdar nas rma gang yod la byugs pas mda' gri phog pa sogs rma gsar rnying kun
[\[350b.7\]]bsos rteshing khrag kyang chad do/_/khyi smyo ba dang ma smyo ba gang gis rmugs kyang /_tsa ra tsi ri'i lo ma phyed dang gsum/_bu ram ba ru ra tsam de dang mnyam du khong du btang zhing /_lo ma chur brdar ba rma khar yang byugs pas rma myur du bsos zhing byi dug gi gnod pa yang mi 'byung ngo /_/gsha'/
[\[351a\]]
[\[351a.1\]]dkar/_rgya mtshal/_lhang tsher/_zangs/_lcags sogs/_'dul thabs las/_gsha' dkar 'dul lugs ni/_chang zho bcu bzhu ba'i zhang du dngul chu zho/_sa pa dang rdza'i spar bu lta bu khebs ldan gye nang tshwa zhib mos brgyangs pa'i dkyil du bcug
[\[351a.2\]]nas kha legs par bcad/_gsha' dkar la sogs pa btus ma 'di rnams sman sbyor gang dang gi skabs su de dang de [\[]bcul[\]]dgos pa byung na so so'i kha skyur rnams der te btags par _thug nas phyed tsam gyis gtums/_de nas sa dong khru
[\[351a.3\]]gang tsam zhig brus la ra'i ril mas bkang ba'i dkyil du btsug__/de la me sbar te me ma yal tsam la slar yang ril ma bsnan te zhag gsum gyi ba'i khub srang lnga dang mnyam du blugs la kha legs par bsdams
[\[351a.4\]]nas kha mtshams 'jim pas byugs la rlung mi 'gro bar byas te nyin phyed tsam gyi bar shing gi me mtshams ma chad par btang /_de nas bton la grang thag chod thog rdo gzhong gi nang du zhib par btags/_thog mar gro tsam re dang /_de nas sran ma tsam re dzA ti'i bzhi cha re dang mnyam du
[\[351a.5\]]btang na lus stobs 'phel/_dang kha bde/_gzhon sha chags pa sogs yon tan mtha' yas pa 'byung ngo /_/rgya mtshal 'dul thabs ni/_sing+ga ra pha srang do bil ba'i 'bras bu'i kha nas mtheb gang tsam ma chags pa sgor ba'i nang du blug__/de nas sgor ba des kha bcad/_ras brdungs
[\[351a.6\]]pa bsres pa'i 'jim pa sbyin po'i srab mthug nas gang tsam gyis gtums/_de nas sa dong brus la ra'i ril ma'i nang na me gtong lugs yun tshad sogs rgya mtshal gong bzhin tshar ba dang bton/_'jim pa la sogs gang legs par byas rjes rgya mtshal bil ba dang dbyer med song ba de rdo gzhong
[\[351a.7\]]gi nang du legs par snur la sran ma tsam re li shi rdog bzhi tsam btags pa dang mnyam du btang kyang yon tan gong dang 'dra'o/_/lhang tsher 'dul thabs ni/_a b+ha lhang tsher ka srang lnga/_snum bton pa'i ro ma ba chu srang bcu dang mnyam du legs par brdungs te srab mthug bag leb tsam
[\[351b\]]
[\[351b.1\]]byas la skam thag chod pa dang gci ba'i me'i dkyil du nyin phyed tsam gyi bar bsregs/_de nas bton la grang thag chod pa dang gi la ko Ti'i khu ba dang mnyam du rdo gzhong nang du nyin gcig gi ring brdar te slar yang srab mthug bag leb tsam bzosakye/_de skam thag chod pa dang gong bzhin
[\[351b.2\]]gci ba'i me nang du nyin phyed kyi bar bsregs/_ma he ri'i khu bas nyin gcig gi bar nyed pa dang bag leb tsam bcos nas gci ba'i mer bsregs pa sogs sngar bzhin byas/_ban bu Thi'i khu ba dang mnyam du nyed pa sogs gzhan ma gong dang 'dra ba la gci ba'i mi nang du nyin gcig gi
[\[351b.3\]]bar bsregs la/_de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton la rdo gzhong nang du zhib par btags la ras la btsags/_de nas 'bras tsam re li shi bzhi tsam brdungs pa'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang bas lus rgyags pa/_brtan pa/_gzi mdangs che ba/_rgas sra ba/_'dod pa spyod nus pa sogs
[\[351b.4\]]stobs bskyed kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/zangs 'dul thabs ni/_talba mang nyung ji ltar 'dod pa sbrang gshog legs par 'then te mer bsregs/_de snum gyi dkyil du bcug_/yang mer bsregs/_snum nang du 'jug pa sogs lan bdun gyi bar byas/_de bzhin du rim pa
[\[351b.5\]]ltar/_dar ba/_ba'i chu/_ba'i zho star bu'i khu ba rnams lan bdun zangs _re byas rjes/_de nas rdza snod du ra'i chu zangs mang nyung dang bstun pa'i snod kyi phyed tsam gang ba blug la me btang ste/_chu de skam thag chod pa dang chu gtsang mas legs par bkrus/_de nas dngul chu
[\[351b.6\]]zangs leb gang yod kyi phyi nang tshang mar mdog dkar por ma song bar byugs/_de steng b+hang+ga ri'i khu ba legs par byugs/_de nas zangs dang ljid mnyam pa'i mu zi ser po btags pa zangs brtsegs pa'i srubs la khod snyoms yod pa byas nas khog ma gsar pa'i nang du bcug_/
[\[351b.7\]]khog ma'i kha dam par bcad de kha mtshams 'jim pas gtums nas rlung mi 'gro bar bya/_de lcags sgyed lta bu'i steng du bzhag nas nyin gnyis dang mtshan gcig gi bar me mtshams ma chad par btang /_de yang nyin dang po la me cung zad chung ba btang /_nyin mtshan
[\[352a\]]
[\[352a.1\]]phyi ma gnyis la shin tu tshal btang /_de nas grang thag chod pa dang ras kyi khung du gtums nas chu gtsang mar 'jug 'don thengs lnga tsam byas/_de rjes skam thag chod pa dang rdo gzhong du zhib par btags/_de nas 'bras tsam re nam zla grang
[\[352a.2\]]dus li shi dang /_dro dus ka ko la dang mnyam du btang bas pho ba'i me drod ches cher bskyed de zas gang zos kyang 'phral du 'ju bas dang kha shin tu bde la lus gzi mdangs dang stobs rtsal che zhing gzhon sha chags pa sogs yon tan dpag tu med pa 'byung ngo /_/lcags 'dul
[\[352a.3\]]lugs ni/_lu ha mang nyung ji ltar 'dod pa srab 'thug nas phyed tsam brdungs pa sor bzhi gru bzhi tsam pa bcos/_de rdza snod kyi nang du bi sa kha pa ri'i khu ba dang mnyam du blug la nyi ma gang tsha sar zhag nyi shu'i bar khu ba skam rim bzhin blug nas bzhag_/zhag grangs thim pa dang bton
[\[352a.4\]]la slar yang gong _lcags _bzhin la phug btsir ba'i khu ba dang mnyam du zhag nyi shu'i bar bzhag_/de nas bton la sol ba'i me nang du skam pas bzung la dmar por tshig pa dang ba'i chu'i nang du bcug_/slar yang sreg 'jug gong bzhin lan lnga'i bar byas la/_de nas rdo gzhong nang du
[\[352a.5\]]zhib par btags la nas tsam re nam zla grong dus lga dang /_dro dus ka ko la dang mnyam du zos pas dngas ma 'phel zhing lus stobs bskyed la/_mu sa ba ra dang mnyam du zos na dmu rdzings dang skya rbab sel/_a ka ra ka dang la bang+ga cha mnyam btags pa se ba phyed do dang /_gong gi
[\[352a.6\]]lcags phyes ba phyed bcas btang na dang kha mi bde ba/_glo/_mig ser rnams la phan no/_/zha nye nag po 'dul thabs ni/_shi sha mang nyung dzo ltar 'dod pa su bam thug ras tsa ma brdungs pa sen mo tsam du gtubs/_li shi/_de dang ljid mnyam pa'i pip+ba la dang mnyam du rdo
