[\[352a.7\]]gzhong nang du nyin gnyis kyi bar skam nyed zhib par byas/_de nas ras la btsags pa se ba phyed shel dkar dang li shi cha mnyam __zha nyen nag kho_du btags pa zho re dang mnyam du btang na/_lus shin tu rid cing shed med pa sogs la mdangs dang lus_drod sman_stobs mchog
[\[352b\]]
[\[352b.1\]]tu bzang bar 'gyur ro/_/gsha' tshe 'dul thabs ni/_sa ta ji ltar 'dod pa lcags snod du bzhu ba de dang ljid mnyam pa'i bku tsi zhib par btags pa thug thal ltar 'debs shing dkrug_/de legs par 'dres nas nas khangs pa dang rdo gzhong nang du zhib par btags la ras
[\[352b.2\]]la btsags pa se ba phyed shel dkar dang ka ko la cha mnyam _gsha' tshe _du btags pa se ba bzhi dang mnyam du btang na tsha ba'i nad rigs thams cad la phan no/_/bab la 'dul thabs ni/_ha ri ta la ta ba ki srang nyi shu zhib par btags la ras la gtums khog mar gong gi 'bras
[\[352b.3\]]chu skyur mo'i nang du bcug la ras khog ma'i mthil lam reg pa'i ngos ras thum chu dkyil du yong ba'i thi gu ri thung 'tsham pa btags pa'i shing tshag khog ma'i khar 'jog_/khog ma lcags sgyed lta bu'i steng du _bab lab tsag bu ltar shun pa 'bye rgyu yod bzhig yod _bzhag nas me nyin
[\[352b.4\]]phyed kyi ring bar ma chad par btang /_de nas bton la rdo gzhong nang du a dz+yapa la srang do dang mnyam ras shing gi rtsa bas khu ba byas la nyin gsum gyi bar du snur/_de bzhin du pa la sha'i khu ba/_bang+ga ri'i khu ba/__da ng+hu ri'i khu ba/_ku haDa'i khu ba/_baT ku i'i khu ba rnams kyis rim
[\[352b.5\]]pa bzhin nyin gsum re'i bar snur la/_de nas srab 'thug bag lo tsam byas la skam/_de nas khog ma'i nang du pa la sha brdar ba'i phye mas khog ma'i phyed brgyangs pa'i steng du bzhag_/de steng du yang shing phye khengs par blug la kha gcod legs par 'grig pa'i mtshams 'jim
[\[352b.6\]]pas gtums nas rlung mi 'chor ba byas/_de lcags sgyed kyi steng du bzhag la thog mar nyin phyed kyi bar me chung brta ma chad tsam re btang /_de nas nyin phyed kyi bar de las che tsam btang /_de nas nyin mtshan gnyis kyi ring me shin tu tsha ba btang /_de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton
[\[352b.7\]]la rdo gzhong gi nang du zhib par btags la ras la btsags pa se ba phyed dang h+lang+hi_sga ser_zho do dang mnyam du zos na khrag mkhris kyi nad sel lo/_ba yi bi byi thang ka rang+ga zho gang ha la ng+hi zho do bcas zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi ring zos na skom pa'i nad sel bar 'gyur ro/_/tsa ra tsi ri'i
[\[353a\]]
[\[353a.1\]]thang chu zho lnga dang sen+d+ha lo Na zho gang bcas pa zla gcig zhag bcu dgu'i bar zos na mdze dkar po'i rigs rtsa ba nas thon no/_/pip+pa la zho do dang a jalba Na zho lnga bcas pa zhag grangs gong 'dra zos na pags nad shu 'gram sogs sel lo/_/ba ku tsi dang na gi zho gsum
[\[353a.2\]]de bcas pa zla gcig zhag bcu dgu'i _rgyam tsha_bar zos na mdze nag po'i rigs rtsa ba nas thon no/_/ja ya pa tri dang khu ra sa a dza wa ni zho re bcas pa _drod sman _bal phud _zhag grangs gong 'dra zos na sha bkra'i nad sal lo/_/ni ra guN+Di'i khu ba zho gsum/_la bang+ga zho lnga dang bcas pa zla ba
[\[353a.3\]]gcig zhag bcu dgu'i bar zos na mdzes sor mo gum pa dang yan lag zha ba sogs sos so/_ja ti'i me tog_la la bub chung ba_shwe ta su ba ri dang ma ri tsi zhor bcas pa zhag grangs gong 'dra zos na khrag la brten pa'i mdze la phan no/_/pip+pa la'i pags pa dang ja li shi mu ni'i pags pa zho gsum
[\[353a.4\]]re bcas pa zla gcig zhag bcu dgu'i bar zos na mdzes sor mo'am yan lag chad pa dang /_sna chad pa zhom _go yu bcag na kha dog dkar mo yod pa _pho ris _pa sogs sos so/_/pa la lo tsa Na dang pa na zho re bcas pa zhag _drod sman_grangs gong bzhin zos na rlung la brten pa'i yan
[\[353a.5\]]lag zha grum/_grang ba sogs bsos par 'gyur ro/_/sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du zhag bcu bzhi'i bar zos na 'dus pa'i nad sel lo/_/la wang+ga se ba bzhi dang mnyam du zhag grangs gong 'dra zos na bse dug gi nad sel lo/_/pip+pa la dang sen+d+ha lo zho re/_la wang+ga zho do dang bcas
[\[353a.6\]]zla ba gcig zhag bcu dgu'i bar zos na dmu rjings kyi nad thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/_/ke la'i khu ba/_pip+pa la/_gur gsum zho do dang _li shi_bcas pa zhag grangs gong bzhin zos na mgo gzer gyi nad sel lo/_shuN+Thi dang a sa gan+ng+ha_drod sman _rgya tsha _zho re dang bcas pa li shi _bzhag nyi shu rtsa
[\[353a.7\]]gcig gi bar zos na khong nang gi rlung skran zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/dza la kum+bi zho gsum/_hi ra bi'i khu ba zho gang dang bcas pa zla gcig gam zhag bcu dgu'i bar du zos na mdze rigs thams cad rtsa ba nas thon no/_lag ba spru ba_pip+pal _drod sman_dang dang+hu ra'i thang phrom khu bzhor/_pa na
[\[353b\]]
[\[353b.1\]]dum tsam dang bcas pa zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du zos na sbrags pa dang 'byin pa sel lo/_/e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang yi bi rang+ga zho do re/_dza ye pha la zho gang dang bcas pa nyin bcu bzhi'i bar zos na srin nad rtsa ba nas 'byin no/_/na ga da ba ni'i rtsa ba/_ka pa dza/_shuN+Thi gsum zho do
[\[353b.2\]]ra dang bcas pa zla gcig zhag bcu dgu'i bar zos na rtsa 'dar gyi nad sel lo/_/bang+ga na'i khu ba zho _dan+Da_byi thang do dang mnyam du _dzAti_zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar zos na sna'i nad sel lo/_/ti ta ba ro la'i khu ba zho do/_rang+ga ni'i khu ba zho drug dang bcas pa nyin _lga_bcu bzhi'i bar
[\[353b.3\]]zos na mtshan bar rdol ba'i nad sel lo/_/nim+bi'i pags pa zho do/_a dza wa ni zho brgyad dang bcas pa zhag nyer gcig gi bar btang na gzhang 'brum gyi nad sel lo/_/_pip+pa la'i khu bzho do dang mnyam _gser me_du zos na mri gi'i nad sel lo/_/tsa ra tsi ri'i khu ba dang /_shuN+Di zho
[\[353b.4\]]gsum re dang bcas pa zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar zos na za phrug gi nad sel lo/_/la la bud _sbrang rtsi dang rang+ga ni zho gsum re dang bcas pa zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar zos kyang phan yon gong dang 'dra'o/_/de rnams ni bab la btul ma kha bsgyur dang bcas pa'i phan yon te/_sman de _lga
[\[353b.5\]]rnams gtong ring ro sgyur ba dang la phug mi bza'/_khyad par mdze nad kyi rigs la gtong skabs zas gang la'ang tsha bsrung dgos so/_/gsha' dkar ram zha nye dkar po 'dul lugs ni/_gsha' dkar rang+ga srang phyed gsum srab mthug shog bu tsam brdungs pa sen mo tsam du gtubs/_a dza wa ni
[\[353b.6\]]dang be Da ha gnyis srang nyi shu re so sor zhib par btags la gci ba khru gang gru bzhi tsam brtsegs pa'i steng du ras bting /_de steng gong gi la la phud kyi phye ma'i phyed snyoms par brdal de steng ba ru ra'i phye ma'i phyed snyoms par bting /_de steng gong gi zha nye dkar po bkram/_la la phud _de steng
[\[353b.7\]]btur_la la phud kyi phyi ma phyed po brdal/_de steng ba ru ra'i phye ma phyed po brdal la gci ba'i me sbar te me ma yal bar bzhag_/grang thag chod pa dang zha nye dkar po rnams sgrugs la rdo gzhong du zhib par btags te ras la btsags pa se ba gang /_e la ya tsi se ba gang dang shel
[\[354a\]]
[\[354a.1\]]dkar zho gang bcas zla ba gcig gi bar btang na lus rgyags pa/_brtan pa/_gzi mdangs che ba/_yang ba/_rgas kha sra ba sogs yon tan dpag tu med cing stobs bskyed kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/de ltar slob dpon kun phan bdud rtsi
[\[354a.2\]]byin gyis mdzad pa'i tshangs pa'i rig byed rgya mtsho'i yan lag 'dzin pa g.yo ba can dang /_lha dbang phyug gis tshogs bdag la gnang ba'i sa mu dra pha la'i sbyor ba sogs zur bskol zab gnad can sna tshogs dang bcas sbyor ba kha bsgyur sdom pa sum brgyar nye ba'i
[\[354a.3\]]bstan bcos 'di ni/_dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen brtse nus pa'i spyi gzugs rgyal ba'i dbang po thams cad mkhyen gzigs chen po'i bla'i sman pa/_deng dus bsil ldan gyi ljongs 'dir gso ba rig pa'i ring lugs 'dzin pa la 'gran pa'i zla thams cad
[\[354a.4\]]dang bral ba yar stod dar mo sman rams pa blo bzang chos grags kyis 'di ltar sgyur cig zhes bka' stsal ut+pa la'i chun po thod du bcings te 'phags yul ma thu rar rgyal rigs mchog gi rigs las tshe'i rig byed 'dzin par gu nA tha dang /_gtsang stod 'dar
[\[354a.5\]]gyi skad gnyis pa ngag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub kyis rab byung bcu gcig pa'i nang gi don 'grub ces pa sa lug nag pas nya ba'i yar tshes dge bar phun tshogs lugs brgya'i mdun sa pho brang chen po po ta lar bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'i yi ge pa ni nyang
[\[354a.6\]]stod pa 'jam dbyangs dbang pos bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'gro ba mang po la phan par gyur cig_/shu b+ha mastu sarba dza ga taM//_//[{D4442}]@/_/'phags yul dbus 'gyur mthu ra'i rgyal rigs kyi sman bar gunA tha'i gdams pa bzhugs so//_//
[\[354a.7\]]@#/_/'dre gdon gyi gnod pa rang gzhan gnyis ka la bsrung na/_a kA sha ki ka mi ni ban+ng+he/_pa ta la ki na gi ni ban+ng+he/_na benA/_tha tsaur si sib+ng+ha ben+ng+hi/_dA he ne na ra sing+ha ban+ng+he/_sa tas ta hu la ban+ng+he/_pany+tsa pa ny+tsa hu la ban+ng+he/_tsaud har ne ban+ng+he/_u
[\[354b\]]
[\[354b.1\]]Dan+ti a ma sa na ban+ng+he/_rag ti a ma san ban+ng+he/_tsaus Thi yo gi ni ban+ng+he/_ba ba ni par ban+ng+he/_a Tha si ka ru pa ban+ng+he/_de ba ban+ng+he/_da nau ban+ng+he/_ki yo ka ra yo ban+ng+he/_a pa no par o ban+ng+he/__la ge o pa li ge o ban+ng+he/_tsha tis ro ga me ro ga ge_/go ha dza ti/_ka
[\[354b.2\]]pa la te/_tsauMTi te/_na bon rib ha ta ri ko Tha te/_ya haMpa ba hi taM ban+ng+he/_a de b+hairo ban+ng+he/_yug de bai ro ban+ng+he/_tsa ri khuT pany+tsa i de ha ri ban+ng+he/_a thad ha pa rab nas bab ti ban+ng+he/_na bo la kha ka ba ruM ban+ng+he/_sa ba su mer par ba ta ban+ng+he/_ban+ng+he ban+ng+he sai a da ba ra ha na/_de khum
[\[354b.3\]]te re man+t+ra ki sak+ti/_mi ri bak+ti/_pho re man+t+ra i sh+Ta ro ba tsa/___zhes pa'i sngags 'di dag par bzung la thog mar nyi zla gang rung gza' 'dzin yod dus mdun du mar me/_spos/_lug sha tshon tsam/_chang phud bcas bza' 'dzin ma grol bar bsnyen pa gang 'gro skyel/_de rjes
[\[354b.4\]]rang bsrung na gang dgos dus bzlas shing /_gzhan 'dre gdon gyis gnod pa la phus btab pas/_sha za/_yi dgas/_'byung po sogs 'dre gdon gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed do/_/yang /_ha tha kha pa ra ka re re ka pa la/_ma ri mas ni hUM phi ruM mo hi ra khe ma ha ma gA la/_a
[\[354b.5\]]de bai roM ki rak+Sha/_u ka de bai ro ki rak+Sha/_yaM ga rak+She yaM gi shwa ra/_ka ya ya rak+She b+hai sa su ra/_si sa ra rak+She sI ta la/_hi yo rak+She ba ma ha re/_ba ma rak+She k+She tra pA la/_na bo na ri ba ha tra ko Tha ra rak+She ba ra bi ra/_kau na bi ra ha nu min+ta bi ra/_rA dza bA ma tsan+d+ra ke pa yi ka_/ma he sha
[\[354b.6\]]kuN+Di ki ba ha na/_sI tA ke sa hod la/_me ri b+haste/_ku ru ki sak+ti/_pho ri man+ta i shwa ro ba tsa/_zhes pa 'di dag par bzung la rab mig dmar gzar nam yod dang /_de min zla ba rer mig dmar yod pa'i tshes grangs gang yin la do ma stongs tsam re khrus byas/_mdun
[\[354b.7\]]du ras gtsang ma'i stang gro phye/_mar/_dkar gsum bsres pa'i ril bu bya sgang tsam gcig_/de'i steng du sin+ng+har tshon tsam/_mar me/_spos dang bcas bzhag la tshar gsum las mi nyung ba'i gang lcogs re bzlas na gzhan gyis sngags/_rdzas/_ting nge 'dzin sogs
[\[355a\]]
[\[355a.1\]]kyi sgo nas ngan byed byas pa thams cad byed po kho rang la bzlog pa las glags rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing 'dre gdon kyi gnod pa'ang mi 'byung ngo /_/a de sha gu ru gum purba de sha yo gi ni/_pa tshi ma ni ra d+ha ra/_ban+ng+ho khaM Da pA haM pra d+ha ra/_i shwa ra ma hA de ba/
[\[355a.2\]]ru pe pA u/_so du ri me saM ga tsa d+ha li/_a tra a tra d+ha da tsu re/_ru aM baM ho i/_ka ma ru ka mi k+Sha ki do ha yi/_ru i baM ga do ha yi/_gra ru goR+Sha na tha ki do ha yi/_me ri b+hak+ti gu ra ki sak+ti/_phu re man+t+ra ne na yo gi nI ba tsa/_zhes pa'i sngags 'di yid la bzung la g.yul la 'jug skabs sogs nam
[\[355a.3\]]dgos dus tshar bdun bgrangs nas las gang rigs la btab ste lus la byugs na gri ring thung gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed do/_/u hi pa ra ba ti la ka ri mang+ga yi/_so la ka ri haM ma tsu le lai/_dza ra thaM bu/_dza ra ka thaM bu/_thaM bu ma gal ta thi/_dza ra ta te la gi/_hu ka ra yi tham
[\[355a.4\]]bu|_traM bi sa ka ram sa khi/_dzo hUM dze hUM te la ba re /_si ra u ba ra gau ra ke si ras thi/_phu re man+t+ra e shwa ro ba tsa/_sngags 'di blo la bzung la/_snum dkrug skabs tshar bdun bgrangs la lag par phus btab la dkrugs pas lag pa tshig par mi 'gyur ro/_/ha tha pa kha ru/
[\[355a.5\]]mu kha do uM/_Di Da ke ba duMb ra/_rA dza he ka ruM bar dza/_na hA tha herga ruM se a ra sa du ba e pai thuM/_sing+ga b+hani ka suM/_tsit+to ka re dzi bya tsa re/_ba thuMn ra seng+ga dzi gi mu ha ni/_ra hi dza ga tra mo tsha mi/_de Sho na ra seng+ga ki sak+ti/_me re b+hak+ti/_phu re man+t+ra i shwa ro ba tsa/_zhes pa'i
[\[355a.6\]]sngags 'di tshar bdun bgrangs la chur phu btab nas kha lag gdong gsum bkrus te phyin na/_rgyal po/_rgyal phran/_blon po/_gtso bo sogs kyis dgyes par brtse bas skyong zhing rang gi 'dod pa gang yin ster la gang smras bden par 'dzin no/_/ka thu su ba ri tsu Na/_i sta
[\[355a.7\]]ka pe tha d+he/_pa Tha ho i la ge ma re to ma sa na ho i/_i dza ga dzi bai ho ta ra ba tsa tre//_me ri b+hak+ti gu ra ki sak+ti/_phu re man+t+ra i shwa ro ba tsa/_zhes pa'i sngags 'di go yu phye mar btab pa la lan sum cu bgrangs te bsngags la dzar btab ste bud med gang 'dod la sbyin na rang gi
[\[355b\]]
[\[355b.1\]]dbang du 'dus nas ci zer nyan par 'gyur ro/_/sbrang bu zi ma pho mo gnyis gza' nyi ma yod pa'i nyin zin la dur khrod du pho mo ma nor ba me la bsregs pa'i thal ba ma nor ba so sor tshags byas/_de'i pho'i thal ba bud med kyis skyes pa la byen na skyes pa dbang du 'du zhing /_mo'i thal ba skyes
[\[355b.2\]]pas bud med la byin na bud med de dbang du 'gyur nges so/_sngon la phur ba pho dang rjes la phur ba mo'o/_/a ra dza ra ko ni da ba re/_a ra dza ra go ra pa ra ba ti ni da ba re/_do ta i ha nu man+d+ra kai/_me ri b+hak+ti gu ra ki sak+ti/_phu re man+t+ra i shwa ra d+hib tsa/_ya mas mgo ba phyed na ba la ma
[\[355b.3\]]zhig mgo bo na ba nas 'dzin du 'jug rang gis sngags 'di tshar bdun ma song bar gri rtses sa la ri mo mig mangs ris gang mang bris/_sngags grangs tshar ba dang gri rtse ri mo'i dkyil du btsugs la nad gang na 'dug dris/_gzhan du 'phos 'dug na de nas
[\[355b.4\]]zin la sngar ltar byas pas zug gzer 'phral du chag nas nad med bde bar 'gyur ba ni myong grub zab gnad can no/_/de ltar shin tu zab pa'i man ngag gi tshogs 'di rnams kyang 'phags yul dbus 'gyur ma thu ra'i rgyal rigs kyi sman par gu nA tha los
[\[355b.5\]]dar mo sman rams pas rnyed pa'o//[ {D4443}]@/_/mig 'byed mthong ba don ldan bzhugs so/__/@##/_/rgya gar shA dzang gi sman pa yul ba ri pu ra nas 'ongs pa'i ma na ho'i lag len zin bris su dgod pa ni/_de la
[\[355b.6\]]sman dpyad zas spyod bzhi la/_sngon 'gro/_/dngos gzhi/_rjes/_rten 'brel/_sngags rnams so/_/dang por dgongs mo nyal nas sang mig mi 'byed kyi bar du zas skom gyi rigs bkag_/sprin med nyi ma dro sar nad pa dang sman pa gnyis stan bde bar
[\[355b.7\]]bsdad/_yo byad la/_dkar yol gtsang mar chu/_me hrag du ba med/_ras dkar dri med/_srin bal/_gtsags bu/_thur ma/_phyi'i mig sman yung ba/_nang gi mig sman la bya phur leb 'dra ba/_shing sman gaN+Da pa Ta gsum/_rnga mong gi ko lpags kyi rngar/
[\[356a\]]
[\[356a.1\]]rdza rngar 'jam pa rnams bsags rjes/_nad pa dang sman pa gnyis kyi lham phud/_sman pa'i lag pa gtsang bar bkrus/_nas phud gnyis ka'i lag tu thogs nas gsol 'debs bden bdar brjod nas nas 'thor/_yung ba brdar nas chu dang
[\[356a.2\]]sbyar bas mig gang 'byed kyi smin ma'i ltag la byugs/_de rjes mig g.yon ma lta bu 'byed na sman pa'i pus mo g.yas pa bslang zhing /_nad pa'i lag pa spar 'dzings kyis bzung /_de'i rjes mig gi 'grib kyi thad g.yon phyed na g.yon zur/_dkar nag
[\[356a.3\]]nas gang gi mtshams su gtsags bur dar dkar gyi skud pas sked bcings byas pa'i steng du rgya gram brgyab pa'i rtse nas nas phyed tsam mthong ba des bsnun nas pags pa phigs pa byas rjes thur ma bra bo 'dra bas chad dar skud kyi mtshams su sleb pa rgyal mor btang /
[\[356a.4\]]de nas rten 'brel gyi sog ma dkar po gcig gi sked pa gtubs nas nad pa dang rang nyid kyi bar la sog ma lag g.yas kyi de g.yon dang g.yon gyi de g.yas la bskyur rjes/_lag g.yon gyis mig lbags yar 'then pa dang /_g.yas kyis thur ma rgyal mo'i sgrib byed 'phan ltar
[\[356a.5\]]bsgril bas thur mar sgrib byed 'khril nas rgyal mo nag sing nge byung ba dang thur ma'i sgab nas bteg bteg byed pa dang lag g.yon gyis mig gang 'byed kyi tshog sgang du sdeg sdeg byas pas 'grib log byung na sngar ltar bsgril nas bzhag_/de nas mig gi mthong byed du rdzas kha
[\[356a.6\]]dog sna tshogs pa che ba chung ba'i bar rim par bstan pas phra rags so sor dbye 'byed thub pa yod/_de rjes mig la srin pa la chur sbyangs pa bkab/_me mdangs kyi bsros pas 'grib byed thon sla ba'ong /_de nas thur ma tshur bsgril nas bton/_thur rtse yung ba'i chur bcug pas
[\[356a.7\]]sgring byed thur mar 'khril nas dngos su mthong ba yong /_de nas bya 'phur slob 'dra ba/_rgya gar skad la rnyo don dzo ti/_shin sman giN+Da paT_nimA'i _rnams chu thigs gnyis gsum rdo 'jam po'i steng blug par rim bzhin brdar ba'i skyo ma sngar gyi thur ma brgyab par bslan/_de'i rjes srin bal
[\[356b\]]
[\[356b.1\]]chur sbyangs bkab de steng ras dkar yung ba'i khu bar bcug pa bkab/_rgyal mo dmar nag byung na dar dkar tshwa snum bsres par spags pa bkab/_dkar po byung na mtshal dkar ma btul ba dang dung gnyis brdar ba'i skyo ma gong ltar bslan/_de nas srin bal chur sbyangs
[\[356b.2\]]yung ba'i chur ras spags pa rim par bkab steng ras dkar gyis mig 'bras bkab/_rdzas la/_byu ru/_gla rtsi/_gri chung /_dngul gsum po mi gcig gis mgo thog tu bzhag nas/_sngags 'di brjod do/_/khang+ga rA khang+ga rA/_sA ta saM bung+b+har/_pa la/_gaN+Da/
[\[356b.3\]]gau ra/_smau re/_mA le/_be se pA niH/_zhes pa tshar gsum bzlas la mig gi steng du phu gsum rgyab pas mig gi nad zug dang bgegs sogs zhi bar byed pa yin/_gri chung nad pa'i rkang 'og tu 'dren/_yang mig rus dang mig na na/_tsan dan dmar po dang
[\[356b.4\]]yur ba/_rgya gar gyi btsag yug brdar ba'i skyo ma na sar byugs/_zas skom chu grang gi zan bya sgong tsam dang /_rtsam pa sman tsha btab pa'i tsha ba brdi ba nyin re kha skom na thug pa phor pa gsum re tsam gang dgos gtong /_zhag gsum byi bar zas skyo ma 'di ma gtogs
[\[356b.5\]]mi byed/_spyod lam nyin mo gnyid mi nyal/ldan pa g.yas g.yon phab nas mi sdod/_dgongs mo nyal sa steng shod la 'gro dgos yod tshe dal bus phyin nas nyal zhing rkang pa brkyangs chog_/de nyin nas bzung zhag gsum gyi bar mig sman mig 'byed pa'i dus dang
[\[356b.6\]]dgongs ja khar mig kha phye nas rdzas phra rags bstan pas gsal bar yong /_de'i rjes mig sman re brgyab nas dkris ma sngar bzhin byed/_rlung rtags kyis mgo dang mi rus la sogs na ba byung na snum bskol ba la/_ga bur/_gla rtsi/_li shi/_pi pi ling /_dzA ti/
[\[356b.7\]]btsag yug rnams rim cha bskyed nas btab byugs pas phan zhing /_gzhan yang log gnon/_'gram pa/_'grib pa/_zhar ba/_gzer ba sogs rgyud ltar shes par bya'o/_/kye ma shar phyogs rin chen shel gyi gzhal yas na/_/bde chen pad+ma dkar po'i
[\[357a\]]
[\[357a.1\]]gdan khri la/_/sku yi rigs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas/_/deng 'dir zhi ba'i dbang dang byin rlabs stsol/_/lho'i drang srong ser po/_kye ma lho phyogs rin chen gser gyi gzhal yas nas/_/bde chen pad+ma ser po'i klong dkyil na/_/yon tan rigs
[\[357a.2\]]kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas/_/deng 'dir rgyas pa'i dbang dang byin rlabs/_/nub kyi drang srong dmar po/_kye ma nub phyogs rin chen mchong gi gzhal yas nas/_/bde chen pad+ma dmar po'i dkyil dbus na/_/gsung gi rigs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas/_/deng 'dir dbang ldan
[\[357a.3\]]dbang gi byin rlabs stsol/_/byang gi drang srong ljang gu/_kye ma byang phyogs rin chen g.yu yi gzhal yas nas/_/bde chen pad+ma ljang gu'i gdan steng na/_/'phrin las rigs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas/_/deng 'dir 'phrin las dbang dang byin rlabs stsol/_/dbus kyi drang srong
[\[357a.4\]]mthing ba/_/kye ma dbus phyogs rin chen baiDUr gzhal yas nas/_/bde chen pad+ma mthing ga'i klong dbus su/_/rigs ldan thugs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas/_/deng 'dir bsam tshad lhun grub dbang mchog stsol/_/khyod kyi bu brgyud slob brgyud thams cad la/_/drang srong rigs lnga sman
[\[357a.5\]]skyong srung mar bcas/_/bskal pa ma stongs par du byun gyis rlobs/_/kye rin chen sna lnga baiDUr gzhal yas khang /_/dkar ser dmar ljang mthing ga pad+ma'i steng /_/rigs lnga pho brang 'ja' tshon 'khrigs pa'i dbus/_/mtshan dpes rab brgyan sangs rgyas sman gyi bla/_/ye shes
[\[357a.6\]]lnga ldan sku lnga gsal bar sprul/_/re re'i 'od la 'khor gyi drang srong dang /_/lha dang drang srong phyi nang sde bzhis bskor/_/zhi rgyas dbang drag lhun grub rnam pa lnga'i/_/sman gyi bu mo rnam lnga gnas 'dir byon/_/dri bzang me tog gru gar du ma bcas/_/drang srong rnams la phyag dang mchod pa 'bul/_/
[\[357a.7\]]khang+ga ra khang+ga ra/_sA ta saM bung+ng+ha ra/_pa la/_gaN+Da/_gau ra/_smau re/_mA le/_bi pe pA ni/_lan gsum bzla/_shing kun srang gang /_li shi srang gang /_dzA ti zha drug_/sug smel srang gang /_pi pi leng zho drug_/rgya gar gyi la la phud zho drug_/kha che zho do/_'jam 'bras pags pa med pa zho
[\[357b\]]
[\[357b.1\]]gsum/_shing tsha zho gsum/_a ru ra rus pa med pa zho drug_/shu dag zho gsum/_ru rta zho drug_/thal dkar rdo rje zho drug_/kong po'i sga zho drug_/sha 'bras zho gsum/_ga bur zho gsum/_zi ra nag po zho drug_/pho ba ri zho gsum/_dom mkhris zho gsum/_sum cu tig zho gsum/_gla rtsi zho gsum/
[\[357b.2\]]gi haM zho gsum/_sle tres zho drug_/byi thang ka zho gsum/_ba du ra zho drug_/sgog pa 'khar nyag gsum/_btsod nyag gang /_d+ha du ra zho gsum/_btsan dug zho gsum/_sa min pha la zho gsum/_ko byil zho gsum/_tsi tra ka zho drug_/dngul chu zho gang /_gzi yod pa'i so ma ra tsa zho gsum/pad ka dmar
[\[357b.3\]]po'i snum nyag drug_/til nag gi snum nyag gsum/_zar ma'i snum nyag gsum/_nyungs kar gyi snum nyag drug_/nya tsho ba dkyus mtho gang lhag tsam bcu drug gi khu ba/_phag tshil nyag gsum/_spyang ki'i tshil nyag gang /_rgod kyi tshil spor do/_/sman sbrul sgor mo bubs gcig btsos pa'i khu
[\[357b.4\]]ba/_phug ron gyi sha rul sums med pa bubs gcig btsos pa'i khu ba/_'bri mar lo bcu gnyis song ba nyag lnga/_lcag mar nyag do/_ra'i 'o ma phul gang sbyar ba rnams kyi byug pas/_grum bu'i nad/_rtsa dkar/_dreg_/rlung 'bam/_chu ser/_me dbal/_za 'phrug_/skam mdze/_khe
[\[357b.5\]]ma/_'brum thor/_shu ba sogs chu ser grang ba la brten pa'i rigs mtha' dag la phan/_nyi ma byung na dang de min me la bsros pa'i 'byug thengs gnyis byed/_srong phyed re nad gzhi gang yod la bsgu mnye zhib 'them byas pa'i lo gcig song na zhag bdun tshun la drag_/na ba'i lo gnyis song na zhag
[\[357b.6\]]bcu bzhir drag_/gsum song na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la drag_/'di khong du gtong rgyu'i sman nya phyis zho drug_/la la phud zho drug_/pi pi ling zho gsum/_tsi ta ka zho gsum/_kong sga zho drug_/gser mdog rus med zho drug_/ba ru ra zho gsum/_sle tres zho gsum/_tik+ta zho phyed do/_/sug smel zho phyed
[\[357b.7\]]do/_/dzA deti zho phyed do/_/li shi zho phyed do/_/so ma ra tsa zho gang /_'jam 'bras zho gsum/_gla rtsi zho phyed do/_/gi haM zho phyed do/_/pho ril zho phyed do/_/'di rnams kyi khar bye dkar spar ba gang btab pa'i ril bu kham bu skam po tsam tho rangs chu skol ngang yal gyes rta byas btang ngo /_/zas la rtsam pa/_sha gsar/
[\[358a\]]
[\[358a.1\]]rus gsar gyi thug pa tsha phyed tsha/_ja la mar dang 'o ma med pa'i tsha phyed tsha ma gtogs zas kyi rigs mi gtong /_phan yon mgo dang rna ba yan lag ma gtogs khong nad kyi rigs la phan/_rgya gar gyi skad la sa mu dra phe na/_bod skad la rgya mtsho'i sru ba dngos/_sgog pa se'u
[\[358a.2\]]gsum/_li shi/_dzA ti gsum cha bsnyams pa'i phye ma snum skol bar btab pa'i khu ba rna bar thigs pa gsum ri gnyis ra blugs pas te rna ba'i nad tsha grang kun la phan/_ba'i 'o ma phul do/_snum phul gang /_rgya gar gyi d+ha du ra zho drug zhib par btags snum dang 'o ma gnyis skol bar
[\[358a.3\]]btab pa lus la byugs pas chu bsags/_pho ba sgos pa na zug che ba'i rigs la phan/_zas spyod rtsam pa dang skom li shi 'bru bdun tsam chu phor gang la sbangs pa'i khub grang mo gtong /_gong gi sman rnams nyin re la 'byug thengs gnyis re byed/_nyin bdun tsam la grag 'gro/_sman chen ser po
[\[358a.4\]]dang dung me la bsregs pa pho ril gsum zho la bteg pa'i ril bu pho ril tsam sgril ba khong du btang bas cham pa/_tsha ba/_za ma ma zhu ba rnams la bsngags/_sman ma zhu na dug ril ltag pa sbrad ces byepa yang 'di yin/_'khyags pa sogs grang ba'i nad rigs kun la phan/_rgya gar gyi la la phud
[\[358a.5\]]chu la thun che bar btab la skol ba'i khu ba phor pa do gsum tsam btang bas shal skyug gang rigs byung na phan/_grang ba yun ring lo 'das 'grim pa la ko ci la me la bsregs pa dang la la phud shu dag gsum khram khrum brdungs pa thun che ba gsum zos pas phan/_rtsam pa rtsam thug mdzo zho'i
[\[358a.6\]]chu ras la btsags pa btang bas phan/_pho pa 'bras bu gsum sdom chung ba la thag btang ba gcig zhib par btags pa'i khu ba mgo bo gzhogs phyed na _la nadan gang na'i mig tu dar la btsags pa'i khu ba blug pas phan/_kro ma seng ge/_tsan dan dmar po/_lga ser/_btsag
[\[358a.7\]]rnams brdar ba'i khu ba bal mchu la byugs pas phan/_so ma ra tsa brdar ba'i khu ba mig gi mtha' la byugs pas na zug che ba la phan/_ma la drod dugs byed/_ha ha tha g+ha ru la g+ha ru ra yi ke ke ma tsu li/_aM ge he aM g+ha sa ma i zhes lan gsum thal ba la sngags btab na kha rlang gi dug la phan no//_//
[\[358b\]]
[\[358b.1\]{D4444}]@/_/'phrul gyi me long dgu skor zhes bya ba'i rtsa 'grel bzhugs/__/@##/_/kun mkhyen nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnal 'byor lta ba'i spyi 'grel brdeg_/log rtog byang chub yul snang ba'i/_/chos kun
[\[358b.2\]]sems su gcig mi gcig_/lhun gyis grub pa gang la bgyi/_/de nyid snang ba yod dam med/_/ye nas sangs rgyas yin nam min/_/khams gsum sems can ji ltar 'khrul/_/'khrul nyid ni don ci
[\[358b.3\]]lags/_/rnal 'byor bye ba'i ngo bo gang /_/de dag dogs pa'i the tshom gang /_/de rnams khyad par ji ltar che/_/'phrul gyi me long dgu skor skyebazhin/_/gsal byed 'phrul tshig dgu yis ston/_/sgyu ma rnam gnyis
[\[358b.4\]]spyod du yul ni/_/sems kyi chos nyid ngang du gcig_/de yi de nyid ji lta ba/_/mkha' dang gzha' snang ji bzhin du/_/log rtog sems rgyud tha dad kyang /_/rigs rgyud med phyir dbye ba dka'/_/sems
[\[358b.5\]]nyid nor bu rin po che/_/ji ltar dmigs shing sems par snang /_/'gro la sems rgyud gnyis su 'char/_/de ni dngos med kun gyi gzhi/_/log rtog mun pa'i yul snang kun/_/sems phyir mtha' la
[\[358b.6\]]rtsod pa med/_/gang la yod med med pa lte/_/rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das/_/de ni de phyir rgyal 'gro zhes/_/ris su bcad pa med pa la/_/gtsang dang mi gtsang dngos gcig bzhin/_/phyogs su
[\[358b.7\]]bltas na nor ba'i blo/_/ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i sems/_/me long g.ya' dang mkha' sprin bzhin/_/rig dang ma rig gnyis med pas/_/phyogs gcig rkyen gyi dus su 'khrul/_/'jig rten brtan
[\[359a\]]
[\[359a.1\]]g.yo la sogs pa/_/snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med/_/rang byung phyi nang med snang phyir/_/de dus rang bzhin nyams pa med/_/'jug pa'i rnam shes de lta bus/_/shes rab thun mong
[\[359a.2\]]spyan yin no/_/rang byung ye shes tshogs kun bdag_/shes rab can gyi mchog yin no/_/rdo rje yid ni dbang mchog phyir/_/lta ba med phyir rang spyi chos/_/dbyer med phyogs lta'i 'dod bral ba/_/ma nor
[\[359a.3\]]rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs/_/gsum gnyis gcig gis spangs/_/dang po dngos dang gsal ba dang /_/snga ma sangs rgyas sems can dag_/so so sems rgyud tha dad pa/_/gcig na bdun la snga rtogs skye/_/
[\[359a.4\]]de bzhin sems rgyud brgyad la za/_/tha dad zhe na bdun gyis 'gal/_/de bas dgag dang sgrub med pas/_/gcig dang du ma med pa'o/_/gsum pa'i snga ma rtog skyon dgu/_/phyi ma med pa'i the tshom dag_/
[\[359a.5\]]skyon gyi dngos po bcu gnyis shes/_/mi mkhas mkhas pa'i bsam pa ni/_/mi mkhas shin tu mi mkhas pa/_/shin tu mi mkhas mthar lta ba'i/_/mi mkhas yod med rtsod byed cing/_/dgag dang sgrub pa
[\[359a.6\]]gang byed pa/_/de de de la chags sdang skye/_/mkhas dang shin tu mkhas pa ni/_/mkhas pa phal pa dgag sgrub can/_/sgrub pa'i don la brten par byed/_/byis pa'i gzung 'dzin dbang gyur pa'i/_/
[\[359a.7\]]ma nor lam dang bral ba yin/_/shin tu mkhas pa thams cad la/_/sems phyir dgag dang sgrub pa med/_/de dang rang rig rang snang phyir/_/dgag sgrub bral la yid mi rton/_/de phyir so so dgag sgrub can/
[\[359b\]]
[\[359b.1\]]sgrub pa'i phyogs la zhen pa'i phyir/_/de de med pa ga la mthong /_/de bas rang gi brtags mthong yin/_/de de skas gdang ji lta ba/_/khyad par grangs dang dor ba med/_/cha yod dug la mi 'thung bzhin/_/log
[\[359b.2\]]lta gnyis su ga la 'gyur/_/gnyis po de ltar de nyid la/_/grub pa'i tha snyad ji ltar mtshon/_/ma grub grub na nges tshig med/_/de ma grub na de bzhin no/_/de bas srid dang mi srid kun/_/lhun grub phyogs su
[\[359b.3\]]grub pa med/_/bzhi pa'i snga ma skyon drug gnyis/_/de bzhin phyi ma rjes su mthun/_/gnyis med zhe na dus gsum la/_/'byung zhes bya ba'ang gnyis med dang /_/sman nyid phan gnod bdag gnas ltar/_/
[\[359b.4\]]ngo bo tha dad 'gyur ba med/_/phyogs las logs pa'i tha dad med/_/lnga pa 'khrul gzhi yod med pa'i/_/skyon ni gsum pa ji bzhin grangs/_/mig yor gsum la dngos med 'dra'i/_/chos yod bzhin
[\[359b.5\]]pas rang sems la/_/de dngos med kyang rgyu rkyen drug_/rang bzhin lhun grub dpag bsam bzhin/_/so sor snang ba dus gsum du/_/rgyun du 'khrul la lhun grub pas/_/'gro 'ong 'byung 'jug med snang bzhin/_/
[\[359b.6\]]gzhi yod med dang dbyer med mtshungs/_/drug pa de ltar de bden na/_/de la skyon du bya ba bdun/_/thams cad 'ching 'grol dbyer med la/_/gnyis mthong 'khrul bar blta ba 'khrul/_/de bas blang dang dor ba med/_/bde
[\[359b.7\]]sdug gnas su ris ma blta/_/bdun pa rang rig can yin na/_/de la skyon bcu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes 'di/_/mi lnga'i bdag po kun gyi sems/_/rang spyi ji snyed ji lta ba/_/rang yul med
[\[360a\]]
[\[360a.1\]]par nges gsal ba/_/nam mkha' sprin mthongs 'od bzhin du/_/rab rib gang dag shes rab snang /_/brgyad pa nges mthong sgrib pa'i grangs/_/brgyad pa bsnyad pa yan lag bcas/_/phyag rgya
[\[360a.2\]]bzhi yi gzhir gyur pa/_/nges par ngos zin bya bar bsnyad/_/ma rig pa nyid ye shes gsal/_/the tshom nyid kyang nges pa'i spyan/_/log rtog nyid kyang ma nor lam/_/de la mi mthun shes dang bral/_/dgu pa 'das dang
[\[360a.3\]]'jig rten pa'i/_/theg pa'i lta ba gral dgongs/_/skas gdang lta bur bstan pa dag_/kun kyang bdag dang bral ba'i phyir/_/'jig rten shes 'phags ci smos te/_/de dag nyid ni dgag dang sgrub/_/rim pa yod
[\[360a.4\]]med khyad par dang /_/ltos pas phye ba'i khyad par ni/_/bdag spong bdag med sgrub pa dang /_/gzugs spong phyi steng sgrub pa dang /_/don 'gog sems tsam sgrub pa dang /_/mtha' spong mtha' bral sgrub pa dang /_/
[\[360a.5\]]dri spong dag pa sgrub pa dang /_/mtshan 'gog mtshan med sgrub pa dang /_/blang dor 'gog med sgrub pa dang /_/rtsol spong rtsol bral sgrub pa dang /_/de dag kun kyang yod med phyir/_/dgag sgrub rang gis mi byed
[\[360a.6\]]pa'o/_/rim par phye ba'i khyad par ston/_/mthong ba dag dang ma dag pa'i/_/rim pas don gcig khyad par snang /_/mthong ba dge ba'i kun mthong 'di/_/sna tshogs theg pa'i lta ba dang /_/ji snyed bsdom pa'i
[\[360a.7\]]bya ba rnams/_/sbyang bar bya ba ma yin yang /_/ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par gsal/_/kun shes bzhin 'dra rab rib dri ma nyid/_/bstan pa'i me long mthong goms rang dag sar/_/'gyur bas ma 'ongs don can
[\[360b\]]
[\[360b.1\]]ched bgyis pa'i/_/dge rtsas bdag dang mtha' yas 'gro bar bsngo/_/'phrul gyi me long dgu skor rdzogs so//_//[{D4445}]@/_/'grel pa bzhugs/_/@##/_/rnal 'byor rigs pa'i me tog 'phrul
[\[360b.2\]]gyi me long la dbu zhabs su bsdus pa'i don bzhi ste/_phyag 'tshal mchod pa'i lung dang /_dam bca' sdom pa'i lung dang /_gzhung lugs rtsa ba'i lung dang /_sna tshogs kyi lung dang bzhi'o/_/kun mkhyen nyid la phyag
[\[360b.3\]]'tshal nas/_/shes pa gang gis gang ltar phyag btsal ba'o/_/rnal 'byor lta ba'i spyi 'grel brdeg_/ces pa lta ba'i rim pa spyi'i shan dbye ba'i phyir 'grel pa ste/_the tshom gtar ka gnad du brdeg par dam bca'
[\[360b.4\]]ba'o/_/lung bsdu ba bstan pa la gnyis te/_dris pa'i lung dang lan no/_/dris pa ni dgu ste/_log rtog byang chub yul snang ba'i/_/chos kun sems su gcig mi gcig_/ces pa 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das
[\[360b.5\]]pa'i spyod yul byang chub sems su gcig mi gcig dris pa dang po'o/_/lhun gyis grub pa gang la bgyi/_/dris pa gnyis pa'o/_/de nyid snang ba yod dam med/_/ces pa lhun grub snang stong gang yin dris pa gsum pa'o/_/
[\[360b.6\]]ye nas sangs rgyas yin nam min/_/zhes pa chos kun gzhi yi sangs rgyas pa yin nam ma rgyas pa yin dris pa bzhi pa'o/_/khams gsum sems can ji ltar 'khrul zhes pa lnga pa'o/_/'khrul pa nyid ni don
[\[360b.7\]]ci lags/_/zhes pa 'khrul pa'i grub mtha' dris pa drug pa'o/_/rnal 'byor lta ba'i ngo bo gang zhes pa bdun pa'o/_/de dag dogs pa'i the tshom gang /_/zhes pa skyon dris pa brgyad pa'o/_/de rnams
[\[361a\]]
[\[361a.1\]]khyad par ji ltar che/_/bdun po theg pa gzhan las gang dpag dris pa dgu pa'o/_/'phrul gyi me long dgu skor bzhin/_/zhes pa mtshon pa dgus mtshon du btub pa'o/_/gsal byed 'phrul tshig dgu yis ston/_/zhes pa
[\[361a.2\]]don dris pa lan zung dgu yi tshig gis gsal bar ston pa'o/_/lan dang po bstan pa'i phyir/_/sgyu ma rnam gnyis spyod yul ni/_/sems kyi chos nyid dang du gcig_/ces pa log rtog sgyu ma'i sems can dang /_ye shes sgyu ma'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul 'khrul lam
[\[361a.3\]]ma 'khrul gnyis/_sems kyi de kho na nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su gcig par lan gdab po/_/de'i dpe ni/_de'i de nyid ji lta ba'o/_/mkha' dang gzha' snang ji bzhin du/_/zhes pa gzha' tshon snang ba dang rang bzhin stong pa dbyer med pa bzhin no/_/
[\[361a.4\]]gtan tshigs ni/_log rtog sems rgyud tha dad kyang /_/rig rgyud med phyir dbye ba dka'/_/zhes pa log rtog gi rgyud so sor rtog pa dang /_'du shes tha dad pas/_tshor ba dang /_'du byed de lta ba dang /_rgyal ba'i thugs gsal ba rtags kyis tha dad pa las
[\[361a.5\]]mi mthun pa ni rgyal ba dang /_'gro ba la rig rgyud rtag par nges pa med pa'i phyir/_gcig ces dgos ched gnyis kyi phyir brjod kyis ngo bo gcig dang tha dad las grol ba'i ngang du dbyer med pa la de skad brjod pa'o/_/gnyis pa ni/_sems nyid nor bu rin po che/_/
[\[361a.6\]]zhes pa lhun grub kyi dpe'o/_/ji ltar dmigs shing bsams par snang /_/zhes pa lhun gyis ma grub pa dang ma grub pa'i chos thams cad du sems so sor snang ba'o/_/'gro la sems rgyud gnyis mi 'chang /_/zhes pa sems kun gyi sems kyi chos nyid kyi
[\[361a.7\]]gzhi'am dngos po zhes pa skad gcig ma ni bsam pa'am blo zhes rtog pa dang mi rtog pa'i sems rgyud gnyis pa 'gro ba gcig la med do/_/skabs kyis mi brjod pa'o/_/de ni dngos med kun gyi gzhi/_/zhes pa sems can gyi sems gcig pa de ni dngos
[\[361b\]]
[\[361b.1\]]po brtag dka' ste/_dgos 'dod bskong ba'i nor bu lta bu la gcig la gcig ma grub pa dang /_lhun grub kyi ngo bo la ni phyogs gcig pa'i lhun grub tu khas blangs pa'o/_/lan gsum pa ni/_log rtog mun pa'i yul snang kun/_/zhes pa 'gro ba so so'i ma
[\[361b.2\]]rig pa'i snang ba tha dad pa bsdu'o/_/sems phyir mtha' la rtsod pa med/_/ces pa snang ba yod med kun bdag nyid chen po'i gtan tshigs kyis dbyer med pa la yod med sgro skur tu rtsod pa byis pa'i blo/_dpe ni/_gang la yod med med pa ltar/_/ces pa dngos po
[\[361b.3\]]gang la phan pa 'ba' zhig yod ce'am/_gnod pa'i mthu 'ba' zhig yod ces phyir ni mi btub ste/_brtags na mi dmigs par/_bsam na phan gnod so sor snang yang dbyer med pa ltar/_rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das/_/zhes pa 'khrul pa'i snang
[\[361b.4\]]ba yod med dbyer med pa ni thun mong chen po'i smra bsam las 'das pa ste/_don dam dngos po'am gzhi la med/_/kun rdzob blo 'am bsam pa la yod ces smra ba dag mi mkhas pa'i shes pas/_'di skad du/_sems 'di yod do med do zhes/_/byis pa rnams ni
[\[361b.5\]]rtsod par byed/_/zhes pa la sogs pas gsal lo/_/lan bzhi pa ni/_de ni de phyir rgyal 'gro zhes/_/ris su bcad pa med pa la/_sems snang stong dbyer med pa'i lhun grub de ni/_tshig snga ma gtan tshigs su gyur pas ye sangs rgyas pas rgyal ba zhe'am/_'gro
[\[361b.6\]]ba 'khor ba yin zhes gsungs pa'i tshig gnyis kar/_sems 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dbyer med la mi bsam mi brjod do/_/gtsang dang mi gtsang dngos gcig bzhin/_/zhes pa gnyis su med pa'i dpe ste/_la la'i gtsang ba la la la'i mi gtsang bar
[\[361b.7\]]snang bas gtsang mi gtsang dngos po gcig ste/_gzhi la nges pa bzhin de kho na ji snyed pa'i ji bzhin pa sems kyi chos nyid sangs rgyas sems can dbye ba med pa la/_phyogs su bltas na nor pa'i blo/_/zhes pa gzhi 'khrul 'khor med pa'o/_/rnam dag phyogs
[\[362a\]]
[\[362a.1\]]gcig tu bltas te/_gzhi med pa la bsam blos blo bur du blta ba dag ni/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dag dang /_tha snyad la skur ba 'debs pa'i lta ba ste/_gnyis med ngang la gsal ba 'dus par brjod pa nyid kyis mkha'i lta ba
[\[362a.2\]]khas blangs pa'o/_/'dir gnyis su yod med nyid kyang dbyer med pas thun mong ma yin pa'i gnyis su med pa ste/_'di skad du/_gnyis med gnyis su med min zhing /_/zhes pa dgos byed gnyis kyi phyir brjod pa tsam mo/_/lan lnga pa ni/_ji snyed 'jig
[\[362a.3\]]rten 'khrul pa'i sems/_/zhes pa log rtog tha dad pa'i sems bsam yas pa'o/_/me long g.ya' dang mkha' sprin bzhin/_/zhes pa ma rig pa dang sems ye shes gnyis su med pa'i dpe'o/_/rig dang ma rig gnyis med pas/_/zhes pa lhan
[\[362a.4\]]cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa med pa min pa'i phyir/_ye shes dang ma rig pa dbyer med kyang /_phyogs gcig rkyen gyi dus gsum 'khrul/_/zhes pa phyogs gcig nas ltos pas 'khor ba'o/_/de'i rgyu ma rig pas rkyen las dang nyon mongs pas dus gsum
[\[362a.5\]]thog mtha' med par rgyun chags su 'khrul pa ni/_thag sprul tho mi sab rtas mtshon nas gzhi med pa las 'byung bar smra ba lta bu ma yin te/_sgro skur dang bral ba'i ngang las 'khrul ba'o/_/lan drug pa/_'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa/snang ba
[\[362a.6\]]nyid na rang bzhin med/_/ces pa brtan g.yo blo brtags kyi rang bzhin bsam pa la yod la gzhi la med par smra ba ni rang bzhin la skur ba ste/_'dir 'khrul pa snang ba do ba'i dus nyid na mkha' sprin ltar rnam pa'i mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa chen po la rang bzhin
[\[362a.7\]]yod med dbyer med la dgos ched kyis brjod pa'o/_/rang byung phyi nang med snang phyir/_/zhes pa bdag nyid chen po'i gtan tshigs kyis kyang chu nyid rlabs lta bur 'gro 'ong med par snang ba'o/_/de dus rang bzhin nyams pa med/_/ces pa 'khrul pa de snang
[\[362b\]]
[\[362b.1\]]ba'i dus na rang bzhin stong pas ji bzhin nyid las ma nyams rang bzhin thun mong ma yin pa'i 'khrul pa ste/_'di skad du/_'khor ba nyid na bde gnas so/_/shes pa dang rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med/_/ces gsungs so/_/lan bdun pa ni/_'jug pa'i
[\[362b.2\]]rnam shes de lta ba/_/shes rab thun mong spyan yin na/_/zhes pa lta ba'i ngo bo 'og ma bdag yid kyi rnam par shes pa de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i phyir/_'du byed kyi shes rab dang mtshungs par thun mong gi lta ba lam du rigs pa'i shes pa la lta ba zhes brjod do/_/
[\[362b.3\]]'dir/_rang byung ye shes tshogs kun bdag_/shes rab spyan gyi mchog yin no/_/zhes pa tshogs brgyad rig rgyud gzugs mtshan gnas kyis tha dad med par 'od gsal ba'o/_/rkyen dang rgyu med par ma 'gags par ye rang gsal bar rang byung
[\[362b.4\]]ye shes te/_bltas pa med par de kho na nyid du gsal ba lta ba'i phul lo/_/lta ba'i ngo bo des ji ltar mthong snyam pa la/_rdo rje yid ni dbang mchog phyir/_/zhes pa yid ye shes rdo rje ni shes rab kyi dbang po mchog ste gtan tshigs
[\[362b.5\]]lta ba med pa rang spyi'i chos/_dbyer med phyogs lta'i 'dod bral ba/_zhes pa yul du lta ba med de rang rig phyi nang med phyir ro/_/rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi chos su snang ba yang shes pa dang rnam pa tsam du dbyer med pas/_nang phyogs nas phyi ru
[\[362b.6\]]bltas pa'am/_phyi nas nang du blta ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas de kho na nyid yul med par rig pa rang gsal ba'i gdeng rnyed bas thams cad mkhyen pa la zhes pas/_zhe 'dod du med pas/_ma nor rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs/_/zhes gsungs
[\[362b.7\]]so/_/de la g.yo theb brtan mthar phyin pa'i lam du gyur pa'o/_/lan brgyad pa ni/_gsum gnyis gcig gis the tshom spangs/_/zhes pa dris lan bdun pa'i tshom dris pa rjes su bsam pa'i phyir/_dang po dngos dang gsal ba dang /_/zhes
[\[363a\]]
[\[363a.1\]]pa tshag lngas gtar ka gnyis kyi gegs bsal ba la/_/snga ma sangs rgyas sems can dag_/so so sems rgyud tha dad pa/_/gcig na bdun la snga rtog skye/_/zhes pa spyir sangs rgyas dang sems can rnams phyogs
[\[363a.2\]]gcig pa'i gcig pa yin na bka' lung la mi snang ba dang /_don dang 'gal ba dang /_gtan tshigs kyis mi rgyas pa dang /_rig pas mi 'thad pa dang /_chos brtags pa bzhi dang 'gal ba bdun po kun la 'byung mod kyang /_skabs gnyis kyis
[\[363a.3\]]gsang sngags ni spyi dang 'thun par rigs pas mi 'thad pa'i skyon brjod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi thugs dang sems can gyi sems phyogs gcig pa'i ldog pa dang bcas pa yin zhe na/_rgyal ba bzhin du 'gro bas kyang thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ba dang /
[\[363a.4\]]rtog pa med par 'gyur ba dang /_/nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_lam gyi chos la rag las mi dgos pa dang /_rgyal ba yang 'gro ba bzhin thams cad mi mkhyen pa dang /_rtog pa can du 'gyur ba dang /_nyon mongs pa sdug
[\[363a.5\]]bsngal myong ba dang /_skyon bdun 'byung ngo /_/'gro ba drug gi sems can tha dad gcig na yang /_de bzhin sems rgyud brgyad la za/_/zhes pa chos tha ma'i skyon 'byung ste/_'gro ba drug po kun sems rang byung gi ye shes su gcig na yang /_'gro ba
[\[363a.6\]]gcig sangs rgyas na kun sangs rgyas par rigs pa dang /_gcig ltung na kun ltung bar rigs pa dang /_gcig shes pa chen kun che/_gcig shes pa chung na kun chung /_gcig 'du shes rgya che na kun che/_gcig 'du shes chung na kun chung /
[\[363a.7\]]gcig rnon kun rno/_/gcig rtul na kun rtul/_gcig dog na kun dog_/gcig yangs na kun yangs/_gcig tshor ba gsal na kun gsal/_gcig mi gsal na kun mi gsal/_gcig dran pa gsal na kun gsal/_gcig mi gsal na kun
[\[363b\]]
[\[363b.1\]]mi gsal/_brgyad po de ltar the tshom za ba/_tha dad zhen bdun gyis 'gal/_/zhes pa sangs rgyas kyi thugs dang 'gro ba'i sems tha dad na yang/_sangs rgyas sems can gnyis rang bzhin tha dad du 'gyur/_ngo bo tha dad du 'gyur bas 'brel pa med
[\[363b.2\]]pas don byar mi btub/_'gro ba sangs rgyar mi btub/_nyon mongs pa spang zhing sgrib pa byang du mi btub/_rgyal ba bsten pa la dgos pa med/_so sor rtog pa'i mthar 'gyur ba dang bdun no/_/sems can kun gyi rang gi ye shes tha dad na yang /
[\[363b.3\]]rang byung gi ye shes so son yod pa'i phyir/_gcig gis gcig reg na gzhan 'byung du 'gyur ba dang /_nges tshig med/_gcig gis gcig ma rig na/_ye shes su mi 'gyur ro/_/yul med par rig na dam bca' nyams/_shes pa'i rnam pa ye
[\[363b.4\]]shes gzhan du snang ngo zhe na/_bdag gzhan gyi phyogs nas rnam pa cha gnyis yod pas gzung 'dzin du 'gyur ro/_/ye shes la rig rgyud la sogs pa tha dad pa bdun 'ong bas du ma'i mthar 'gyur ro/_/de gsal ba ni/_de bas dgag dang sgrub med
[\[363b.5\]]pa'i/_/gcig dang du mar bral ba'o/_/zhes pa sangs rgyas dang sems can gcig dang du ma'i mtha' ma bkag la bral ba sgrub tu med pa ni rig pa rang byung gi ye shes nyid gcig dang du ma dang bral ba dang ma bral ba kun yin pas/_bral ma bral dbyer med
[\[363b.6\]]pa la shugs snang la dgag sgrub ltar snang yang zhes 'dod la lhag pa'i dgag sgrub med pas skyon de dag mi 'byung ngo /_/gsum pa 'khrul snang gzhi la yod med ston pa'i phyir/_/gsum pa'i snga ma rtog skyon dgu/_/zhes pa 'khrul snang gzhi la yod na gzhi
[\[363b.7\]]'khor ba rang rgyud rtog pa'i skyon gyis sgrib pa mi 'byong /_'ching bu dpes sangs mi rgya/_rgyal ba dang /_'gro ba rig rgyud tha dad 'byung /_bstan pa gsungs pa la dgos ched med/_mya ngan 'das pa'i snang ba 'gag_/'khor ba mthar 'gyur/
[\[364a\]]
[\[364a.1\]]'grel pa med pas don byar mi btub/_gzhi'i chos dri ma can du 'gyur ba'o/_/phyi ma med pa'i the tshom dag skyon gyi dngos po bcu gnyis gzhi'o/_/zhes pa gzhi la 'khrul pa med pa yin na'ang /_lhan cig skyes pa'i ma
[\[364a.2\]]rig pa med pa'i skyon dang /_rang bzhin chad pa'i skyon dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa mthar 'gyur/_'khrul snang 'gag gzhi med pa la 'khor ba snang na/_'khor ba la thog ma 'byung /_rgyud dag pa yang 'khor sgrib pa sbyang mi dgos/_bstan pa
[\[364a.3\]]la dgos ched med/_ye nas gzhi la med pa las snang na/_mu stegs chad pa'i snang bar 'gyur/_snga na med pa'i skyon dang /_gcig la gcig med pa'i skyon dang/_ye nas med pa dang bcu gnyis 'byung do/_/gzhi ni 'khrul snang yod med
[\[364a.4\]]gnyis su med pa'i don dang 'gal/_bka' lung las mi snang ba/_gtan tshigs kyis ma rgyas pa/_de ltar rigs pas mi 'thad pa'o/_/zhor la shes pa'i khyad par bstan pa ni/_mi mkhas mkhas pa'i bsam pa ni/_zhes pa dbye na/_mi mkhas
[\[364a.5\]]shin tu mi mkhas pa/_zhes pa mi mkhas pa'i bsam pa la gnyis te/_gang zhe na shin tu mi mkhas mthar lta ba'o/_/zhes pa mu stegs pa dang skye bo dag go/_/mi mkhas yod med rtsod byed cing/_/dgag dang sgrub pa gang byed pa/_/de de de la chags sdang
[\[364a.6\]]skye/_/zhes pa ltos pa'i mi mkhas pa dag ni/_tshad ma tshul yod la rtsod/_sems tsam pa rnam pa yod med la rtsod/_dbu ma snang ba yod med la rtsod pa byed cing /_rig pa ma yin pa'i shes pa'i yul ched du 'gegs/_rig pa'i
[\[364a.7\]]shes pa'i yul sgrub par byed pa de ni/_sgrub pa'i don la blo chags/_dgag bya la zhe sdang bskyed pas/_blang dor med pa'i don ma mthong ba'i phyir mi mkhas pa'o/_/'o na mkhas pa gang zhe na/_mkhas dang shin tu mkhas pa ni/_zhes pa mkhas pa'i
[\[364b\]]
[\[364b.1\]]bsam pa dbye ba nye bar bstan pa'o/_/mkhas pa phal pa dgag sgrub can/_/sgrub pa'i don la brten par byed/_/ces pa theg pa chen po dbu ma dang sems tsam pa'o/_/de yang gsang sngags la ltos na 'khrul pa'i phyir/_byas pa'i gzung 'dzin dbang
[\[364b.2\]]gyur ba'i/_/ma nor lam dang bral ba yin/_/zhes pa'o/_/ched du dgag sgrub byed pa'i nges pa 'jog pa'i rtog pa skyes pas/_gsang sngags kyi lta ba dang bral ba'o/_/gsang sngags ni/_shin tu mkhas pa thams cad la/_sems phyir dgag dang
[\[364b.3\]]sgrub pa med/_/ces pa gsang sngags pa ni shin tu mkhas pa'i bsam pa ste/_bdag nyid chen po'i gtan tshigs kyis dgag sgrub ched du mi byed pa yang rtogs byad kyi thabs dam pa ste/_zhor la dgag sgrub can gyi lta ba 'gegs pa dang /_dgag
[\[364b.4\]]sgrub med pa'i don sgrub pa yod mod kyang /_dgag sgrub med pa'i phyogs gcig pur khas mi len te/_don ni/_de dang rang rig rang snang phyir/_/dgag sgrub bral la yid mi rton/_/zhes pa dgag sgrub yod med kyi chos thams cad rang rig pa yin
[\[364b.5\]]pas/_dgag sgrub med pa'i don ched du dmigs pa yul du mi byed do/_/dgag sgrub gtan la 'bebs pa'i dus dang /_mnyam pa la bzhag pa'i dus gnyis ka ched du byed pa 'khrul pa'i phyir/_de phyir so sor dgag sgrub can/_/bsgrub pa'i
[\[364b.6\]]phyogs la zhen pa'i phyir/_/de de med pa ga la mthong /_/de bas rang gi brtags mthong yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/lan dgu pa zhar la bstan pa'i phyir/_/de de skas gdang ji lta ba/_khyad par grangs dang dor ba med/_/zhes pa rgyu'i theg pa de snyed
[\[364b.7\]]'bras bu de skas gdang ltar khyad yod pa'i grangs mi 'dor bas/_bdun po'i skyon rgyu'i theg pa la grangs ji ltar brjod pa ltar 'byung gi/_'bras bu'i theg pa la skyon mi 'byung bar smos pa'o/_/dgos ched ni/_cha yod dug la mi btung bzhin/_log lta
[\[365a\]]
[\[365a.1\]]gnyis su ga la 'gyur/_/zhes pa des de bzhin du rang bzhin log pa dang /_ltos pa'i log pa ltar gsang sngags mi 'gro ba'o/_/gnyis pa the tshom bsal ba'i phyir/_gnyis po de ltar de nyid la/_/zhes pa grangs kyi
[\[365a.2\]]gnyis pa de lta bur lhun grub dris pa/_grub pa'i tha snyad ji ltar mtshon/_/zhes pa lhun gyis grub pa phyogs gcig pa'am/_phyogs med pa gang yin dris pa'o/_/ma grub grub na nges tshig med/_/ces pa phyogs med na grub pa'i ngang la rta la
[\[365a.3\]]glang ma grub pa la sogs pa yang grub pas/_grub pa gcig pu'i nges tshig med par 'gyur ro/_/de ma grub na de bzhin no/_/zhes pa ma grub par grags pa'i chos lhun gyis ma grub na'ang /_ma grub pa'i chos ma rdzogs pas nges tshig med do/_/gzhan
[\[365a.4\]]yang ma grub pa phyogs gcig par 'gyur bas yod mthar lta ba dang /_bden pa mthong ba yang 'khor ba dang /_zhen pas 'tshang rgya ba dang /_dge sdig 'bras bu bsnol mar 'gyur ba yang grub dgos pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro/_/de bsal ba'i thabs ni/
[\[365a.5\]]de bas srid dang mi srid kun/_/lhun grub phyogs su grub pa med/_/ces pa lhun grub kyi gtan tshigs kyis dge bas mtho ris su srid pa la sogs pa dang /_dge ba ngan song du mi srid pa kun yod med grub ma grub dbyer med pa la dgos ched kyis
[\[365a.6\]]lhun grub tu brjod kyis/_don grub grub por brjod pa med pas/_lhag pa'i lhun grub la skyon de dag mi 'byung /_bzhi pa'i snga ma skyon drug gnyis/_/zhes pa ye sangs rgyas pa phyogs gcig pa cig rin chen gling dang /_nyi mas mtshon pa sgra ji bzhin du
[\[365a.7\]]brtags na/_mya ngan las 'das pa mthar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas rig rgyud can du 'gyur/_sgrib pa sbyang mi dgos/_rgyal bas don byar med/_sgrub pa'i gang zag med pas lam mi dgos/_bstan pa gsungs pa la dgos ched med/_'khor
[\[365b\]]
[\[365b.1\]]ba'i snang ba 'gag_/gal te na brgyud pa yang 'khor/_'khor ba la thog ma 'gyur/_gzhi la 'khor ba med la blo la yod na blo dang gzhi tha dad pa'i skyon 'ong /_tha mi dad na blo la yod pa bzhin du gzhi la yang yod par 'gyur/_de nyid dang gzhan
[\[365b.2\]]du brjod du med pa yin zhe na/_de nyid ma yin pas gzhi la med kyang /_gzhan du brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis gzhi la yod par 'gyur/_sgrub sngags gnyis pa des ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i phyogs kyang min no/_/de bzhin phyi ma rjes su mthun/_/zhes
[\[365b.3\]]pa gzhi sangs rgyas ma yin par 'khor ba yin zhe na/_skyon grangs phyi ma'ang snga ma'i rjes mthun te/_gzhi 'khor ba'i mthar 'gyur/_gzhi dri ma can du 'gyur/_'gro ba rang rgyud par 'gyur/_don byed pa po med par 'gyur/_mya ngan 'das pa
[\[365b.4\]]'gag_/gal te mya ngan 'das pa la thog ma 'byung /_'khor ba mtha' ma 'byung ste/_mtha' stong par 'gyur/_sgrib pa mi 'byangs par 'gyur/_'khor ba rtags pa'i skyon dang /_'brel pa med pas don byar med pa dang /_bstan pa gsungs
[\[365b.5\]]pa la dgos ched med/_gzhi la 'khor ba yod na/_zhen blo dang khyad mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang bcu gnyis so/_/gnyis med zhe na dus gsum la/_/zhes pa ye sangs rgyas pa yin min gnyis ka ma yin na'ang/_phung po gsum pa dang /_lung du
[\[365b.6\]]ma bstan pa dang /_'gal ba 'dus pa 'byung ngo zhe na/_de gsal ba ni gnyis med dang /_/zhes pa rang rig pa ni sangs rgyas dang sems can dbyer med na'ang /_'di skad du/_bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i/_/ye nas lhun rdzogs
[\[365b.7\]]sangs rgyas chos/_/zhes gsungs pa'i don la/_dpe/_sman nyid phan gnod bdag gnas ltar/_/ces pa sman gcig kyang phan gnod gnyis ka'i ngo bor gnas pa ltar/_ngo bo tha dad 'gyur ba med/_ces pa sems rgyal 'gro gang gi phyogs su
[\[366a\]]
[\[366a.1\]]ma gyur pas/_yin min lung du ma bstan pa'i skyon mi 'byung ngo /_/lnga pa 'khrul gzhi yod med pa'i/_/zhes pa chos nyid ngang la 'khor gzhi yod med gnyis/_gnyis med dang gsum la gsum pa mtshon pa sgo so
[\[366a.2\]]sor bstan kyang /_don la gcig par ma shes pa dag yod pa rang rgyud pa dang /_med pa rnam dag phyogs gcig pa dang /_phyogs kyi gnyis med la 'khrul par smra na/_skyon ni gsum pa ji ltar grangs/_shes pa 'khrul snang yod med skabs su
[\[366a.3\]]bshad pa dang mthun par bgrang ngo /_/de bsal ba ni/_mig yor gsum la dngos med 'dra'i/_/chos yod bzhin pas shes pa 'khrul tu btub pa'i dpe ni/_tho yor dang som mo dang thag pa la/_yang dag pa'i rta sprul gyi sha khrag med kyang /
[\[366a.4\]]mi rta sbrul dang 'dra ba'i chos yod pas 'khrul du btub pa'i rkyen bzhis btub pa bzhin/_rang sems la/_de dngos med kyang rgyu rkyen drug_/rang bzhin lhun grub dpag bsam bzhin/_/so sor snang ba zhes pa/_sems la 'khor ba rang rgyud
[\[366a.5\]]med kyang me long gi g.ya' bzhin 'khor ba'i rgyu gnyis rkyen bzhis gnas pas snang du btub la/_dpag bsam shing la bsod nams che chung gis so sor snang ba ltar/_dag dang ma dag pa'i spyod yul du snang ngo /_/gzhi ma rig pa yang dag par rang
[\[366a.6\]]snang ba dang /_lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig mtshungs par yod pa dang /_yod med dbyer med pas 'khrul gzhi med do yod do gnyis su med do zhes pa bstan pa don gcig go/_/dus gsum du/_rgyun du/_'khrul pa lhun grub pas/_shes pa
[\[366a.7\]]dus dang 'khrul gzhi'o/_/'gro 'ong 'byung 'jug med snang ba/_/gzhi yod med dang dbyer med mtshungs/_/zhes pa chu rlabs kyi tshul du 'gro 'ong med par 'khor bar snang ba'i gzhi yod med dbyer med du gcig pa la skyon med de/_drug pa de
[\[366b\]]
[\[366b.1\]]ltar de bden na/_de la skyon du bya ba bdun/_/zhes pa gong du 'khrul tshul bstan pa ltar bden te/_yid med phyogs can las 'khrul tu btub na/_tho yor la rta ru 'khrul/_sam mo la mir 'khrul/_thag pa la rtar 'khrul par rigs/_mi
[\[366b.2\]]srid pa'i chos gzhi 'byung bar rigs te dpe skyon bdun no/_/de bas 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin 'khrul pa nyid du rtog na'ang /_'khor ba gzhi la grub nas/_'khrul pa'i rgyu rkyen gnyis la rag mi lus pa'i skyon gnyis/_'khrul pa mi sangs pa'i
[\[366b.3\]]skyon/_gang zag dgos pa rtsan du 'khor ba la mtha' mi 'ong /_bden pa mthong du mi btub chos nyid du ma 'dus shing ma khyab pa'i skyon 'byung ngo /_/de bsal ba'i thabs/_thams cad 'ching grol dbyer med la/_/zhes pa gzhi la 'khrul ma
[\[366b.4\]]'khrul yod med kyi sgro skur med pa'o/_/gnyis mthong 'khrul par blta ba'o/_/'khrul zhes pa rang bzhin ma nyams par blta ba'o/_/'khrul pa'o/_/de bas blang dang dor ma byed/_/bde sdug gnas su ris ma blta/_/zhes pa don gnyis mod la
[\[366b.5\]]lta spyod kyi gdams ngag dag go/_/bdun pa rang rig can yin na/_/de la skyon bcu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes pa rang byung ye shes lta ba'i ngo bo yin na/_/rang byung ye shes gcig pas gcig gis rtogs na kun gyi skyon 'byung /_skye mi 'byung /
[\[366b.6\]]rgyal ba dang 'gro ba khyad par med par 'gyur/_lam chad/_da lta nyid nas thams cad mkhyen par thal/_gzhir thal/_sgom mi dgos/_tshig dang yi ge la la dgos pa med/_gtan la dbab mi dgos/_mngon shes ma bsgom par 'char
[\[366b.7\]]bar 'gyur ba dang bcu'o/_/de bsal ba/_de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes 'di/_/mi lnga bdag po kun gyi sems/_/zhes pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_mi gnas pa dang /_rang byung dang /_lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i ye shes dang lnga'o/_/ngo
[\[367a\]]
[\[367a.1\]]bo 'gro ba kun gyis sems so/_/rang spyi ji snyed ji lta ba/_/rang yul med par nges gsal ba/_/zhes pa lta ba'i don no/_/dpe ni/_nam mkha'i sprin mthongs 'od bzhin du/_/zhes pa sprin gang dag pa na/_nyi
[\[367a.2\]]ma'i 'od dang nam mkha' gsal ba ltar/_rab rib gang dag shes rab snang/_/zhes pa log rtog tha dad pa'i bsam rgyud gang dag pa la rim par rang byung ye shes snang bas/_stobs rdzogs ma rdzogs kyi skyon med do/_/brgyad pa nges mthong
[\[367a.3\]]sgrib pa'i grangs/_brgyad pa bsnyad pa yan lag bcas/_/zhes pa don mthong ba la sgrib pa'i the tshom ste/_de'i rtsa ba bdun la skyon gyi grangs brjod zin pa de bsdu na/_phyag rgya bzhi pa'i gzhir gyur pa/_/nges par ngos zin bya bar bsnyad/_/
[\[367a.4\]]ces pa 'di skad du/_bka'/_don/_gtan tshigs/_rigs pa gzhi/_snang dang /_mi 'gal/_rgyas/_'thad sbyar zhes pas don ngos gzung ngo /_/la bzla ba ni/_ma rig pa nyid ye shes gsal/_/the tshom nyid kyang nges pa'i spyan/_/
[\[367a.5\]]log rtog nyid kyang ma nor lam/_/de la mi mthun shes dang bral/_/zhes pa gsum po rim pa rang snang phyir/_de dag gnyis su med par bstan pa la 'gal ba 'dus par brtag tu med pa'o/_/dgu pa 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/
[\[367a.6\]]theg pa'i lta ba gral bgod pa/_/skas gdang lta bur bstan pa dag go/_/kun dang bdag dang bral ba'i phyir/_/'jig rten shes 'phags ci smos te/_/zhes pa nyan thos yan chad kun 'jig rten pa'i bdag nyid med par 'phags mod
[\[367a.7\]]kyang/_de dag nyid ni dgag dang sgrub zhes pa/_theg pa che chung nad pa gol ba man chod la yod pas khyad par ni/_rim pa yod med khyad par dang /_/ltos pas phye ba'i khyad par ni/_/zhes pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i theg pa rnams lta ba
[\[367b\]]
[\[367b.1\]]rnams lta ba gtan la 'bebs pa'i tshe/_'di skad du/_bdag spang bdag med bsgrub pa dang /_/gzugs spang phyi stong bsgrub pa dang /_/don 'gog sems tsam bsgrub pa dang /_/mtha' spong mtha' bral bsgrub pa dang /_/dri spong dag pa bsgrub pa
[\[367b.2\]]dang/_/mtshan 'gag mtshan med bsgrub pa dang /_/blang dor 'gag med bsgrub pa dang /_/rtsol spong rtsol bral bsgrub pa dang /_/de dag kun kyang yod med phyir/_dgag bsgrub rang gis mi byed pa'o/_/rim par phye ba'i khyad par ston/_/mthong
[\[367b.3\]]ba dag dang ma dag pa'i/_/rim pas don gcig khyad par snang /_/zhes pa lta ba ma dag pa'i byis pa gnyis so/_/ltos pa'i ma dag pa'i rjes su rnal 'byor man chad do/_/'o na dag pa chen po gang zhe na/_mthong ba dag pa kun mthong ba 'di/_zhes
[\[367b.4\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lta ba'o/_/de yang 'di skad du/_sna tshogs theg pa'i lta ba dang /_/ji snyed bsdom pa'i lta ba rnams/_/spyad par bya ba ma yin yang /_/ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par gsal/_/zhes 'byung bas/_ngo bo rang byung thams cad
[\[367b.5\]]mkhyen pa dang /_/rang bzhin lta ba thams cad dang /_/mtshan nyid lta ba gang dang yang ma 'dres pa dang /_rtsal lta ba'i sgrib pa kun bcom pa dang /_byin rlabs lta ba kun 'byung ba dang /_yon tan lhag pa'i lha dang /_sangs rgyas thob pas go 'phang bla na med
[\[367b.6\]]pa'o/_/bsngo ba tshogs kyi lung ni/_kun shes bzhin 'dra rab rib dri ma nyid/_/ces pa 'gro ba kun gyi shes rab kyis rang gi bzhin rang gis ma mthong ba ltar/_ma rig pas sgrib pa ni/_bstan pa'i me long mthong bsgom rang dag par/_/'gyur bas ma 'ongs
[\[367b.7\]]don can ched bgyid pa'i/_/dge rtsas bdag dang mtha' yas grol bar bsngo/_/zhes pa bzhin la me long bstan pas dri ma mthong nas 'dag par byas pa bzhin/_'phrul gyi tshig dgus bstan pa'i tshig gi sgron mas/_lta ba rtogs pa la bsgoms pas sgrib pa
[\[368a\]]
[\[368a.1\]]'dag par 'gyur bas/_ma 'ongs pa bdag bas blo dman pa'i don du/_'phrul gyi me long brtsams pa'i dgos kyi sbyin pa'i dge rtsas/_mtha' yas pa theg pa chen po'i chen por grol bar dmigs pa'o/_/'phrul gyi me long dgu
[\[368a.2\]]skor la/_rig pa'i me tog gis 'grel pa'o/_/slob dpon chen po bi mA las mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//[{D4446}]@/_/thugs kyi sgron ma bzhugs/_/@##/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i
[\[368a.3\]]bdag_/chos kun rdzogs pa'i thugs rdo rje/_/sems dpa' che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dz+nyana'i yin bar bzheng /_phyag phyag 'tshal lo//_spyan mchog dbul ba'i shi sha'i phyir/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dag las/_/'khor lo dag mchu'i tshul bzhin du/_/sgyu 'phrul thugs kyi sgrol
[\[368a.4\]]ma de/_/'dzin pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal bas/_/g.yo 'dzin gsum dang mi g.yo ba'i/_/'dzin dgu log lta de bzhin pa'i/_/rnam gnyis spang phyir gnyen por brjod/_/bsam mi khyab dang de bsdus pa/_/brgyad khri bzhi stong da lta bas/_/gnyis bsdus
[\[368a.5\]]nges bzhi 'bras bur gcig_/thun mong mchog gi lam lnga po/_/'dod pa'i yul la zhen pa dang /_/bsam gtan snyoms 'jug 'du shes med/_/rtag tshad bcu gsum zhen pa rnams/_/ring du gtong la mi mthun pa'i/_/spyod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig la'ang /_/dang
[\[368a.6\]]po phyed spong gcig gtang snyoms/_/byed pa'i zhen pas gzhi byed dang /_/'phra zab dngos lta'i zhen pa dang /_/phyogs stong de bzhin phyogs 'dzin pa'i/_/rgyud 'dzin zhen pa bden pa gnyis/_/rigs 'byed zhen pa'i stong pa can/_/'jig rten ngan song
[\[368a.7\]]khams su rtse/_/zhi ba phyogs las nges 'byung dang /_/rgyu 'bras rten 'brel 'byung ba'ang /_/phyi pa dag lha gnyis rjes 'brang /_/mtshan med 'od gsal nges zhen pa'i/_/spong len nges 'dzin bdag 'dzin gzhi/_/theg mchog lam gyi stegs gyur
[\[368b\]]
[\[368b.1\]]kyang|_/rang rang nges pas bsgribs pa min/_/mchog gi gzhung lugs gdeng ma gyur/_/de bas rnal 'byor chen po'i lugs/_/bcu gnyis gcig gi zhen pa dag_/mi spong gnyis med blang ba med/_/thabs kyi rang bzhin bral mngon byed/_/de bzhin
[\[368b.2\]]pa yi lugs mchog 'di/_/rgyud dang rnal 'byor gsum rim pa/_/de las kun nas spags pa'i don/_/yang rab rnal 'byor blo la gsal/_/de gang zhe na gdod bsams pas/_/dug lnga dngos dang yul shes bcas/_/sems phyir cho 'phrul snang
[\[368b.3\]]ba la/_/gsum snang zhen pa'i yul med par/_/rgyud drug shes pa rkyen bcas kyis/_/yul med mi dmigs phyir mi mthong /_/mthong shes dbang bcas rang ma mthong /_/de bzhin pa yis lnga nyon mongs/_/rjes 'brangs stobs gyur 'gro lngar smin/_/
[\[368b.4\]]mi mthun bde sdug myong gyur bzhin/_/lam bral dus dgras bcom pa dang /_/thar med yang dag lam ston dgos/_/de phyir mi gtsang rus spyod dang /_/sab rta thag sprul mtho mi ltar/_/mi bden shes snang phyir rdzun pa'ang /_/mi spong mod kyang
[\[368b.5\]]bden pa med/_/rang byung ye shes mtha' dbus med/_/mi g.yo rang gsal 'dzin bral la/_/tshad med bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi/_/rim par so sor bdag rtog cing /_/gzugs rnams kun la bdag rtog pas/_/gsang ba'i bden gsum
[\[368b.6\]]mnyam ma mthong /_/thams cad mkhyen ldan 'bral ba yis/_/'du shes med lta sho bar ba/_/mnyam pa gsum la mdongs pa yis/_/mi g.yo snyoms 'jug bzhi 'dzin can/_/thal 'gyur ting 'dzin lus zhig na/_/ya nga'i 'bras bu ltung yong
[\[368b.7\]]phyir/_/dran pa nyams pa'i ting 'dzin te/_/yid brtan bya ba'i yul ma yin/_/rang bzhin 'das dang 'khor ba dag_/gnyis med lhun grub brjod bsam yul/_/'das dang sngon bzhin ma mthong bas/_/'khrul yul gzhir mthong ltar blo 'khrul/_/g.yang
[\[369a\]]
[\[369a.1\]]sa mtho dman lam zhugs pas/_/zad par bde sdug myong bar 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i 'bras bu ga la yin/_/de phyir gsum la khyad par med/_/drug gnyis ston pa'i rjes 'brangs pa'i/_/rigs min lta ba bsam yas pa/_/
[\[369a.2\]]gnyis bsdus rtag dang chad pa dngos/_/log lta'i gtso bo ya nga'i rgyu/_/lnga pa ril po 'byed lta ba'ang /_/snga ma dran pa'i byed lta ba'i/_/rigs bzhi nges 'dod rang blo log_/de la kha dog dbyibs yod na/_/gzugs su thal bas mang nyung gis/_/'gal
[\[369a.3\]]dang dran pa skye mi 'gyur/_/rnam smin myong ba ga la rung /_/'on te gzugs kyis shes myong thal/_/des na ril po rdzun par nges/_/byed pos byas pa'ang de bzhin te/_/de kho gal te bden zhe na/_/byed por grub pa su yis byas/_/byed po rdul las 'grub
[\[369a.4\]]'gyur ram/_/'on te las kyis byed 'byung zhe 'am/_/byed po nyid la byed yod dam/_/rang bzhin nyid kyis 'byung bar 'gyur/_/byed po stes dbang tsam du zad/_/byed la byed yod thugs med skyon/_/rdul na byas 'dra rag lus med/_/las yin kho bo'i 'dod
[\[369a.5\]]pa med/_/rang bzhin stes dbang byas pa'ang thal/_/tsha rims a bras chod pa'i mig_/'bag sogs snang ltar ga la bden/_/cis shos nya shing btsos bsregs pas/_/mi skye brlag 'gyur rigs pa yin/_/snga phyi med par bden lta ba'ang /_/mi bden
[\[369a.6\]]da lta sha 'brug ltar/_/stes dbang snang du btub zhe na/_/snga phyi 'ang stes dbang cis mi 'byung /_/de mi 'byung na da lta'ang /_/mi 'byung de min smos ci dgos/_/da ltar de na bdag dang gzhan/_/stes dbang snang ba dus gsum du/_/rgyun brtags med pa zhes
[\[369a.7\]]pa 'gyur/_/gzugs la rung yang ming bzhis so/_/de ltar bden na rmi lam gyi/_/shes pa'ang nya shing mtshungs brlag 'gyur/_/rmi lam btags ldang zhing rgyun brtag na/_/gzugs phung zhig kyang de 'dra mod/_/'on te da lta yod pa bzhin/_/snga phyi yod
[\[369b\]]
[\[369b.1\]]pa smos ci dgos/_/rtag chad gnyis kar blo zhen na/_/don gyi snying po mchog las gol/_/rang rig snang stong yul min par/_/rig pa rang gsal bsam brjod 'das/_/de phyir gnyis dang der mi 'dzin/_/de la blang dor phyogs 'dzin med/_/de dag
[\[369b.2\]]so so zhen yul bcas/_/blos bzhag med a yod brtags pa/_/spong byed chad du byas spong ba'ang /_/lnga yi bye brag mi mthun pa/_/mos pa tha dad phyir gsungs pa/_/bye brag mdo tsam bshad par bya/_/theg pa dang po bcu drug 'gran/_/gnyis pa bzhi
[\[369b.3\]]yi lta spyod bsrungs/_/gsum pa bcu gnyis nges par bstan/_/bzhi pa bden pa rnam pa gnyis/_/lnga pa gsang ba 'ang phyi pa'ang /_/dang po rang rig rnam par dag_/gnyis pa snga phyi rjes su 'brangs/_/gsum pa dbyings nyid 'od gsal ba'i/_/sa bdun
[\[369b.4\]]rim par bkod pa yang /_/gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam/_/theg pa bzhis yis nges 'byung la/_/theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas/_/tha ma'ang bsti gnas mthar thug ste/_/tha ma'ang gtso mchog 'dir bshad do/_/de la spong thabs mi mthun
[\[369b.5\]]pa/_/'dod dang 'gog spang sbyong sol byed/_/'bras shes btang snyoms dag byed dang /_/phyogs spyod dang len da ro la/_/bdag phyir blang dor med pa yis/_/che bas skas gdang lta bur 'gyur/_/brgyad gnyis bcu spyod theg sogs pa/_/thun mongs
[\[369b.6\]]lam brjod rnam dgu/_/srid pa dang po dngos lta ba/_/rnal 'byor g.yeng drug gis bral yang /_/rgyu 'bras shes pas ya nga spong /_/bsti gnas dang po smin par 'dod/_/log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de/_/gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med/_/bsam gtan
[\[369b.7\]]snyoms 'jug pa brgyad po/_/'dod spyod sdig sogs spyod pas 'dor/_/dang po'i g.yeng drug bsam pas 'dor/_/'dzin pa phra bas ting nge 'dzin/_/dor ba gnyis mthun dor ba yis/_/sa stegs rtsa gcig thob byed pa'o/_/log lta bzhi po gnyis
[\[370a\]]
[\[370a.1\]]mthong bas/_/log pa'i lam zhugs ya nga'i 'bras/_/lam rim dang po dngos 'dzin gzhi/_/'khor ba'i lam bzhi zag bcas 'bras/_/de dag mchog gi gsum la rmongs/_/de phyir ma rtogs log rtogs pa'o/_/spang
[\[370a.2\]]bgegs byed pa'i byis pa gnyis/_/tshul khrims bslab pas dngas 'gog cing /_/mthong goms shes rab ting 'dzin gyis/_/spong bgegs med smra ting 'dzin lta/_/zab phra'i gzung 'dzin bya ba bar/_/brtag dngos zhags pas bcings pa yi/_/
[\[370a.3\]]log par rtog pa tsam nyid las/_/phra zhing zab pa'ang yod min te/_/lhag par drug gnyis phyi stong 'dod/_/phyogs stong zhen pas bsgribs pa ste/_/rmi lam rten 'brel gzhi snang bas/_/mi bden rang byung ye shes skal/_/bshed med theg
[\[370a.4\]]pa'i gzhung gnyis pos/_/rdul dang rten 'brel bzhir 'dod pas/_/phyogs gcig 'das mtha' lam zhugs pas/_/bsti gnas dang po 'bras bu tsam/_/bla na med pa'i theg pa pa/_/bslab pa gsum gyis spang bya dag_/sol sbyong dag pas thob
[\[370a.5\]]'dod pa/_/rnam rig rnal 'byor mdo sde'o/_/dang po rang byung ye shes don/_/mi dmigs phyir na rang sems la/_/rnam pa yod med rtsod pa byed/_/gang ltar rtsod kyang 'khrul pa'i mtha'o/_/'khrul snang yul gyi rnam pa can/_/rang bzhin 'khrul
[\[370a.6\]]mthong yod ma myong /_/rnam pa med pa'i rang rig pa/_/'od gsal shel ltar dag pa 'ang /_/rgyu rtag skad cig mi rtag pas/_/skye 'gag med pa'i ye shes la/_/nam yang reg par mi 'gyur te/_/rnam par 'gog par thug pa'i mtha'o/_/rnam dag
[\[370a.7\]]ye shes rnam bral ba/_/sems can rgyud re de yin te/_/rgyud 'dzin yul med gzung 'dzin can/_/g.yo med rtsod pa 'khrul par zad/_/byis pa mkha' la rtsod dang mtshungs/_/rnam pa yod med kun bdag skal/_/shes rgyud bzhi la rtsol ba'i lam/
[\[370b\]]
[\[370b.1\]]de dang thun mong sangs rgyas de'i 'bras bur/_/byed kyi lhag pa'i gsum ma mthong /_/dam pa'i shes pa'ang brdzun pa'o/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa'ang de 'dra'i phyir/_/snga ma'i dam pa rgyu rkyen la/_/rang lus zhig dang skyes dang skyes/_/de bas brdzun lta dam par ni/_/
[\[370b.2\]]thams cad sems te de ma dmigs/_/ma skyes stong pa smra bsam 'das/_/mtha' la dben pa'i don du lta/_/rnam pa yod med rtsod dang bral/_/shes pa ma skyes phyogs lta ba/_/mtha' dang bral ba thug pa'i mtha'/_/skye med phyogs gcig mtha' dang bral/_/
[\[370b.3\]]de kho mchog lta'i zhen pa can/_/gnyis med dbyer med ma mthong bas/_/sems stong bzhi pa dka' spyod lam/_/'bras bu sngon bzhin 'das pa'i mtha'/_/grub mtha' nor rtog shes rab kyis/_/'bad pas brtan thob de yi phyir/_/de mi bden pas
[\[370b.4\]]de mi bden/_/mdo sde pa yi gzhung lugs kyang /_/kun brtags snang ba'i spyod yul 'di/_/dam pa gzhan dbang sgyu ma tsam/_/shes snang ma yin 'du snang yin/_/dam par skye med smra bsam 'das/_/rten 'brel gcig dang du ma med/_/rdo rje gzigs ma rnam
[\[370b.5\]]bzhi dang /_/mu bzhi skye 'gag la sogs pas/_/mtha' yas bye brag sel byed cing /_/de 'dra bsam gtan 'das chen cing /_/snang ba yod dang med pa dang /_/rig pas 'grub dang ma grub sogs/_/de dag la rtsod mtha' tshol ba/_/snyed nas nges 'jog
[\[370b.6\]]gzung 'dzin can/_/bden gnyis ngo bo gcig mi gcig_/rtsod cing gcig la bden dang rdzun/_/rigs lta cha shas zhen pa can/_/gcig na rdzun mthong bden thal 'gyur/_/yang na bden mthong brdzun par 'gyur/_/brdzun zhen bden par bslu sogs
[\[370b.7\]]ldar/_/thal 'gyur bden bzhin brdzun pa'ang /_/skye 'gag med sogs bzhin thal 'gyur/_/yang na mnyam gzhag tshe na'ang /_/bden gnyis dus gcig mthong bar rigs/_/bden brdzun phan tshun spangs pas 'gal/_/tha dad gyur na sgyu ma la/
[\[371a\]]
[\[371a.1\]]brten nas don dam mi rtogs shing /_/sgyu mar 'bad pas 'ang tshi tshad 'gyur/_/dam pa btsal ba'i gnas med cing /_/'grel ba med pas mi 'gyur/_/gang ma skyes ba'ang /_/skye ba med par 'grub mi 'gyur/_/zhen spong gnyen po
[\[371a.2\]]mi btub cing /_/de nyid rang rgyud can gyur pas/_/gang la phan gnod med 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rtog cing the tshom za/_/khas blangs med sgra phyogs la zhen/_/de bas bla med theg pa pa/_/don dam du ni dbyer med de/_/kun rdzob tsam du thams cad la/_/dag
[\[371a.3\]]dang ma dag gnyis kar 'dzin/_/thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni/_/don dam du ni kor bdun no/_/kun rdzob tu ni mnyam rdzogs so/_/rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag_/kun rdzob tu'ang dbye rigs te/_/lta ba mtho dman de tsam mo/_/de nyid 'bras bu'i
[\[371a.4\]]mtshan nyid la/_/don dam ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu/_/lhag pa'i bden par mtshan brjod do/_/cir yang snang ba'i ye shes nyid/_/mtshan mar ma 'gag cir yang snang /_/ngo bo ma nges don mdzad dang /_/rtag pa gnyis las ring ba dang /_/rnal 'byor dam
[\[371a.5\]]pa'i yul mthun dang /_/snang la skye 'gag med pa'i phyir/_/lhag pa'i kun rdzob zhes su grags/_/thams cad kun gyi rang bzhin pas/_/ye shes snang ba'ang rgyu rkyen med/_/skye 'jig med do lnga 'bras bu/_/dbyings dang ye shes rdzogs mi
[\[371a.6\]]dmigs/_/phyogs med re skong 'phrin las ni/_/kun nas mtshams pas don mdzad de/_/ched du byas pa'i rtag pa'ang bral/_/rang bzhin mtshan nyid ngo bo dang /_/yon tan 'phrin las rtogs pas dben/_/chos drug ldan phyir lhag par bsgrags/_/de
[\[371a.7\]]bzhin rang bzhin 'bras bu dang /_/ye shes gsum phyir don dam pa'ang /_/shes don nang nas mchog gyur pas/_/don gyi ming du 'grub pa yin/_/de'ang ma skyes dbyings kyi don/_/gzhi yis nges la khyad gyur pa/_/log rtog spyod yul las sogs
[\[371b\]]
[\[371b.1\]]pa|_/kun gyi rang bzhin phyogs bkol med/_/ngo bo bdun rdzogs dmigs pa med/_/mtshan nyid kun grol kun bdag la/_/phyogs stong chad par yod pa med/_/kun byin ldan pa'i brlabs snang la/_dngos po gnyis kyi ngo bo'i rgyur/_/gyur pas
[\[371b.2\]]ci yang mi 'gog ste/_/rgya mtsho'i chu dang rlabs bzhin no/_/yid bzhin nor ltar re skong ba'o/_/yon tan kun rdzogs phyir snang ba'o/_/thun mong dam pa'i yul min te/_/phyogs gcig mtha' bral ma yin te/_/dpe dang gtan tshigs thun mong bas/_/gtan
[\[371b.3\]]la 'bebs pa ma yin te/_/bdun sogs ngo bor gnas pa'i phyir/_/lhag pa'ang grangs mthun nyid du brjod/_/rnal sogs spyod yul ma yin no/_/gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni/_/pho mo ma yin ma ning min/_/mtshan med ma yin rig rgyud med/_/kha
[\[371b.4\]]dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin/_/gnas su ma yin gang yang med/_/de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te/_/thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu/_/phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad la/_/rang byung chen pos kun tu khyab/_/rang byung de nyid dngos med pas/_/chos dang gang
[\[371b.5\]]zag bdag med pa/_/kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin no/_/ma skyes bzhi la bgrod pa'i lam/_/gang spangs gang thob de'i 'bras bu/_/dngos po ji bzhin mi mthong bas/_/'bras bu btags pa'i sangs rgyas tsam/_/de ltar nges 'byung bye brag gi/_/rgyud
[\[371b.6\]]mas nges pa'i gsang ba'ang /_/dang po rgyu 'bras dbye byed pas/_/'bras bu lam du byed ce'ang /_/phyogs gcig dag pa'i chos nyid la/_/lta zhing de las lha drug sogs/_/dmigs pa gsum dang yan lag gis/_/sgom byed 'bras bu gzung 'dzin
[\[371b.7\]]can/_/lta spyod ya cha'i zhen pa yis/_/bdag nyid chen po nang mi mthong /_/dag pa'i sems zhi rtsol ba'i lam/_/rdo rje gsum gyi sa 'dzin pa/_/rmus long 'dri mkhan dang mtshungs te/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i thugs rje'i yul/_/gnyi ga ba yi bya ba
[\[372a\]]
[\[372a.1\]]dang /_/rnal 'byor rjes su lta spyod 'brang /_/gnyis po ya cha sngon bzhin te/_/de nyid bzhi yi zhen pa can/_/de'ang phyi rol pa la gnas/_/rnal 'byor ting 'dzin zhen pa can/_/dam par rang rig 'od gsal ba/_/
[\[372a.2\]]dbyings nyid rnam dag ye shes la/_/kun rdzob byin rlabs dkyil 'khor dag_/ye shes snang smra de la dmigs/_/de phyir lta dgongs phyi rol 'gyur/_/de rtogs khas len gtsang smrar len/_/chu yi ral gri phyis pa bzhin/_/spyod par mi phod
[\[372a.3\]]'dzin pa can/_/de nyid sgo nas phyi rol spyod/_/shin tu nang don ma gtogs pas/_/phyi rol cha yis bcings pa yin/_/'od gsal bzhi las mtshan mar g.yo/_/snang stong res slob lam lnga yis/_/thob pa dam pa'ang bsti ba'i gnas/_/phyi
[\[372a.4\]]rol gnyis sogs 'bras bu'i phyir/_/mching bu rin chen ji lta bar/_/lam 'bras ma 'brel 'khrul par zad/_/gtso mchog bshad par khas blangs pa/_/rgyas par gdams kyi gdeng du bgyis/_/rnal 'byor chen po lta ba'i don/_/yod
[\[372a.5\]]las btsal na sgros btags te/_/med las btsal na skur btab 'gyur/_/yod med gnyis las btsal byas na/_/de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur/_/de la gzhan yang 'brel med pas/_/nam yang rnyed par mi 'gyur te/_/mtha' la rtsod
[\[372a.6\]]kun de lta bas/_/gsum bral phyogs gcig mtha' bral ba/_/rang blo 'khrul pa snang ba yin/_/de bas mthar thug ltos yod pa/_/kun kyang mtha' yis bral ba'ang mtha'/_/yin phyir nges pa'i blo mi bzhag_/gnyis med smras bsam bral ba ltos/_/
[\[372a.7\]]tshig dang sgra mthun tha dad pa/_/lta spyod log par drangs thabs su/_/gsung phyir rdo rje theg chen po/_/sgra gcig don gyi khyad par rtogs/_/dang po chos kun gnas bubs nyid/_/dang por mtshan cing dngos bzlog dang /_/gnyis par yang dag
[\[372b\]]
[\[372b.1\]]bden bral don/_/mtshon phyir ma skyes de bzhin nyid/_/stong pa nyid dang snang ba med/_/gnyis su med dang mnyam pa nyid/_/ci'ang min dang smra bsam 'das/_/mi gnas mi dmigs mi rtog dang /_/mtha' bral rnam par dag pa dang /_/
[\[372b.2\]]mtshan med smon pa med pa dang /_/chos nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid dang /_/spros bral 'gro 'ong med pa dang /_/snang dang 'gag med thob pa med/_/grol dang thar dang thob pa dang /_/kun rdzob don dam bden pa dang /_/ma chags pa dang rang bzhin dang /_/
[\[372b.3\]]dngos med zhen med rig pa dang /_/bdag med gzhan med spyod yul med/_/lta ba rig pa ye shes sogs/_/mtshon pa'i sgra grag chos rnams kyi/_/rang rang don rnams tha dad pa/_/khyad par ma 'dres gsal bya'i phyir/_/rig pas mdo
[\[372b.4\]]tsam phyogs brjod pa/_/dang po rgyun gyis log rtog chos/_/bkag bsal phyogs gcig ma skyes dang /_/dri mar ma skyes mtshan mar min/_/ched du byas pa ma skyes rnams/_/skyes spong ma skyes 'dod pa yis/_/srin bu bal bzhin bcings
[\[372b.5\]]par zad/_/ji snyed tha dad chos rnams kun/_/gnyis med blang dor med pa yis/_/ltag pa ma go don mchog ni/_/skyes pa nyid na skye ba med/_/dbyings phyogs ma skyes de bzhin nyid/_/rig pa nyid dang yod ye shes 'dod/_/blang dor med pa'i de
[\[372b.6\]]bzhin nyid/_/gnyis med ma byas ma bcos pa/_/smra bsam 'das pa'i gtso mtsho skyes/_/de bzhin stong nyid zhen pa'ang /_/phyogs stong gsal stong la sogs las/_/rnam pa'i mchog ldan stong chen po/_/yod pa nyid ni stong pa nyid/_/yod dang
[\[372b.7\]]med dbus smra bsam 'das/_/ngo bo rang bzhin mtshan nyid dang /_/byin rlabs la sogs khyad par 'phags/_/snang ba med ces brjod pa yang /_/ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs/_/snang la med lta bus pa med/_/phyogs gcig snang med phyogs ris med/_/brdzun pa
[\[373a\]]
[\[373a.1\]]gsal ba snang med dang /_/snang ba dri ma med pa dang /_/mtshan snang med pa la sogs pa/_/ched byas snang rtags kun par zad/_/sna tshogs snang ba dang bcas pa'i/_/snang ba med pa'i mchog 'di ni/_/snang ba yang med dbyer med
[\[373a.2\]]pas/_/'di ltar snang zhes bsam du med/_/gnyis su med par bstan pa yang /_/phyogs stong gnyis med yul sems med/_/phyogs gcig bral ba'i gnyis med pa/_/de kun gnyis pa'i gtso mchog go/_/don dam 'dod pa yod phyir ro/_/rgyu 'bras
[\[373a.3\]]gnyis su med pa yang /_/bya ba rnal 'byor don dam par/_/gnyis med dang du len pa'ang /_/res 'jog ltos pa'i phyogs gcig pa'o/_/gnyis par grags pa'i chos so cog_/ldan bzhin gnyis su med pa yis/_/lhun grub blang dor med pa dang /_/gzugs
[\[373a.4\]]brnyan nor bus mtshon pa'o/_/tshe phyir mnyam nyid gsungs pa dang /_/'dra ba'i mnyam pa mi mnyam chos/_/mi mnyam bral ba'i phyogs mnyam ni/_/mnyam pa'i mtha' la gnas pas log_/gsang chen mnyam pa chen po ni/_/mi mnyam chos kun bdag nyid la/_/
[\[373a.5\]]mnyam dang mi mnyam cha shas med/_/mnyam pa kun gyi yang rtse yin/_/gzhan sel don du gnyer ba'i phyir/_/ci 'ang min par bka' stsal pa'ang /_/rig pas ma yin shes pa la/_/yin par snang la skyon lta bar/_/mtha' sel phyogs gcig ma yin dang /_/dmigs
[\[373a.6\]]pa ma yin kun kyang mtha'/_/blang dor med sogs mi gsum ldan/_/ci'ang min zhes brjod pa'ang /_/ci'ang yin pa'i dngos gzhi can/_/yin min dbyer med cha shas bral/_/phyogs su thug pa 'di la med/_/rma bya'i mdongs rtse kha dog 'dra/_/dgos ched sngon
[\[373a.7\]]bzhin smra bsam 'das/_/bden pa phyogs gcig de bzhin pa/_/mkhur bar chu blugs bzhin 'dod la/_/phyogs chos smra bsam yul las 'das/_/rtog ge'i yul du nga smra'o/_/mi gsum ldan pa'i don mchog ni/_/smra bsam kun dngos smra bsam dka'/
[\[373b\]]
[\[373b.1\]]blo dan yul du ma gyur las/_/nam mkha' 'di zhes dka' dang 'dra/_/log rtog phyogs rigs rnal 'byor dang /_/phyogs gsal mi gnas rten pa can/_/phyi pa'ang 'dzin pa'i gzhi can/_/gnas pa'i gtso bor bdag gis brjod/_/blang med dor med mi gnas
[\[373b.2\]]pa/_/bsgom bya sems phyir rten bral ba/_/gnas dang mi gnas spong len med/_/ci la'ang yid rten mi 'cha' bas/_/mi gnas nyid la gnas mi byed/_/rten dang rten can med pa ni/_/mi gnas chen po mchog yin te/_/nam mkha' lta bu rten dang bral/_/gang
[\[373b.3\]]gi mi dmigs shes brjod pa'ang /_/log dang 'jig rten ting 'dzin dang /_/'gog gnyis phyogs gcig la gnas dang /_/dbu ma ba dag mi dmigs gsum/_/'dod las gsel ba'i dmigs pa can/_/phyogs gcig rten med dmigs pa'o/_/dmigs
[\[373b.4\]]pa kun bdag mi dmigs la/_/mtshon chen can du de brjod kyang /_/mi dmigs 'dod pa'i chags pa med/_/dmigs spo zhe sdang phrag dog med/_/gnyis su med par mi dmigs la/_/mkha' la 'di zhes dmigs bral 'dra'o/_/rnam par mi rtog brjod pa'ang /_/
[\[373b.5\]]'jig rten zhen pa'i rnam mi rtog_/log par sgom pa mi rtog dang /_/byis pa dgag sgrub mi rtog gnyis/_/phyogs 'dzin gsal ba mi rtog pa/_/rnam dag gsal ba mi rtog rnams/_/bzhi la rtog pa med smra zhing /_/mi rtog mi mthun bgegs lta bas/_/dgag
[\[373b.6\]]sgrub blang dor byed pa de/_/nges mchog bzhi yi rtog pa can/_/thabs chen rnam par mi rtog pa/_/rtogs tshogs ming tsam ye shes phyir/_/rtog pa nyid nas ma skyes pas/_/skyes brda'i 'du shes dbye ba med/_/dgag dang sgrub med mi rtog pa/_/mi rtog nyid
[\[373b.7\]]du'ang rtog med pas/_/me long nang la rtog med bzhin/_/grol rtogs bya phyir mtha' bral ba/_/mtha' zhes thub par grags pa rnams/_/log pa'i mtha' gnyis bral gzugs med/_/skye 'gag cha shas bral ba dang /_/rang rig mtha' brgyad bzhi gnyis bral/
[\[374a\]]
[\[374a.1\]]mtha' la skyon du rtog byed cing /_/mtha' bral yon tan len byed pa/_/ltos pas thub pa yod pa'i phyir/_/mtha' bral nyid kyang mtha' yi gtso/_/kun rdzob shes yul byed pas 'khrul/_/yang dag mtha' bral shes
[\[374a.2\]]pa'ang /_/mtha' brgyad la sogs grags pa rnams/_/rang rig ye shes snang ba'i phyir/_/spros pa thugs rje'i dus nyid na/_/ming tsam der red med pa'i phyir/_/mtha' dang bral ba gnyis su med/_/sman zhes bya ba'i ga bur dus/_/grang ba'i dug
[\[374a.3\]]dang gnyis med ltar/_/bral rjes brjod pa de kho na/_/thug pa'i mtha' dang dbyer med la/_/gang du'ang thug pa med pa'i phyir/_/mtha' bral bla mar bshad pa yin/_/rnal 'byor dag pa sbyang bya dag_/mthong sgom lam gyi spang bya zhing /_/sngags dang
[\[374a.4\]]phyag rgya spyor rim dag_/dag 'dod dri med chags pas bcings/_/thug pa'i rnam dag zhen pa can/_/rang rang kun tu btags pas non/_/'og mas smad pa'i dri ma rnams/_/dri ma nyid na rnam dag cing /_/blang dor gnyis su med pa la/_/dag dang ma
[\[374a.5\]]dag ris med pas/_/theg pa kun gyi yang kye ste/_/'dam skyes pad+ma ji bzhin no/_/mtshan ma med pa'i rim pa yang /_/grags pa'i mtshan med 'dod pa yis/_/spang dang spel bas phyogs gcig pa/_/'du shes yul la skyon lta zhing /_/de
[\[374a.6\]]med pa la mchog gzhol byed/_/'dod dang zhen pa'i gzung 'dzin can/_/phyi yi bya ba rnal 'byor kyang /_/de phyogs mthun mtshan phyir na brdzun/_/mchog gi mtshan ma med ces pa/_/'du shes kun bdag rang rig phyir/_/yul med de la 'dzin pa
[\[374a.7\]]med/_/de nas phyogs kyi mtshan 'dzin bral/_/de bzhin smon pa med pa yang /_/blo chung ltos pa'i smon byed dang /_/bsal dang len dang smon med gsum/_/'dod pas zhen pa smon pa yin/_/smon pa kun rdzogs rang rig nyid/_/lam dang
[\[374b\]]
[\[374b.1\]]'bras bu dngos gzhi'i phyir/_/'phrul dga'i longs spyod tshul bzhin du/_/gzhan du re smon skye ba med/_/chos nyid dbyings zhes brjod pa'ang /_/spyod yul 'di dag med stong zhing /_/gsal bral stong pa'i chos dbyings dang /_/rang rig
[\[374b.2\]]dag pa'i chos nyid dang /_/mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings sogs pas/_/zhen yul chos can mtha' las ril/_/stong nyid mu mtha' med sogs smra/_/rang rig rtags mthong dbyings shes bya/_/gsang sngags chen po'i chos nyid dbyings/_/chos
[\[374b.3\]]can ma gol dmigs pa'ang med/_/byar med byas med bslad pa'ang med/_/'di dang 'di zhes ris med pa/_/chos nyid dam pa de kho na'o/_/kun 'byung mu med brda khyab med/_/gang yang ma spangs bkol ba med/_/phyogs tshad med de blos rig med/_/
[\[374b.4\]]de phyir gsang ba'i dbyings zhes bya/_/rnam mrangs chos de nam mkha' dang /_/mthu yod phyir na nyer spyar ba'o/_/spros bral shes par bya ba'ang /_/log rtog zhe na spros pa rnams/_/skyon shes sel ba'i phyogs gcig pa/_/phyogs gcig spros pa'i
[\[374b.5\]]mtha' thub bcings/_/rang rig ye shes spros pa'ang /_/spong len byed na spros pa'i mtha'/_/thig le kun nas bzlum pa ltar/_/spros pa lhun 'grub spros bral ni/_/ji snyed spros pa sems nyid phyir/_/rgyu 'dzin med pa'i byang chub sems/_/ming
