[\[374b.6\]]lnga ldan pa'i ye shes ni/_/de nyid chos dbyings rang byung ste/_/mi gnas shes pa lhun 'grub pa/_/de kho de bzhin nyid dam pa'o/_/yul dang ngo bos spros med phyir/_/spros bral kun gyi blor 'gyur yin/_/'gro dang 'ong ba med pa 'di/_/zhen log 'gro 'ong dam
[\[374b.7\]]par med/_/thun mong phyogs gcig 'gro 'ong med/_/dag dang 'od gsal 'gro 'ong med/_/'gro 'ong phyogs la smod byed cing /_/'gro 'ong med phyogs rjes 'brangs pa/_/shes bya shes byed ya cha ba/_/dam pa'i lam du gang la 'gyur/_/'gro 'ong
[\[375a\]]
[\[375a.1\]]kun dang gnyis med pa'i/_/'gro 'ong med pa chen po'o/_/'gro 'ong nyid na med pa'i phyir/_/'ong dang mi 'ong yod med med/_/rgya mtshor 'brel pa'i 'bab chu bzhin/_/yod med mtha' yi pa med/_/rtag pa 'khrul snang
[\[375a.2\]]log snang dang /_/phra rab stong 'khrul rnam snang dang /_/sgyu snang ltar snang rim pa dag_/yod snang la sogs 'dus snang dang /_/bdag rig rang bzhin rkyen bslangs pas/_/lhag snang 'dod pas 'khrul mthong yin/_/snang med snang ba
[\[375a.3\]]kun bdag nyid/_/rang rig ye shes cho 'phrul ni/_/rgya mtsho chu dang rlabs bzhin du/_/byang chub sems nyid kun tu shar/_/'gag pa med pa'i bye brag ni/_/med na mi 'gyur 'gag med dag_/blo bur tsam snang mi 'gog dang /_/'bras bu rdo rje'i
[\[375a.4\]]'gag med gnyis/_/'gag spong de dang bral 'dod na/_/'gag med mtha' la zhen par zad/_/gnyis med 'gag pa med pa ni/_/rang byung ye shes rang snang phyir/_/'gag pa nyid na 'gag med pas/_/nam mkha' lta bur skye 'jig med/_/
[\[375a.5\]]'dod pa zhen pa thob pa dang /_/spangs thob sbyangs thob bgrong pa dang /_/bdag yin las rung thob pa dag_/'dod pas spangs thob phyir na rdzun/_/thob pa med pa'i thob pa ni/_/mtshan ldan long ba mig phyed bzhin/_/thabs la rten pa'i shes rab nyid/_/
[\[375a.6\]]'bras bus shar bar zad/_/gzhi tsam nyid la spang thob med/_/ched du phyed pa'i thob med gnyis/_/lan cing chags pa yod pa'i phyir/_/thog med zhen pa lcags sgrog can/_/bdag nyid chen po thob med ni/_/'bras bu kun bdag rang rig la/_/gnyis
[\[375a.7\]]phyir thob bya'i chos med de/_/dbul mo gter dang phrad nor bzhin/_/byed pos bgrol dang skag grol dang /_/sbyangs pa grol ba phyogs gcig pa/_/thun mong min pa'i bltas grol ba/_/'ching grol gnyis su bltas pas bcings/_/bdag
[\[375b\]]
[\[375b.1\]]nyid chen por dbyer med pa/_/sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de/_/bcings par bya ba med gnyis grol/_/mkha' la 'dud med ji lta bu'o/_/ma rig nyon mongs las sdug bsngal/_/chu bo bzhi las thar pa'ang /_/shin tu ring dang rgyud pa
[\[375b.2\]]dang/_/bkag spangs gsal bas thar pa dang /_/zil gnon sbyor bas thar 'dod pa/_/'dod pa'i rgya mtshor chud pa'i phyir/_/rtsol ba'i chu rgyun phyogs cha khyer/_/mchog dang ring ba'i log lta can/_/chu bo bzhi nyid lam 'bras phyir/_/
[\[375b.3\]]thabs dang shes rab las nyid kyi/_/chu bo nyid la rol spyod pas/_/brgal ba med par rnam par thar/_/chu la nya chen 'phyo ba'am/_/sman sngags ldan pa'i dug nad 'dra'o/_/log pa'i kun rdzob rnam gnyis dang /_/'khrul pa gzhan
[\[375b.4\]]dbang kun rdzob rnams/_/rig pa bzhis bcus bden lta ba'ang /_/yon tan rlabs 'byung lnga yi 'khor/_/tshul mthun rig pas 'bras bur lta/_/lhag pa kun rdzob don dam gnyis/_/bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya/_/thun mong don dam bye
[\[375b.5\]]brag kyang /_/bshad pa cha yis shes par bya/_/rgya mtsho dngas par gza' skar bzhin/_/bden gnyis snang stong dbyer med pa/_/phyogs blta'i mthar thug med pa ni/_/de ka rang bzhin rgyud nyid do/_/zhen pa'i yul la ma chags pa'ang /_/tshim
[\[375b.6\]]dang snying po bar chad sogs/_/chags med 'khrul dang log pa dang /_/bkag spangs phyogs gcig chags pa dang /_/bzlog dang gtang snyoms chags med dang /_/bzhi po chags med chags pas bcings/_/chags med blang dor med pa ni/_/
[\[375b.7\]]chags pa nyid na chags med pas/_/thabs dang shes rab gdeng ldan pas/_/pad+ma la ni de bzhin no/_/kun brtags rang bzhin chos rnams ni/_/rgyud spangs phyogs gcig rang bzhin med/_/phyogs gcig mtha' yi rang bzhin dang /_/chos
[\[376a\]]
[\[376a.1\]]nyid mtshan nyid la sogs pa/_/rang bzhin yod 'dor med bsgrub phyir/_/spong len mthar gyur rang bzhin can/_/nam mkha' dngas pa'i dus nyid dang /_/'ja' sprin tshogs kyi rang bzhin lta/_/brtags pa'i rang bzhin thams
[\[376a.2\]]cad pa/_/de nyid snang phyir gnyis med pa'o/_/de bzhin dngos po med pa dang /_/zhen pa med cing grags pa rnams/_/ye med snga la gcig med gcig la gcig_/med dang zhig med 'dod lta ba/_gzhi la gnyis pa med 'dod pa/_/mi srid gzhi yi dpes mtshon par/_/
[\[376a.3\]]'dod pa snang ris mi mthun par/_/lta ba sngon bzhin rgyu rim bzhin/_/de nyid 'bras lta'i rim pa gnyis/_/drug po 'das pa'i mthar zhen cing /_/phyogs gcig gzhi la gang lta ba/_/sna tshogs snang ba'i gzhi mi rung /_/de des mar me gsal dus na/_/mun pa
[\[376a.4\]]ma sang sgrol med de/_/gsal nyid gnyis su med par lta/_/dngos zhen ma rig ye shes pa/_/spangs dang mi gnas 'gal ba med/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i yon tan ltar/_/dngos gnyis lhun grub cir yang snang /_/chos kun gzhi zhes de phyir bya'o/_/rdzun la sogs
[\[376a.5\]]pa'i rig pa ni/_/rgyu yi gzhi 'dod bden lta ba/_/phyogs gcig yin gyi nges 'jog_/'byung ba'i gzhi rtsar the tshom med/_/thams cad ye nas dbyer med la/_/rig dang ma rig blang dor med/_/gnyis med ston pa'i lung man ngag_/rig pas 'tsham pa go 'byed
[\[376a.6\]]pa/_/dpa' bo'i lag cha ji bzhin du/_/rnam grangs kun kyang rtogs pa'i thabs/_/rig pa med kyang thabs kyi mchog_/yin min chos la rtsod mi byed/_/chos dang gang zag bdag med pa/_/dngos lta'i bdag med nyan thos pas/_/phyogs tsam stong
[\[376a.7\]]pa'i chos bdag med/_/rgyun snang don 'gog bdag med dang /_/gsal ba phyogs gcig bdag med dang /_/rig snang bdag med ye shes snang /_/gsum gnyis spong len byed pa'i phyir/_/bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gtso bo yin/_/phyogs bcu rang
[\[376b\]]
[\[376b.1\]]byung ye shes la/_/rang byung 'di 'dra'i dngos med pas/_/chos dang gang zag yod ma yin/_/la lar nyi ma'ang mun rkyen ltar/_/bdag med ye shes bdag kun ldan/_/gnyis med bdag med bdag nyid che/_/med mthar thug pa 'di la med/_/gzhan med spyod
[\[376b.2\]]yul med pa yang /_/phra bas gzhan pa'i yor po med/_/zab pas rtags pa'i dpyod byed med/_/gzhan pa stong pas med pa dang /_/'khrul pas med pa'i rdzun pas med/_/rig phyir med dang ye shes phyir/_/gzhan med pa'ang de bzhin no/_/de bral
[\[376b.3\]]'dod phyir lcags kyi dkris/_/sngon bzhin thams cad ye shes la/_/ngo bo gcig phyir cha shas med/_/gcig mtha' med pas kun tu shar/_/gnyis su med pas phung gsum med/_/de la smras bsam med pa'i phyir/_/gzung 'dzin lcags kyis bsdoms
[\[376b.4\]]pa med/_/lha rig gnyis kyi sngon brjod pa/_/'dod pa tha dad yul mthong ba'o/_/shes rab spyan gyi ngo bo ste/_/khyad par bshad pa nyid du zad/_/mthong ba'i lam du gcig smra ba'ang /_/bshes gnyen rkyen phrad sngags mthong gi/_/de med rang gi mngon shes
[\[376b.5\]]kyis/_/mthong na bcu pa'ang thob par rigs/_/lta ba'i sgrib pas phye ba'i phyir/_/las dang 'bras bu'i khyad bar che'o/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ye shes la/_/bcu drug gnyis su 'dod pa dang /_/bzhi dang gnyis su gnas 'gyur 'dod/_/rig pa bzhi dang
[\[376b.6\]]lngar 'dod pa/_/rang rang rtogs pa'i don mthong phyir/_/mun pa'i rab mchog yin zhes brjod/_/brgyad drug tshogs bzhi snang bcas pa/_/dpyod yul dngos po snang ngo cog_/rig pas dbang bsgyur bzhin snang dang /_/so so'i ji ltar brtags snang
[\[376b.7\]]dang/_/ngo bos nges pa red med phyir/_/sems nyid 'ba' zhig snang ba yang /_/'khrul dus rang bzhin ma 'khrul dang /_/so so shes pa brgyad chos phyir/_/ming gsum ldan pa'i shes gcig ste/_/gcig dang du ma kun dngos pas/_/ye shes kun
[\[377a\]]
[\[377a.1\]]gyi bdag nyid pa/_/cha yi lnga dang brgyad brjod pa/_/rtsa ba rang byung ye shes so/_/ye nas shes pa'i bdag nyid pas/_/me long blta ba'i tshul bzhin du/_/snang stong chos su grags pa kun/_/kha dog dbyibs sogs rang snang ba'o/_/rtag
[\[377a.2\]]chad phyin ci log pa'i grangs/_/dngos dang ther zug skad cig rgyun/_/mi nyams ngo bo nyid rtag pa/_/tha ma theg mchog bzhed kun dang /_/zhig med ye nas chad pa dang /_/rkyen gyi ring chad la sogs pa/_/med bzhin sngon bzhin gsungs pa yang /_/ched du byas
[\[377a.3\]]pa'i rtag snang zad/_/sum cu brgyad sogs mtha' rnams la/_/spong len bral 'dod zhen chags can/_/bdag med smra ba'i blang dor mkhan/_/blang dor mtha' la mkhan po gnas/_/mchog 'dir mtha' yi grangs de'ang/_/'du shes bzlog phyir brjod pa
[\[377a.4\]]las/_/de dag nyid du 'dod pa med/_/sems phyir mi spong rkun bu yang /_/so so phyogs kyi ma reg pas/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ngo bo la/_/thams cad dag ces bya ba yang /_/dngos po bsal dag ma yin te/_/snang spyod nyid na rnam par dag_/de phyir
[\[377a.5\]]lhag pa zhes su brjod/_/rang bzhin sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i don/_/sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kun/_/ngo bo gcig pa'i de kho na/_/de ni gcig gi mthar thug 'gyur/_/cir yang snang ba'i ye shes nyid/_/bcos med nges pa'i de kho na/_/lhag pa'i ye
[\[377a.6\]]shes sgyu ma de/_/byas 'gro med par ci yang 'khrul/_/nam mkha'i cho 'phrul mtsho rlabs bzhin/_/snang ba'i dus na snang med de/_/dbyer med pa la rim mi phyed/_/de phyir gcig ces mtshon thabs brjod/_/de kho 'dra ba'i mchog yin no/_/tha dad spong ba'i gcig
[\[377a.7\]]'dod pa/_/gcig gi mtha' la zhen pas nor/_/dag pa'i 'og tu gcig pa las/_/ma dag glo bur snang 'dod pa/_/sa bon med pa'i 'bras 'dod pa/_/sa ba rta mtho mi thag sbrul ltar/_/smig rgyu chu zla ltar med pas/_/snang zhes rig pas bsgrub pa
[\[377b\]]
[\[377b.1\]]pa yang /_/'khrul te de na ri bong rwa'ang /_/'byung ba nyid du the tshom med/_/gzhi la 'dra 'khrul chos yod phyir/_/'di 'dra 'khrul pa'i chos med ltar/_/lhun 'grub dbyer med ngang la snang /_/'khor 'das snang yang grub pa med/_/yod pa sun 'byin
[\[377b.2\]]chos 'di la/_/med par smra ba byis pa'i blo/_/med par sun 'byin chos dag la/_/yod lta yin zhes smra ba'ang log_/dbus 'dzin sun 'byin chos dag la/_/gcig tu lta bur byed pa'ang 'khrul/_/mtha' bral 'dzin pa sun 'byin ba/_dri mas
[\[377b.3\]]'gos 'dra nor ba'i mig_/kun gyi 'byung gnas byed pa'o/_/de yis ma byas gang yang med/_/kha dog dbyibs rigs kun dngos dang /_/kha dog dbyibs rigs gang yang min/_/shin tu brtag dka' sus mi rig_/rig med dang la
[\[377b.4\]]thams cad snang /_/byang chub sems zhes brjod pa ni/_/skad cig kun dngos rgyud med phyir/_/gang nas ma 'ong gar mi 'gro/_/rtog med rang rig kho na'o/_/shes byar gyur pa'i chos so cog_/rig pa ye nas rang gsal phyir/_/rang rig shes bya
[\[377b.5\]]dmigs skye med/_/dngos yul tsam yang 'dod ma yin/_/byang chub sems kyi thig le ni/_/kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa/_/kha dog gnas dbyibs ris yod min/_/yon tan mchog gi snying po ni/_/rtog ge'i spyod yul de ma yin/_/mnyam
[\[377b.6\]]pa'i don nyid ji lta bu/_/mnyam nyid rang bzhin gang yang min/_/gnyis phyir min zhes brjod pa las/_/phyogs gcig min pa smra brjod 'das/_/zhen pa bzlog phyir rkyen bshad ma rtogs pa/_/chos kyi ngang la tshig med brjod med pa'ang /_/
[\[377b.7\]]spangs bsal med phyogs log gsum blta ba ste/_/rang bzhin ngo bo mtshan nyid mchog las gol ba ni/_/'og mas spangs pa'i log rtog grangs/_/mtha' yas mi spong rang rig phyir/_/len pa'i chos rnams blang du med/_/blang dor med pa'i
[\[378a\]]
[\[378a.1\]]don mchog ni/_/zhen bral mtha' 'das 'ching grol sogs/_/blang bya kun gyi mchog yin te/_/de nyid bdag yin bla med pa/_/nyams su blang ba'i thabs mchog yin/_/sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de/_/bcings
[\[378a.2\]]par bya ba yod ma yin/_/bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i/_/ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i yon tan ltar/_/bden gsum don kyang de ltar snang /_/don du bden dang mi bden zhes/_/gnyis pa'i rtog pa rang gis med/_/
[\[378a.3\]]de mthong shes rab mchog gi spyan/_/dmigs pa'i yul gyis blta 'dod pa/_/gzung 'dzin lam du zhugs pa'i phyir/_/nam yang lhag pa'i don mi mthong /_/rtog pa'i yid dang rdo rje'i yid/_/snga ma mi spong mi len te/_/de sogs brgyad po'i rigs
[\[378a.4\]]med phyir/_/brgyad bzhi'i tshogs rnams gcig yin te/_/rang rig tshogs gcig dbang drug mchog_/so so'i rgyud du dbyer med de/_/brtags pas tha snyad snang dus na/_/ngo bo gcig pa rdo rje yin/_/yul med rang gsal shes rab spyan/_/shes
[\[378a.5\]]pa spyod yul gnyis su med/_/shes dang shes par bya med pa'i/_/ye shes sgron me sbar bar ni/_/rgyu med rgyun tu rang shar bas/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mthong /_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i shes rab can/_/go tshim myong rag rig
[\[378a.6\]]sogs chos/_/ming grangs drug bzhi gnyis su grangs/_/de ltar nges pa'i lta ba la/_/zhen pa'i lam du 'gro sa med/_/'jug pa'i dus na gcig po nyid/_/nges par rang gsal mi g.yo la/_/rtog ge pa dag de lta na/_/bogs dang yon tan dgag
[\[378a.7\]]'gyur zhes/_/som nyis za gzhi'i yul min pas/_/gnyis su bslabs pa gces par bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te/_/blo rtsol rab kyis rtogs 'gyur cing /_/brjod bzhin shes pa des skye phyir/_/zab brjod zab mor nges par skye/
[\[378b\]]
[\[378b.1\]]zab mo'i tshe na blo can gyis/_/rang gi mtshan nyid mngon rtogs phyir/_/'dod pa med par zhor bogs sogs/_/'byung ba nyid na g.yos pa med/_/rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab lam/_/rim par mngon byas stobs 'gyur na/_/dpag bsam shing dang rin chen
[\[378b.2\]]ltar/_/ngo mtshar rmad 'byung 'bras bu lnga/_/gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te/_/thabs la brten na shes rab nyid/_/de lta bu yi dang du 'byung /_/yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas shes bya/_/rigs 'dzin gsum pa'i gang de nyid/_/srid pa tha ma mdzad rdzogs pas/_/nga yi
[\[378b.3\]]dbang bskur mngon sangs rgyas/_/rdo rje 'dzin par the tshom med/_/skal ba snod shes dad brtson shes/_/mchog rnams kun gyis rtog bya bgyis/_/de bzlog yul min sgro skur la/_/ming tsam don phyir bstan mi bya/_/bskal mun nang gi rin chen nor/_/sgron mes rnyed
[\[378b.4\]]'gyur dbul sel ltar/_/skal ba thugs kyi rin chen nor/_/ston tshig sgron ma 'di rnyed shog_/thugs kyi sgron ma dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//[{D4447}]@/_/lta ba yang dag sgron ma bzhugs/_/@##/_/dpal ldan thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyi ma'i
[\[378b.5\]]'od stong gis/_/shin tu 'bar ba'i zer tsam bdag blo mun par byung /_/dbyangs dang tshig 'das nam mkha'i mtshan nyid las 'das pa'i/_/rang sems skye med zab mo'i don gyi phyogs tsam snang /_/rang gis rtogs pas mkhas pas gsungs pa'i rnam mang ba/_/rtog
[\[378b.6\]]ge bdag 'dra'i spyod yul rtsom par mi 'os kyang /_/rig pa'i brjed byang tsam 'di nges don mos rnams kyis/_/chos phyir 'brang ba'i blo yis dpyad cing goms par bya/_/bskal pa mang por rgyal ba rnams la ni/_/dge rtsa bskyed cing rang sems sbyangs pa yis/_/rnal
[\[378b.7\]]'byor dam pa nges pa'i lung chen la/_/shes rab mchog ldan rig pa'i mos blo gsal/_/rnam par mi rtog don dam rang bzhin gyi/_/rig pa'i tshul chen sems kyis dmigs pa ni/_/lung dang man ngag rigs pas thag bcad de/_/chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag yid
[\[379a\]]
[\[379a.1\]]ches bya/_/ji ltar nam mkha' la ni tha snyad du/_/ming dang tshig gis rjod par byed mod kyi/_/mtshan ma med cing spros dang bral ba ste/_/ngo bo nyid kyis sems kyi yul las 'das/_/ji ltar smig rgyu'i phung po snang ba dag_/snang ba nyid na nam mkha'i rang bzhin
[\[379a.2\]]ltar/_/de bzhin chos rnams sna tshogs ltar snang yang /_/snang ba nyid na mtshan ma nam mkha' bzhin/_/rgya che rab zab theg mchog yangs pa'i lam/_/don dam dmigs med spros pa kun las 'das/_/bdag dang chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa yi/_/dbu ma'i don can blo yi rting du go bar byos/_/
[\[379a.3\]]yang dag don dam cig car go nas ni/_/yod med la sogs sems kyi yul 'das shing /_/re dang dogs pa'i mtha' ni rab spangs nas/_/rtsol ba med pa'i brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/_/chos rnams thams cad ye nas ro gcig phyir/_/bsgom pa dang ni bsgom bya'ang dmigs su med/_/
[\[379a.4\]]sems nyid ye nas chos nyid yin shes na/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid gzhan du bsgom mi dgos/_/rmi lam dag gi bde dang sdug bsngal dag_/sad par gyur na rang bzhin mnyam pa ltar/_/rnam par rtog dang mi rtog gnyis ka yang /_/shes pas rig na rang bzhin yongs kyis mnyam/_/
[\[379a.5\]]de ltar dus gsum rnam par dag pa dag_/rang bzhin nyid las ma 'das shes na ni/_/sgro 'dogs gus pa'i rjes su ma 'brangs na/_/rang bzhin ngang du yong gis bcos mi dgos/_/ji ltar nam mkha' mtshan ma med pa'i phyir/_/nam mkha' de nyid bsgom par mi 'gyur bzhin/_/ngo bo
[\[379a.6\]]nyid kyis ma skyes sems kyis ni/_/ma skyes de nyid bsgom par ga la 'gyur/_/mi mthun pa dang gnyan po dbyer med don/_/rang gis shes na rtsol ba kun spangs te/_/btang snyoms chen por ma bcos ngang bzhag na/_/tha snyad tsam du'ang bsgom zhes de la bya/_/skyon dang yon tan
[\[379a.7\]]gnyis po ma skyes phyir/_/rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma ci byung yang /_/ma bkag rang byung ma 'brangs rang zhi ste/_/ma bcos ma byas rang gi ngang gis gsal/_/lta ba yang dag sgron ma rdzogs so//_//A tsar+ya dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'o//_//[{D4448}]@/_/mtha'i mun sel
[\[379b\]]
[\[379b.1\]]sgron ma bzhugs/_@##/_//chos rnams sems kyi 'khrul pa ste/_/sems las ma gtogs chos rnams med/_/chos su snang ba 'khrul pa'i sems/_/rten 'brel sgyu ma skye ba med/_/skye ba med ces bstan pa'ang /_/dngos por 'dzin pa bzlog phyir te/_/sgyu ma ye nas skye med la/_/
[\[379b.2\]]skye med snyad kyi sgra mi gdags/_/nam mkha' 'di ni med do zhes/_/blun po gang zhig rtog par byed/_/mkhas pa sngon nas yod mi 'dzin/_/med par mi rtog tshig mi brjod/_/sems las ma gtogs chos med phyir/_/bsgom bya'i chos nyid gud na med/_/sems kyang ye nas ma skyes na/_/
[\[379b.3\]]bsgom pa po'ang gang la yod/_/brjod pa'i rtsa ba sems nyid ni/_/ma skyes dngos gzhi yod min na/_/bsgom dang bsgom du med pa yi/_/tha snyad gang zhig gang la 'jug_/'gro la sems rgyud gnyis mi 'chang /_/de ni ma skyes rang mi dmigs/_/de las gzhan pa'i sems med phyir/_/
[\[379b.4\]]bcos shing gnas pa gang zhig yod/_/'khrul rtog rkyen dang ldan gyi bar/_/smig rgyu bzhin du sems snang na/_/rang bzhin shes pas bcos su med/_/mi shes smig rgyu bcos pa bzhin/_/mi rtog mtshan med sems rnams kyis/_/ma rtogs mtshan ma med la'ang gnas ma byed/_/
[\[379b.5\]]mtshan ma med la mi gnas na/_/mtshan mar gnas pa smos ci dgos/_/bsgrub pa med cing gnas pa med/_/'du byed med pa mkha' 'dra bas/_/'du byed las byung bsam gtan skyon/_/ma lus kun gyis gos pa med/_/ji ltar rtog med zab mo zhig_/blo yi yul du snang zhe na/_/mi
[\[379b.6\]]rtog zab mo'i nyams myong ba/_/myong ba yin phyir de nyid min/_/lta ba dgum chung /_mtha'i mun sel sgron ma/_bod kyi paN+Di ta A tsar+ya gnyan dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'o//_//[{D4449}]@/_/thabs shes sgron ma bzhugs/_/@##/_/dus gsum rgyal bas ji ltar thugs chud pa'i/_/chos
[\[379b.7\]]kyi rang bzhin rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/ma thob thob phyir brtson par mi byed kyang /_/snying rje'i bye brag thabs kyi spyod pa'ang ston/_/ji ltar mkha' la 'ja' tshon rnam mang yang /_/nam mkha'i ngang du ro gcig bye brag med/_/de bzhin rgyal ba'i gzugs sku rnam mang yang /_/ye shes dbyings
[\[380a\]]
[\[380a.1\]]su ro gcig bye brag med/_/bde gshegs snying po sems kyi rang bzhin la/_/yun ring dus nas rmongs pa'i sems can rnams/_/bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems rgyud so sor snang /_/rang bzhin nyid ni rgyal ba'i chos skur gcig_/ye shes sgyu mar snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_/
[\[380a.2\]]log rtog sgyu mar snang ba'i sems can gnyis/_/ye shes log rtog khyad par bsam yas kyang /_/sgyu ma yin phyir rang bzhin yongs kyis mnyam/_/sems can sangs rgyas bden par tshul gcig cing /_/rang gi sems nyid sangs rgyas yin shes na/_/gzhan nas bsgrub par bya
[\[380a.3\]]ba ci yang med/_/de lta bas na spang bar bya ba'ang med/_/'di lta bu yi chos kyi tshul rig na/_/ma rig rnams la snying rje yongs kyis skye/_/snying rje skyes nas sgyu ma'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/phan 'dogs thabs kyi spyod pa cir yang ston/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pa ji lta ba/_/sems kyi rang bzhin
[\[380a.4\]]gnam med de ltar bsgom/_/thugs rje'i 'bad pa rab 'byams ji lta ba/_/rnal 'byor thabs kyi ting 'dzin de ltar spral/_/bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir/_/pha rol phyin drug dmigs med rdzogs par ldan/_/thabs kyi spyod pas gdul bya kun 'dul yang /_/sgyu ma'i blo ldan
[\[380a.5\]]rlom sems ci yang med/_/ma skyes sems la sems can med pa'i phyir/_/ngo bo nyid kyi chos sku'i nga rgyal 'chang /_/chos kun sgyu mar mngon sum gsal ba'i phyir/_/ting 'dzin sgyu mas ci 'dus de ltar ston/_/chos sku mnyam nyid rtogs nas 'gro don du/_/bde gshegs byin rlabs cing
[\[380a.6\]]yang ston pa ltar/_/bdag nyid chos sku rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/thabs kyi bye brag da nas de ltar brjod/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i sgron ma rdzogs so//_//slob dpon dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'o//_//[{D4450}]@/_/rnal 'byor spyod ba'i lugs nges pa'i don la ji bzhin sgom thabs kyi sgron ma
[\[380a.7\]]bzhugs/__/@##/_/ji bzhin pa yi chos brtson par/_/chos la chos ni mi 'jug ste/_/ji tsam zab pa'i tshig brjod kyang /_/don dang mthun par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems ni ci la 'ang mi gnas dang /_/ci la'ang mi dmigs shes bya ba/_/sems la gnas dmigs skyon sel ba'i/_/sems 'dzin
[\[380b\]]
[\[380b.1\]]phra mo de la yod/_/smig rgyu bzhin du sems med na/_/mi gnas mi dmigs byed pa gang /_/nam mkha' rang la'ang mi gnas shes/_/bsgom pa don dang ldan ma yin/_/de bzhin skyil krung drang 'dug dang /_/lus kyi bcos pa thams cad kyang /_/lus rtog mngon par zhen las byung /_/lus med
[\[380b.2\]]mkha' la bcos su med/_/sgyu ma bzhin du lus shes na/_/drang 'dug skyil krung 'cha' ba med/_/spyod lam gsum gyis gnas pa gang /_/ched du bya med byed pa'ang med/_/lus sems ma skyes gzhi med pa/_/mkha' ltar bcos pa'i kha na med/_/tshad mar lus sems 'chos byed pa/_/'dzin
[\[380b.3\]]pa'i phur pa de la yod/_/ji ltar mtshan med nam mkha' ni/_/dmigs dang dmigs med rtsol dang bral/_/de bzhin sems nyid nam mkha' yang /_/rang bzhin nyid kyis de lta'o/_/las la sogs kyang de bzhin te/_/rtsol ba med phyir gang ltar yang /_/gnas pa med de mi gnas na/_/
[\[380b.4\]]mi 'gal tsam du gyur pa yin/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lugs nges pa'i don la ji bzhin bsgom thabs rdzogs so//_//man ngag dgum chung /_gnyan dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'o//_//[{D4451}]@/_/lta ba rin chen sgron ma bzhugs/_/@##/_/gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub
[\[380b.5\]]sems/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dang ye nas mnyam/_/rig dang gti mug sgyu ma'i khyad par las/_/srid dang rnam grol rgyu dang 'bras bur snang /_/dngos po med phyir dngos por rtog pa'ang med/_/chos can mi dmigs chos nyid yod ma yin/_/zhen pa bzlog phyir rkyen bshad ma gtogs
[\[380b.6\]]pa/_/chos kyi ngang la tshig med brjod du med/_/snang ba nyid na med pa'i smig rgyu la/_/shes ldan rnams ni med pa'i blo mi 'byung /_/chos rnams rang bzhin ma skyes rtogs pa yi/_/mkhas pas skye med stong par sgro mi 'dogs/_/ji bzhin ma skyes gdod nas zhi ba yi/_/gnyis med spros bral rang rig
[\[380b.7\]]blo ldan pa/_/brjod med ngang tsam du yang mi gnas na/_/dngos dang tha snyad 'dzin par ga la 'gyur/_/bdag med chos sku byang chub snying po bas/_/gzhan nas btsal zhing thob ba ma yin yang /_/rmi lam sad nas gzugs dang bral ba bzhin/_/sgrib spangs byang chub thob ces rgyal bas gsungs/
[\[381a\]]
[\[381a.1\]]rmi lam skyes bus dug 'thungs ji bzhin du/_/srid rgyu nyon mongs las rnams de ltar shes/_/rmi lam dug nad sdug bsngal bzod dka' ba/_/skye rgas na 'chi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yin/_/rmi lam nad sel sman dang 'dra ba ni/_/'phags lam rnam thar mang por rig par
[\[381a.2\]]bya/_/sdug bsngal khad kyis 'byor pa'i skad cig ma/_/shes rab ting 'dzin khyad par skye ba'i tshul/_/rmi lam nad bsal sos pa'i bde rnyed pa/_/sems kyi rang bzhin byang chub thob pa'i dpe/_/rmi lam nyid na rgyu 'bras mi bslu bzhin/_/ma rig gnyid log rnams la de ltar nges/_/rmongs pa'i
[\[381a.3\]]gnyid sad shes rab ldan pa dang /_/'khor ba rmi lam lta bu'i dbang tsam du/_/'phags lam don brtson 'bras bu rig par gsal/_/rang bzhin mi 'gyur thob pa'i rlom sems med/_/mnyam pa'i don nyid blo dang ma mnyam na/_/tshig gi mnyam pas rtog pa'i klung mi bzlogs/_/dmyal
[\[381a.4\]]sogs 'khor ba mnyam las ma g.yos kyang /_/sdug bsngal mi zad srid las 'khyam/_/ye nas rnam dag thob la med rig nas/_/shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor rab brtson zhing /_/sku gsung che ba'i yon tan kun bsdus pas/_/mtshan ma'i nyes dang ldan pa ga la yin/_/shes rab mchog gis
[\[381a.5\]]log rtog sems sbyangs nas/_/ye shes tshogs chen rgyal ba chos kyi sku/_/dpe byad mtshan gyis ting 'dzin dbang thob nas/_/bsod nams tshogs chen rgyal ba gzugs kyi sku/_/rnam smin tshul gyis grub par mi lta zhing /_/ye shes gzhan nas thob par mi byed de/_/sku gsum ji bzhin
[\[381a.6\]]sbyor bas 'bras bu'i mchog_/rtsol byas bsgrub pa'i dbang gi rgyu yang yin/_/rang sems rnal 'byor shes rab ting 'dzin yin/_/sems can nyid na bde gshegs yul la 'jug_/dag pa'i zhing du smon par mi byed de/_/snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas su bsgom/_/shes rab gnas med
[\[381a.7\]]chags pa'i rdul bral yang /_/snying rje sems can khams la skyo ba med/_/sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ma 'gags mngon sum ste/_/mtshan med ro gcig don dam dbyings su rtogs/_/slob dpon dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'i lta ba rin po che'i sgron ma rdzogs so//_//
